52#define VIEW_STATE_SNAP 0x0000
53#define VIEW_STATE_GRIP 0x0001
54#define VIEW_STATE_RULER 0x0002
55#define VIEW_STATE_ORTHO 0x0004
56#define VIEW_STATE_POLAR 0x0008
57#define VIEW_STATE_QSNAP 0x0010
58#define VIEW_STATE_QTRACK 0x0020
59#define VIEW_STATE_LWT 0x0040
60#define VIEW_STATE_REAL 0x0080
61#define VIEW_STATE_CLOSEABLE 0x0100
62#define VIEW_STATE_USE_LOGO 0x0200
63#define VIEW_STATE_USE_TEXTURE 0x0400
64#define VIEW_STATE_USE_COLOR 0x0800
65#define VIEW_STATE_GRID 0x1000

90/* object values
91 * -------------
92 *
93 * The object flag describing which object
94 * the action is intended for or "Null" for global effects
95 * like duplicating a pattern.
96 */
97/* NOTE: Allow this enum to evaluate false */
98#define OBJ_TYPE_NULL 0
99/* NOTE: Values >= 65536 ensure compatibility with qgraphicsitem_cast() */
100#define OBJ_TYPE_BASE 0
101#define OBJ_TYPE_ARC 1
102#define OBJ_TYPE_BLOCK 2
103#define OBJ_TYPE_CIRCLE 3
104#define OBJ_TYPE_DIMALIGNED 4
105#define OBJ_TYPE_DIMANGULAR 5
106#define OBJ_TYPE_DIMARCLENGTH 6
107#define OBJ_TYPE_DIMDIAMETER 7
108#define OBJ_TYPE_DIMLEADER 8
109#define OBJ_TYPE_DIMLINEAR 9
110#define OBJ_TYPE_DIMORDINATE 10
111#define OBJ_TYPE_DIMRADIUS 11
112#define OBJ_TYPE_ELLIPSE 12
113#define OBJ_TYPE_ELLIPSEARC 13
114#define OBJ_TYPE_RUBBER 14
115#define OBJ_TYPE_GRID 15
116#define OBJ_TYPE_HATCH 16
117#define OBJ_TYPE_IMAGE 17
118#define OBJ_TYPE_INFINITELINE 18
119#define OBJ_TYPE_LINE 19
120#define OBJ_TYPE_PATH 20
121#define OBJ_TYPE_POINT 21
122#define OBJ_TYPE_POLYGON 22
123#define OBJ_TYPE_POLYLINE 23
124#define OBJ_TYPE_RAY 24
125#define OBJ_TYPE_RECTANGLE 25
126#define OBJ_TYPE_SLOT 26
127#define OBJ_TYPE_SPLINE 27
128#define OBJ_TYPE_TEXTMULTI 28
129#define OBJ_TYPE_TEXTSINGLE 29
130#define OBJ_TYPE_UNKNOWN 30

132/* CAD Linetypes
133 *(CONT, CENTER, DOT, HIDDEN, PHANTOM, ZIGZAG)
134 *
135 * Embroidery Stitchtypes
136 * RUNNING ---------
137 * SATIN VVVVVVVVV
138 * FISHBONE >>>>>>>>>
139 */
140#define OBJ_LTYPE_CONT 0
141#define OBJ_LTYPE_CENTER 1
142#define OBJ_LTYPE_DOT 2
143#define OBJ_LTYPE_HIDDEN 3
144#define OBJ_LTYPE_PHANTOM 4
145#define OBJ_LTYPE_ZIGZAG 5
146#define OBJ_LTYPE_RUNNING 6
147#define OBJ_LTYPE_SATIN 7
148#define OBJ_LTYPE_FISHBONE 8

223#define OBJ_RUBBER_POLYLINE 18
224#define OBJ_RUBBER_IMAGE 19

266// Custom Data used in QGraphicsItems
267
268//(int, QVariant)
269// I.E. object.setData(OBJ_TYPE, OBJ_TYPE_LINE);
270// I.E. object.setData(OBJ_LAYER, "OUTLINE");
271// I.E. object.setData(OBJ_COLOR, 123);
272// I.E. object.setData(OBJ_LTYPE, OBJ_LTYPE_CONT);
273
274// Keys
275enum OBJ_KEYS {
276OBJ_TYPE = 0, //value type - int: See OBJ_TYPE_VALUES
277OBJ_NAME = 1, //value type - str: See OBJ_NAME_VALUES
278OBJ_LAYER = 2, //value type - str: "USER", "DEFINED", "STRINGS", etc...
279OBJ_COLOR = 3, //value type - int: 0-255 //TODO: Use color chart in formats/format-dxf.h for this
280OBJ_LTYPE = 4, //value type - int: See OBJ_LTYPE_VALUES
281OBJ_LWT = 5, //value type - int: 0-27
282OBJ_RUBBER = 6 //value type - int: See OBJ_RUBBER_VALUES
283};
284

286#define ENABLE_REAL "ENABLE_REAL"

393 {
394 .label = "Center X",
395 .icon = "blank",
396 .type = "double",
397 .signal = "lineEditCircleCenterX",
398 .user_editable = false
399 },
400 {
401 .label = "Center Y",
402 .icon = "blank",
403 .type = "double",
404 .signal = "lineEditCircleCenterY",
405 .user_editable = false
406 },
407 {
408 .label = "Radius",
409 .icon = "blank",
410 .type = "double",

448#define OBJ_RUBBER_OFF 0
449#define OBJ_RUBBER_CIRCLE_1P_RAD 1
453#define OBJ_RUBBER_CIRCLE_1P_DIA 2
458#define OBJ_RUBBER_MODES 3
466#define EMB_BLOCK -1
467 /*< For the block type, that has to exist for SVG. */
468#define EMB_DIM_ALIGNED -2
469 /*< For the Aligned Dimension, that has to exist for DXF drawings. */
470#define EMB_DIM_ANGULAR -20
471 /*< For the Angular Dimension, that has to exist for DXF drawings. */
472#define EMB_DIM_ARCLENGTH -3
473 /*< For the Arc Length Dimension, that has to exist for DXF drawings. */
474#define EMB_DIM_LINEAR -4
475 /*< For the Linear Dimension, that has to exist for DXF drawings. */
476#define EMB_DIM_RADIUS -5
477 /*< For the Radial Dimension, that has to exist for DXF drawings. */
478#define EMB_DIM_ORDINATE -6
479 /*< For the Ordinate Dimension, that has to exist for DXF drawings. */
480#define EMB_INFINITELINE -7
481 /*< For the Infinite Line object. Which should be removed from output as it exists
482 for drafting reasons. */
483#define EMB_RAY -8
484 /*< For the Ray object. */
485

543#define JUSTIFY_RIGHT 1

589typedef struct UiObject_ {
590 char fname[200]; /*< \todo document this */
591 char command[200]; /*< \todo document this */
592 bool firstRun; /*< If this UiObject has been put through the
593 user interaction processor. */
594 EmbVector controlPoints[10]; /*< Storage for however many Rubber Points the
595 design needs. */
596 char controlPointLabels[10][200]; /*< Storage for the labels for the Rubber Points
597 using the same indexing. */
598 int n_controlPoints; /*< The number of entries in the controlPoints
599 and controlPointsLabels. */
600 int numPoints; /*< The number of points if we consider the object as a Polygon. */
601 int minPoints; /*< The minimum number of points needed to make the
602 polygon look somewhat like the design. */
603 int maxPoints; /*< The maximum number of points before adding more will
604 do nothing but slow down the program. */
605 EmbVector center; /*< Where the polygon is centered. */
606 EmbVector scale; /*< The scale of the object: note that the default
607 may not be (1.0, 1.0). */
608 EmbReal rotation; /*< \todo document this */
609 unsigned int mode; /*< The mode argument records what kind of design we are
610 using and how to interact with it. */
611 char path_desc[1000]; /*< The SVG style path spec. */
612 char text[200]; /*< The text to be rendered to the scene. */
613 int textJustify; /*< One of the JUSTIFY_* constants representing what kind
614 of alignment to use. */
615 char textFont[200]; /*< The file name of the font to use. */
616 float textHeight; /*< The text height. */
617 float textRotation; /*< The rotation of the text in the scene. */
618 GLuint texture_id; /*< Pointer to a texture that may be rendered to the object. */
619 char id[200]; /*< \todo document this */
620 int pattern_index; /*< \todo document this */
621 char type[200]; /*< \todo document this */
622 int object_index; /*< \todo document this */
623 bool selectable; /*< \todo document this */
624 EmbColor color; /*< \todo document this */
625} UiObject;
626
630typedef struct UndoHistory_ {
631 char data[100][200]; /*< \todo document this */
632 int length; /*< \todo document this */
633 int position; /*< \todo document this */
634 int max_length; /*< \todo document this */
635} UndoHistory;
636
640typedef struct IndexEntry_ {
641 char key[200]; /*< \todo document this */
642 Dictionary *value; /*< \todo document this */
643} IndexEntry;
644
648typedef struct Index_ {
649 IndexEntry *data; /*< \todo document this */
650 int length; /*< \todo document this */
651 int max_length; /*< \todo document this */
652} Index;
653
661typedef struct View_ {
662 EmbPattern *pattern; /*< \todo document this */
663 EmbVector origin; /*< \todo document this */
664 float scale; /*< \todo document this */
665 char grid_type[200]; /*< \todo document this */
666 int ui_mode; /*< \todo document this */
667 bool snap_mode; /*< \todo document this */
668 bool grid_mode; /*< \todo document this */
669 bool ruler_mode; /*< \todo document this */
670 bool ortho_mode; /*< \todo document this */
671 bool polar_mode; /*< \todo document this */
672 bool qsnap_mode; /*< \todo document this */
673 bool qtrack_mode; /*< \todo document this */
674 bool lwt_mode; /*< \todo document this */
675 bool real_render; /*< \todo document this */
676 bool metric; /*< \todo document this */
677 bool simulate; /*< \todo document this */
678 clock_t simulation_start; /*< \todo document this */
679 char text_font[200]; /*< \todo document this */
680 float text_size; /*< \todo document this */
681 float text_angle; /*< \todo document this */
682 bool text_style_bold; /*< \todo document this */
683 bool text_style_italic; /*< \todo document this */
684 bool text_style_underline; /*< \todo document this */
685 bool text_style_overline; /*< \todo document this */
686 bool text_style_strikeout; /*< \todo document this */
687 char filename[200]; /*< \todo document this */
688 UndoHistory undo_history; /*< \todo document this */
689 int selected[100]; /*< \todo document this */
690 int n_selected; /*< \todo document this */
691 int rubber_mode; /*< . */
692} View;
693
704typedef struct Settings_ {
705 char version[200]; /*< \todo document this */
706 bool running; /*< \todo document this */
707 bool testing; /*< \todo document this */
708 int debug_mode; /*< \todo document this */
709 bool show_about_dialog; /*< \todo document this */
710 bool show_settings_editor; /*< \todo document this */
711 bool show_editor; /*< \todo document this */
712 bool show_details_dialog; /*< \todo document this */
713 bool show_open_file_dialog; /*< \todo document this */
714 int icon_size; /*< \todo document this */
715 char icon_theme[200]; /*< \todo document this */
716 int pattern_index; /*< \todo document this */
717 char assets_dir[200]; /*< \todo document this */
718 bool use_translation; /*< \todo document this */
719 char language[200]; /*< \todo document this */
720 bool mdi_bg_use_logo; /*< \todo document this */

722 bool mdi_bg_use_color; /*< \todo document this */

728 bool general_system_help_browser; /*< \todo document this */

1003
1007Settings settings = {
1008 .version = "2.0.0-alpha",
1009 .running = true,
1010 .testing = false,
1011 .debug_mode = 1,
1012 .show_about_dialog = false,
1013 .show_settings_editor = false,
1014 .show_editor = false,
1015 .show_details_dialog = false,
1016 .show_open_file_dialog = false,
1017 .icon_size = 16,
1018 .icon_theme = "default",
1019 .pattern_index = 0,
1020 .assets_dir = "assets/",
1021 .use_translation = false,
1022 .language = "default",
1023 .mdi_bg_use_logo = true,
1024 .mdi_bg_use_texture = true,
1025 .mdi_bg_use_color = true,
1026 .general_mdi_bg_logo = "./images/logo-spirals.png",
1027 .general_mdi_bg_texture = "./images/texture-spirals.png",
1028 .general_mdi_bg_color = 0xAAAAAAFF,
1029 .tip_of_the_day = true,
1030 .general_current_tip = 0,
1031 .general_system_help_browser = true,
1032 .display_use_opengl = false,
1033 .display_renderhint_aa = false,
1034 .display_renderhint_text_aa = false,
1035 .display_renderhint_smooth_pix = false,
1036 .display_renderhint_high_aa = false,
1037 .display_renderhint_noncosmetic = false,
1038 .display_show_scrollbars = true,
1039 .display_scrollbar_widget_num = 0,
1040 .display_crosshair_color = 0x000000FF,
1041 .display_bg_color = 0xEEEEEEFF,
1042 .display_selectbox_left_color = 0x008000FF,
1043 .display_selectbox_left_fill = 0x00FF00FF,
1044 .display_selectbox_right_color = 0x000080FF,
1045 .display_selectbox_right_fill = 0x0000FFFF,
1046 .display_selectbox_alpha = 32,
1047 .display_zoomscale_in = 2.0,
1048 .display_zoomscale_out = 0.5,
1049 .display_crosshair_percent = 5,
1050 .display_units = "mm",
1051 .opensave_custom_filter = "supported",
1052 .opensave_open_format = "*.*",
1053 .opensave_open_thumbnail = false,
1054 .opensave_save_format = "*.*",
1055 .opensave_save_thumbnail = false,
1056 .opensave_recent_max_files = 10,
1057 // .opensave_recent_list_of_files = {},
1058 .opensave_recent_directory = "./samples",
1059 .opensave_trim_dst_num_jumps = 5,
1060 .printing_default_device = "",
1061 .printing_use_last_device = false,
1062 .printing_disable_bg = true,
1063 .grid_show_on_load = true,
1064 .grid_show_origin = true,
1065 .grid_color_match_crosshair = true,
1066 .grid_color = 0x000000FF,
1067 .grid_load_from_file = true,
1068 .grid_type = "Rectangular",
1069 .grid_center_on_origin = true,
1070 .grid_center.x = 0.0,
1071 .grid_center.y = 0.0,
1072 .grid_size_x = 100.0,
1073 .grid_size_y = 100.0,
1074 .grid_spacing_x = 25.0,
1075 .grid_spacing_y = 25.0,
1076 .grid_size_radius = 50.0,
1077 .grid_spacing_radius = 25.0,
1078 .grid_spacing_angle = 45.0,
1079 .ruler_show_on_load = true,
1080 .ruler_metric = true,
1081 .ruler_color = 0xAAAA55FF, //qRgb(210,210, 50);
1082 .ruler_pixel_size = 20,
1083 .qsnap_enabled = true,
1084 .qsnap_locator_color = 0xFFFF00FF,
1085 .qsnap_locator_size = 4,
1086 .qsnap_aperture_size = 10,
1087 .qsnap_endpoint = true,
1088 .qsnap_midpoint = true,
1089 .qsnap_center = true,
1090 .qsnap_node = true,
1091 .qsnap_quadrant = true,
1092 .qsnap_intersection = true,
1093 .qsnap_extension = true,
1094 .qsnap_insertion = false,
1095 .qsnap_perpendicular = true,
1096 .qsnap_tangent = true,
1097 .qsnap_nearest = false,
1098 .qsnap_apparent = false,
1099 .qsnap_parallel = false,
1100 .lwt_show_lwt = false,
1101 .lwt_real_render = true,
1102 .lwt_default_lwt = 0,
1103 .selection_mode_pickfirst = true,
1104 .selection_mode_pickadd = true,
1105 .selection_mode_pickdrag = false,
1106 .selection_coolgrip_color = 0x0000FFFF,
1107 .selection_hotgrip_color = 0xFF0000FF,

1110 .text_font = "Arial",

1117 .text_style_strikeout = false,
1118 .zoomInLimit = 1.0e-10,
1119 .zoomOutLimit = 1.0e10,
1120 .grid_spacing = {40.0, 40.0},
1121 .ruler_width = 50.0f,
1122 .tick_depth = 30.0f,
1123 .major_tick_seperation = 10.0f,
1124 .needle_speed = 100.0,
1125 .stitch_time = 0.1

1128
1129Index *menu_layout; /*< */
1130Index *toolbar_layout; /*< */
1131View views[50]; /*< */
1132int n_views = 0; /*< */
1133char menu_action[200]; /*< */
1134char current_directory[200] = "/"; /*< */
1135char to_open[200] = ""; /*< This char array is for the open file dialog to store what */
1136
1141char settings_dir[200];
1142
1146char settings_file[200];
1147
1152static Settings dialog, preview;
1153
1157bool just_opened = true;
1158
1162Dictionary *translation_table;
1163
1169View *active_view = NULL;
1170
1181int
1182main(int argc, char *argv[])
1183{
1184 char command[200];
1185 strcpy(command, "open");
1186 parse_command(argc, argv, command);
1187 if (!settings.running) {
1188 return 0;
1189 }
1190
1191 strcpy(settings_file, "./settings.toml");
1192 read_settings(settings_file);
1193 load_configuration();
1194
1195 if (strcmp(command, "open")) {
1196 actuator(command);
1197 }
1198
1199 EmbColor ruler_color_ = {150, 170, 0};
1200 EmbColor black_color_ = {0, 0, 0};
1201 EmbColor white_color_ = {255, 255, 255};
1202 settings.ruler_color = embColor_to_int(ruler_color_, 255);
1203 settings.ticks_color = embColor_to_int(black_color_, 255);
1204 settings.grid_color = embColor_to_int(black_color_, 255);
1205 settings.shine_color = embColor_to_int(white_color_, 20);
1206
1207 int width = 1080;
1208 int height = 576;
1209 if (!glfwInit()) {
1210 log_debug("ERROR: Failed to initialise GLFW.");
1211 return 2;
1212 }
1213 char title[200];
1214 sprintf(title, "Embroidermodder %s", settings.version);
1215 GLFWwindow *window = glfwCreateWindow(width, height, title, NULL, NULL);
1216 if (!window) {
1217 log_debug("Failed to create GLFW window.");
1218 glfwTerminate();
1219 return 1;
1220 }
1221 glfwMakeContextCurrent(window);
1222
1223 char font_file[200];
1224 sprintf(font_file, "%sfonts/SourceSans3-Regular.ttf", settings.assets_dir);
1225
1226 setup_imgui(window);
1227 set_style(font_file);
1228 load_textures(settings.texture_list);
1229
1230 while (!glfwWindowShouldClose(window)) {
1231 glfwPollEvents();
1232
1233 imgui_new_frame();
1234
1235 setup_main_widget();
1236
1237 strcpy(menu_action, "");
1238
1243 if (begin_menu_bar()) {
1244 load_menu("File");
1245 load_menu("Edit");
1246 load_menu("View");
1247 load_menu("Tools");
1248 load_menu("Draw");
1249 load_menu("Window");
1250 load_menu("Settings");
1251 load_menu("Help");
1252 end_menu_bar();
1253 }
1254
1256 load_toolbar("File");
1257 same_line();
1258 load_toolbar("Edit");
1259 same_line();
1260 load_toolbar("Help");
1261 same_line();
1262 load_toolbar("Icon");
1263 same_line();
1264 load_toolbar("Draw");
1265
1266 load_toolbar("Zoom");
1267 same_line();
1268 load_toolbar("Pan");
1269 same_line();
1270 load_toolbar("View");
1271
1272 load_toolbar("Layer");
1273 same_line();
1274 load_toolbar("Properties");
1275
1276 load_toolbar("Text");
1277
1278 if (strlen(menu_action)) {
1279 actuator(menu_action);
1280 }
1281
1282 if (n_views > 0) {
1283 if (begin_tab_bar("Tab Bar")) {
1284 for (int i=0; i<n_views; i++) {
1285 create_tab(i);
1286 }
1287 end_tab_bar();
1288 }
1289 }
1290 else {
1291 //EmbVector size = {500, 300};
1292 //ImGui::Image((void*)(intptr_t)textures["texture-spirals"], size);
1293 }
1294
1295 if (settings.show_about_dialog) {
1296 about_dialog();
1297 }
1298
1299 if (settings.show_details_dialog) {
1300 details_dialog();
1301 }
1302
1303 if (settings.show_open_file_dialog) {
1304 open_file_dialog();
1305 }
1306
1307 if (settings.show_settings_editor) {
1308 settings_editor();
1309 }
1310
1329 //ImGuiIO &io = ImGui_GetIO();
1330 //ImGui_SetNextWindowSize(EmbVector(50, 100));
1331 // ImGui_SetNextWindowPos(EmbVector(io.DisplaySize.x, io.DisplaySize.y - 50));
1332 //ImGui_BeginChild("Statusbar");
1333 if (button("SNAP")) {
1334 views[settings.pattern_index].snap_mode = !views[settings.pattern_index].snap_mode;
1335 /* change button depressed state */
1336 }
1337 same_line();
1338 if (button("GRID")) {
1339 views[settings.pattern_index].grid_mode = !views[settings.pattern_index].grid_mode;
1340 }
1341 same_line();
1342 if (button("RULER")) {
1343 views[settings.pattern_index].ruler_mode = !views[settings.pattern_index].ruler_mode;
1344 }
1345 same_line();
1346 if (button("ORTHO")) {
1347 views[settings.pattern_index].ortho_mode = !views[settings.pattern_index].ortho_mode;
1348 }
1349 same_line();
1350 if (button("POLAR")) {
1351 views[settings.pattern_index].polar_mode = !views[settings.pattern_index].polar_mode;
1352 }
1353 same_line();
1354 if (button("QSNAP")) {
1355 views[settings.pattern_index].qsnap_mode = !views[settings.pattern_index].qsnap_mode;
1356 }
1357 same_line();
1358 if (button("QTRACK")) {
1359 views[settings.pattern_index].qtrack_mode = !views[settings.pattern_index].qtrack_mode;
1360 }
1361 same_line();
1362 if (button("LWT")) {
1363 views[settings.pattern_index].lwt_mode = !views[settings.pattern_index].lwt_mode;
1364 }
1365 same_line();
1366 translated_text("\todo Mouse co-ordinates here.");
1367
1368 // statusBarMouseCoord->setMinimumWidth(300); // Must fit this text always
1369 // statusBarMouseCoord->setMaximumWidth(300); // "+1.2345E+99, +1.2345E+99, +1.2345E+99"
1370 //ImGui_EndChild();
1371
1372 end_ui();
1373
1374 imgui_render(window);
1375
1376 glfwMakeContextCurrent(window);
1377 glfwSwapBuffers(window);
1378 if (!settings.running) {
1379 break;
1380 }
1381 }
1382
1383 glfwDestroyWindow(window);
1384 glfwTerminate();
1385
1386 return 0;
1387}
1388
1420int
1421run_script(const char *filename)
1422{
1423 char line[200];
1424 FILE *f;
1425 int line_pos = 0;
1426 f = fopen(filename, "r");
1427 char c;
1428 while (fread(&c, 1, 1, f)) {
1429 if (c != '\n') {
1430 line[line_pos] = c;
1431 line_pos++;
1432 }
1433 else {
1434 line[line_pos+1] = 0;
1435 actuator(line);
1436 line_pos = 0;
1437 }
1438 }
1439 fclose(f);
1440 return 0;
1441}
1442
1450EmbReal
1451random_uniform(void)
1452{
1453 int r = rand() % 100000;
1454 return 0.00001*r;
1455}
1456
1467int
1468roundToMultiple(int roundUp, int numToRound, int multiple)
1469{
1470 if (multiple == 0) {
1471 return numToRound;
1472 }
1473 int remainder = numToRound % multiple;
1474 if (remainder == 0) {
1475 return numToRound;
1476 }
1477
1478 if (numToRound < 0 && roundUp) {
1479 return numToRound - remainder;
1480 }
1481 if (roundUp) {
1482 return numToRound + multiple - remainder;
1483 }
1484 //else round down
1485 if (numToRound < 0 && !roundUp) {
1486 return numToRound - multiple - remainder;
1487 }
1488 return numToRound - remainder;
1489}
1490
1499bool
1500willUnderflowInt32(int32_t a, int32_t b)
1501{
1502 assert(LLONG_MAX>INT_MAX);
1503 int64_t c = (int64_t)a-b;
1504 return c < INT_MIN || c > INT_MAX;
1505}
1506
1515bool
1516willOverflowInt32(int32_t a, int32_t b)
1517{
1518 assert(LLONG_MAX>INT_MAX);
1519 int64_t c = (int64_t)a+b;
1520 return c < INT_MIN || c > INT_MAX;
1521}
1522
1530bool
1531valid_file_format(char *fname)
1532{
1533 if (fname[0] == 0) {
1534 return false;
1535 }
1536 if (emb_identify_format(fname) >= 0) {
1537 return true;
1538 }
1539 return false;
1540}
1541
1548bool
1549test_translate(void)
1550{
1551 const char *translated = translate("?");
1552 printf("Failed to use translate.");
1553 return streq(translated, "?");
1554}
1555
1559static void
1560c_split(char input[200], int *argc, char argv[10][200])
1561{
1562 *argc = 0;
1563 char buffer[200];
1564 strcpy(buffer, input);
1565 char *p = strtok(buffer, " ");
1566 for (int i=0; i<10; i++) {
1567 strcpy(argv[*argc], p);
1568 (*argc)++;
1569 p = strtok(NULL, " ");
1570 if (p == NULL) {
1571 break;
1572 }
1573 }
1574}
1575
1587EmbReal
1588emb_clamp(EmbReal lower, EmbReal x, EmbReal upper)
1589{
1590 if (lower > x) {
1591 return lower;
1592 }
1593 if (upper < x) {
1594 return upper;
1595 }
1596 return x;
1597}
1598
1604static void
1605undo_history_viewer(void)
1606{
1607 char str[200];
1608 sprintf(str, "Undo History %s", views[settings.pattern_index].filename);
1609 begin_child(str);
1610 header("Undo History");
1611 for (int i=0; i<views[settings.pattern_index].undo_history.length; i++) {
1612 translated_text(views[settings.pattern_index].undo_history.data[i]);
1613 }
1614 end_child();
1615}
1616
1622static void
1623create_tab(int i)
1624{
1625 int width, height;
1626 get_display_size(&width, &height);
1627 if (begin_tab_item(views[i].filename)) {
1628 settings.pattern_index = i;
1629 active_view = &(views[i]);
1630 char str[200];
1631 sprintf(str, "View %s", views[settings.pattern_index].filename);
1632 columns(3, str);
1633 set_column_width(-1, 200);
1634 undo_history_viewer();
1635 next_column();
1636 set_column_width(-1, width - 605);
1637 pattern_view();
1638 next_column();
1639 set_column_width(-1, 400);
1640 property_editor();
1641 end_columns();
1642 end_tab_item();
1643 }
1644}
1645
1649static void
1650load_toolbar(const char *label)
1651{
1652 Dictionary *toolbar = dictionary_from_index(toolbar_layout, label);
1653 for (int i=0; i<toolbar->length; i++) {
1654 if (streq(toolbar->data[i].key, "---")) {
1655 menu_separator();
1656 continue;
1657 }
1658 EmbVector size = {1.0f*settings.icon_size, 1.0f*settings.icon_size};
1659 if (image_button(toolbar->data[i].key, size)) {
1660 strcpy(menu_action, toolbar->data[i].value);
1661 }
1662 if (i+1 < toolbar->length) {
1663 same_line();
1664 }
1665 }
1666}
1667
1672static void
1673open_file_dialog(void)
1674{
1675 char separator = '/';
1676 #if _WIN32
1677 separator = '\\';
1678 #endif
1679 // char typed_filename[400];
1680 begin_ui("Open File", 600, 400);
1681 tinydir_dir dir;
1682 if (tinydir_open_sorted(&dir, current_directory) == -1) {
1683 translated_text("Failed to open directory.");
1684 end_ui();
1685 return;
1686 }
1687 int n_columns = 1 + dir.n_files/5;
1688 columns(n_columns, "files");
1689 for (size_t i=0; i<dir.n_files; i++) {
1690 tinydir_file file;
1691 tinydir_readfile_n(&dir, &file, i);
1692 if (button(file.name)) {
1693 if (file.is_dir) {
1694 sprintf(current_directory, "%s%c%s",
1695 current_directory, separator, file.name);
1696 simplify_path(current_directory);
1697 }
1698 else {
1699 sprintf(to_open, "%s%s", current_directory, file.name);
1700 }
1701 }
1702 tinydir_next(&dir);
1703 if (i%5 == 4) {
1704 next_column();
1705 }
1706 }
1707 end_columns();
1708 display_text(current_directory);
1709 display_text(to_open);
1710 //ImGui::InputText("", typed_filename, 100);
1711 if (button("Open")) {
1712 char cmd[200];
1713 sprintf(cmd, "open %s", to_open);
1714 log_debug(to_open);
1715 actuator(cmd);
1716 settings.show_open_file_dialog = false;
1717 }
1718 same_line();
1719 if (button("Cancel")) {
1720 settings.show_open_file_dialog = false;
1721 }
1722 tinydir_close(&dir);
1723 end_ui();
1724}
1725
1729static void
1730parse_command(int argc, char *argv[], char command[200])
1731{
1732 for (int i=1; i<argc; i++) {
1733 char *s = argv[i];
1734 if (streq(s, "--local-boot") || streq(s, "-L")) {
1735 strcpy(settings.assets_dir, argv[i+1]);
1736 printf("Booting from \"%s\".\n", settings.assets_dir);
1737 i++;
1738 continue;
1739 }
1740 if (streq(s, "--debug") || streq(s, "-d")) {
1741 settings.debug_mode = 1;
1742 printf("DEBUG MODE\n");
1743 continue;
1744 }
1745 if (streq(s, "--help") || streq(s, "-h")) {
1746 usage();
1747 settings.running = false;
1748 }
1749 if (streq(s, "--version") || streq(s, "-v")) {
1750 /* For scripts that need the version string */
1751 printf("%s", settings.version);
1752 settings.running = false;
1753 }
1754 if (streq(s, "--test")) {
1755 settings.testing = true;
1756 continue;
1757 }
1758 strcat(command, " ");
1759 strcat(command, s);
1760 }
1761
1762 get_current_directory(settings.current_directory);
1763}
1764
1765
1771static void
1772simplify_path(char *path)
1773{
1774 char storage[200];
1775 strcpy(storage, path);
1776 char *separator = "/";
1777 #if _WIN32
1778 separator = "\\";
1779 #endif
1780 char tokens_to_use[30][100];
1781 int n_tokens = 0;
1782 char *token = strtok(storage, separator);
1783 while (token != NULL) {
1784 if (streq(token, "..")) {
1785 n_tokens--;
1786 }
1787 if (strcmp(token, "..") && strcmp(token, ".") && strcmp(token, "")) {
1788 strcpy(tokens_to_use[n_tokens], token);
1789 n_tokens++;
1790 }
1791 token = strtok(NULL, separator);
1792 }
1793
1794 #if _WIN32
1795 strcpy(path, "");
1796 #else
1797 strcpy(path, "/");
1798 #endif
1799
1800 for (int i=0; i<n_tokens; i++) {
1801 strcat(path, tokens_to_use[i]);
1802 if (i < n_tokens-1) {
1803 strcat(path, separator);
1804 }
1805 }
1806}
1807
1811static void
1812load_menu(const char *menu_label)
1813{
1814 if (begin_menu(menu_label)) {
1815 Dictionary *dict = dictionary_from_index(menu_layout, menu_label);
1816 if (dict == NULL) {
1817 end_menu();
1818 return;
1819 }
1820 for (int i=0; i<dict->length; i++) {
1821 DictionaryEntry line = dict->data[i];
1822 if (!strcmp(line.key, "---")) {
1823 menu_separator();
1824 continue;
1825 }
1826 if (!strcmp(line.value, "submenu")) {
1827 load_menu(line.key);
1828 continue;
1829 }
1830 if (menu_item(line.key)) {
1831 strcpy(menu_action, line.value);
1832 }
1833 }
1834 end_menu();
1835 }
1836}
1837
1841GLuint
1842gen_gl_texture(uint8_t* data, int w, int h, int wrap)
1843{
1844 GLuint texture;
1845
1846 glGenTextures(1, &texture);
1847 glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, texture);
1848 glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, GL_LINEAR);
1849 glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER, GL_LINEAR);
1850 glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_WRAP_S, wrap);
1851 glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_WRAP_T, wrap);
1852 glTexImage2D(GL_TEXTURE_2D, 0, GL_RGBA, w, h, 0, GL_RGBA, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, data);
1853#if defined(GL_UNPACK_ROW_LENGTH) && !defined(__EMSCRIPTEN__)
1854 glPixelStorei(GL_UNPACK_ROW_LENGTH, 0);
1855#endif
1856 glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, 0);
1857
1858 return texture;
1859}
1860
1864GLuint
1865load_texture(char fname[200])
1866{
1867 int width, height;
1868 char fname2[200];
1869 sprintf(fname2, "%s%s", settings.assets_dir, fname);
1870 uint8_t* data = stbi_load(fname2, &width, &height, NULL, 4);
1871 if (!data) {
1872 return 0;
1873 }
1874
1875 GLuint texture_id = gen_gl_texture(data, width, height, GL_CLAMP_TO_EDGE);
1876 stbi_image_free(data);
1877
1878 return texture_id;
1879}
1880

1885view_empty_double_click(void)
1886{
1887 actuator("open");
1888}

1894view_empty_paint_event(View *view, int* event)
1895{
1896 /*
1897 QWidget* vport = viewport();
1898 EmbRect rect = vport->rect();
1899
1900 QPainter painter(vport);
1901 painter.setRenderHint(QPainter_SmoothPixmapTransform);
1902 */
1903
1904 /* Always fill with a solid color first. */
1905 /*

1907 painter.fillRect(rect, bgColor);
1908 }
1909 else {
1910 painter.fillRect(rect, background());
1911 }
1912 */
1913
1914 /* Then overlay the texture. */
1915 /*
1916 if (view->useTexture) {
1917 QBrush bgBrush(bgTexture);
1918 painter.fillRect(rect, bgBrush);
1919 }
1920 */
1921
1922 /* Overlay the logo last. */
1923 /*
1924 if (view->useLogo) {
1925 //Center the pixmap
1926 int dx = (rect.width()-bgLogo.width())/2;
1927 int dy = (rect.height()-bgLogo.height())/2;
1928 painter.drawPixmap(dx, dy, bgLogo.width(), bgLogo.height(), bgLogo);
1929 }
1930 */
1931}

2304static void
2305set_mouse_coord(EmbVector pos)
2306{
2307 char s[200];
2308 sprintf(s, "%f %f", pos.x, pos.y);
2309
2310 /* Decimal */
2311 // sprintf(s, "%4f %4f", pos.x, pos.y);
2312
2313 /* Scientific */
2314 // sprintf(s, "%4e %4e", pos.x, pos.y);
2315
2316 translated_text(s);
2317}
2318
2322static void
2323status_bar_context_menu(void)
2324{
2325 /*
2326 QMenu menu(this);
2327 if (objectName() == "statusbar_buttonSNAP") {
2328 QAction* settingsSnapAction = QAction(
2329 load_icon("gridsnapsettings"),
2330 "&Settings...",
2331 &menu);
2332 connect(settingsSnapAction, triggered(), settingsSnap());
2333 menu.addAction(settingsSnapAction);
2334 }
2335 else if (objectName() == "statusbar_buttonGRID") {
2336 QAction* settingsGridAction = QAction(
2337 load_icon("gridsettings"),
2338 "&Settings...",
2339 &menu);
2340 menu.addAction(settingsGridAction);
2341 }
2342 else if (objectName() == "statusbar_buttonRULER") {
2343 QAction* settingsRulerAction = QAction(
2344 load_icon("rulersettings"),
2345 "&Settings...",
2346 &menu);
2347 menu.addAction(settingsRulerAction);
2348 }
2349 else if (objectName() == "statusbar_buttonORTHO") {
2350 QAction* settingsOrthoAction = QAction(
2351 load_icon("orthosettings"), "&Settings...", &menu);
2352 menu.addAction(settingsOrthoAction);
2353 }
2354 else if (objectName() == "statusbar_buttonPOLAR") {
2355 QAction* settingsPolarAction = QAction(
2356 load_icon("polarsettings"), "&Settings...", &menu);
2357 connect(settingsPolarAction, triggered(), settingsPolar());
2358 menu.addAction(settingsPolarAction);
2359 }
2360 else if (objectName() == "statusbar_buttonQSNAP") {
2361 QAction* settingsQSnapAction = QAction(
2362 load_icon("qsnapsettings"), "&Settings...", &menu);
2363 connect(settingsQSnapAction, triggered(), settingsQSnap());
2364 menu.addAction(settingsQSnapAction);
2365 }
2366 else if (objectName() == "statusbar_buttonQTRACK") {
2367 QAction* settingsQTrackAction = QAction(
2368 load_icon("qtracksettings"), "&Settings...", &menu);
2369 connect(settingsQTrackAction, triggered(), settingsQTrack());
2370 menu.addAction(settingsQTrackAction);
2371 }
2372 else if (objectName() == "statusbar_buttonLWT") {
2373 QAction* enableRealAction = QAction(
2374 load_icon("realrender"),
2375 "&RealRender On",
2376 &menu);
2377 enableRealAction->setEnabled(!gview->isRealEnabled());
2378 connect(enableRealAction, triggered(), enableReal());
2379 menu.addAction(enableRealAction);
2380
2381 QAction* disableRealAction = QAction(
2382 load_icon("realrender"),
2383 "&RealRender Off",
2384 &menu);
2385 disableRealAction->setEnabled(gview->isRealEnabled());
2386 connect(disableRealAction, triggered(), disableReal());
2387 menu.addAction(disableRealAction);
2388
2389 QAction* settingsLwtAction = QAction(
2390 load_icon("lineweightsettings"),
2391 "&Settings...",
2392 &menu);
2393 connect(settingsLwtAction, triggered(), settingsLwt());
2394 menu.addAction(settingsLwtAction);
2395 }
2396 menu.exec(event->globalPos());
2397 statusbar_clearMessage();
2398 */
2399}
2400
2405static void
2406about_dialog(void)
2407{
2408 char out[200];
2409 log_debug("about_dialog()");
2410
2411 begin_ui("About Embroidermodder 2", 500, 200);
2412 // ImageWidget img(assets_dir + "/images/logo-small");
2413 sprintf(out, "Embroidermodder %s", settings.version);
2414 translated_text(out);
2415 translated_text("https://www.libembroidery.org");
2416 translated_text("Available Platforms: GNU/Linux, Windows, Mac OSX, Raspberry Pi.");
2417 translated_text("Embroidery formats by Josh Varga and Robin Swift.");
2418 translated_text("User Interface by Jonathan Greig and Robin Swift.");
2419 translated_text("Free under the zlib/libpng license.");
2420 if (button("Oh, Yeah!")) {
2421 settings.show_about_dialog = false;
2422 }
2423 end_ui();
2424}

2436
2441static void
2442alert(const char *txt)
2443{
2444 const char *title = "";
2445 begin_ui(title, 500, 200);
2446 translated_text(txt);
2447 if (button("Ok")) {
2448
2449 }
2450 end_ui();
2451}
2452
2457static void
2458help_dialog(void)
2459{
2460 begin_ui("Help", 700, 500);
2461
2462 translated_text("Help -- Embroidermodder 2");
2463
2464 /* Minimum size (600, 500). */
2465
2466 FILE *f;
2467 char *s;
2468 char fname[200];
2469 sprintf(fname, "%sdocs/manual.md", settings.assets_dir);
2470 f = fopen(fname, "r");
2471 if (f) {
2472 fseek(f, 0, SEEK_END);
2473 size_t length = ftell(f);
2474 fseek(f, 0, SEEK_SET);
2475 s = (char*)malloc(length+2);
2476 fread(s, 1, length, f);
2477 fclose(f);
2478 /* This needs a different function for wrapping. */
2479 translated_text(s);
2480 free(s);
2481 }
2482 else {
2483 translated_text("Failed to load manual.");
2484 }
2485
2486 /* Center button */
2487 if (button("Close")) {
2488
2489 }
2490
2491 end_ui();
2492}
2493
2503static void
2504details_dialog(void)
2505{
2506 if (n_views < 1) {
2507 return;
2508 }
2509
2510 begin_ui(translate("Embroidery Design Details"), 500, 500);
2511
2512 EmbRect boundingRect = embPattern_calcBoundingBox(active_view->pattern);
2513
2514 int colorChanges = 0;
2515
2516 if (active_view->pattern->stitch_list->count == 0) {
2517 /*
2518 alert(translate("No Design Loaded"),
2519 translate("<b>A design needs to be loaded or created before details can be determined.</b>"));
2520 */
2521 return;
2522 }
2523
2524 /*
2525 std_vector<EmbReal> stitchLengths;
2526 int colors = 0;
2527 EmbReal totalColorLength = 0.0;
2528 for (int i = 0; i < sts->count; i++) {
2529 EmbStitch st = sts->stitch[i];
2530 totalColorLength += length;
2531 if (i > 0 && sts->stitch[i-1].flags != NORMAL)
2532 length = 0.0; //can't count first normal stitch;
2533 if (sts->stitch[i].flags & STOP) {
2534 stitchLengths.push_back(totalColorLength);
2535 totalColorLength = 0;
2536 colors++;
2537 }
2538 if (sts->stitch[i].flags & END) {
2539 stitchLengths.push_back(totalColorLength);
2540 }
2541 }
2542
2543 //second pass to fill bins now that we know max stitch length
2544#define NUMBINS 10
2545 int bin[NUMBINS+1];
2546 embPattern_lengthHistogram(sts, bin, NUMBINS);
2547
2548 EmbReal binSize = max_stitchlength / NUMBINS;
2549 const char *str;
2550 for (int i = 0; i < NUMBINS; i++) {
2551 str += std_to_string(binSize * (i));
2552 str += " - " + std_to_string(binSize * (i+1));
2553 str += " mm: " + std_to_string(bin[i]) + "\n\n";
2554 }
2555
2556 translated_text("Stitch Distribution:");
2557 translated_text("%s", str.c_stranslate());
2558 translated_text("Thread Length By Color:");
2559 int currentRow = 12;
2560
2561 for (int i = 0; i < pattern->n_threads; i++) {
2562 QFrame *frame = QFrame();
2563 frame->setGeometry(0,0,30,30);
2564 QPalette palette = frame->palette();
2565 EmbColor t = embThreadList_getAt(pattern->threadList, i).color;
2566 palette.setColor(backgroundRole(), EmbColor( t.r, t.g, t.b ) );
2567 frame->setPalette( palette );
2568 frame->setAutoFillBackground(true);
2569 grid->add_widget(frame, currentRow,0,1,1);
2570 log_debug("size: %d i: %d", stitchLengths.size(), i);
2571 grid->add_widget(new QLabel(std_string_number(stitchLengths.at(i)) + " mm"), currentRow,1,1,1);
2572 currentRow++;
2573 }
2574 */
2575
2576 /* setMinimumSize(750,550); */
2577
2578 /* Collapsing header? */
2579 translated_text("General Information");
2580
2581 show_real("Total Stitches:", active_view->pattern->stitch_list->count);
2582 show_real("Total Stitch Length:", embPattern_totalStitchLength(active_view->pattern));
2583 show_int("Real Stitches:", embPattern_realStitches(active_view->pattern));
2584 show_int("Jump Stitches:", embPattern_jumpStitches(active_view->pattern));
2585 show_int("Trim Stitches:", embPattern_trimStitches(active_view->pattern));
2586
2587 show_int("Total Colors:", active_view->pattern->thread_list->count);
2588 show_int("Color Changes:", colorChanges);
2589
2590 translated_text("Left:");
2591 same_line();
2592 char s[200];
2593 sprintf(s, "%f mm", boundingRect.left);
2594 translated_text(s);
2595
2596 translated_text("Top:");
2597 same_line();
2598 sprintf(s, "%f mm", boundingRect.top);
2599 translated_text(s);
2600
2601 translated_text("Right:");
2602 same_line();
2603 sprintf(s, "%f mm", boundingRect.right);
2604 translated_text(s);
2605
2606 translated_text("Bottom:");
2607 same_line();
2608 sprintf(s, "%f mm", boundingRect.bottom);
2609 translated_text(s);
2610
2611 translated_text("Width:");
2612 same_line();
2613 sprintf(s, "%f mm", boundingRect.right-boundingRect.left);
2614 translated_text(s);
2615
2616 translated_text("Height:");
2617 same_line();
2618 sprintf(s, "%f mm", boundingRect.bottom-boundingRect.top);
2619 translated_text(s);
2620
2621 if (button("Ok")) {
2622 settings.show_details_dialog = false;
2623 }
2624
2625 end_ui();
2626
2627 /* Stitch Distribution */
2628 //QGroupBox* groupBoxDist = QGroupBox(translate("Stitch Distribution"), widget);
2629}

2835
2843static void
2844View__(void)
2845{
2846 /*
2847 mainWin = mw;
2848 active_view = theScene;
2849
2850 setFrameShape(QFrame_NoFrame);
2851 */
2852
2853 /* NOTE: This has to be done before setting mouse tracking.
2854 if (settings_display_use_opengl) {
2855 log_debug("Using OpenGL...");
2856 set_viewport(new QGLWidget(QGLFormat(QGL_DoubleBuffer)));
2857 }
2858
2859 set_viewportUpdateMode(QGraphicsFullViewportUpdate);
2860
2861 panDistance = 10;
2862
2863 setCursor(BlankCursor);
2864 horizontalscrollbar()->setCursor(ArrowCursor);
2865 verticalscrollbar()->setCursor(ArrowCursor);
2866 qsnapLocatorColor = settings.qsnap_locator_color;
2867 qsnapLocatorSize = settings.qsnap_locator_size;
2868 qsnapApertureSize = settings_qsnap_aperture_size;
2869 gripColorCool = settings.selection_coolgrip_color;
2870 gripColorHot = settings.selection_hotgrip_color;
2871 gripSize = settings.selection_grip_size;
2872 pickBoxSize = settings.selection_pickbox_size;
2873 setCrossHairColor(settings.display_crosshair_color);
2874 setCrossHairSize(settings.display_crosshair_percent);
2875 setGridColor(settings.grid_color);
2876
2877 if (settings.grid_show_on_load) {
2878 createGrid(settings.grid_type);
2879 }
2880 else {
2881 createGrid("");
2882 }
2883
2884 toggleRuler(settings.ruler_show_on_load);
2885 toggleReal(true);
2886
2887 grippingActive = false;
2888 rapidMoveActive = false;
2889 previewMode = PREVIEW_MODE_NULL;
2890 previewData = 0;
2891 previewObjectItemGroup = 0;
2892 pasteObjectItemGroup = 0;
2893 previewActive = false;
2894 active_view->pasting_active = false;
2895 movingActive = false;
2896 selectingActive = false;
2897 zoomWindowActive = false;
2898 panningRealTimeActive = false;
2899 panningPointActive = false;
2900 panningActive = false;
2901 qSnapActive = false;
2902
2903 // Randomize the hot grip location initially so it's not located at (0,0)
2904 srand(time(NULL));
2905 sceneGripPoint = EmbVector(random_uniform()*1000, random_uniform()*1000);
2906
2907 gripBaseObj = 0;
2908 tempBaseObj = 0;
2909
2910 selectBox = SelectBox(QRubberBand_Rectangle, this);
2911 selectBox->set_colors(
2912 settings.display_selectbox_left_color,
2913 settings.display_selectbox_left_fill,
2914 settings.display_selectbox_right_color,
2915 settings.display_selectbox_right_fill,
2916 settings.display_selectbox_alpha);
2917
2918 show_scrollbars(settings.display_show_scrollbars);
2919 setCornerButton();
2920
2921 undo_stack = QUndoStack(this);
2922 dockUndoEdit->addStack(undo_stack);
2923
2924 installEventFilter(this);
2925
2926 setMouseTracking(true);
2927 setBackgroundColor(settings.display_bg_color);
2928 //\todo wrap this with a setBackgroundPixmap() function: setBackgroundBrush(QPixmap("images/canvas.png"));
2929
2930 connect(active_view, selectionChanged(), selectionChanged()));
2931 */
2932}

2982delete_object(EmbGeometry* obj)

2988 */

2994static void
2995preview_on(int clone, int mode, EmbReal x, EmbReal y, EmbReal data)

2999 return;

3005

3009 if (clone == PREVIEW_CLONE_SELECTED)
3010 previewObjectList = createObjectList( active_view->selected);

3012 previewObjectList = createObjectList(rubberRoomList);

3019 previewMode == preview.MODE_ROTATE ||
3020 previewMode == preview.MODE_SCALE) {
3021 previewPoint = EmbVector(x, y); //NOTE: Move: basePt; Rotate: basePt; Scale: basePt;
3022 previewData = data; //NOTE: Move: unused; Rotate: refAngle; Scale: refFactor;
3023 previewActive = true;

3101 return true;
3102 }

3117
3121static void
3122vulcanize_rubber_room(void)
3123{
3124 /*
3125 for (EmbGeometry* item, rubberRoomList) {
3126 EmbGeometry* base = static_cast<EmbGeometry*>(item);

3131}
3132
3136static void
3137vulcanizeObject(EmbGeometry* obj)
3138{
3139 if (!obj) {
3140 return;
3141 }
3142
3143 /*
3144 active_view->removeItem(obj); //Prevent Qt Runtime Warning, QGraphicsScene_addItem: item has already been added to this scene
3145 obj->vulcanize();
3146
3147 UndoableAddCommand* cmd = UndoableAddCommand(obj->data(OBJ_NAME).toString(), obj, 0);
3148 if (cmd) undo_stack->push(cmd);
3149 */
3150}

3155static void
3156clearRubberRoom(void)
3157{
3158 /*

3160 EmbGeometry* base = static_cast<EmbGeometry*>(item);
3161 if (base) {
3162 int type = base->type;
3163 if ((type == EMB_PATH && spareRubberList.contains(SPARE_RUBBER_PATH)) ||
3164 (type == EMB_POLYGON && spareRubberList.contains(SPARE_RUBBER_POLYGON)) ||
3165 (type == EMB_POLYLINE && spareRubberList.contains(SPARE_RUBBER_POLYLINE)) ||
3166 (spareRubberList.contains(base->objID))) {
3167 if (!base->objectPath().elementCount()) {
3168 critical_messagebox(translate("Empty Rubber Object Error"),
3169 translate("The rubber object added contains no points. "
3170 "The command that created this object has flawed logic. "
3171 "The object will be deleted."));
3172 active_view->removeItem(item);
3173 delete item;
3174 }
3175 else {
3176 vulcanizeObject(base);
3177 }
3178 }
3179 else {
3180 active_view->removeItem(item);
3181 delete item;
3182 }
3183 }
3184 }
3185
3186 rubberRoomList.clear();
3187 spareRubberList.clear();
3188 */
3189}

3265static void
3266createGrid(const char *gridType)
3267{
3268 /*
3269 if (gridType == "Rectangular") {
3270 createGridRect();
3271 active_view->setProperty("ENABLE_GRID", true);
3272 }
3273 else if (gridType == "Circular") {
3274 createGridPolar();
3275 active_view->setProperty("ENABLE_POLAR", true);
3276 }
3277 else if (gridType == "Isometric") {
3278 createGridIso();
3279 active_view->setProperty("ENABLE_ISOMETRIC", true);
3280 }
3281 else {
3282 gridPath = EmbPath();
3283 active_view->setProperty("ENABLE_GRID", false);
3284 }
3285 */
3286
3287 createOrigin();
3288}
3289
3293static void
3294createOrigin(void)
3295{
3296 /*
3297 originPath = EmbPath();
3298
3299 if (settings.grid_show_origin) {
3300 //originPath.addEllipse(EmbVector(0,0), 0.5, 0.5); //\todo Make Origin Customizable
3301 EmbReal rad = 0.5;
3302 originPath.moveTo(0.0, rad);
3303 originPath.arcTo(-rad, -rad, rad*2.0, rad*2.0, 90.0, 360.0);
3304 originPath.arcTo(-rad, -rad, rad*2.0, rad*2.0, 90.0, -360.0);
3305 originPath.lineTo(0.0, -rad);
3306 originPath.arcTo(-rad, -rad, rad*2.0, rad*2.0, 270.0, 90.0);
3307 originPath.lineTo(-rad, 0.0);
3308 originPath.arcTo(-rad, -rad, rad*2.0, rad*2.0, 180.0, -90.0);
3309 originPath.closeSubpath();
3310 }
3311 */
3312}
3313
3317static void
3318createGridRect(void)
3319{
3320 /*
3321 EmbRect gr(0, 0, settings.grid_size_x, -settings.grid_size_y);
3322 //Ensure the loop will work correctly with negative numbers
3323 EmbReal x1 = EMB_MIN(gr.left(), gr.right());
3324 EmbReal y1 = EMB_MIN(gr.top(), gr.bottom());
3325 EmbReal x2 = EMB_MAX(gr.left(), gr.right());
3326 EmbReal y2 = EMB_MAX(gr.top(), gr.bottom());
3327
3328 gridPath = EmbPath();
3329 gridPath.addRect(gr);
3330 for (EmbReal gx = x1; gx < x2; gx += settings.grid_spacing_x) {
3331 for (EmbReal gy = y1; gy < y2; gy += settings.grid_spacing_y) {
3332 gridPath.moveTo(x1,gy);
3333 gridPath.lineTo(x2,gy);
3334 gridPath.moveTo(gx,y1);
3335 gridPath.lineTo(gx,y2);
3336 }
3337 }
3338
3339 //Center the Grid
3340 EmbRect gridRect = gridPath.boundingRect();
3341 EmbReal bx = gridRect.width()/2.0;
3342 EmbReal by = -gridRect.height()/2.0;
3343 EmbReal dx = settings.grid_center.x - bx;
3344 EmbReal dy = settings.grid_center.y - by;
3345
3346 if (settings.grid_center_on_origin) {
3347 gridPath.translate(-bx, -by);
3348 }
3349 else {
3350 gridPath.translate(dx, dy);
3351 }
3352 */
3353}
3354
3358static void
3359createGridPolar(void)
3360{
3361 /*
3362 EmbReal rad = settings.grid_size_radius;
3363
3364 gridPath = EmbPath();
3365 gridPath.addEllipse(EmbVector(0, 0), rad, rad);
3366 for (EmbReal r = 0; r < rad; r += settings.grid_spacing_radius) {
3367 gridPath.addEllipse(EmbVector(0,0), r, r);
3368 }
3369 for (EmbReal ang = 0; ang < 360; ang += settings.grid_spacing_angle) {
3370 gridPath.moveTo(0, 0);
3371 gridPath.lineTo(EmbLine_fromPolar(rad, ang).p2());
3372 }
3373
3374 if (!settings.grid_center_on_origin) {
3375 gridPath.translate(settings.grid_center.x, -settings.grid_center.y);
3376 }
3377 */
3378}
3379
3383static void
3384createGridIso(void)
3385{
3386 // Ensure the loop will work correctly with negative numbers
3387 /*
3388 EmbReal isoW = fabs(settings.grid_size_x);
3389 EmbReal isoH = fabs(settings.grid_size_y);
3390
3391 EmbVector p1 = EmbVector(0,0);
3392 EmbVector p2 = EmbLine_fromPolar(isoW, 30).p2();
3393 EmbVector p3 = EmbLine_fromPolar(isoH, 150).p2();
3394 EmbVector p4 = p2 + p3;
3395
3396 gridPath = EmbPath();
3397 gridPath.moveTo(p1);
3398 gridPath.lineTo(p2);
3399 gridPath.lineTo(p4);
3400 gridPath.lineTo(p3);
3401 gridPath.lineTo(p1);
3402
3403 for (float x = 0.0; x < isoW; x += settings.grid_spacing_x) {
3404 for (float y = 0.0; y < isoH; y += settings.grid_spacing_y) {
3405 EmbVector px = EmbLine_fromPolar(x, 30).p2();
3406 EmbVector py = EmbLine_fromPolar(y, 150).p2();
3407
3408 gridPath.moveTo(px);
3409 gridPath.lineTo(px+p3);
3410 gridPath.moveTo(py);
3411 gridPath.lineTo(py+p2);
3412 }
3413 }
3414 */
3415
3416 /* Center the Grid */
3417 /*
3418 EmbRect gridRect = gridPath.boundingRect();
3419 // bx is unused
3420 EmbReal by = -gridRect.height()/2.0;
3421
3422 if (settings.grid_center_on_origin) {
3423 gridPath.translate(0, -by);
3424 }
3425 else {
3426 gridPath.translate(0, -by);
3427 gridPath.translate(settings.grid_center.x, -settings.grid_center.y);
3428 }
3429 */
3430}

3502 }
3503 }
3504 }
3505 }
3506 }

3511 * ================================================== */

3571 active_view->setProperty("SCENE_MOUSE_POINT", sceneMousePoint);
3572 active_view->setProperty("VIEW_MOUSE_POINT", viewMousePoint);
3573 statusbar_setMouseCoord(sceneMousePoint.x, -sceneMousePoint.y);

3576
3580static void
3581setCrossHairSize(uint8_t percent)
3582{
3583 /*
3584 //NOTE: crosshairSize is in pixels and is a percentage of your screen width
3585 //NOTE: Example: (1280*0.05)/2 = 32, thus 32 + 1 + 32 = 65 pixel wide crosshair
3586 QScreen *screen = qApp->primaryScreen();
3587 quint32 screenWidth = screen->grabWindow(0).width();
3588 if (percent > 0 && percent < 100) {
3589 crosshairSize = (screenWidth*(percent/100.0))/2;
3590 }
3591 else {
3592 crosshairSize = screenWidth;
3593 }
3594 */
3595}

3688
3692static void
3693mouse_press_event(int* event)
3694{
3695 /*
3696 updateMouseCoords(event->x, event->y);
3697 if (event->button() == EMB_LEFT_BUTTON) {
3698 if (is_command_active()) {
3699 EmbVector cmdPoint = map_to_scene(event->pos());
3700 run_command_click(activeCommand(), cmdPoint.x, cmdPoint.y);
3701 return;
3702 }
3703 EmbPath path;
3704 EmbGeometry *pickList = active_view->items(
3705 EmbRect(
3706 map_to_scene(viewMousePoint.x-pickBoxSize,
3707 viewMousePoint.y-pickBoxSize),
3708 map_to_scene(viewMousePoint.x+pickBoxSize,
3709 viewMousePoint.y+pickBoxSize)));
3710
3711 bool itemsInPickBox = pickList.size();
3712 if (itemsInPickBox && !selectingActive && !grippingActive) {
3713 bool itemsAlreadySelected = pickList.at(0)->isSelected();
3714 if (!itemsAlreadySelected) {
3715 pickList.at(0)->set_selected(true);
3716 }
3717 else {
3718 bool foundGrip = false;
3719 EmbGeometry* base = static_cast<EmbGeometry*>(pickList.at(0)); //\todo Allow multiple objects to be gripped at once
3720 if (!base) return;
3721
3722 EmbVector qsnapOffset(qsnapLocatorSize, qsnapLocatorSize);
3723 EmbVector gripPoint = base->mouseSnapPoint(sceneMousePoint);
3724 EmbVector p1 = map_from_scene(gripPoint) - qsnapOffset;
3725 EmbVector q1 = map_from_scene(gripPoint) + qsnapOffset;
3726 EmbRect gripRect = EmbRect(map_to_scene(p1), map_to_scene(q1));
3727 EmbRect pickRect = EmbRect(
3728 map_to_scene(viewMousePoint.x-pickBoxSize,
3729 viewMousePoint.y-pickBoxSize),
3730 map_to_scene(viewMousePoint.x+pickBoxSize,
3731 viewMousePoint.y+pickBoxSize));
3732 if (gripRect.intersects(pickRect))
3733 foundGrip = true;
3734
3735 //If the pick point is within the item's grip box, start gripping
3736 if (foundGrip) {
3737 startGripping(base);
3738 }
3739 // start moving
3740 else {
3741 movingActive = true;
3742 pressPoint = event->pos();
3743 scenePressPoint = map_to_scene(pressPoint);
3744 }
3745 }
3746 }
3747 else if (grippingActive) {
3748 stopGripping(true);
3749 }
3750 else if (!selectingActive) {
3751 selectingActive = true;
3752 pressPoint = event->pos();
3753 scenePressPoint = map_to_scene(pressPoint);
3754
3755 if (!selectBox)
3756 selectBox = SelectBox(QRubberBand_Rectangle, this);
3757 selectBox->setGeometry(EmbRect(pressPoint, pressPoint));
3758 selectBox->show();
3759 }
3760 else {
3761 selectingActive = false;
3762 selectBox->hide();
3763 releasePoint = event->pos();
3764 sceneReleasePoint = map_to_scene(releasePoint);
3765
3766 //Start SelectBox Code
3767 path.addPolygon(map_to_scene(selectBox->geometry()));
3768 if (sceneReleasePoint.x > scenePressPoint.x) {
3769 if (settings.selection_mode_pickadd) {
3770 if (isShiftPressed()) {
3771 EmbGeometry *item_list = active_view->items(path, ContainsItemShape);
3772 for (EmbGeometry* item, item_list)
3773 item->set_selected(false);
3774 }
3775 else {
3776 EmbGeometry*> item_list = active_view->items(path, ContainsItemShape);
3777 for (EmbGeometry* item, item_list)
3778 item->set_selected(true);
3779 }
3780 }
3781 else {
3782 if (isShiftPressed()) {
3783 EmbGeometry *item_list = active_view->items(path, ContainsItemShape);
3784 if (!item_list.size())
3785 clear_selection();
3786 else {
3787 for (EmbGeometry* item, item_list)
3788 item->set_selected(!item->isSelected()); //Toggle selected
3789 }
3790 }
3791 else {
3792 clear_selection();
3793 EmbGeometry *item_list = active_view->items(path, ContainsItemShape);
3794 for (EmbGeometry* item, item_list)
3795 item->set_selected(true);
3796 }
3797 }
3798 }
3799 else {
3800 if (settings.selection_mode_pickadd) {
3801 if (isShiftPressed()) {
3802 EmbGeometry *item_list = active_view->items(path, IntersectsItemShape);
3803 for(EmbGeometry* item, item_list)
3804 item->set_selected(false);
3805 }
3806 else {
3807 EmbGeometry *item_list = active_view->items(path, IntersectsItemShape);
3808 for (EmbGeometry* item, item_list)
3809 item->set_selected(true);
3810 }
3811 }
3812 else {
3813 if (isShiftPressed()) {
3814 EmbGeometry *item_list = active_view->items(path, IntersectsItemShape);
3815 if (!item_list.size())
3816 clear_selection();
3817 else {
3818 for (EmbGeometry* item, item_list)
3819 item->set_selected(!item->isSelected()); //Toggle selected
3820 }
3821 }
3822 else {
3823 clear_selection();
3824 EmbGeometry *item_list = active_view->items(path, IntersectsItemShape);
3825 for (EmbGeometry* item, item_list)
3826 item->set_selected(true);
3827 }
3828 }
3829 }
3830 //End SelectBox Code
3831 }
3832
3833 if (active_view->pasting_active) {
3834 EmbGeometry* item_list = pasteObjectItemGroup->childItems();
3835 active_view->destroyItemGroup(pasteObjectItemGroup);
3836 for (EmbGeometry* item, item_list) {
3837 active_view->removeItem(item); //Prevent Qt Runtime Warning, QGraphicsScene_addItem: item has already been added to this scene
3838 }
3839
3840 undo_stack->beginMacro("Paste");
3841 for (EmbGeometry* item, item_list) {
3842 EmbGeometry* base = static_cast<EmbGeometry*>(item);
3843 if (base) {
3844 UndoableAddCommand* cmd = UndoableAddCommand(base->data(OBJ_NAME).toString(), base, 0);
3845 if (cmd) undo_stack->push(cmd);
3846 }
3847 }
3848 undo_stack->end_macro();
3849
3850 active_view->pasting_active = false;
3851 selectingActive = false;
3852 }
3853 if (zoomWindowActive) {
3854 fitInView(path.boundingRect(), KeepAspectRatio);
3855 clear_selection();
3856 }
3857 }
3858 if (event->button() == EMB_MIDDLE_BUTTON) {
3859 panStart(event->pos());
3860 //The Undo command will record the spot where the pan started.
3861 UndoableNavCommand* cmd = UndoableNavCommand("PanStart", 0);
3862 undo_stack->push(cmd);
3863 event->accept();
3864 }
3865 */
3866}
3867
3871static void
3872panStart(EmbVector point)
3873{
3874 /*
3875 recalculateLimits();
3876
3877 alignScenePointWithViewPoint(map_to_scene(point), point);
3878
3879 panningActive = true;
3880 panStartX = point.x;
3881 panStartY = point.y;
3882 */
3883}
3884
3892static void
3893recalculateLimits(void)
3894{
3895 /*
3896 EmbRect viewRect(map_to_scene(rect().topLeft()), map_to_scene(rect().bottomRight()));
3897 EmbRect sceneRect(active_view->sceneRect());
3898 EmbRect newRect = viewRect.adjusted(-viewRect.width(), -viewRect.height(), viewRect.width(), viewRect.height());
3899 if (!sceneRect.contains(newRect.topLeft())
3900 || !sceneRect.contains(newRect.bottomRight())) {
3901 active_view->setSceneRect(
3902 sceneRect.adjusted(
3903 -viewRect.width(),
3904 -viewRect.height(),
3905 viewRect.width(),
3906 viewRect.height()));
3907 }
3908 */
3909}
3910
3914static void
3915centerAt(EmbVector centerPoint)
3916{
3917 /*
3918 //centerOn also updates the scrollbars, which shifts things out of wack o_O
3919 centerOn(centerPoint);
3920 //Reshift to the new center
3921 EmbVector offset = centerPoint - center();
3922 EmbVector newCenter = centerPoint + offset;
3923 centerOn(newCenter);
3924 */
3925}
3926
3930static void
3931alignScenePointWithViewPoint(EmbVector scenePoint, EmbVector viewPoint)
3932{
3933 /*
3934 EmbVector viewCenter = center();
3935 EmbVector pointBefore = scenePoint;
3936 //centerOn also updates the scrollbars, which shifts things out of wack o_O
3937 centerOn(viewCenter);
3938 //Reshift to the new center so the scene and view points align
3939 EmbVector pointAfter = map_to_scene(viewPoint);
3940 EmbVector offset = pointBefore - pointAfter;
3941 EmbVector newCenter = viewCenter + offset;
3942 centerOn(newCenter);
3943 */
3944}
3945
3949static void
3950mouseMoveEvent(int* event)
3951{
3952 /*
3953 updateMouseCoords(event->position().x, event->position().y);
3954 movePoint = event->pos();
3955 sceneMovePoint = map_to_scene(movePoint);
3956
3957 if (is_command_active()) {
3958 if (rapidMoveActive) {
3959 runCommandMove(activeCommand(), sceneMovePoint.x, sceneMovePoint.y);
3960 }
3961 }
3962 if (previewActive) {
3963 if (previewMode == preview.MODE_MOVE) {
3964 previewObjectItemGroup->setPos(sceneMousePoint - previewPoint);
3965 }
3966 else if (previewMode == preview.MODE_ROTATE) {
3967 EmbReal mouseAngle = EmbLine(previewPoint, sceneMousePoint).angle();
3968
3969 EmbVector p;
3970 EmbReal alpha = radians(previewData - mouseAngle);
3971 p.x = -previewPoint.x;
3972 p.y = -previewPoint.y;
3973 rot = embVector_rotate(p, alpha);
3974 rot = embVector_add(rot, previewPoint);
3975
3976 previewObjectItemGroup->setPos(rot);
3977 previewObjectItemGroup->setRotation(previewData - mouseAngle);
3978 }
3979 else if (previewMode == preview.MODE_SCALE) {
3980 EmbReal scaleFactor = previewData;
3981
3982 EmbReal factor = EmbLine(previewPoint, sceneMousePoint).length()/scaleFactor;
3983
3984 previewObjectItemGroup->setScale(1);
3985 previewObjectItemGroup->setPos(0,0);
3986
3987 if (scaleFactor <= 0.0) {
3988 critical_messagebox(translate("ScaleFactor Error"),
3989 translate("Hi there. If you are not a developer, report this as a bug. "
3990 "If you are a developer, your code needs examined, and possibly your head too."));
3991 }
3992 else {
3993 //Calculate the offset
3994 EmbVector old(0, 0);
3995 EmbLine scaleLine(preview.point, old);
3996 scaleLine.setLength(scaleLine.length()*factor);
3997
3998 EmbVector delta = embVector_subtract(scaleLine.end, old);
3999
4000 previewObjectItemGroup->setScale(previewObjectItemGroup->scale()*factor);
4001 previewObjectItemGroup->moveBy(delta);
4002 }
4003 }
4004 }
4005 if (active_view->pasting_active) {
4006 pasteObjectItemGroup->setPos(sceneMousePoint - pasteDelta);
4007 }
4008 if (movingActive) {
4009 //Ensure that the preview is only shown if the mouse has moved.
4010 if (!previewActive)
4011 previewOn(PREVIEW_CLONE_SELECTED, preview.MODE_MOVE, scenePressPoint.x, scenePressPoint.y, 0);
4012 }
4013 if (selectingActive) {
4014 if (sceneMovePoint.x >= scenePressPoint.x) {
4015 selectBox->setDirection(1);
4016 }
4017 else {
4018 selectBox->setDirection(0);
4019 }
4020 selectBox->setGeometry(EmbRect(map_from_scene(scenePressPoint), event->pos()).normalized());
4021 event->accept();
4022 }
4023 if (panningActive) {
4024 horizontalscrollbar()->setValue(horizontalscrollbar()->value() - (event->x - panStartX));
4025 verticalscrollbar()->setValue(verticalscrollbar()->value() - (event->y - panStartY));
4026 panStartX = event->x;
4027 panStartY = event->y;
4028 event->accept();
4029 }
4030 */
4031}
4032
4036static void
4037mouseReleaseEvent(int* event)
4038{
4039 /*
4040 updateMouseCoords(event->x, event->y);
4041 if (event->button() == EMB_LEFT_BUTTON) {
4042 if (movingActive) {
4043 previewOff();
4044 EmbReal dx = sceneMousePoint.x-scenePressPoint.x;
4045 EmbReal dy = sceneMousePoint.y-scenePressPoint.y;
4046 //Ensure that moving only happens if the mouse has moved.
4047 if (dx || dy) moveSelected(dx, dy);
4048 movingActive = false;
4049 }
4050 event->accept();
4051 }
4052 if (event->button() == EMB_MIDDLE_BUTTON) {
4053 panningActive = false;
4054 //The Undo command will record the spot where the pan completed.
4055 UndoableNavCommand* cmd = UndoableNavCommand("PanStop", 0);
4056 undo_stack->push(cmd);
4057 event->accept();
4058 }
4059 if (event->button() == XButton1) {
4060 log_debug("XButton1");
4061 undo(); //\todo Make this customizable
4062 event->accept();
4063 }
4064 if (event->button() == XButton2) {
4065 log_debug("XButton2");
4066 redo(); //\todo Make this customizable
4067 event->accept();
4068 }
4069 */
4070}
4071
4075bool
4076allow_zoom_in(void)
4077{
4078 /*
4079 EmbVector origin = map_to_scene(0, 0);
4080 EmbVector corner = map_to_scene(width(), height());
4081 EmbVector max_dimension = embVector_subtract(corner, origin);
4082
4083 if ((max_dimension.x < settings.zoomInLimit) || (max_dimension.y < settings.zoomInLimit)) {
4084 log_debug("ZoomIn limit reached. (limit=%.10f)", settings.zoomInLimit);
4085 return false;
4086 }
4087 */
4088
4089 return true;
4090}
4091
4095bool
4096allow_zoom_out(void)
4097{
4098 /*
4099 EmbVector origin = map_to_scene(0, 0);
4100 EmbVector corner = map_to_scene(width(), height());
4101 EmbVector max_dimension = embVector_subtract(corner, origin);
4102
4103 if ((max_dimension.x > zoomOutLimit) || (max_dimension.y > zoomOutLimit)) {
4104 log_debug("ZoomOut limit reached. (limit=%.1f)", zoomOutLimit);
4105 return false;
4106 }
4107 */
4108
4109 return true;
4110}
4111
4115static void
4116wheel_event(int* event)
4117{
4118 /*
4119 int zoomDir = 1; // \todo event->delta();
4120 EmbVector mousePoint = event->position();
4121
4122 updateMouseCoords(mousePoint.x, mousePoint.y);
4123 if (zoomDir > 0) {
4124 UndoableNavCommand* cmd = UndoableNavCommand("ZoomInToPoint", 0);
4125 undo_stack->push(cmd);
4126 }
4127 else {
4128 UndoableNavCommand* cmd = UndoableNavCommand("ZoomOutToPoint", 0);
4129 undo_stack->push(cmd);
4130 }
4131 */
4132}
4133
4137static void
4138zoom_to_point(EmbVector mousePoint, int zoomDir)
4139{
4140 /*
4141 EmbVector pointBeforeScale(map_to_scene(mousePoint));
4142
4143 // Do The zoom
4144 EmbReal s = 1.0;
4145 if (zoomDir > 0) {
4146 if (!allowZoomIn()) {
4147 return;
4148 }
4149 s = settings.display_zoomscale_in;
4150 }
4151 else {
4152 if (!allowZoomOut()) {
4153 return;
4154 }
4155 s = settings.display_zoomscale_out;
4156 }
4157
4158 scale(s, s);
4159 alignScenePointWithViewPoint(pointBeforeScale, mousePoint);
4160 recalculateLimits();
4161 alignScenePointWithViewPoint(pointBeforeScale, mousePoint);
4162
4163 updateMouseCoords(mousePoint.x, mousePoint.y);
4164 if (active_view->pasting_active) {
4165 pasteObjectItemGroup->setPos(sceneMousePoint - pasteDelta);
4166 }
4167 if (selectingActive) {
4168 selectBox->setGeometry(EmbRect(map_from_scene(scenePressPoint), mousePoint).normalized());
4169 }
4170 */
4171}
4172
4176static void
4177context_menu_event(void) // (QContextMenuEvent* event)
4178{
4179 /*
4180 QMenu menu;
4181 EmbGeometry* item_list = active_view->selected;
4182 bool selectionEmpty = item_list.isEmpty();
4183
4184 for (int i = 0; i < item_list.size(); i++) {
4185 if (item_list.at(i)->data(OBJ_TYPE) != EMB_NULL) {
4186 selectionEmpty = false;
4187 break;
4188 }
4189 }
4190
4191 if (active_view->pasting_active) {
4192 return;
4193 }
4194 if (!prompt->is_command_active()) {
4195 char lastCmd[200] = prompt->lastCommand();
4196 QAction* repeat_action = QAction(load_icon(lastCmd), "Repeat " + lastCmd, this);
4197 repeat_action->setStatusTip("Repeats the previously issued command.");
4198 connect(repeat_action, triggered(), repeat_action()));
4199 menu.addAction(repeat_action);
4200 }
4201 if (zoomWindowActive) {
4202 QAction* cancelZoomWinAction = QAction("&Cancel (ZoomWindow)", this);
4203 cancelZoomWinAction->setStatusTip("Cancels the ZoomWindow Command.");
4204 connect(cancelZoomWinAction, triggered(), escapePressed()));
4205 menu.addAction(cancelZoomWinAction);
4206 }
4207
4208 menu.addSeparator();
4209 menu.addAction(actionHash.value(ACTION_cut));
4210 menu.addAction(actionHash.value(ACTION_copy));
4211 menu.addAction(actionHash.value(ACTION_paste));
4212 menu.addSeparator();
4213
4214 if (!selectionEmpty) {
4215 QAction* deleteAction = QAction(load_icon("erase"), "D&elete", this);
4216 deleteAction->setStatusTip("Removes objects from a drawing.");
4217 connect(deleteAction, triggered(), delete_selection()));
4218 menu.addAction(deleteAction);
4219
4220 QAction* moveAction = QAction(load_icon("move"), "&Move", this);
4221 moveAction->setStatusTip("Displaces objects a specified distance in a specified direction.");
4222 connect(moveAction, triggered(), moveAction()));
4223 menu.addAction(moveAction);
4224
4225 QAction* scaleAction = QAction(load_icon("scale"), "Sca&le", this);
4226 scaleAction->setStatusTip("Enlarges or reduces objects proportionally in the X, Y, and Z directions.");
4227 connect(scaleAction, triggered(), scaleAction()));
4228 menu.addAction(scaleAction);
4229
4230 QAction* rotateAction = QAction(load_icon("rotate"), "R&otate", this);
4231 rotateAction->setStatusTip("Rotates objects about a base point.");
4232 connect(rotateAction, triggered(), rotateAction()));
4233 menu.addAction(rotateAction);
4234
4235 menu.addSeparator();
4236
4237 QAction* clearAction = QAction("Cle&ar Selection", this);
4238 clearAction->setStatusTip("Removes all objects from the selection set.");
4239 connect(clearAction, triggered(), clear_selection()));
4240 menu.addAction(clearAction);
4241 }
4242
4243 menu.exec(event->globalPos());
4244 */
4245}
4246
4250static void
4251delete_pressed(void)
4252{
4253 /*
4254 if (active_view->pasting_active) {
4255 active_view->removeItem(pasteObjectItemGroup);
4256 delete pasteObjectItemGroup;
4257 }
4258 active_view->pasting_active = false;
4259 zoomWindowActive = false;
4260 selectingActive = false;
4261 selectBox->hide();
4262 stopGripping(false);
4263 delete_selection();
4264 */
4265}
4266
4272static void
4273escape_pressed(void)
4274{
4275 /*
4276 if (active_view->pasting_active) {
4277 active_view->removeItem(pasteObjectItemGroup);
4278 delete pasteObjectItemGroup;
4279 }
4280 active_view->pasting_active = false;
4281 zoomWindowActive = false;
4282 selectingActive = false;
4283 selectBox->hide();
4284 if (grippingActive) {
4285 stopGripping(false);
4286 }
4287 else {
4288 clear_selection();
4289 }
4290
4291 end_command();
4292 */
4293}
4294

4299start_gripping(EmbGeometry* obj)

4301 /*

4303 return;
4304 }

4307 sceneGripPoint = gripBaseObj->mouseSnapPoint(sceneMousePoint);
4308 gripBaseObj->setObjectRubberPoint("GRIP_POINT", sceneGripPoint);
4309 gripBaseObj->setObjectRubberMode(OBJ_RUBBER_GRIP);
4310 */
4311}

4316static void
4317stop_gripping(bool accept)
4318{
4319 /*

4322 gripBaseObj->vulcanize();
4323 if (accept) {
4324 UndoableGripEditCommand* cmd = UndoableGripEditCommand(sceneGripPoint, sceneMousePoint, translate("Grip Edit ") + gripBaseObj->data(OBJ_NAME).toString(), gripBaseObj, 0);
4325 if (cmd) undo_stack->push(cmd);
4326 selectionChanged(); //Update the Property Editor
4327 }
4328 gripBaseObj = 0;
4329 }
4330 //Move the sceneGripPoint to a place where it will never be hot
4331 sceneGripPoint = sceneRect().topLeft();
4332 */
4333}
4334
4338static void
4339clear_selection(void)
4340{
4341 views[settings.pattern_index].n_selected = 0;
4342}
4343
4347static void
4348delete_selected(void)
4349{
4350 /*
4351 EmbGeometry *item_list = active_view->selected;
4352 int active_view->n_selected = item_list.size();
4353 if ( active_view->n_selected > 1) {
4354 undo_stack->beginMacro("Delete " + setNum(item_list.size()));
4355 }
4356 for (int i = 0; i < item_list.size(); i++) {
4357 if (item_list.at(i)->data(OBJ_TYPE) != EMB_NULL) {
4358 EmbGeometry* base = static_cast<EmbGeometry*>(item_list.at(i));
4359 if (base) {
4360 UndoableDeleteCommand* cmd = UndoableDeleteCommand(translate("Delete 1 ") + base->data(OBJ_NAME).toString(), base, 0);
4361 if (cmd)
4362 undo_stack->push(cmd);
4363 }
4364 }
4365 }
4366 if ( active_view->n_selected > 1) {
4367 undo_stack->end_macro();
4368 }
4369 */
4370}
4371
4375static void
4376cut(void)
4377{
4378 /*
4379 if (active_view->n_selected == 0) {
4380 information_messagebox(translate("Cut Preselect"), translate("Preselect objects before invoking the cut command."));
4381 return; //\todo Prompt to select objects if nothing is preselected
4382 }
4383
4384 undo_stack->beginMacro("Cut");
4385 copy_selection();
4386 delete_selection();
4387 undo_stack->end_macro();
4388 */
4389}
4390
4396static void
4397copy(void)
4398{
4399 if (!views[settings.pattern_index].n_selected) {
4400 /*
4401 information_messagebox(translate("Copy Preselect"),
4402 translate("Preselect objects before invoking the copy command."));
4403 */
4404 return;
4405 }
4406
4407 copy_selection();
4408 clear_selection();
4409}
4410
4417static void
4418copy_selection(void)
4419{
4420 /*
4421 EmbGeometry *selectedList = active_view->selected;
4422
4423 delete_all(cutCopyObjectList.begin(), cutCopyObjectList.end());
4424 cutCopyObjectList.clear();
4425 */
4426
4427 /* Create new objects but do not add them to the scene just yet.
4428 * By creating them now, ensures that pasting will still work
4429 * if the original objects are deleted before the paste occurs.
4430 */
4431 /*
4432 cutCopyObjectList = createObjectList(selectedList);
4433 */
4434}
4435
4439static void
4440paste(void)
4441{
4442 /*
4443 if (active_view->pasting_active) {
4444 active_view->removeItem(pasteObjectItemGroup);
4445 delete pasteObjectItemGroup;
4446 }
4447
4448 pasteObjectItemGroup = active_view->createItemGroup(cutCopyObjectList);
4449 pasteDelta = pasteObjectItemGroup->boundingRect().bottomLeft();
4450 pasteObjectItemGroup->setPos(sceneMousePoint - pasteDelta);
4451 active_view->pasting_active = true;*/
4452
4453 /* Re-create the list in case of multiple pastes. */
4454 /*
4455 cutCopyObjectList = createObjectList(cutCopyObjectList);
4456 */
4457}
4458
4481EmbArray *
4482createObjectList(EmbArray *list)
4483{
4484 int i;
4485 EmbArray *copyList = embArray_create(EMB_LINE);
4486
4487 for (i=0; i < list->count; i++) {
4488 /*
4489 EmbGeometry* item = list.at(i);
4490 if (!item) {
4491 continue;
4492 }
4493
4494 int objType = item->data(OBJ_TYPE).toInt();
4495
4496 switch (objType) {
4497 case EMB_ARC: {
4498 ArcObject* arcObj = static_cast<ArcObject*>(item);
4499 if (arcObj) {
4500 ArcObject* copyArcObj = ArcObject(arcObj);
4501 copyList.append(copyArcObj);
4502 }
4503 break;
4504 }
4505 case EMB_BLOCK: {
4506 break;
4507 }
4508 case EMB_CIRCLE: {
4509 CircleObject* circObj = static_cast<CircleObject*>(item);
4510 if (circObj) {
4511 CircleObject* copyCircObj = CircleObject(circObj);
4512 copyList.append(copyCircObj);
4513 }
4514 break;
4515 }
4516 case EMB_DIM_ALIGNED: {
4517 break;
4518 }
4519 case EMB_DIM_ANGULAR: {
4520 //\todo cut/copy angular dimensions
4521 break;
4522 }
4523 case EMB_DIM_ARCLENGTH: {
4524 //\todo cut/copy arclength dimensions
4525 break;
4526 }
4527 case EMB_DIM_DIAMETER: {
4528 //\todo cut/copy diameter dimensions
4529 break;
4530 }
4531 case EMB_DIM_LEADER: {
4532 EmbDimLeader* dimLeaderObj = static_cast<EmbDimLeader*>(item);
4533 if (dimLeaderObj) {
4534 EmbDimLeader* copyDimLeaderObj = EmbDimLeader(dimLeaderObj);
4535 copyList.append(copyDimLeaderObj);
4536 }
4537 break;
4538 }
4539 case EMB_DIMLINEAR: {
4540 break;
4541 }
4542 case EMB_DIMORDINATE: {
4543 break;
4544 }
4545 case EMB_DIMRADIUS: {
4546 break;
4547 }
4548 case EMB_ELLIPSE: {
4549 EmbEllipse* elipObj = static_cast<EmbEllipse*>(item);
4550 if (elipObj) {
4551 EmbEllipse* copyElipObj = EmbEllipse(elipObj);
4552 copyList.append(copyElipObj);
4553 }
4554 break;
4555 }
4556 case EMB_ELLIPSEARC: {
4557 break;
4558 }
4559 case EMB_IMAGE: {
4560 break;
4561 }
4562 case EMB_INFINITELINE: {
4563 break;
4564 }
4565 case EMB_LINE: {
4566 LineObject* lineObj = static_cast<LineObject*>(item);
4567 if (lineObj) {
4568 LineObject* copyLineObj = LineObject(lineObj);
4569 copyList.append(copyLineObj);
4570 }
4571 break;
4572 }
4573 case EMB_PATH: {
4574 PathObject* pathObj = item.path;
4575 if (pathObj) {
4576 PathObject* copyPathObj = PathObject(pathObj);
4577 copyList.append(copyPathObj);
4578 }
4579 break;
4580 }
4581 case EMB_POINT: {
4582 PointObject* pointObj = item.point;
4583 if (pointObj) {
4584 PointObject* copyPointObj = PointObject(pointObj);
4585 copyList.append(copyPointObj);
4586 }
4587 break;
4588 }
4589 case EMB_POLYGON: {
4590 EmbPolygon* pgonObj = item.polygon;
4591 if (pgonObj) {
4592 EmbPolygon* copyPgonObj = EmbPolygon(pgonObj);
4593 copyList.append(copyPgonObj);
4594 }
4595 break;
4596 }
4597 case EMB_POLYLINE: {
4598 PolylineObject* plineObj = static_cast<PolylineObject*>(item);
4599 if (plineObj) {
4600 PolylineObject* copyPlineObj = PolylineObject(plineObj);
4601 copyList.append(copyPlineObj);
4602 }
4603 break;
4604 }
4605 case EMB_RAY: {
4606 //\todo cut/copy rays
4607 break;
4608 }
4609 case EMB_RECT: {
4610 RectObject* rectObj = static_cast<RectObject*>(item);
4611 if (rectObj) {
4612 RectObject* copyRectObj = RectObject(rectObj);
4613 copyList.append(copyRectObj);
4614 }
4615 break;
4616 }
4617 case EMB_TEXT_SINGLE: {
4618 TextSingleObject* textObj = static_cast<TextSingleObject*>(item);
4619 if (textObj) {
4620 TextSingleObject* copyTextObj = TextSingleObject(textObj);
4621 copyList.append(copyTextObj);
4622 }
4623 break;
4624 }
4625 default:
4626 break;
4627 }
4628 */
4629 }
4630
4631 return copyList;
4632}
4633
4637static void
4638repeat_action(void)
4639{
4640 /*
4641 prompt->end_command();
4642 prompt->set_current_text(prompt->lastCommand());
4643 prompt->process_input(Key_Return);
4644 */
4645}

4652{
4653 /*
4654 prompt->end_command();
4655 prompt->set_current_text("move");
4656 prompt->process_input(Key_Return);
4657 */
4658}
4659
4663static void
4664moveSelected(EmbReal dx, EmbReal dy)
4665{
4666 /*
4667 EmbGeometry*item_list = active_view->selected;
4668 int active_view->n_selected = item_list.size();
4669 if ( active_view->n_selected > 1)
4670 undo_stack->beginMacro("Move " + setNum(item_list.size()));
4671 for (EmbGeometry* item, item_list) {
4672 EmbGeometry* base = static_cast<EmbGeometry*>(item);
4673 if (base)
4674 {
4675 UndoableMoveCommand* cmd = UndoableMoveCommand(dx, dy, translate("Move 1 ") + base->data(OBJ_NAME).toString(), base, 0);
4676 if (cmd) undo_stack->push(cmd);
4677 }
4678 }
4679 if ( active_view->n_selected > 1)
4680 undo_stack->end_macro();
4681
4682 //Always clear the selection after a move
4683 active_view->clear_selection();
4684 */
4685}

4690static void
4691rotateAction(void)
4692{
4693 /*
4694 prompt->end_command();
4695 prompt->set_current_text("rotate");
4696 prompt->process_input(Key_Return);
4697 */
4698}
4699
4703static void
4704rotateSelected(EmbReal x, EmbReal y, EmbReal rot)
4705{
4706 if (active_view == NULL) {
4707 return;
4708 }
4709
4710 /*
4711 EmbGeometry *item_list = active_view->selected;
4712 if (active_view->n_selected > 1) {
4713 undo_stack->beginMacro("Rotate " + setNum(item_list.size()));
4714 }
4715
4716 for (EmbGeometry* item, item_list) {
4717 EmbGeometry* base = static_cast<EmbGeometry*>(item);
4718 if (base)
4719 {
4720 UndoableRotateCommand* cmd = UndoableRotateCommand(x, y, rot, translate("Rotate 1 ") + base->data(OBJ_NAME).toString(), base, 0);
4721 if (cmd) undo_stack->push(cmd);
4722 }
4723 }
4724
4725 if ( active_view->n_selected > 1) {
4726 undo_stack->end_macro();
4727 }
4728 */
4729
4730 /* Always clear the selection after a rotate */
4731 active_view->n_selected = 0;
4732}
4733
4737static void
4738mirrorSelected(EmbReal x1, EmbReal y1, EmbReal x2, EmbReal y2)
4739{
4740 if (active_view == NULL) {
4741 return;
4742 }
4743
4744 /*
4745 EmbGeometry *item_list = active_view->selected;
4746 if (active_view->n_selected > 1) {
4747 undo_stack->beginMacro("Mirror " + setNum(item_list.size()));
4748 }
4749
4750 for (EmbGeometry* item, item_list) {
4751 EmbGeometry* base = static_cast<EmbGeometry*>(item);
4752 if (base)
4753 {
4754 UndoableMirrorCommand* cmd = UndoableMirrorCommand(x1, y1, x2, y2, translate("Mirror 1 ") + base->data(OBJ_NAME).toString(), base, 0);
4755 if (cmd) undo_stack->push(cmd);
4756 }
4757 }
4758
4759 if (active_view->n_selected > 1) {
4760 undo_stack->end_macro();
4761 }
4762 */
4763
4764 /* Always clear the selection after a mirror */
4765 active_view->n_selected = 0;
4766}
4767
4771static void
4772scaleAction(void)
4773{
4774 /*
4775 prompt->end_command();
4776 prompt->set_current_text("scale");
4777 prompt->process_input(Key_Return);
4778 */
4779}
4780
4784static void
4785scaleSelected(EmbReal x, EmbReal y, EmbReal factor)
4786{
4787 if (active_view == NULL) {
4788 return;
4789 }
4790
4791 /*
4792 EmbGeometry* item_list = active_view->selected;
4793 if (active_view->n_selected > 1) {
4794 undo_stack->beginMacro("Scale " + setNum(item_list.size()));
4795 }
4796
4797 for (EmbGeometry* item, item_list) {
4798 EmbGeometry* base = static_cast<EmbGeometry*>(item);
4799 if (base)
4800 {
4801 UndoableScaleCommand* cmd = UndoableScaleCommand(x, y, factor, translate("Scale 1 ") + base->data(OBJ_NAME).toString(), base, 0);
4802 if (cmd) undo_stack->push(cmd);
4803 }
4804 }
4805
4806 if (active_view->n_selected > 1) {
4807 undo_stack->end_macro();
4808 }
4809 */
4810
4811 /* Always clear the selection after a scale */
4812 active_view->n_selected = 0;
4813}
4814

4819showscrollbars(bool val)
4820{
4821 /*
4822 if (val) {
4823 setHorizontalscrollbarPolicy(SCROLLBAR_ALWAYS_ON);
4824 setVerticalscrollbarPolicy(SCROLLBAR_ALWAYS_ON);
4825 }
4826 else {
4827 setHorizontalscrollbarPolicy(SCROLLBAR_ALWAYS_OFF);
4828 setVerticalscrollbarPolicy(SCROLLBAR_ALWAYS_OFF);
4829 }
4830 */
4831}

4884
4888static void
4889selectbox_setDirection(int dir)

4891 /*

4893 dirPen = leftPen;
4894 dirBrush = leftBrush;
4895 }
4896 else {
4897 dirPen = rightPen;
4898 dirBrush = rightBrush;
4899 }

4903
4907static void
4908selectbox_set_colors(
4909 EmbColor colorL,
4910 EmbColor fillL,
4911 EmbColor colorR,
4912 EmbColor fillR,
4913 int newAlpha)
4914{
4915 /*
4916 alpha = newAlpha;
4917
4918 leftPenColor = colorL; //\todo allow customization
4919 leftBrushColor = EmbColor(fillL.red(), fillL.green(), fillL.blue(), alpha);
4920 rightPenColor = colorR; //\todo allow customization
4921 rightBrushColor = EmbColor(fillR.red(), fillR.green(), fillR.blue(), alpha);
4922
4923 leftPen.setColor(leftPenColor);
4924 leftPen.setStyle(DashLine);
4925 leftBrush.setStyle(SolidPattern);
4926 leftBrush.setColor(leftBrushColor);
4927
4928 rightPen.setColor(rightPenColor);
4929 rightPen.setStyle(SolidLine);
4930 rightBrush.setStyle(SolidPattern);
4931 rightBrush.setColor(rightBrushColor);
4932
4933 if (!boxDir) { dirPen = leftPen; dirBrush = leftBrush; }
4934 else { dirPen = rightPen; dirBrush = rightBrush; }
4935 */
4936}
4937
4941static void
4942selectbox_paintEvent(int* paint_event)
4943{
4944 /*
