4946 painter.setPen(dirPen);
4947 painter.fillRect(0,0,width()-1, height()-1, dirBrush);
4948 painter.drawRect(0,0,width()-1, height()-1);
4949 */
4950}
4951
4958static void
4959property_editor(void)
4960{
4961 if (n_views == 0) {
4962 return;
4963 }
4964
4965 EmbPattern *pattern = views[settings.pattern_index].pattern;
4966
4967 char msg[200];
4968 sprintf(msg, "%s%s",
4969 translate("Property Editor"),
4970 views[settings.pattern_index].filename);
4971 begin_child(msg);
4972 translated_text("Properties");
4973 /*
4974 propertyEditorButtonStyle = ToolButtonTextBesideIcon; //\todo Make customizable
4975
4976 pickAdd = pickAddMode;
4977
4978 precisionAngle = 0;
4979 precisionLength = 4;
4980 */
4981
4982 if (pattern) {
4983 create_group_box_general(settings.pattern_index, pattern);
4984 }
4985
4986 for (int i=0; i<pattern->geometry->count; i++) {
4987 if (pattern->geometry->geometry[i].type == EMB_ARC) {
4988 EmbArc *arc = &(pattern->geometry->geometry[i].object.arc);
4989 create_group_box_arc(i, arc);
4990 }
4991 }
4992
4993 if (0) {
4994 create_group_box_block(0, NULL);
4995 }
4996
4997 for (int i=0; i<pattern->geometry->count; i++) {
4998 if (pattern->geometry->geometry[i].type == EMB_CIRCLE) {
4999 EmbCircle *circle = &(pattern->geometry->geometry[i].object.circle);
5000 create_group_box_circle(i, circle);
5001 }
5002 }
5003
5004 if (0) {
5005 create_group_box_dim_aligned(0, NULL);
5006 }
5007
5008 if (0) {
5009 create_group_box_dim_angular(0, NULL);
5010 }
5011
5012 if (0) {
5013 create_group_box_dim_arc_length(0, NULL);
5014 }
5015
5016 if (0) {
5017 create_group_box_dim_diameter(0, NULL);
5018 }
5019
5020 if (0) {
5021 create_group_box_dim_leader(0, NULL);
5022 }
5023
5024 if (0) {
5025 create_group_box_dim_linear(0, NULL);
5026 }
5027
5028 if (0) {
5029 create_group_box_dim_ordinate(0, NULL);
5030 }
5031
5032 if (0) {
5033 create_group_box_dim_radius(0, NULL);
5034 }
5035
5036 for (int i=0; i<pattern->geometry->count; i++) {
5037 if (pattern->geometry->geometry[i].type == EMB_ELLIPSE) {
5038 EmbEllipse *ellipse = &(pattern->geometry->geometry[i].object.ellipse);
5039 create_group_box_ellipse(i, ellipse);
5040 }
5041 }
5042
5043 if (0) {
5044 create_group_box_image(0, NULL);
5045 }
5046
5047 if (0) {
5048 create_group_box_infinite_line(0, NULL);
5049 }
5050
5051 for (int i=0; i<pattern->geometry->count; i++) {
5052 if (pattern->geometry->geometry[i].type == EMB_LINE) {
5053 EmbLine *line = &(pattern->geometry->geometry[i].object.line);
5054 create_group_box_line(i, line);
5055 }
5056 }
5057
5058 for (int i=0; i<pattern->geometry->count; i++) {
5059 if (pattern->geometry->geometry[i].type == EMB_PATH) {
5060 EmbPath *path = &(pattern->geometry->geometry[i].object.path);
5061 create_group_box_path(i, path);
5062 }
5063 }
5064
5065 for (int i=0; i<pattern->geometry->count; i++) {
5066 if (pattern->geometry->geometry[i].type == EMB_POINT) {
5067 EmbPoint *point = &(pattern->geometry->geometry[i].object.point);
5068 create_group_box_point(i, point);
5069 }
5070 }
5071
5072 for (int i=0; i<pattern->geometry->count; i++) {
5073 if (pattern->geometry->geometry[i].type == EMB_POLYGON) {
5074 EmbPolygon *polygon = &(pattern->geometry->geometry[i].object.polygon);
5075 create_group_box_polygon(i, polygon);
5076 }
5077 }
5078
5079 for (int i=0; i<pattern->geometry->count; i++) {
5080 if (pattern->geometry->geometry[i].type == EMB_POLYLINE) {
5081 EmbPolyline *polyline = &(pattern->geometry->geometry[i].object.polyline);
5082 create_group_box_polyline(i, polyline);
5083 }
5084 }
5085
5086 if (0) {
5087 create_group_box_ray(0, NULL);
5088 }
5089
5090 for (int i=0; i<pattern->geometry->count; i++) {
5091 if (pattern->geometry->geometry[i].type == EMB_RECT) {
5092 EmbRect *rect = &(pattern->geometry->geometry[i].object.rect);
5093 create_group_box_rectangle(i, rect);
5094 }
5095 }
5096
5097 if (pattern->stitch_list->count > 0) {
5098 create_group_box_stitch_list(settings.pattern_index, pattern->stitch_list);
5099 }
5100
5101 if (0) {
5102 create_group_box_text_multi(0, NULL);
5103 }
5104
5105 if (0) {
5106 create_group_box_text_single(0, NULL);
5107 }
5108
5109 end_child();
5110}
5111
5118bool
5119property_editor_eventFilter(void)
5120{
5121 /*
5122 if (event->type() == QEvent_KeyPress) {
5123 QKeyEvent* pressedKey = (QKeyEvent*)event;
5124 int key = pressedKey->key();
5125 switch(key)
5126 {
5127 case Key_Escape:
5128 if (focusWidget)
5129 focusWidget->setFocus(OtherFocusReason);
5130 return true;
5131 break;
5132 default:
5133 pressedKey->ignore();
5134 }
5135 }
5136 return QObject_eventFilter(obj, event);
5137 */
5138 return true;
5139}
5140

5147property_editor_createComboBoxSelected(void)

5149 /*
5150 comboBoxSelected = int(this);
5151 comboBoxSelected->addItem(translate("No Selection"));
5152 return comboBoxSelected;
5153 */
5154 return NULL;
5155}

5170 toolButtonQSelect->setToolTip("QSelect"); //\todo Better Description

5173 */

5190 return toolButtonPickAdd;
5191 */
5192 return NULL;
5193}
5194
5198static void
5199property_editor_updatePickAddModeButton(bool pickAddMode)
5200{
5201 /*
5202 pickAdd = pickAddMode;
5203 if (pickAdd) {
5204 toolButtonPickAdd->setIcon(QIcon(iconDir + "/pickadd.png"));
5205 toolButtonPickAdd->setIconSize(QSize(iconSize, iconSize));
5206 toolButtonPickAdd->setText("PickAdd");
5207 toolButtonPickAdd->setToolTip("PickAdd Mode - Add to current selection.\nClick to switch to PickNew Mode.");
5208 toolButtonPickAdd->setToolButtonStyle(ToolButtonIconOnly);
5209 }
5210 else {
5211 toolButtonPickAdd->setIcon(QIcon(iconDir + "/picknew.png"));
5212 toolButtonPickAdd->setIconSize(QSize(iconSize, iconSize));
5213 toolButtonPickAdd->setText("PickNew");
5214 toolButtonPickAdd->setToolTip("PickNew Mode - Replace current selection.\nClick to switch to PickAdd Mode.");
5215 toolButtonPickAdd->setToolButtonStyle(ToolButtonIconOnly);
5216 }
5217 */
5218}

5223static void
5224property_editor_togglePickAddMode(void)

5226 /*
5227 emit pickAddModeToggled();
5228 */
5229}
5230
5234static void
5235property_editor_set_selectedItems(int *item_list, int length)
5236{
5237 /*
5238 selectedItemList = item_list;
5239 //Hide all the groups initially, then decide which ones to show
5240 hideAllGroups();
5241 comboBoxSelected->clear();
5242
5243 QSet<int> typeSet;
5244
5245 if (length == 0) {
5246 comboBoxSelected->addItem(translate("No Selection"));
5247 return;
5248 }
5249
5250 int num_geometry[NUMBER_OF_OBJECT_TYPES];
5251
5252 for (int i=0; i<length; i++) {
5253 typeSet.insert(objType);
5254
5255 if (item_list[i].type < NUMBER_OF_OBJECT_TYPES) {
5256 num_geometry[item_list[i].type]++;
5257 }
5258 else {
5259 num_geometry[OBJ_UNKNOWN]++;
5260 }
5261 }
5262
5263 int numTypes = typeSet.size();
5264
5265 // Populate the selection comboBox
5266 if (numTypes > 1) {
5267 comboBoxSelected->addItem(translate("Varies"), length) + ")");
5268 connect(comboBoxSelected, currentIndexChanged(int), showOneType(int)));
5269 }
5270
5271 char object_labels[][200] = {
5272 "Arc",
5273 "Block",
5274 "Circle",
5275 "Aligned Dimension"
5276 };
5277
5278 char *comboBoxStr[200];
5279 for (int objType=0; objType < EMB_UNKNOWN; objType++) {
5280 switch (objType) {
5281 case EMB_ARC:
5282 sprintf(comboBoxStr, "%s(%d)", translate("Arc"), numArc);
5283 break;
5284 case EMB_BLOCK:
5285 sprintf(comboBoxStr, "%s(%d)", translate("Block"), numBlock);
5286 break;
5287 case EMB_CIRCLE:
5288 sprintf(comboBoxStr, "%s(%d)", translate("Circle"), numCircle);
5289 break;
5290 case EMB_DIM_ALIGNED:
5291 sprintf(comboBoxStr, "%s(%d)", translate("Aligned Dimension"), numDimAlign);
5292 break;
5293 case EMB_DIM_ANGULAR:
5294 sprintf(comboBoxStr, "%s(%d)", translate("Angular Dimension"), numDimAngular);
5295 break;
5296 case EMB_DIM_ARCLENGTH:
5297 sprintf(comboBoxStr, "%s(%d)", translate("Arclength Dimension"), numDimArcLen);
5298 break;
5299 case EMB_DIM_DIAMETER:
5300 sprintf(comboBoxStr, "%s(%d)", translate("Diameter Dimension"), numDimDiam);
5301 break;
5302 case EMB_DIM_LEADER:
5303 sprintf(comboBoxStr, "%s(%d)", translate("Leader Dimension"), numDimLeader);
5304 break;
5305 case EMB_DIM_LINEAR:
5306 sprintf(comboBoxStr, "%s(%d)", translate("Linear Dimension"), numDimLinear);
5307 break;
5308 case EMB_DIM_ORDINATE:
5309 sprintf(comboBoxStr, "%s(%d)", translate("Ordinate Dimension"), numDimOrd);
5310 break;
5311 case EMB_DIM_RADIUS:
5312 sprintf(comboBoxStr, "%s(%d)", translate("Radius Dimension"), numDimRadius);
5313 break;
5314 case EMB_ELLIPSE:
5315 sprintf(comboBoxStr, "%s(%d)", translate("Ellipse"), numEllipse);
5316 break;
5317 case EMB_IMAGE:
5318 sprintf(comboBoxStr, "%s(%d)", translate("Image"), numImage);
5319 break;
5320 case EMB_INFINITELINE:
5321 sprintf(comboBoxStr, "%s(%d)", translate("Infinite Line"), numInfLine);
5322 break;
5323 case EMB_LINE:
5324 sprintf(comboBoxStr, "%s(%d)", translate("Line"), numLine);
5325 break;
5326 case EMB_PATH:
5327 sprintf(comboBoxStr, "%s(%d)", translate("Path"), numPath);
5328 break;
5329 case EMB_POINT:
5330 sprintf(comboBoxStr, "%s(%d)", translate("Point"), numPoint);
5331 break;
5332 case EMB_POLYGON:
5333 sprintf(comboBoxStr, "%s(%d)", translate("Polygon"), numPolygon);
5334 break;
5335 case EMB_POLYLINE:
5336 sprintf(comboBoxStr, "%s(%d)", translate("Polyline"), numPolyline);
5337 break;
5338 case EMB_RAY:
5339 sprintf(comboBoxStr, "%s(%d)", translate("Ray"), numRay);
5340 break;
5341 case EMB_RECT:
5342 sprintf(comboBoxStr, "%s(%d)", translate("Rectangle"), numRect);
5343 break;
5344 case EMB_TEXT_MULTI:
5345 sprintf(comboBoxStr, "%s(%d)", translate("Multiline Text"), numTextMulti);
5346 break;
5347 case EMB_TEXT_SINGLE:
5348 sprintf(comboBoxStr, "%s(%d)", translate("Text"), numTextSingle);
5349 break;
5350 default:
5351 sprintf(comboBoxStr, "%s(%d)", translate("Unknown"), numUnknown);
5352 break;
5353 }
5354
5355 comboBoxSelected->addItem(comboBoxStr, objType);
5356 }
5357
5358 // Load Data into the fields
5359
5360 // Clear fields first so if the selected data varies, the comparison is simple
5361 clearAllFields();
5362
5363 for (UiObject item : item_list) {
5364 if (!item) {
5365 continue;
5366 }
5367
5368 //\todo load data into the General field
5369 switch (item->type) {
5370 case EMB_ARC:
5371 ArcObject* obj = static_cast<ArcObject*>(item);
5372 create_group_box_arc(id, obj);
5373 break;
5374 case EMB_BLOCK:
5375 create_group_box_block(id, obj);
5376 break;
5377 case EMB_CIRCLE:
5378 CircleObject* obj = static_cast<CircleObject*>(item);
5379 create_group_box_circle(id, obj);
5380 break;
5381 case EMB_DIM_ALIGNED:
5382 create_group_box_dim_aligned(id, obj);
5383 break;
5384 case EMB_DIM_ANGULAR:
5385 create_group_box_dim_angular(id, obj);
5386 }
5387 case EMB_DIM_ARCLENGTH) {
5388 create_group_box_dim_arc_length(id, obj);
5389 }
5390 case EMB_DIM_DIAMETER) {
5391 create_group_box_dim_diameter(id, obj);
5392 }
5393 case EMB_DIM_LEADER) {
5394 create_group_box_dim_leader(id, obj);
5395 break;
5396 }
5397 case EMB_DIM_LINEAR: {
5398 create_group_box_dim_linear(id, obj);
5399 break;
5400 }
5401 case EMB_DIM_ORDINATE: {
5402 create_group_box_dim_ordinate(id, obj);
5403 break;
5404 }
5405 case EMB_DIM_RADIUS: {
5406 create_group_box_dim_radius(id, obj);
5407 break;
5408 }
5409 case EMB_ELLIPSE: {
5410 EmbEllipse* obj = static_cast<EmbEllipse*>(item);
5411 create_group_box_ellipse(id, obj);
5412 break;
5413 }
5414 case EMB_IMAGE: {
5415 create_group_box_image(id, obj);
5416 break;
5417 }
5418 case EMB_INFINITELINE: {
5419 create_group_box_infinite_line(id, obj);
5420 break;
5421 }
5422 case EMB_LINE: {
5423 create_group_box_line(id, obj);
5424 break;
5425 }
5426 case EMB_PATH: {
5427 create_group_box_path(id, obj);
5428 break;
5429 }
5430 case EMB_POINT: {
5431 create_group_box_point(id, obj);
5432 break;
5433 }
5434 case EMB_POLYGON: {
5435 create_group_box_polygon(id, obj);
5436 break;
5437 }
5438 case EMB_POLYLINE: {
5439 create_group_box_polyline(id, obj);
5440 break;
5441 }
5442 case EMB_RAY: {
5443 create_group_box_ray(id, obj);
5444 break;
5445 }
5446 case EMB_RECT: {
5447 create_group_box_rectangle(id, obj);
5448 break;
5449 }
5450 case EMB_TEXT_MULTI: {
5451 create_group_box_text_multi(id, obj);
5452 break;
5453 }
5454 case EMB_TEXT_SINGLE: {
5455 create_group_box_text_single(id, obj);
5456 break;
5457 }
5458 default:
5459 break;
5460 }
5461 }
5462
5463 // Only show fields if all objects are the same type
5464 if (numTypes == 1) {
5465 for(int objType : typeSet) {
5466 showGroups(objType);
5467 }
5468 }
5469 */
5470}
5471
5475static void
5476property_editor_updateLineEditStrIfVaries(int* lineEdit, const char * str)
5477{
5478 /*
5479 fieldOldText = lineEdit->text();
5480 fieldNewText = str;
5481
5482 if (fieldOldText.isEmpty()) lineEdit->setText(fieldNewText);
5483 else if (fieldOldText != fieldNewText) lineEdit->setText(fieldVariesText);
5484 */
5485}
5486
5490static void
5491property_editor_updateLineEditNumIfVaries(
5492 int* lineEdit,
5493 EmbReal num,
5494 bool useAnglePrecision)
5495{
5496 /*
5497 int precision = 0;
5498 if (useAnglePrecision) precision = precisionAngle;
5499 else precision = precisionLength;
5500
5501 fieldOldText = lineEdit->text();
5502 fieldNewText.setNum(num, 'f', precision);
5503
5504 //Prevent negative zero :D
5505 const char *negativeZero = "-0.";
5506 for (int i = 0; i < precision; ++i)
5507 negativeZero.append('0');
5508 if (fieldNewText == negativeZero)
5509 fieldNewText = negativeZero.replace("-", "");
5510
5511 if (fieldOldText.isEmpty()) lineEdit->setText(fieldNewText);
5512 else if (fieldOldText != fieldNewText) lineEdit->setText(fieldVariesText);
5513 */
5514}
5515
5519static void
5520property_editor_updateFontComboBoxStrIfVaries(
5521 int* fontComboBox,
5522 const char * str)
5523{
5524 /*
5525 fieldOldText = fontComboBox->property("FontFamily").toString();
5526 fieldNewText = str;
5527 //debug_message("old: %d %s, new: %d %s", oldIndex, fontComboBox->currentText()), newIndex, str));
5528 if (fieldOldText.isEmpty()) {
5529 fontComboBox->setCurrentFont(QFont(fieldNewText));
5530 fontComboBox->setProperty("FontFamily", fieldNewText);
5531 }
5532 else if (fieldOldText != fieldNewText) {
5533 // Prevent multiple entries
5534 if (fontComboBox->findText(fieldVariesText) == -1)
5535 fontComboBox->addItem(fieldVariesText);
5536 fontComboBox->setCurrentIndex(fontComboBox->findText(fieldVariesText));
5537 }
5538 */
5539}
5540
5544static void
5545property_editor_updateComboBoxStrIfVaries(
5546 int* comboBox,
5547 const char *str,
5548 const char **strList)
5549{
5550 /*
5551 fieldOldText = comboBox->currentText();
5552 fieldNewText = str;
5553
5554 if (fieldOldText.isEmpty()) {
5555 for (const char *s, strList) {
5556 comboBox->addItem(s, s);
5557 }
5558 comboBox->setCurrentIndex(comboBox->findText(fieldNewText));
5559 }
5560 else if (fieldOldText != fieldNewText) {
5561 if (comboBox->findText(fieldVariesText) == -1) //Prevent multiple entries
5562 comboBox->addItem(fieldVariesText);
5563 comboBox->setCurrentIndex(comboBox->findText(fieldVariesText));
5564 }
5565 */
5566}
5567
5571static void
5572property_editor_updateComboBoxBoolIfVaries(int* comboBox, bool val, bool yesOrNoText)
5573{
5574 /*
5575 fieldOldText = comboBox->currentText();
5576 if (yesOrNoText) {
5577 if (val) fieldNewText = fieldYesText;
5578 else fieldNewText = fieldNoText;
5579 }
5580 else {
5581 if (val) fieldNewText = fieldOnText;
5582 else fieldNewText = fieldOffText;
5583 }
5584
5585 if (fieldOldText.isEmpty()) {
5586 if (yesOrNoText) {
5587 comboBox->addItem(fieldYesText, true);
5588 comboBox->addItem(fieldNoText, false);
5589 }
5590 else {
5591 comboBox->addItem(fieldOnText, true);
5592 comboBox->addItem(fieldOffText, false);
5593 }
5594 comboBox->setCurrentIndex(comboBox->findText(fieldNewText));
5595 }
5596 else if (fieldOldText != fieldNewText) {
5597 if (comboBox->findText(fieldVariesText) == -1) //Prevent multiple entries
5598 comboBox->addItem(fieldVariesText);
5599 comboBox->setCurrentIndex(comboBox->findText(fieldVariesText));
5600 }
5601 */
5602}
5603
5607static void
5608property_editor_showGroups(int objType)
5609{
5610 switch (objType) {
5611 case EMB_ARC:
5612 // groupBoxGeometryArc->show();
5613 // groupBoxMiscArc->show();
5614 break;
5615 case EMB_BLOCK:
5616 // groupBoxGeometryBlock->show();
5617 break;
5618 case EMB_CIRCLE:
5619 // groupBoxGeometryCircle->show();
5620 break;
5621 case EMB_DIM_ALIGNED:
5622 // groupBoxGeometryDimAligned->show();
5623 break;
5624 case EMB_DIM_ANGULAR:
5625 // groupBoxGeometryDimAngular->show();
5626 break;
5627 case EMB_DIM_ARCLENGTH:
5628 // groupBoxGeometryDimArcLength->show();
5629 break;
5630 case EMB_DIM_DIAMETER:
5631 // groupBoxGeometryDimDiameter->show();
5632 break;
5633 case EMB_DIM_LEADER:
5634 // groupBoxGeometryDimLeader->show();
5635 break;
5636 case EMB_DIM_LINEAR:
5637 // groupBoxGeometryDimLinear->show();
5638 break;
5639 case EMB_DIM_ORDINATE:
5640 // groupBoxGeometryDimOrdinate->show();
5641 break;
5642 case EMB_DIM_RADIUS:
5643 // groupBoxGeometryDimRadius->show();
5644 break;
5645 case EMB_ELLIPSE:
5646 // groupBoxGeometryEllipse->show();
5647 break;
5648 case EMB_IMAGE:
5649 // groupBoxGeometryImage->show();
5650 // groupBoxMiscImage->show();
5651 break;
5652 case EMB_INFINITELINE:
5653 // groupBoxGeometryInfiniteLine->show();
5654 break;
5655 case EMB_LINE:
5656 // groupBoxGeometryLine->show();
5657 break;
5658 case EMB_PATH:
5659 // groupBoxGeometryPath->show();
5660 // groupBoxMiscPath->show();
5661 break;
5662 case EMB_POINT:
5663 // groupBoxGeometryPoint->show();
5664 break;
5665 case EMB_POLYGON:
5666 // groupBoxGeometryPolygon->show();
5667 break;
5668 case EMB_POLYLINE:
5669 // groupBoxGeometryPolyline->show();
5670 // groupBoxMiscPolyline->show();
5671 break;
5672 case EMB_RAY:
5673 // groupBoxGeometryRay->show();
5674 break;
5675 case EMB_RECT:
5676 // groupBoxGeometryRectangle->show();
5677 break;
5678 case EMB_TEXT_MULTI:
5679 // groupBoxGeometryTextMulti->show();
5680 break;
5681 case EMB_TEXT_SINGLE:
5682 // groupBoxTextTextSingle->show();
5683 // groupBoxGeometryTextSingle->show();
5684 // groupBoxMiscTextSingle->show();
5685 break;
5686 default:
5687 break;
5688 }
5689}
5690

5696{
5697 /*
5698 hideAllGroups();
5699 showGroups(comboBoxSelected->itemData(id).toInt());
5700 */
5701}
5702
5706static void
5707property_editor_hideAllGroups(void)
5708{
5709 //NOTE: General group will never be hidden
5710 /*
5711 groupBoxGeometryArc->hide();
5712 groupBoxMiscArc->hide();
5713 groupBoxGeometryBlock->hide();
5714 groupBoxGeometryCircle->hide();
5715 groupBoxGeometryDimAligned->hide();
5716 groupBoxGeometryDimAngular->hide();
5717 groupBoxGeometryDimArcLength->hide();
5718 groupBoxGeometryDimDiameter->hide();
5719 groupBoxGeometryDimLeader->hide();
5720 groupBoxGeometryDimLinear->hide();
5721 groupBoxGeometryDimOrdinate->hide();
5722 groupBoxGeometryDimRadius->hide();
5723 groupBoxGeometryEllipse->hide();
5724 groupBoxGeometryImage->hide();
5725 groupBoxMiscImage->hide();
5726 groupBoxGeometryInfiniteLine->hide();
5727 groupBoxGeometryLine->hide();
5728 groupBoxGeometryPath->hide();
5729 groupBoxMiscPath->hide();
5730 groupBoxGeometryPoint->hide();
5731 groupBoxGeometryPolygon->hide();
5732 groupBoxGeometryPolyline->hide();
5733 groupBoxMiscPolyline->hide();
5734 groupBoxGeometryRay->hide();
5735 groupBoxGeometryRectangle->hide();
5736 groupBoxGeometryTextMulti->hide();
5737 groupBoxTextTextSingle->hide();
5738 groupBoxGeometryTextSingle->hide();
5739 groupBoxMiscTextSingle->hide();
5740 */
5741}

5746static void
5747create_group_box_general(int id, EmbPattern *pattern)
5748{
5749 char label[200];
5750 sprintf(label, "%s##%d", translate("General"), id+1);
5751 printf("%d", pattern->stitch_list->count);
5752 if (collapsing_header(label)) {
5753 /*
5754 if (ImGui_ComboBox("Layer")) {
5755 for (int i=0; i<) {
5756
5757 }
5758 }
5759 if (ImGui_ComboBox("Color")) {
5760 for () {
5761
5762 }
5763 }
5764 if (ImGui_ComboBox("LineType")) {
5765 for () {
5766
5767 }
5768 }
5769 if (ImGui_ComboBox("LineWeight")) {
5770 for () {
5771
5772 }
5773 }
5774 */
5775 }
5776}
5777
5781static void
5782create_group_box_arc(int id, EmbArc *arc)
5783{
5784 char label[200];
5785 sprintf(label, "%s ID: %d", translate("Arc"), id+1);
5786 if (collapsing_header(label)) {
5787 translated_text("Geometry");
5788
5789 show_real("Start X", arc->start.x);
5790 show_real("Start Y", arc->start.y);
5791 show_real("Mid X", arc->mid.x);
5792 show_real("Mid Y", arc->mid.y);
5793 show_real("End X", arc->end.x);
5794 show_real("End Y", arc->end.y);
5795
5796 /*
5797 toolButtonArcCenterX = create_tool_button("blank", translate("Center X"));
5798 toolButtonArcCenterY = create_tool_button("blank", translate("Center Y"));
5799 toolButtonArcRadius = create_tool_button("blank", translate("Radius"));
5800 toolButtonArcStartAngle = create_tool_button("blank", translate("Start Angle"));
5801 toolButtonArcEndAngle = create_tool_button("blank", translate("End Angle"));
5802 toolButtonArcStartX = create_tool_button("blank", translate("Start X"));
5803 toolButtonArcStartY = create_tool_button("blank", translate("Start Y"));
5804 toolButtonArcEndX = create_tool_button("blank", translate("End X"));
5805 toolButtonArcEndY = create_tool_button("blank", translate("End Y"));
5806 toolButtonArcArea = create_tool_button("blank", translate("Area"));
5807 toolButtonArcLength = create_tool_button("blank", translate("Arc Length"));
5808 toolButtonArcChord = create_tool_button("blank", translate("Chord"));
5809 toolButtonArcIncAngle = create_tool_button("blank", translate("Included Angle"));
5810
5811 lineEditArcCenterX = create_line_edit("EmbReal", false);
5812 lineEditArcCenterY = create_line_edit("EmbReal", false);
5813 lineEditArcRadius = create_line_edit("EmbReal", false);
5814 lineEditArcStartAngle = create_line_edit("EmbReal", false);
5815 lineEditArcEndAngle = create_line_edit("EmbReal", false);
5816 lineEditArcStartX = create_line_edit("EmbReal", true);
5817 lineEditArcStartY = create_line_edit("EmbReal", true);
5818 lineEditArcEndX = create_line_edit("EmbReal", true);
5819 lineEditArcEndY = create_line_edit("EmbReal", true);
5820 lineEditArcArea = create_line_edit("EmbReal", true);
5821 lineEditArcLength = create_line_edit("EmbReal", true);
5822 lineEditArcChord = create_line_edit("EmbReal", true);
5823 lineEditArcIncAngle = create_line_edit("EmbReal", true);
5824
5825 show_real("Area", embArc);
5826 show_real("Chord", embVector_angle(delta));
5827 show_real("Included Angle", embVector_length(delta));
5828 */
5829
5830 translated_text("Misc");
5831
5832 /*
5833 toolButtonArcClockwise = create_tool_button("blank", translate("Clockwise"));
5834
5835 comboBoxArcClockwise = createComboBox(true);
5836 */
5837 }
5838}

6024static void
6025create_group_box_ellipse(int id, EmbEllipse *ellipse)
6026{
6027 char label[200];
6028 sprintf(label, "%s ID: %d", translate("Ellipse"), id+1);
6029 if (collapsing_header(label)) {
6030 translated_text("Geometry");
6031
6032 edit_real("Center X", &(ellipse->center.x));
6033 edit_real("Center Y", &(ellipse->center.y));
6034 edit_real("Major Radius", &(ellipse->radius.x));
6035 edit_real("Minor Radius", &(ellipse->radius.y));
6036 show_real("Major Diameter", 2.0*ellipse->radius.x);
6037 show_real("Minor Diameter", 2.0*ellipse->radius.y);
6038 }
6039}

6045static void
6046create_group_box_image(int id, EmbImage *image)
6047{
6048 char label[200];
6049 sprintf(label, "%s ID: %d", translate("Image"), id+1);
6050 if (collapsing_header(label)) {
6051 translated_text("Geometry");
6052
6053 edit_real(translate("Position X"), &(image->position.x));
6054 edit_real(translate("Position Y"), &(image->position.y));
6055 //edit_real(translate("Width"), &(image->width));
6056 //edit_real(translate("Height"), &(image->height));
6057
6058 translated_text("Misc");
6059
6060 translated_text("Name");
6061 same_line();
6062 translated_text(image->name);
6063
6064 translated_text("Path");
6065 same_line();
6066 translated_text(image->path);
6067 }
6068}

6100
6105static void
6106create_group_box_line(int id, EmbLine *line)
6107{
6108 char label[200];
6109 sprintf(label, "%s ID: %d", translate("Line"), id+1);
6110 if (collapsing_header(label)) {
6111 translated_text("Geometry");
6112
6113 // \todo icons
6114 /*
6115 translated_text("Start X");
6116 input_double("Start X", &(line->start.x), line->start.x);
6117 translated_text("Start Y");
6118 input_double("Start Y", &(line->start.y), line->start.y);
6119 translated_text("End X");
6120 input_double("End Y", &(line->end.y), line->end.y);
6121 translated_text("End Y");
6122 input_double("End Y", &(line->end.y), line->end.y);
6123 */
6124
6125 EmbVector delta;
6126 delta = embVector_subtract(line->end, line->start);
6127 show_real("Delta X", delta.x);
6128 show_real("Delta Y", delta.y);
6129 show_real("Angle", embVector_angle(delta));
6130 show_real("Length", embVector_length(delta));
6131 }
6132}
6133

6150 toolButtonPathArea = create_tool_button("blank", translate("Area"));
6151 toolButtonPathLength = create_tool_button("blank", translate("Length"));
6152
6153 comboBoxPathVertexNum = createComboBox(false);
6154 lineEditPathVertexX = create_line_edit("EmbReal", false);
6155 lineEditPathVertexY = create_line_edit("EmbReal", false);
6156 lineEditPathArea = create_line_edit("EmbReal", true);
6157 lineEditPathLength = create_line_edit("EmbReal", true);*/
6158
6159 translated_text("Misc");
6160
6161 /*
6162 toolButtonPathClosed = create_tool_button("blank", translate("Closed"));
6163
6164 comboBoxPathClosed = createComboBox(false);
6165 */
6166 }

6327 lineEditRectangleHeight = create_line_edit("EmbReal", false);
6328 lineEditRectangleArea = create_line_edit("EmbReal", true);*/
6329 }
6330}
6331
6335static bool stor[10];
6336
6341static void
6342create_group_box_stitch(int i, EmbStitch *st)
6343{
6344 char decorator[200], label[200];
6345 sprintf(decorator, "##stitch%d %d", settings.pattern_index, i);
6346 sprintf(label, "Stitch %d%s", i, decorator);
6347 if (i == 0) {
6348 sprintf(label, "Home%s", decorator);
6349 }
6350 if (collapsing_header(label)) {
6351 char s[200];
6352 sprintf(s, "X%s", decorator);
6353 edit_real(s, &(st->x));
6354 sprintf(s, "Y%s", decorator);
6355 edit_real(s, &(st->y));
6356 /* \todo checkboxes for individual flags */
6357 translated_text("Flags");
6358
6359 /* The stors need to be distinct memory locations. */
6360 stor[0] = st->flags & TRIM;
6361 sprintf(s, "TRIM%s", decorator);
6362 checkbox_data(s, stor, stor);
6363
6364 stor[1] = st->flags & NORMAL;
6365 sprintf(s, "NORMAL%s", decorator);
6366 checkbox_data(s, stor+1, stor+1);
6367
6368 stor[2] = st->flags & END;
6369 sprintf(s, "END%s", decorator);
6370 checkbox_data(s, stor+2, stor+2);
6371
6372 st->flags = (stor[0] & TRIM) + (stor[1] & NORMAL) + (stor[2] & END);
6373
6374 sprintf(s, "Thread Index%s", decorator);
6375 edit_int(s, &(st->color));
6376 }
6377}
6378
6382static int from_ = 0;
6383static int to_ = 10;
6384
6389static void
6390create_group_box_stitch_list(int id, EmbArray *stitch_list)
6391{
6392 char label[200];
6393 sprintf(label, "%s ID:%d", translate("Stitch List"), id+1);
6394 if (collapsing_header(label)) {
6395 char s[200];
6396 sprintf(s, "From##%d", id+1);
6397 edit_int(s, &from_);
6398 sprintf(s, "To##%d", id+1);
6399 edit_int(s, &to_);
6400 if (to_ < from_) {
6401 to_ = from_;
6402 }
6403 if (to_ > stitch_list->count) {
6404 to_ = stitch_list->count;
6405 }
6406 for (int i=from_; i<to_; i++) {
6407 EmbStitch *st = &(stitch_list->stitch[i]);
6408 create_group_box_stitch(i, st);
6409 }
6410 }
6411}
6412
6417static void
6418create_group_box_text_multi(int id, EmbTextMulti *text_multi)
6419{
6420 if (collapsing_header("Text Multi")) {
6421 translated_text("Geometry");
6422 translated_text("Text");
6423
6424 /*
6425 toolButtonTextMultiX = create_tool_button("blank", translate("Position X"));
6426 toolButtonTextMultiY = create_tool_button("blank", translate("Position Y"));
6427
6428 lineEditTextMultiX = create_line_edit("EmbReal", false);
6429 lineEditTextMultiY = create_line_edit("EmbReal", false);*/
6430 }
6431}
6432
6437static void
6438create_group_box_text_single(int id, EmbTextSingle *text_single)
6439{
6440 if (collapsing_header("Text Single")) {
6441 /*
6442 toolButtonTextSingleContents = create_tool_button("blank", translate("Contents"));
6443 toolButtonTextSingleFont = create_tool_button("blank", translate("Font"));
6444 toolButtonTextSingleJustify = create_tool_button("blank", translate("Justify"));
6445 toolButtonTextSingleHeight = create_tool_button("blank", translate("Height"));
6446 toolButtonTextSingleRotation = create_tool_button("blank", translate("Rotation"));
6447
6448 lineEditTextSingleContents = create_line_edit("string", false);
6449 comboBoxTextSingleFont = createFontComboBox(false);
6450 comboBoxTextSingleJustify = createComboBox(false);
6451 lineEditTextSingleHeight = create_line_edit("EmbReal", false);
6452 lineEditTextSingleRotation = create_line_edit("EmbReal", false);*/
6453
6454 translated_text("Geometry");
6455
6456 /*
6457 toolButtonTextSingleX = create_tool_button("blank", translate("Position X"));
6458 toolButtonTextSingleY = create_tool_button("blank", translate("Position Y"));
6459
6460 lineEditTextSingleX = create_line_edit("EmbReal", false);
6461 lineEditTextSingleY = create_line_edit("EmbReal", false);*/
6462
6463 translated_text("Misc");
6464
6465 /*
6466 toolButtonTextSingleBackward = create_tool_button("blank", translate("Backward"));
6467 toolButtonTextSingleUpsideDown = create_tool_button("blank", translate("UpsideDown"));
6468
6469 comboBoxTextSingleBackward = createComboBox(false);
6470 comboBoxTextSingleUpsideDown = createComboBox(false);*/
6471 }
6472}
6473
6479Index *index_init(void)
6480{
6481 Index *index = (Index*)malloc(sizeof(Index));
6482 index->max_length = 1000;
6483 index->length = 0;
6484 index->data = (IndexEntry*)malloc(1000*sizeof(IndexEntry));
6485 return index;
6486}
6487
6491static void
6492index_free(Index *index)
6493{
6494 free(index->data);
6495 free(index);
6496}
6497
6501Dictionary *
6502dictionary_from_index(Index *index, const char *label)
6503{
6504 for (int i=0; i<index->length; i++) {
6505 if (!strcmp(index->data[i].key, label)) {
6506 return index->data[i].value;
6507 }
6508 }
6509 return NULL;
6510}
6511
6517UndoHistory
6518undo_history_init(void)
6519{
6520 UndoHistory undo_history;
6521 undo_history.max_length = 100;
6522 undo_history.length = 0;
6523 undo_history.position = 0;
6524 return undo_history;
6525}
6526
6530static void
6531add_to_undo_history(UndoHistory *undo_history, const char *command_line)
6532{
6533 int pos = undo_history->position;
6534 strcpy(undo_history->data[pos], command_line);
6535 undo_history->position++;
6536 undo_history->length++;
6537 if (undo_history->position >= 80) {
6538 for (int i=0; i<80; i++) {
6539 strcpy(undo_history->data[i], undo_history->data[i+20]);
6540 }
6541 undo_history->position -= 20;
6542 undo_history->length -= 20;
6543 }
6544}
6545
6549static void
6550load_configuration(void)
6551{
6552 char error_buffer[200];
6553 FILE *f;
6554 char fname[200];
6555 sprintf(fname, "%sem2_config.toml", settings.assets_dir);
6556 f = fopen(fname, "r");
6557 if (!f) {
6558 log_debug("ERROR: failed to open configuration file \"em2_config.toml\".");
6559 settings.running = false;
6560 return;
6561 }
6562 toml_table_t *config = toml_parse_file(f, error_buffer, sizeof(error_buffer));
6563 fclose(f);
6564
6565 if (!config) {
6566 log_debug("ERROR: failed to parse \"em2_config.toml\".");
6567 settings.running = false;
6568 return;
6569 }
6570
6571 Dictionary *menu = read_dictionary_setting(config, "menu_layout");
6572 char cmd[200];
6573 sprintf(cmd, "menu length: %d", menu->length);
6574 log_debug(cmd);
6575 menu_layout = index_init();
6576 for (int i=0; i<menu->length; i++) {
6577 strcpy(menu_layout->data[i].key, menu->data[i].key);
6578 menu_layout->data[i].value = read_dictionary_setting(config, menu->data[i].value);
6579 menu_layout->length++;
6580 }
6581
6582 Dictionary *toolbar = read_dictionary_setting(config, "toolbar_layout");
6583 sprintf(cmd, "toolbar length: %d", toolbar->length);
6584 log_debug(cmd);
6585 toolbar_layout = index_init();
6586 for (int i=0; i<toolbar->length; i++) {
6587 strcpy(toolbar_layout->data[i].key, toolbar->data[i].key);
6588 toolbar_layout->data[i].value = read_dictionary_setting(config, toolbar->data[i].value);
6589 toolbar_layout->length++;
6590 }
6591
6592 /* string_matrix actions = load_string_matrix(config, "action_list"); */
6593
6594 settings.texture_list = read_dictionary_setting(config, "texture_list");
6595 sprintf(cmd, "texture_list length: %d", settings.texture_list->length);
6596 log_debug(cmd);
6597
6598 read_str_setting(config, "version", settings.version);
6599 log_debug(settings.version);
6600 toml_free(config);
6601}
6602
6606static void
6607read_str_setting(toml_table_t *table, const char *key, char s[200])
6608{
6609 toml_datum_t result_in = toml_string_in(table, key);
6610 if (result_in.ok) {
6611 strcpy(s, result_in.u.s);
6612 }
6613 else {
6614 char error[200];
6615 sprintf(error, "ERROR: failed to read %s.\n", key);
6616 log_debug(error);
6617 }
6618 free(result_in.u.s);
6619}
6620
6624int
6625read_int_setting(toml_table_t *table, const char *key)
6626{
6627 toml_datum_t result_in = toml_int_in(table, key);
6628 if (!result_in.ok) {
6629 char s[200];
6630 sprintf(s, "ERROR: failed to read %s.\n", key);
6631 log_debug(s);
6632 return 0;
6633 }
6634 return result_in.u.i;
6635}
6636
6640bool
6641read_bool_setting(toml_table_t *table, const char *key)
6642{
6643 toml_datum_t result_in = toml_bool_in(table, key);
6644 if (!result_in.ok) {
6645 char s[200];
6646 sprintf(s, "ERROR: failed to read %s.\n", key);
6647 log_debug(s);
6648 }
6649 return result_in.u.b;
6650}
6651
6655Dictionary *
6656read_dictionary_setting(toml_table_t *table, const char *key)
6657{
6658 Dictionary *dict = (Dictionary*)malloc(sizeof(Dictionary));
6659 dict->data = (DictionaryEntry*)malloc(200*sizeof(DictionaryEntry));
6660 dict->length = 0;
6661 dict->max_length = 200;
6662 toml_array_t *array = toml_array_in(table, key);
6663
6664 if (!array) {
6665 char s[200];
6666 sprintf(s, "ERROR: failed to read %s.\n", key);
6667 log_debug(s);
6668 return NULL;
6669 }
6670
6671 for (int i=0; ; i++) {
6672 toml_datum_t str1;
6673 dict->length = i;
6674 toml_array_t *a2 = toml_array_at(array, i);
6675 if (!a2) {
6676 break;
6677 }
6678 str1 = toml_string_at(a2, 0);
6679 if (!str1.ok) {
6680 free(str1.u.s);
6681 break;
6682 }
6683 strcpy(dict->data[i].key, str1.u.s);
6684
6685 str1 = toml_string_at(a2, 1);
6686 if (!str1.ok) {
6687 free(str1.u.s);
6688 break;
6689 }
6690 strcpy(dict->data[i].value, str1.u.s);
6691 free(str1.u.s);
6692 }
6693
6694 return dict;
6695}
6696
6700static void
6701write_float_setting(FILE *file, const char *key, float value)
6702{
6703 fprintf(file, "%s = %f\n", key, value);
6704}
6705
6709static void
6710write_int_setting(FILE *file, const char *key, int value)
6711{
6712 fprintf(file, "%s = %d\n", key, value);
6713}
6714
6718static void
6719write_uint_setting(FILE *file, const char *key, unsigned int value)
6720{
6721 fprintf(file, "%s = %u\n", key, value);
6722}
6723
6727static void
6728write_str_setting(FILE *file, const char *key, const char value[200])
6729{
6730 fprintf(file, "%s = \"%s\"\n", key, value);
6731}
6732
6736static void
6737write_bool_setting(FILE *file, const char *key, bool value)
6738{
6739 if (value) {
6740 fprintf(file, "%s = true\n", key);
6741 }
6742 else {
6743 fprintf(file, "%s = false\n", key);
6744 }
6745}
6746
6750static void
6751write_dictionary_setting(FILE *file, const char *key, Dictionary dict)
6752{
6753 fprintf(file, "%s = [\n", key);
6754 for (int i=0; i<dict.length-1; i++) {
6755 fprintf(file, " [%s, %s],\n", dict.data[i].key, dict.data[i].value);
6756 }
6757 fprintf(file, " [%s, %s]\n",
6758 dict.data[dict.length-1].key,
6759 dict.data[dict.length-1].value);
6760 fprintf(file, "]\n\n");
6761}
6762
6766static void
6767read_settings(const char *settings_file)
6768{
6769 /*
6770 EmbVector pos(0,0);
6771 QSize size(800,600);
6772
6773 some layout state recording? */
6774 char error_buffer[200];
6775 FILE *f;
6776 f = fopen(settings_file, "r");
6777 if (!f) {
6778 return;
6779 }
6780 toml_table_t *setting_toml = toml_parse_file(f, error_buffer, sizeof(error_buffer));
6781 fclose(f);
6782
6783 if (!setting_toml) {
6784 puts("ERROR: failed to parse settings.toml, continuing with defaults.");
6785 return;
6786 }
6787
6788 /*
6789 if (setting_toml.contains("window")) {
6790 toml_table_t table = read_setting(setting_toml, "window");
6791 if (table.contains("position-x")) {
6792 pos.setX(read_setting(table, "position_x"));
6793 }
6794 if (table.contains("position-y")) {
6795 pos.setY(read_setting(table, "position_y"));
6796 }
6797 if (table.contains("size-x")) {
6798 size.setWidth(read_setting(table, "size_x"));
6799 }
6800 if (table.contains("size-y")) {
6801 size.setHeight(read_setting(table, "size_y"));
6802 }
6803 }
6804 */
6805
6806 toml_table_t *table = toml_table_in(setting_toml, "general");
6807 if (table) {
6808 read_str_setting(table, "language", settings.language);
6809 settings.icon_size = read_int_setting(table, "icon_size");
6810 read_str_setting(table, "icon_theme", settings.icon_theme);
6811 settings.use_translation = read_bool_setting(table, "use_translation");
6812 settings.mdi_bg_use_logo = read_bool_setting(table, "mdi_bg_use_logo");
6813 settings.mdi_bg_use_texture = read_bool_setting(table, "mdi_bg_use_texture");
6814 settings.mdi_bg_use_color = read_bool_setting(table, "mdi_bg_use_color");
6815 /*
6816 settings.general_mdi_bg_logo = read_setting(table, "mdi_bg_logo");
6817 settings.general_mdi_bg_texture = read_setting(table, "mdi_bg_texture");
6818 settings.general_mdi_bg_color = read_setting(table, "mdi_bg_color");
6819 settings.tip_of_the_day = read_setting(table, "tip_of_the_day");
6820 settings.general_current_tip = read_setting(table, "current_tip");
6821 settings.general_system_help_browser = read_setting(table, "general_system_help_browser");
6822 */
6823 }
6824
6825 /*
6826 if (setting_toml.contains("display")) {
6827 toml_table_t table = toml_find<toml_table_t>(setting_toml, "display");
6828 }
6829 */
6830
6831 /*
6832 .display_use_opengl = false,
6833 .display_renderhint_aa = false,
6834 .display_renderhint_text_aa = false,
6835 .display_renderhint_smooth_pix = false,
6836 .display_renderhint_high_aa = false,
6837 .display_renderhint_noncosmetic = false,
6838 .display_show_scrollbars = true,
6839 .display_scrollbar_widget_num = 0,
6840 .display_crosshair_color = 0x000000FF,
6841 .display_bg_color = 0xEEEEEEFF,
6842 .display_selectbox_left_color = 0x008000FF,
6843 .display_selectbox_left_fill = 0x00FF00FF,
6844 .display_selectbox_right_color = 0x000080FF,
6845 .display_selectbox_right_fill = 0x0000FFFF,
6846 .display_selectbox_alpha = 32,
6847 .display_zoomscale_in = 2.0,
6848 .display_zoomscale_out = 0.5,
6849 .display_crosshair_percent = 5,
6850 .display_units = "mm",
6851 .opensave_custom_filter = "supported",
6852 .opensave_open_format = "*.*",
6853 .opensave_open_thumbnail = false,
6854 .opensave_save_format = "*.*",
6855 .opensave_save_thumbnail = false,
6856 .opensave_recent_max_files = 10,
6857 // .opensave_recent_list_of_files = {},
6858 .opensave_recent_directory = "./samples",
6859 .opensave_trim_dst_num_jumps = 5,
6860 .printing_default_device = "",
6861 .printing_use_last_device = false,
6862 .printing_disable_bg = true,
6863 .grid_show_on_load = true,
6864 .grid_show_origin = true,
6865 .grid_color_match_crosshair = true,
6866 .grid_color = 0x000000FF,
6867 .grid_load_from_file = true,
6868 .grid_type = "Rectangular",
6869 .grid_center_on_origin = true,
6870 .grid_center.x = 0.0,
6871 .grid_center.y = 0.0,
6872 .grid_size_x = 100.0,
6873 .grid_size_y = 100.0,
6874 .grid_spacing_x = 25.0,
6875 .grid_spacing_y = 25.0,
6876 .grid_size_radius = 50.0,
6877 .grid_spacing_radius = 25.0,
6878 .grid_spacing_angle = 45.0,
6879 .ruler_show_on_load = true,
6880 .ruler_metric = true,
6881 .ruler_color = 0xAAAA55FF, //qRgb(210,210, 50);
6882 .ruler_pixel_size = 20,
6883 .qsnap_enabled = true,
6884 .qsnap_locator_color = 0xFFFF00FF,
6885 .qsnap_locator_size = 4,
6886 .qsnap_aperture_size = 10,
6887 .qsnap_endpoint = true,
6888 .qsnap_midpoint = true,
6889 .qsnap_center = true,
6890 .qsnap_node = true,
6891 .qsnap_quadrant = true,
6892 .qsnap_intersection = true,
6893 .qsnap_extension = true,
6894 .qsnap_insertion = false,
6895 .qsnap_perpendicular = true,
6896 .qsnap_tangent = true,
6897 .qsnap_nearest = false,
6898 .qsnap_apparent = false,
6899 .qsnap_parallel = false,
6900 .lwt_show_lwt = false,
6901 .lwt_real_render = true,
6902 .lwt_default_lwt = 0,
6903 .selection_mode_pickfirst = true,
6904 .selection_mode_pickadd = true,
6905 .selection_mode_pickdrag = false,
6906 .selection_coolgrip_color = 0x0000FFFF,
6907 .selection_hotgrip_color = 0xFF0000FF,
6908 .selection_grip_size = 4,
6909 .selection_pickbox_size = 4,
6910 .text_font = "Arial",
6911 .text_size = 12,
6912 .text_angle = 0,
6913 .text_style_bold = false,
6914 .text_style_italic = false,
6915 .text_style_underline = false,
6916 .text_style_overline = false,
6917 .text_style_strikeout = false
6918
6919 move(pos);
6920 resize(size);*/
6921}
6922
6926static void
6927write_settings(const char *settings_file)
6928{
6929 FILE *file = fopen(settings_file, "w");
6930
6931 fprintf(file, "[Window]\n");
6932 /*
6933 write_bool_setting(file, "PositionX", pos().x);
6934 write_bool_setting(file, "PositionY", pos().y);
6935 write_bool_setting(file, "SizeX", size().x);
6936 write_bool_setting(file, "SizeX", size().y);
6937 */
6938
6939 fprintf(file, "[general]\n");
6940 //write_bool_setting(file, "LayoutState", layoutState);
6941 write_str_setting(file, "language", settings.language);
6942 write_str_setting(file, "icon_theme", settings.icon_theme);
6943 write_int_setting(file, "icon_size", settings.icon_size);
6944 write_bool_setting(file, "mdi_bg_use_logo", settings.mdi_bg_use_logo);
6945 write_bool_setting(file, "mdi_bg_use_texture", settings.mdi_bg_use_texture);
6946 write_bool_setting(file, "mdi_bg_use_color", settings.mdi_bg_use_color);
6947 write_str_setting(file, "mdi_bg_logo", settings.general_mdi_bg_logo);
6948 write_str_setting(file, "mdi_bg_texture", settings.general_mdi_bg_texture);
6949 write_uint_setting(file, "mdi_bg_color", settings.general_mdi_bg_color);
6950 write_int_setting(file, "tip_of_the_day", settings.tip_of_the_day);
6951 write_int_setting(file, "current_tip", settings.general_current_tip + 1);
6952 write_bool_setting(file, "system_help_browser", settings.general_system_help_browser);
6953 fprintf(file, "\n");
6954
6955 fprintf(file, "[display]\n");
6956 write_bool_setting(file, "UseOpenGL", settings.display_use_opengl);
6957 write_bool_setting(file, "RenderHintAntiAlias", settings.display_renderhint_aa);
6958 write_bool_setting(file, "RenderHintTextAntiAlias", settings.display_renderhint_text_aa);
6959 write_bool_setting(file, "RenderHintSmoothPixmap", settings.display_renderhint_smooth_pix);
6960 write_bool_setting(file, "RenderHintHighQualityAntiAlias", settings.display_renderhint_high_aa);
6961 write_bool_setting(file, "RenderHintNonCosmetic", settings.display_renderhint_noncosmetic);
6962 write_bool_setting(file, "Showscrollbars", settings.display_show_scrollbars);
6963 write_int_setting(file, "scrollbarWidgetNum", settings.display_scrollbar_widget_num);
6964 write_uint_setting(file, "CrossHairColor", settings.display_crosshair_color);
6965 write_uint_setting(file, "BackgroundColor", settings.display_bg_color);
6966 write_uint_setting(file, "SelectBoxLeftColor", settings.display_selectbox_left_color);
6967 write_uint_setting(file, "SelectBoxLeftFill", settings.display_selectbox_left_fill);
6968 write_uint_setting(file, "SelectBoxRightColor", settings.display_selectbox_right_color);
6969 write_bool_setting(file, "SelectBoxRightFill", settings.display_selectbox_right_fill);
6970 write_bool_setting(file, "SelectBoxAlpha", settings.display_selectbox_alpha);
6971 write_bool_setting(file, "ZoomScaleIn", settings.display_zoomscale_in);
6972 write_bool_setting(file, "ZoomScaleOut", settings.display_zoomscale_out);
6973 write_bool_setting(file, "CrossHairPercent", settings.display_crosshair_percent);
6974 write_str_setting(file, "Units", settings.display_units);
6975 fprintf(file, "\n");
6976
6977 fprintf(file, "[OpenSave]\n");
6978 write_str_setting(file, "CustomFilter", settings.opensave_custom_filter);
6979 write_str_setting(file, "OpenFormat", settings.opensave_open_format);
6980 write_bool_setting(file, "OpenThumbnail", settings.opensave_open_thumbnail);
6981 write_str_setting(file, "SaveFormat", settings.opensave_save_format);
6982 write_bool_setting(file, "SaveThumbnail", settings.opensave_save_thumbnail);
6983 write_bool_setting(file, "RecentMax", settings.opensave_recent_max_files);
6984 //write_bool_setting(file, "RecentFiles", settings.opensave_recent_list_of_files);
6985 write_str_setting(file, "RecentDirectory", settings.opensave_recent_directory);
6986 write_int_setting(file, "TrimDstNumJumps", settings.opensave_trim_dst_num_jumps);
6987 fprintf(file, "\n");
6988
6989 fprintf(file, "[Printing]\n");
6990 write_str_setting(file, "DefaultDevice", settings.printing_default_device);
6991 write_bool_setting(file, "UseLastDevice", settings.printing_use_last_device);
6992 write_bool_setting(file, "DisableBG", settings.printing_disable_bg);
6993 fprintf(file, "\n");
6994
6995 fprintf(file, "[Grid]\n");
6996 write_bool_setting(file, "ShowOnLoad", settings.grid_show_on_load);
6997 write_bool_setting(file, "ShowOrigin", settings.grid_show_origin);
6998 write_bool_setting(file, "ColorMatchCrossHair", settings.grid_color_match_crosshair);
6999 write_bool_setting(file, "Color", settings.grid_color);
7000 write_bool_setting(file, "LoadFromFile", settings.grid_load_from_file);
7001 write_str_setting(file, "Type", settings.grid_type);
7002 write_bool_setting(file, "CenterOnOrigin", settings.grid_center_on_origin);
7003 write_float_setting(file, "CenterX", settings.grid_center.x);
7004 write_float_setting(file, "CenterY", settings.grid_center.y);
7005 write_float_setting(file, "SizeX", settings.grid_size_x);
7006 write_float_setting(file, "SizeY", settings.grid_size_y);
7007 write_float_setting(file, "SpacingX", settings.grid_spacing_x);
7008 write_float_setting(file, "SpacingY", settings.grid_spacing_y);
7009 write_float_setting(file, "SizeRadius", settings.grid_size_radius);
7010 write_float_setting(file, "SpacingRadius", settings.grid_spacing_radius);
7011 write_float_setting(file, "SpacingAngle", settings.grid_spacing_angle);
7012 fprintf(file, "\n");
7013
7014 fprintf(file, "[Ruler]\n");
7015 write_bool_setting(file, "ShowOnLoad", settings.ruler_show_on_load);
7016 write_bool_setting(file, "Metric", settings.ruler_metric);
7017 write_uint_setting(file, "Color", settings.ruler_color);
7018 write_int_setting(file, "PixelSize", settings.ruler_pixel_size);
7019 fprintf(file, "\n");
7020
7021 fprintf(file, "[QuickSnap]\n");
7022 write_bool_setting(file, "Enabled", settings.qsnap_enabled);
7023 write_bool_setting(file, "LocatorColor", settings.qsnap_locator_color);
7024 write_bool_setting(file, "LocatorSize", settings.qsnap_locator_size);
7025 write_bool_setting(file, "ApertureSize", settings.qsnap_aperture_size);
7026 write_bool_setting(file, "EndPoint", settings.qsnap_endpoint);
7027 write_bool_setting(file, "MidPoint", settings.qsnap_midpoint);
7028 write_bool_setting(file, "Center", settings.qsnap_center);
7029 write_bool_setting(file, "Node", settings.qsnap_node);
7030 write_bool_setting(file, "Quadrant", settings.qsnap_quadrant);
7031 write_bool_setting(file, "Intersection", settings.qsnap_intersection);
7032 write_bool_setting(file, "Extension", settings.qsnap_extension);
7033 write_bool_setting(file, "Insertion", settings.qsnap_insertion);
7034 write_bool_setting(file, "Perpendicular", settings.qsnap_perpendicular);
7035 write_bool_setting(file, "Tangent", settings.qsnap_tangent);
7036 write_bool_setting(file, "Nearest", settings.qsnap_nearest);
7037 write_bool_setting(file, "Apparent", settings.qsnap_apparent);
7038 write_bool_setting(file, "Parallel", settings.qsnap_parallel);
7039 fprintf(file, "\n");
7040
7041 fprintf(file, "[LineWeight]\n");
7042 write_bool_setting(file, "ShowLineWeight", settings.lwt_show_lwt);
7043 write_bool_setting(file, "RealRender", settings.lwt_real_render);
7044 write_bool_setting(file, "DefaultLineWeight", settings.lwt_default_lwt);
7045 fprintf(file, "\n");
7046
7047 fprintf(file, "[Selection]\n");
7048 write_bool_setting(file, "PickFirst", settings.selection_mode_pickfirst);
7049 write_bool_setting(file, "PickAdd", settings.selection_mode_pickadd);
7050 write_bool_setting(file, "PickDrag", settings.selection_mode_pickdrag);
7051 write_bool_setting(file, "CoolGripColor", settings.selection_coolgrip_color);
7052 write_bool_setting(file, "HotGripColor", settings.selection_hotgrip_color);
7053 write_bool_setting(file, "GripSize", settings.selection_grip_size);
7054 write_bool_setting(file, "PickBoxSize", settings.selection_pickbox_size);
7055 fprintf(file, "\n");
7056
7057 fprintf(file, "[Text]\n");
7058 write_str_setting(file, "Font", settings.text_font);
7059 write_int_setting(file, "Size", settings.text_size);
7060 write_float_setting(file, "Angle", settings.text_angle);
7061 write_bool_setting(file, "StyleBold", settings.text_style_bold);
7062 write_bool_setting(file, "StyleItalic", settings.text_style_italic);
7063 write_bool_setting(file, "StyleUnderline", settings.text_style_underline);
7064 write_bool_setting(file, "StyleStrikeOut", settings.text_style_strikeout);
7065 write_bool_setting(file, "StyleOverline", settings.text_style_overline);
7066 fclose(file);
7067}
7068
7073static void
7074platform_string(char str[200])
7075{
7076 strcpy(str, "Unknown plaform.");
7077 #if _WIN32
7078 strcpy(str, "Windows");
7079 #endif
7080 #ifdef __linux__
7081 struct utsname buffer;
7082 uname(&buffer);
7083 sprintf(str, "%s %s %s %s %s",
7084 buffer.sysname,
7085 buffer.nodename,
7086 buffer.release,
7087 buffer.version,
7088 buffer.machine);
7089 #endif
7090}
7091
7095static void
7096usage(void)
7097{
7098 fprintf(stderr,
7099 " ___ _____ ___ ___ __ _ ___ ___ ___ _____ __ ___ ___ ___ ___ ___ " "\n"
7100 "| __| | _ \\| _ \\ / \\| | \\| __| _ \\ | |/ \\| \\| \\| __| _ \\ |__ \\" "\n"
7101 "| __| | | | _ <| /| () | | |) | __| / | | | | () | |) | |) | __| / / __/" "\n"
7102 "|___|_|_|_|___/|_|\\_\\\\__/|_|___/|___|_|\\_\\|_|_|_|\\__/|___/|___/|___|_|\\_\\ |___|" "\n"
7103 " _____________________________________________________________________________ " "\n"
7104 "| | " "\n"
7105 "| http://embroidermodder.github.io | " "\n"
7106 "|_____________________________________________________________________________| " "\n"
7107 " " "\n"
7108 "Usage: embroidermodder [options] files ..." "\n"
7109 //80CHARS======================================================================MAX
7110 "Options:" "\n"
7111 " -d, --debug Print lots of debugging information." "\n"
7112 " -h, --help Print this message and exit." "\n"
7113 " -v, --version Print the version number of embroidermodder and exit." "\n"
7114 "\n");
7115}
7116
7128void
7129log_debug(const char *msg)
7130{
7131 if (settings.debug_mode) {
7132 FILE *f = fopen("debug.txt", "a");
7133 fprintf(f, "%s\n", msg);
7134 fclose(f);
7135 }
7136}
7137
7141bool
7142validRGB(int r, int g, int b)
7143{
7144 if (r < 0 || r > 255) {
7145 log_debug("ERROR: r value must be in range 0-255");
7146 return false;
7147 }
7148 if (g < 0 || g > 255) {
7149 log_debug("ERROR: g value must be in range 0-255");
7150 return false;
7151 }
7152 if (b < 0 || b > 255) {
7153 log_debug("ERROR: b value must be in range 0-255");
7154 return 0;
7155 }
7156 return true;
7157}
7158
7168bool
7169streq(const char *s1, const char *s2)
7170{
7171 return !strncmp(s1, s2, 200);
7172}
7173
7182const char *
7183translate(const char *string)
7184{
7185 if (settings.use_translation) {
7186 return string;
7187 }
7188 return string;
7189 for (int i=0; i<translation_table->length; i++) {
7190 if (streq(translation_table->data[i].key, string)) {
7191 return translation_table->data[i].value;
7192 }
7193 }
7194 return string;
7195}
7196
7197EmbLine stitch_line_to_scene(View view, EmbStitch prev, EmbStitch st);
7198
7202int
7203render_pattern(EmbPattern *p)
7204{
7205 for (int i=0; i<p->geometry->count; i++) {
7206 EmbGeometry g = p->geometry->geometry[i];
7207 int color = embColor_to_int(g.color, 255);
7208 switch (g.type) {
7209 case EMB_CIRCLE: {
7210 EmbCircle c = g.object.circle;
7211 EmbVector scene_center = embVector_add(c.center, active_view->origin);
7212 EmbReal scene_radius = c.radius * active_view->scale;
7213 draw_circle(scene_center, scene_radius, color, false);
7214 // \todo fill
7215 break;
7216 }
7217 case EMB_ELLIPSE: {
7218 /*
7219 EmbEllipse e = g.object.ellipse;
7220 int color = embColor_to_int(e.color);
7221 //draw_list->AddEllipse(e.center.x, e.center.y, e.radius.x, e.radius.y, color);
7222 */
7223 break;
7224 }
7225 case EMB_LINE: {
7226 EmbVector scene_start, scene_end;
7227 EmbLine li = g.object.line;
7228 scene_start = embVector_add(li.start, active_view->origin);
7229 scene_end = embVector_add(li.end, active_view->origin);
7230 draw_line(scene_start, scene_end, color);
7231 break;
7232 }
7233 case EMB_PATH: {
7234 /*
7235 for (int i=0; i<p->paths->count; i++) {
7236 EmbPath path;
7237 EmbArray *curPointList = path.pointList;
7238 if (curPointList) {
7239 EmbPoint pp = curPointList->point[0];
7240 pathPath.moveTo(pp.position.x, -pp.position.y);
7241 //NOTE: Qt Y+ is down and libembroidery Y+ is up, so inverting the Y is needed.
7242 }
7243 for (int j=0; j<curPointList->count; j++) {
7244 EmbPoint pp = curPointList->point[j];
7245 pathPath.lineTo(pp.position.x, -pp.position.y);
7246 // NOTE: Qt Y+ is down and libembroidery Y+ is up, so inverting the Y is needed.
7247 }
7248
7249 QPen loadPen(qRgb(thisColor.r, thisColor.g, thisColor.b));
7250 loadPen.setWidthF(0.35);
7251 loadPen.setCapStyle(RoundCap);
7252 loadPen.setJoinStyle(RoundJoin);
7253
7254 PathObject* obj = PathObject(0,0, pathPath, loadPen.color().rgb());
7255 obj->setObjectRubberMode(OBJ_RUBBER_OFF);
7256 active_view->addItem(obj);
7257 }
7258 */
7259 break;
7260 }
7261 case EMB_POINT: {
7262 EmbPoint po = g.object.point;
7263 EmbReal point_size = 10.0;
7264 draw_circle(po.position, point_size, color, false);
7265 break;
7266 }
7267 case EMB_POLYGON: {
7268 /*
7269 for (int i=0; i<p->polygons->count; i++) {
7270 // EmbPath polygonPath;
7271 EmbPolygon polygon = p->polygons->polygon[i];
7272 bool firstPoint = false;
7273 EmbVector start = {0.0, 0.0};
7274 EmbReal x = 0.0, y = 0.0;
7275 EmbArray *curPointList = polygon.pointList;
7276 for (int j=0; j<curPointList->count; j++) {
7277 EmbPoint pp = curPointList->point[j];
7278 x = pp.position.x;
7279 y = -pp.position.y;
7280
7281 if (firstPoint) {
7282 polygonPath.lineTo(x,y);
7283 }
7284 else {
7285 polygonPath.moveTo(x,y);
7286 firstPoint = true;
7287 startX = x;
7288 startY = y;
7289 }
7290 }
7291
7292 polygonPath.translate(-startX, -startY);
7293 AddPolygon(startX, startY, polygonPath, OBJ_RUBBER_OFF);
7294 }
7295 */
7296 break;
7297 }
7298 /* NOTE: Polylines should only contain NORMAL stitches. */
7299 case EMB_POLYLINE: {
7300 EmbPolyline pl = g.object.polyline;
7301 EmbArray *curPointList = pl.pointList;
7302 EmbLine line;
7303 line.start = curPointList->geometry[0].object.point.position;
7304 for (int j=1; j<curPointList->count; j++) {
7305 EmbPoint pp = curPointList->geometry[j].object.point;
7306 line.end.x = pp.position.x;
7307 line.end.y = -pp.position.y;
7308 draw_line(line.start, line.end, color);
7309 }
7310
7311 /*
7312 polylinePath.translate(-startX, -startY);
7313 addPolyline(startX, startY, polylinePath, OBJ_RUBBER_OFF);
7314 */
7315 break;
7316 }
7317 case EMB_RECT: {
7318 /*
7319 EmbRect r = p->rects->rect[i];
7320 EmbVector position1 = {(float)r.left, (float)r.top};
7321 EmbVector position2 = {(float)r.right, (float)r.bottom};
7322 draw_rect(position1, position2, color); //\todo rotation and fill
7323 */
7324 break;
7325 }
7326 default:
7327 break;
7328 }
7329 }
7330 if (p->stitch_list->count > 1) {
7331 for (int i = 1; i<p->stitch_list->count; i++) {
7332 EmbStitch prev = p->stitch_list->stitch[i-1];
7333 EmbStitch st = p->stitch_list->stitch[i];
7334 EmbLine line = stitch_line_to_scene(*active_view, prev, st);
7335 EmbThread thread = p->thread_list->thread[st.color];
7336 int color = embColor_to_int(thread.color, 255);
7337 draw_line(line.start, line.end, color);
7338 }
7339 }
7340 return 0;
7341}
7342
7349static void
7350render_shine(EmbVector start, EmbVector end, EmbVector normal, float start_frac, float end_frac)
7351{
7352 EmbVector delta, shine_start, shine_end, corner1, corner2, corner3, corner4;
7353 delta = embVector_subtract(end, start);
7354 shine_start = start;
7355 shine_end = end;
7356 shine_start.x += start_frac*delta.x;
7357 shine_start.y += start_frac*delta.y;
7358 shine_end.x += end_frac*delta.x;
7359 shine_end.y += end_frac*delta.y;
7360
7361 corner1 = embVector_add(shine_start, normal);
7362 corner2 = embVector_subtract(shine_start, normal);
7363 corner3 = embVector_subtract(shine_end, normal);
7364 corner4 = embVector_add(shine_end, normal);
7365
7366 draw_quad(corner1, corner2, corner3, corner4, settings.shine_color);
7367}
7368
7372EmbLine
7373stitch_line_to_scene(View view, EmbStitch prev, EmbStitch st)
7374{
7375 EmbVector offset = get_window_pos();
7376 EmbLine line;
7377 line.start.x = view.scale*prev.x;
7378 line.start.y = -view.scale*prev.y;
7379 line.end.x = view.scale*st.x;
7380 line.end.y = -view.scale*st.y;
7381 offset = embVector_add(offset, view.origin);
7382 line.start = embVector_add(line.start, offset);
7383 line.end = embVector_add(line.end, offset);
7384 return line;
7385}
7386
7390static void
7391real_render_pattern(EmbPattern *p)
7392{
7393 if (p->stitch_list->count > 1) {
7394 for (int i = 1; i<p->stitch_list->count; i++) {
7395 EmbStitch prev = p->stitch_list->stitch[i-1];
7396 EmbStitch st = p->stitch_list->stitch[i];
7397 EmbLine line = stitch_line_to_scene(*active_view, prev, st);
7398
7399 float lwt = 2.0;
7400 EmbVector delta;
7401 delta.x = prev.y - st.y;
7402 delta.y = prev.x - st.x;
7403 EmbVector normal_;
7404 embVector_normalize(delta, &normal_);
7405 normal_.x *= lwt;
7406 normal_.y *= lwt;
7407
7408 EmbThread thread = p->thread_list->thread[st.color];
7409 int color = embColor_to_int(thread.color, 255);
7410 EmbVector corner1, corner2, corner3, corner4;
7411 corner1 = embVector_add(line.start, normal_);
7412 corner2 = embVector_subtract(line.start, normal_);
7413 corner3 = embVector_subtract(line.end, normal_);
7414 corner4 = embVector_add(line.end, normal_);
7415 draw_quad(corner1, corner2, corner3, corner4, color);
7416 render_shine(line.start, line.end, normal_, 0.333*0.3, 0.333*0.7);
7417 render_shine(line.start, line.end, normal_, 0.333*0.1, 0.333*0.9);
7418 render_shine(line.start, line.end, normal_, 0.333*1.3, 0.333*1.7);
7419 render_shine(line.start, line.end, normal_, 0.333*1.1, 0.333*1.9);
7420 render_shine(line.start, line.end, normal_, 0.333*2.3, 0.333*2.7);
7421 render_shine(line.start, line.end, normal_, 0.333*2.1, 0.333*2.9);
7422 }
7423 }
7424}
7425
7429static void
7430simulate_pattern(EmbPattern *p)
7431{
7432 clock_t duration = clock() - active_view->simulation_start;
7433 float time_passed = duration / (1.0 * CLOCKS_PER_SEC);
7434 int stitches = 0;
7435 if (p->stitch_list->count > 1) {
7436 float current_time = 0.0;
7437 for (int i = 1; i<p->stitch_list->count; i++) {
7438 EmbStitch prev = p->stitch_list->stitch[i-1];
7439 EmbStitch st = p->stitch_list->stitch[i];
7440 EmbLine line = stitch_line_to_scene(*active_view, prev, st);
7441
7442 EmbThread thread = p->thread_list->thread[st.color];
7443 int color = embColor_to_int(thread.color, 255);
7444 EmbVector delta = {prev.x-st.x, prev.y-st.y};
7445 float time_for_stitch = settings.stitch_time
7446 + embVector_length(delta)/settings.needle_speed;
7447 current_time += time_for_stitch;
7448 stitches = i;
7449 if (current_time > time_passed) {
7450 float t = current_time-time_passed-time_for_stitch;
7451 EmbVector scene_delta;
7452 scene_delta = embVector_subtract(line.end, line.start);
7453 line.end.x = line.start.x - t*scene_delta.x;
7454 line.end.y = line.start.y - t*scene_delta.y;
7455 draw_line(line.start, line.end, color);
7456 break;
7457 }
7458 else {
7459 draw_line(line.start, line.end, color);
7460 }
7461 }
7462 }
7463
7464 begin_ui("Controls", 500, 500);
7465 char s[200];
7466 sprintf(s, "Stitch: %d/%d", stitches, p->stitch_list->count);
7467 translated_text(s);
7468 show_real("Needle Speed: ", settings.needle_speed);
7469 show_real("Stitch Time: ", settings.stitch_time);
7470 show_real("Time Passed: ", time_passed);
7471
7472 if (button("Slower")) {
7473 settings.needle_speed /= 2.0;
7474 settings.stitch_time *= 2.0;
7475 }
7476 same_line();
7477 if (button("Faster")) {
7478 settings.needle_speed *= 2.0;
7479 settings.stitch_time /= 2.0;
7480 }
7481
7482 if (button("Start")) {
7483 active_view->simulation_start = clock();
7484 }
7485 same_line();
7486 if (button("Previous Stitch")) {
7487
7488 }
7489 same_line();
7490 if (button("Next Stitch")) {
7491
7492 }
7493 same_line();
7494 if (button("End")) {
7495
7496 }
7497
7498 if (button("Close")) {
7499 active_view->simulate = false;
7500 }
7501 end_ui();
7502}
7503
7509static void
7510draw_rulers(void)
7511{
7512 EmbVector offset = get_window_pos();
7513 EmbVector screen_size = get_screen_size();
7514 EmbVector dimensions;
7515 dimensions.x = offset.x + settings.ruler_width;
7516 dimensions.y = offset.y + screen_size.y;
7517 draw_rect(offset, dimensions, settings.ruler_color, true);
7518 dimensions.x = offset.x + screen_size.x;
7519 dimensions.y = offset.y + settings.ruler_width;
7520 draw_rect(offset, dimensions, settings.ruler_color, true);
7521 EmbVector origin_x, origin_y;
7522 origin_x.x = active_view->origin.x;
7523 origin_x.y = 0.0;
7524 origin_y.x = 0.0;
7525 origin_y.y = active_view->origin.y;
7526 float major_tick_seperation_scaled = active_view->scale * settings.major_tick_seperation;
7527 if (active_view->metric) {
7528 int repeats = 100;
7529 for (int i=-repeats; i<repeats; i++) {
7530 float ruler_pos = settings.ruler_width
7531 + major_tick_seperation_scaled*i;
7532 EmbLine line;
7533 line.start.x = offset.x + origin_x.x + ruler_pos;
7534 line.start.y = offset.y + origin_x.y;
7535 line.end.x = offset.x + origin_x.x + ruler_pos;
7536 line.end.y = offset.y + origin_x.y + settings.ruler_width;
7537 draw_line(line.start, line.end, settings.ticks_color);
7538 char label[200];
7539 sprintf(label, "%d", i);
7540 line.start.x += 5.0;
7541 draw_text(line.start, settings.ticks_color, label);
7542 for (int j=0; j<10; j++) {
7543 ruler_pos += major_tick_seperation_scaled/10.0;
7544 EmbLine tick;
7545 tick.start.x = offset.x + origin_x.x + ruler_pos;
7546 tick.start.y = offset.y + origin_x.y + settings.tick_depth;
7547 tick.end.x = offset.x + origin_x.x + ruler_pos;
7548 tick.end.y = offset.y + origin_x.y + settings.ruler_width;
7549 draw_line(tick.start, tick.end, settings.ticks_color);
7550 }
7551 }
7552 for (int i=-repeats; i<repeats; i++) {
7553 float ruler_pos = settings.ruler_width + major_tick_seperation_scaled*i;
7554 EmbLine line;
7555 line.start.x = offset.x + origin_y.x;
7556 line.start.y = offset.y + origin_y.y + ruler_pos;
7557 line.end.x = offset.x + origin_y.x + settings.ruler_width;
7558 line.end.y = offset.y + origin_y.y + ruler_pos;
7559 draw_line(line.start, line.end, settings.ticks_color);
7560 char label[200];
7561 sprintf(label, "%d", i);
7562 line.start.x += 5.0;
7563 draw_text(line.start, settings.ticks_color, label);
7564 for (int j=0; j<10; j++) {
7565 ruler_pos += major_tick_seperation_scaled/10.0;
7566 EmbLine tick;
7567 tick.start.x = offset.x + origin_y.x + settings.tick_depth;
7568 tick.start.y = offset.y + origin_y.y + ruler_pos;
7569 tick.end.x = offset.x + origin_y.x + settings.ruler_width;
7570 tick.end.y = offset.y + origin_y.y + ruler_pos;
7571 draw_line(tick.start, tick.end, settings.ticks_color);
7572 }
7573 }
7574 }
7575 else {
7576 /*
7577 int repeats = 100;
7578 for (int i=0; i<repeats; i++) {
7579 float ruler_pos = settings.ruler_width + settings.major_tick_seperation*i;
7580 EmbVector start, end;
7581 start = offset;
7582 end = offset;
7583 start.x += ruler_pos;
7584 end.x += ruler_pos;
7585 end.y += settings.ruler_width;
7586 draw_line(start, end, ticks_color);
7587 char label[200];
7588 sprintf(label, "%d", i);
7589 start.x += 5.0;
7590 draw_text(start, ticks_color, label);
7591 for (int j=0; j<16; j++) {
7592 ruler_pos += settings.major_tick_seperation/16.0;
7593 draw_list->AddLine(
7594 to_EmbVector(offset) + EmbVector(ruler_pos, settings.tick_depth),
7595 to_EmbVector(offset) + EmbVector(ruler_pos, settings.ruler_width),
7596 ticks_color
7597 );
7598 }
7599 }
7600 for (int i=0; i<repeats; i++) {
7601 float ruler_pos = settings.ruler_width + settings.major_tick_seperation*i;
7602 draw_list->AddLine(
7603 to_EmbVector(offset) + EmbVector(0.0, ruler_pos),
7604 to_EmbVector(offset) + EmbVector(ruler_width, ruler_pos),
7605 ticks_color
7606 );
7607 char label[200];
7608 sprintf(label, "%d", i);
7609 draw_list->AddText(
7610 to_EmbVector(offset) + EmbVector(0.0, ruler_pos),
7611 ticks_color, label);
7612 for (int j=0; j<16; j++) {
7613 ruler_pos += settings.major_tick_seperation/16.0;
7614 draw_list->AddLine(
7615 to_EmbVector(offset) + EmbVector(settings.tick_depth, ruler_pos),
7616 to_EmbVector(offset) + EmbVector(settings.ruler_width, ruler_pos),
7617 ticks_color
7618 );
7619 }
7620 }
7621 */
7622 }
7623
7624 EmbVector dim = {settings.ruler_width, settings.ruler_width};
7625 EmbVector corner = embVector_add(offset, dim);
7626 draw_rect(offset, corner, settings.ruler_color, true);
7627}
7628
7632static void
7633draw_grid(void)
7634{
7635 EmbVector offset = get_window_pos();
7636 EmbVector screen_size = get_screen_size();
7637 for (float x=offset.x; x<screen_size.x; x+=settings.grid_spacing.x) {
7638 EmbVector start, end;
7639 start.x = x;
7640 start.y = offset.y;
7641 end.x = x;
7642 end.y = screen_size.y;
7643 draw_line(start, end, settings.grid_color);
7644 }
7645 for (float y=offset.y; y<screen_size.y; y+=settings.grid_spacing.y) {
7646 EmbVector start, end;
7647 start.x = offset.x;
7648 start.y = y;
7649 end.x = screen_size.x;
7650 end.y = y;
7651 draw_line(start, end, settings.grid_color);
7652 }
7653}
7654
7658static void
7659pattern_view(void)
7660{
7661 EmbPattern *pattern = views[settings.pattern_index].pattern;
7662 begin_child(views[settings.pattern_index].filename);
7663 if (views[settings.pattern_index].grid_mode) {
7664 draw_grid();
7665 }
7666 if (views[settings.pattern_index].lwt_mode) {
7667 real_render_pattern(pattern);
7668 }
7669 else {
7670 if (views[settings.pattern_index].simulate) {
7671 simulate_pattern(pattern);
7672 }
7673 else {
7674 render_pattern(pattern);
7675 }
7676 }
7677 if (views[settings.pattern_index].ruler_mode) {
7678 draw_rulers();
7679 }
7680 end_child();
7681}
7682
7700View
7701init_view(void)
7702{
7703 /*
7704 (const int theIndex, MainWindow* mw, QMdiArea* parent, int wflags)
7705
7706 fileWasLoaded = false;
7707
7708 setAttribute(Qt_WA_DeleteOnClose);
7709
7710 this->setWindowIcon(load_icon("app"));
7711
7712 active_view = QGraphicsScene(0, 0, 0, 0, this);
7713 gview = View(mainWin, active_view, this);
7714
7715 setWidget(gview);
7716
7717 gview->setFocusProxy(prompt);
7718
7719 resize(sizeHint());
7720
7721 promptHistory = "Welcome to Embroidermodder 2!<br/>Open some of our sample files. Many formats are supported.<br/>For help, press F1.";
7722 prompt->setHistory(promptHistory);
7723 promptInputList << "";
7724 promptInputNum = 0;
7725
7726 curLayer = "0";
7727 curColor = 0; //\todo color ByLayer
7728 curLineType = "ByLayer";
7729 curLineWeight = "ByLayer";
7730
7731 show();
7732 showMaximized();
7733
7734 setFocusPolicy(Qt_WheelFocus);
7735 setFocus();
7736
7737 onWindowActivated();
7738
7739 view.useLogo = false;
7740 view.useTexture = false;
7741 view.useColor = false;
7742 view.bgLogo = "";
7743 view.bgTexture = "";
7744 view.bgColor = IM_COL32(40, 20, 10, 255);
7745 */
7746 View view;
7747 view.origin.x = 400.0;
7748 view.origin.y = 300.0;
7749 view.scale = 5.0;
7750 strcpy(view.grid_type, "RECTANGULAR");
7751 view.snap_mode = true;
7752 view.grid_mode = true;
7753 view.ruler_mode = true;
7754 view.ortho_mode = false;
7755 view.polar_mode = false;
7756 view.qsnap_mode = false;
7757 view.qtrack_mode = false;
7758 view.lwt_mode = false;
7759 view.metric = true;
7760 view.simulate = false;
7761 view.simulation_start = clock();
7762 strcpy(view.text_font, "default");
7763 view.text_size = 16;
7764 view.text_angle = 0.0;
7765 view.text_style_bold = false;
7766 view.text_style_italic = false;
7767 view.text_style_underline = false;
7768 view.text_style_overline = false;
7769 view.text_style_strikeout = false;
7770 if (n_views > 0) {
7771 sprintf(view.filename, "Untitled%02d.dst", n_views);
7772 }
7773 else {
7774 strcpy(view.filename, "Untitled.dst");
7775 }
7776 view.undo_history.position = 0;
7777 view.undo_history.length = 0;
7778 view.undo_history.max_length = 100;
7779 view.pattern = embPattern_create();
7780 view.rubber_mode = OBJ_RUBBER_OFF;
7781
7782 return view;
7783}
7784
7788static void
7789settings_editor(void)
7790{
7791 if (just_opened) {
7792 dialog = settings;
7793 preview = dialog;
7794 just_opened = false;
7795 }
7796 // ImGuiTabItemFlags_SetSelected
7797 begin_ui("Settings", 750, 550);
7798 if (begin_tab_bar("Tab Bar")) {
7799 if (begin_tab_item("General")) {
7800 create_tab_general();
7801 end_tab_item();
7802 }
7803 if (begin_tab_item("Files/Paths")) {
7804 create_tab_files_paths();
7805 end_tab_item();
7806 }
7807 if (begin_tab_item("Display")) {
7808 create_tab_display();
7809 end_tab_item();
7810 }
7811 if (begin_tab_item("Open/Save")) {
7812 create_tab_open_save();
7813 end_tab_item();
7814 }
7815 if (begin_tab_item("Printing")) {
7816 create_tab_printing();
7817 end_tab_item();
7818 }
7819 if (begin_tab_item("Snap")) {
7820 create_tab_snap();
7821 end_tab_item();
7822 }
7823 if (begin_tab_item("Grid/Ruler")) {
7824 create_tab_grid_ruler();
7825 end_tab_item();
7826 }
7827 if (begin_tab_item("Ortho/Polar")) {
7828 create_tab_ortho_polar();
7829 end_tab_item();
7830 }
7831 if (begin_tab_item("QuickSnap")) {
7832 create_tab_quicksnap();
7833 end_tab_item();
7834 }
7835 if (begin_tab_item("QuickTrack")) {
7836 create_tab_quicktrack();
7837 end_tab_item();
7838 }
7839 if (begin_tab_item("LineWeight")) {
7840 create_tab_lineweight();
7841 end_tab_item();
7842 }
7843 if (begin_tab_item("Selection")) {
7844 create_tab_selection();
7845 end_tab_item();
7846 }
7847 end_tab_bar();
7848 }
7849
7850 if (button("Accept")) {
7851 log_debug("Writing Settings...");
7852 write_settings(settings_file);
7853 settings = dialog;
7854 settings.show_settings_editor = false;
7855 }
7856 same_line();
7857 if (button("Cancel")) {
7858 settings.show_settings_editor = false;
7859 }
7860 end_ui();
7861}
7862
7869const char *languages[20] = {
7870 "default",
7871 "spanish",
7872 "french",
7873 "END"
7874};
7875
7880static void
7881create_tab_general(void)
7882{
7883 translated_text("Language");
7884
7885 /* \todo Detect what the system language is, so we can default
7886 * to that when it can be detected. */
7887 if (begin_combo("Language", dialog.language)) {
7888 for (int i=0; ; i++) {
7889 if (streq(languages[i], "END")) {
7890 break;
7891 }
7892 bool current_language = streq(dialog.language, languages[i]);
7893 if (selectable(languages[i], current_language)) {
7894 strcpy(dialog.language, languages[i]);
7895 dialog.use_translation = true;
7896 }
7897 }
7898 end_combo();
7899 }
7900 /*
7901 QLabel* labelLanguage = QLabel(translate("Language (Requires Restart)"), groupBoxLanguage);
7902 int* comboBoxLanguage = int(groupBoxLanguage);
7903 dialog.general_language = settings_general_language;
7904 comboBoxLanguage->addItem("Default");
7905 comboBoxLanguage->addItem("System");
7906 comboBoxLanguage->insertSeparator(2);
7907 QDir trDir(qApp->applicationDirPath());
7908 trDir.cd("translations");
7909 for(const char *dirName, trDir.entryList(QDir_Dirs | QDir_NoDotAndDotDot))
7910 {
7911 dirName[0] = dirName[0].toUpper();
7912 comboBoxLanguage->addItem(dirName);
7913 }
7914 const char *current = dialog.general_language;
7915 current[0] = current[0].toUpper();
7916 comboBoxLanguage->setCurrentIndex(comboBoxLanguage->findText(current));
7917
7918 translated_text("Icons");
7919
7920 if (ImGui_BeginCombo(translate("Icon Theme"), settings.icon_size)) {
7921 QDir dir(qApp->applicationDirPath());
7922 dir.cd("icons");
7923 dialog.general_icon_theme.string_value = settings_general_icon_theme;
7924 for (const char *dirName, dir.entryList(QDir_Dirs | QDir_NoDotAndDotDot)) {
7925 comboBoxIconTheme->addItem(QIcon("icons/" + dirName + "/" + "theme" + ".png"), dirName);
7926 }
7927 comboBoxIconTheme->setCurrentIndex(comboBoxIconTheme->findText(dialog.general_icon_theme.string_value));
7928 ImGui_EndCombo();
7929 }
7930
7931 if (ImGui_BeginCombo(translate("Icon Size"), settings.icon_size)) {
7932 const char *s = "icons/" + dialog.general_icon_theme.string_value + "/icon16.png";
7933 comboBoxIconSize->addItem(QIcon(s), "Very Small", 16);
7934 s = "icons/" + dialog.general_icon_theme.string_value + "/icon24.png";
7935 comboBoxIconSize->addItem(QIcon(s), "Small", 24);
7936 s = "icons/" + dialog.general_icon_theme.string_value + "/icon32.png";
7937 comboBoxIconSize->addItem(QIcon(s), "Medium", 32);
7938 s = "icons/" + dialog.general_icon_theme.string_value + "/icon48.png";
7939 comboBoxIconSize->addItem(QIcon(s), "Large", 48);
7940 s = "icons/" + dialog.general_icon_theme.string_value + "/icon64.png";
7941 comboBoxIconSize->addItem(QIcon(s), "Very Large", 64);
7942 s = "icons/" + dialog.general_icon_theme.string_value + "/icon128.png";
7943 comboBoxIconSize->addItem(QIcon(s), "I'm Blind", 128);
7944 dialog.general_icon_size = settings_general_icon_size;
7945 comboBoxIconSize->setCurrentIndex(comboBoxIconSize->findData(dialog.general_icon_size));
7946 ImGui_EndCombo();
7947 }
7948
7949 translated_text("Background");
7950 checkbox_data("Use Logo", &(dialog.general_mdi_bg_use_logo));
7951
7952 if (button("Choose") {
7953 buttonMdiBGLogo->setEnabled(dialog.general_mdi_bg_use_logo);
7954 dialog.general_mdi_bg_logo = settings_general_mdi_bg_logo;
7955 accept_general_mdi_bg_logo = dialog.general_mdi_bg_logo;
7956 connect(buttonMdiBGLogo, clicked(), chooseGeneralMdiBackgroundLogo()));
7957 connect(checkBoxMdiBGUseLogo, toggled(bool)), buttonMdiBGLogo, setEnabled(bool)));
7958 }
7959
7960 checkbox_data("Use Texture", &(dialog.general_mdi_bg_use_texture));
7961
7962 if (button("Choose")) {
7963 buttonMdiBGTexture->setEnabled(dialog.general_mdi_bg_use_texture);
7964 dialog.general_mdi_bg_texture = settings_general_mdi_bg_texture;
7965 accept_general_mdi_bg_texture = dialog.general_mdi_bg_texture;
7966 connect(buttonMdiBGTexture, clicked(), chooseGeneralMdiBackgroundTexture()));
7967 connect(checkBoxMdiBGUseTexture, toggled(bool)), buttonMdiBGTexture, setEnabled(bool)));
7968 }
7969
7970 checkbox_data("Use Color", &(dialog.general_mdi_bg_use_color));
7971
7972 if (button("Choose")) {
7973 buttonMdiBGColor->setEnabled(dialog.general_mdi_bg_use_color);
7974 dialog.general_mdi_bg_color = settings_general_mdi_bg_color;
7975 preview.general_mdi_bg_color = dialog.general_mdi_bg_color;
7976 accept_general_mdi_bg_color = dialog.general_mdi_bg_color;
7977 QPixmap mdiBGPix(16,16);
7978 mdiBGPix.fill(EmbColor(preview.general_mdi_bg_color));
7979 buttonMdiBGColor->setIcon(QIcon(mdiBGPix));
7980 connect(buttonMdiBGColor, clicked(), chooseGeneralMdiBackgroundColor()));
7981 connect(checkBoxMdiBGUseColor, toggled(bool)), buttonMdiBGColor, setEnabled(bool)));
7982 }
7983
7984 QGridLayout* gridLayoutMdiBG = QGridLayout(widget);
7985 gridLayoutMdiBG->add_widget(checkBoxMdiBGUseLogo, 0, 0, EMB_ALIGN_LEFT);
7986 gridLayoutMdiBG->add_widget(buttonMdiBGLogo, 0, 1, EMB_ALIGN_RIGHT);
7987 gridLayoutMdiBG->add_widget(checkBoxMdiBGUseTexture, 1, 0, EMB_ALIGN_LEFT);
7988 gridLayoutMdiBG->add_widget(buttonMdiBGTexture, 1, 1, EMB_ALIGN_RIGHT);
7989 gridLayoutMdiBG->add_widget(checkBoxMdiBGUseColor, 2, 0, EMB_ALIGN_LEFT);
7990 gridLayoutMdiBG->add_widget(buttonMdiBGColor, 2, 1, EMB_ALIGN_RIGHT);
7991 groupBoxMdiBG->set_layout(gridLayoutMdiBG);
7992
7993 translated_text("Tips");
7994
7995 checkbox_data("Show Tip of the Day on startup", &(dialog.general_tip_of_the_day));
7996
7997 translated_text("Help Browser");
7998
7999 QRadioButton* radioButtonSystemHelpBrowser = QRadioButton(translate("System"), groupBoxHelpBrowser);
8000 radioButtonSystemHelpBrowser_set_checked(settings_general_system_help_browser);
8001 QRadioButton* radioButtonCustomHelpBrowser = QRadioButton(translate("Custom"), groupBoxHelpBrowser);
8002 radioButtonCustomHelpBrowser_set_checked(!settings_general_system_help_browser);
8003 radioButtonCustomHelpBrowser->setEnabled(false); //\todo finish this
8004
8005 QVBoxLayout* vboxLayoutHelpBrowser = QVBoxLayout(groupBoxHelpBrowser);
8006 vboxLayoutHelpBrowser->add_widget(radioButtonSystemHelpBrowser);
8007 vboxLayoutHelpBrowser->add_widget(radioButtonCustomHelpBrowser);
8008 groupBoxHelpBrowser->set_layout(vboxLayoutHelpBrowser);
8009 */
8010
8011 /* Widget Layout */
8012 /*
8013 QVBoxLayout* vboxLayoutMain = QVBoxLayout(widget);
8014 vboxLayoutMain->add_widget(groupBoxLanguage);
8015 vboxLayoutMain->add_widget(groupBoxIcon);
8016 vboxLayoutMain->add_widget(groupBoxMdiBG);
8017 vboxLayoutMain->add_widget(groupBoxTips);
8018 vboxLayoutMain->add_widget(groupBoxHelpBrowser);
8019 vboxLayoutMain->addStretch(1);
8020 widget->set_layout(vboxLayoutMain);
8021 */
8022}

8038static void
8039create_tab_display(void)
8040{
8041 //\todo Review OpenGL and Rendering settings for future inclusion
8042 translated_text("Rendering");
8043
8044 static bool dialog_display_use_opengl;
8045 static bool dialog_display_renderhint_aa;
8046 static bool dialog_display_renderhint_text_aa;
8047 static bool dialog_display_renderhint_smooth_pix;
