8049 static bool dialog_display_renderhint_noncosmetic;
8050
8051 static bool dialog_display_show_scrollbars;
8052
8053 checkbox_data("Use OpenGL", &dialog_display_use_opengl, &(dialog.display_use_opengl));
8054 checkbox_data("Antialias", &dialog_display_renderhint_aa, &(dialog.display_renderhint_aa));
8055 checkbox_data("Antialias Text", &dialog_display_renderhint_text_aa, &(dialog.display_renderhint_text_aa));
8056 checkbox_data("Smooth Pixmap", &dialog_display_renderhint_smooth_pix, &(dialog.display_renderhint_smooth_pix));
8057 checkbox_data("High Quality Antialiasing (OpenGL)", &dialog_display_renderhint_high_aa, &(dialog.display_renderhint_high_aa));
8058 checkbox_data("Non Cosmetic", &dialog_display_renderhint_noncosmetic, &(dialog.display_renderhint_noncosmetic));
8059
8060 translated_text("Scroll Bars");
8061
8062 checkbox_data("Show scrollbars", &dialog_display_show_scrollbars, &(dialog.display_show_scrollbars));
8063 /*
8064 QLabel* labelscrollbarWidget = QLabel(translate("Perform action when clicking corner widget"), groupBoxscrollbars);
8065 int* comboBoxscrollbarWidget = int(groupBoxscrollbars);
8066 dialog.display_scrollbar_widget_num = settings_display_scrollbar_widget_num;
8067 int numActions = actionHash.size();
8068 for(int i = 0; i < numActions; i++)
8069 {
8070 QAction* action = actionHash.value(i);
8071 if (action) comboBoxscrollbarWidget->addItem(action->icon(), action->text().replace("&", ""));
8072 }
8073 comboBoxscrollbarWidget->setCurrentIndex(dialog.display_scrollbar_widget_num);
8074 connect(comboBoxscrollbarWidget, currentIndexChanged(int), comboBoxscrollbarWidgetCurrentIndexChanged(int)));

8080 groupBoxscrollbars->set_layout(vboxLayoutscrollbars);

8087 preview.display_crosshair_color = dialog.display_crosshair_color;
8088 accept_display_crosshair_color = dialog.display_crosshair_color;
8089 QPixmap crosshairPix(16,16);
8090 crosshairPix.fill(EmbColor(preview.display_crosshair_color));
8091 buttonCrossHairColor->setIcon(QIcon(crosshairPix));
8092 connect(buttonCrossHairColor, clicked(), chooseDisplayCrossHairColor()));
8093
8094 translated_text("Background Color");
8095 QPushButton* buttonBGColor = QPushButton(translate("Choose"), groupBoxColor);
8096 dialog.display_bg_color = settings_display_bg_color;
8097 preview.display_bg_color = dialog.display_bg_color;
8098 accept_display_bg_color = dialog.display_bg_color;
8099 QPixmap bgPix(16,16);
8100 bgPix.fill(EmbColor(preview.display_bg_color));
8101 buttonBGColor->setIcon(QIcon(bgPix));
8102 connect(buttonBGColor, clicked(), chooseDisplayBackgroundColor()));
8103
8104 translated_text("Selection Box Color (Crossing)");
8105 QPushButton* buttonSelectBoxLeftColor = QPushButton(translate("Choose"), groupBoxColor);
8106 dialog.display_selectbox_left_color = settings_display_selectbox_left_color;
8107 preview.display_selectbox_left_color = dialog.display_selectbox_left_color;
8108 accept_display_selectbox_left_color = dialog.display_selectbox_left_color;
8109 QPixmap sBoxLCPix(16,16);
8110 sBoxLCPix.fill(EmbColor(preview.display_selectbox_left_color));
8111 buttonSelectBoxLeftColor->setIcon(QIcon(sBoxLCPix));
8112 connect(buttonSelectBoxLeftColor, clicked(), chooseDisplaySelectBoxLeftColor()));
8113
8114 translated_text("Selection Box Fill (Crossing)");
8115 QPushButton* buttonSelectBoxLeftFill = QPushButton(translate("Choose"), groupBoxColor);
8116 dialog.display_selectbox_left_fill = settings_display_selectbox_left_fill;
8117 preview.display_selectbox_left_fill = dialog.display_selectbox_left_fill;
8118 accept_display_selectbox_left_fill = dialog.display_selectbox_left_fill;
8119 QPixmap sBoxLFPix(16,16);
8120 sBoxLFPix.fill(EmbColor(preview.display_selectbox_left_fill));
8121 buttonSelectBoxLeftFill->setIcon(QIcon(sBoxLFPix));
8122 connect(buttonSelectBoxLeftFill, clicked(), chooseDisplaySelectBoxLeftFill()));
8123
8124 translated_text("Selection Box Color (Window)");

8126 dialog.display_selectbox_right_color = settings_display_selectbox_right_color;
8127 preview.display_selectbox_right_color = dialog.display_selectbox_right_color;

8131 buttonSelectBoxRightColor->setIcon(QIcon(sBoxRCPix));
8132 connect(buttonSelectBoxRightColor, clicked(), chooseDisplaySelectBoxRightColor()));
8133
8134 translated_text("Selection Box Fill (Window)"));
8135 button(translate("Choose"), groupBoxColor);
8136 dialog.display_selectbox_right_fill = settings_display_selectbox_right_fill;
8137 preview.display_selectbox_right_fill = dialog.display_selectbox_right_fill;

8139 QPixmap sBoxRFPix(16,16);
8140 sBoxRFPix.fill(EmbColor(preview.display_selectbox_right_fill));
8141 buttonSelectBoxRightFill->setIcon(QIcon(sBoxRFPix));
8142 connect(buttonSelectBoxRightFill, clicked(), chooseDisplaySelectBoxRightFill()));

8144 translated_text("Selection Box Fill Alpha");
8145 QSpinBox* spinBoxSelectBoxAlpha = QSpinBox(groupBoxColor);
8146 spinBoxSelectBoxAlpha->setRange(0, 255);
8147 dialog.display_selectbox_alpha = settings_display_selectbox_alpha;
8148 preview.display_selectbox_alpha = dialog.display_selectbox_alpha;
8149 spinBoxSelectBoxAlpha->setValue(preview.display_selectbox_alpha);
8150 connect(spinBoxSelectBoxAlpha, valueChanged(int), spinBoxDisplaySelectBoxAlphaValueChanged(int)));
8151
8152 QGridLayout* gridLayoutColor = QGridLayout(widget);
8153 gridLayoutColor->add_widget(labelCrossHairColor, 0, 0, EMB_ALIGN_LEFT);
8154 gridLayoutColor->add_widget(buttonCrossHairColor, 0, 1, EMB_ALIGN_RIGHT);
8155 gridLayoutColor->add_widget(labelBGColor, 1, 0, EMB_ALIGN_LEFT);
8156 gridLayoutColor->add_widget(buttonBGColor, 1, 1, EMB_ALIGN_RIGHT);
8157 gridLayoutColor->add_widget(labelSelectBoxLeftColor, 2, 0, EMB_ALIGN_LEFT);
8158 gridLayoutColor->add_widget(buttonSelectBoxLeftColor, 2, 1, EMB_ALIGN_RIGHT);
8159 gridLayoutColor->add_widget(labelSelectBoxLeftFill, 3, 0, EMB_ALIGN_LEFT);
8160 gridLayoutColor->add_widget(buttonSelectBoxLeftFill, 3, 1, EMB_ALIGN_RIGHT);
8161 gridLayoutColor->add_widget(labelSelectBoxRightColor, 4, 0, EMB_ALIGN_LEFT);
8162 gridLayoutColor->add_widget(buttonSelectBoxRightColor, 4, 1, EMB_ALIGN_RIGHT);
8163 gridLayoutColor->add_widget(labelSelectBoxRightFill, 5, 0, EMB_ALIGN_LEFT);
8164 gridLayoutColor->add_widget(buttonSelectBoxRightFill, 5, 1, EMB_ALIGN_RIGHT);
8165 gridLayoutColor->add_widget(labelSelectBoxAlpha, 6, 0, EMB_ALIGN_LEFT);
8166 gridLayoutColor->add_widget(spinBoxSelectBoxAlpha, 6, 1, EMB_ALIGN_RIGHT);
8167 groupBoxColor->set_layout(gridLayoutColor);
8168
8169 translated_text("Zoom");
8170
8171 translated_text(translate("Zoom In Scale"), groupBoxZoom);
8172 QDoubleSpinBox* spinBoxZoomScaleIn = QDoubleSpinBox(groupBoxZoom);
8173 dialog.display_zoomscale_in = settings_display_zoomscale_in;
8174 spinBoxZoomScaleIn->setValue(dialog.display_zoomscale_in);
8175 spinBoxZoomScaleIn->setSingleStep(0.01);
8176 spinBoxZoomScaleIn->setRange(1.01, 10.00);
8177 connect(spinBoxZoomScaleIn, valueChanged(EmbReal), spinBoxZoomScaleInValueChanged(EmbReal)));
8178
8179 translated_text(translate("Zoom Out Scale"), groupBoxZoom);
8180 QDoubleSpinBox* spinBoxZoomScaleOut = QDoubleSpinBox(groupBoxZoom);
8181 dialog.display_zoomscale_out = settings_display_zoomscale_out;
8182 spinBoxZoomScaleOut->setValue(dialog.display_zoomscale_out);
8183 spinBoxZoomScaleOut->setSingleStep(0.01);
8184 spinBoxZoomScaleOut->setRange(0.01, 0.99);
8185 connect(spinBoxZoomScaleOut, valueChanged(EmbReal), spinBoxZoomScaleOutValueChanged(EmbReal)));
8186
8187 QGridLayout* gridLayoutZoom = QGridLayout(groupBoxZoom);
8188 gridLayoutZoom->add_widget(labelZoomScaleIn, 0, 0, EMB_ALIGN_LEFT);
8189 gridLayoutZoom->add_widget(spinBoxZoomScaleIn, 0, 1, EMB_ALIGN_RIGHT);
8190 gridLayoutZoom->add_widget(labelZoomScaleOut, 1, 0, EMB_ALIGN_LEFT);
8191 gridLayoutZoom->add_widget(spinBoxZoomScaleOut, 1, 1, EMB_ALIGN_RIGHT);
8192 groupBoxZoom->set_layout(gridLayoutZoom);
8193 */
8194}
8195
8200static void
8201create_tab_open_save(void)
8202{
8203 char extensions[100][20] = {
8204 "100", "10o", "ART", "BMC", "BRO", "CND", "COL", "CSD",
8205 "CSV", "DAT", "DEM", "DSB", "DST", "DSZ", "DXF", "EDR",
8206 "EMD", "EXP", "EXY", "EYS", "FXY", "GNC", "GT", "HUS",
8207 "INB", "JEF", "KSM", "PCD", "PCM", "PCQ", "PCS", "PEC",
8208 "PEL", "PEM", "PES", "PHB", "PHC", "RGB", "SEW", "SHV",
8209 "SST", "STX", "SVG", "T09", "TAP", "THR", "TXT",
8210 "U00", "U01", "VIP", "VP3", "XXX", "ZSK"
8211 };
8212
8213 printf("%s", extensions[100]);
8214
8215 /*
8216 //Custom Filter
8217 QGroupBox* groupBoxCustomFilter = QGroupBox(translate("Custom Filter"), widget);
8218 groupBoxCustomFilter->setEnabled(false); //\todo Fixup custom filter
8219
8220 dialog.opensave_custom_filter = settings_opensave_custom_filter;
8221
8222 QCheckBox* checkBoxCustomFilter[200];
8223
8224 for (std_vector<std_string>_size_type i=0; i<extensions.size(); i++) {
8225 checkBoxCustomFilter[i] = QCheckBox(extensions[i],
8226 groupBoxCustomFilter);
8227 bool checked = dialog.opensave_custom_filter.contains
8228 "*."+extensions[i],
8229 Qt_CaseInsensitive);
8230 checkBoxCustomFilter[i]_set_checked(checked);
8231 connect(checkBoxCustomFilter[i], stateChanged(int)), this,
8232 checkBoxCustomFilterStateChanged(int)));
8233 }
8234
8235 QPushButton* buttonCustomFilterSelectAll = QPushButton(translate("Select All"), groupBoxCustomFilter);
8236 connect(buttonCustomFilterSelectAll, clicked(), buttonCustomFilterSelectAllClicked()));
8237 for (std_vector<std_string>_size_type i=0; i<extensions.size(); i++) {
8238 connect(buttonCustomFilterSelectAll(bool)), checkBoxCustomFilter[i], setChecked(bool)));
8239 }
8240
8241 QPushButton* buttonCustomFilterClearAll = QPushButton("Clear All", groupBoxCustomFilter);
8242 connect(buttonCustomFilterClearAll, clicked(), buttonCustomFilterClearAllClicked()));
8243 for (std_vector<std_string>_size_type i=0; i<extensions.size(); i++) {
8244 connect(buttonCustomFilterClearAll(bool)), checkBoxCustomFilter[i], setChecked(bool)));
8245 }
8246
8247 QGridLayout* gridLayoutCustomFilter = QGridLayout(groupBoxCustomFilter);
8248 for (int i=0; i<10; i++)
8249 for (int j=0; j<10; j++) {
8250 if (10*i+j >= extensions.size()) {
8251 break;
8252 }
8253 gridLayoutCustomFilter->add_widget(checkBoxCustomFilter[10*i+j], j, i, EMB_ALIGN_LEFT);
8254 }
8255 gridLayoutCustomFilter->add_widget(buttonCustomFilterSelectAll, 0, 6, EMB_ALIGN_LEFT);
8256 gridLayoutCustomFilter->add_widget(buttonCustomFilterClearAll, 1, 6, EMB_ALIGN_LEFT);
8257 gridLayoutCustomFilter->setColumnStretch(6,1);
8258 groupBoxCustomFilter->set_layout(gridLayoutCustomFilter);
8259
8260 if (dialog.opensave_custom_filter.contains("supported", Qt_CaseInsensitive)) buttonCustomFilterSelectAllClicked();
8261
8262 //Opening
8263 QGroupBox* groupBoxOpening = QGroupBox(translate("File Open"), widget);
8264
8265 int* comboBoxOpenFormat = int(groupBoxOpening);
8266
8267 QCheckBox* checkBoxOpenThumbnail = QCheckBox(translate("Preview Thumbnails"), groupBoxOpening);
8268 checkBoxOpenThumbnail_set_checked(false);
8269
8270 //\todo Add a button to clear the recent history.
8271
8272 QLabel* labelRecentMaxFiles = QLabel(translate("Number of recently accessed files to show"), groupBoxOpening);
8273 QSpinBox* spinBoxRecentMaxFiles = QSpinBox(groupBoxOpening);
8274 spinBoxRecentMaxFiles->setRange(0, 10);
8275 dialog.opensave_recent_max_files = settings_opensave_recent_max_files;
8276 spinBoxRecentMaxFiles->setValue(dialog.opensave_recent_max_files);
8277 connect(spinBoxRecentMaxFiles, valueChanged(int), spinBoxRecentMaxFilesValueChanged(int)));
8278
8279 QFrame* frameRecent = QFrame(groupBoxOpening);
8280 QGridLayout* gridLayoutRecent = QGridLayout(frameRecent);
8281 gridLayoutRecent->add_widget(labelRecentMaxFiles, 0, 0, EMB_ALIGN_LEFT);
8282 gridLayoutRecent->add_widget(spinBoxRecentMaxFiles, 0, 1, EMB_ALIGN_RIGHT);
8283 frameRecent->set_layout(gridLayoutRecent);
8284
8285 QVBoxLayout* vboxLayoutOpening = QVBoxLayout(groupBoxOpening);
8286 vboxLayoutOpening->add_widget(comboBoxOpenFormat);
8287 vboxLayoutOpening->add_widget(checkBoxOpenThumbnail);
8288 vboxLayoutOpening->add_widget(frameRecent);
8289 groupBoxOpening->set_layout(vboxLayoutOpening);
8290
8291 translated_text("File Save");
8292
8293 int* comboBoxSaveFormat = int(groupBoxSaving);
8294
8295 QCheckBox* checkBoxSaveThumbnail = QCheckBox(translate("Save Thumbnails"), groupBoxSaving);
8296 checkBoxSaveThumbnail_set_checked(false);
8297
8298 QCheckBox* checkBoxAutoSave = QCheckBox(translate("AutoSave"), groupBoxSaving);
8299 checkBoxAutoSave_set_checked(false);
8300
8301 QVBoxLayout* vboxLayoutSaving = QVBoxLayout(groupBoxSaving);
8302 vboxLayoutSaving->add_widget(comboBoxSaveFormat);
8303 vboxLayoutSaving->add_widget(checkBoxSaveThumbnail);
8304 vboxLayoutSaving->add_widget(checkBoxAutoSave);
8305 groupBoxSaving->set_layout(vboxLayoutSaving);
8306
8307 //Trimming
8308 QGroupBox* groupBoxTrim = QGroupBox(translate("Trimming"), widget);
8309
8310 QLabel* labelTrimDstNumJumps = QLabel(translate("DST Only: Minimum number of jumps to trim"), groupBoxTrim);
8311 QSpinBox* spinBoxTrimDstNumJumps = QSpinBox(groupBoxTrim);
8312 spinBoxTrimDstNumJumps->setRange(1, 20);
8313 dialog.opensave_trim_dst_num_jumps = settings_opensave_trim_dst_num_jumps;
8314 spinBoxTrimDstNumJumps->setValue(dialog.opensave_trim_dst_num_jumps);
8315 connect(spinBoxTrimDstNumJumps, valueChanged(int), spinBoxTrimDstNumJumpsValueChanged(int)));
8316
8317 QFrame* frameTrimDstNumJumps = QFrame(groupBoxTrim);
8318 QGridLayout* gridLayoutTrimDstNumJumps = QGridLayout(frameTrimDstNumJumps);
8319 gridLayoutTrimDstNumJumps->add_widget(labelTrimDstNumJumps, 0, 0, EMB_ALIGN_LEFT);
8320 gridLayoutTrimDstNumJumps->add_widget(spinBoxTrimDstNumJumps, 0, 1, EMB_ALIGN_RIGHT);
8321 frameTrimDstNumJumps->set_layout(gridLayoutTrimDstNumJumps);
8322
8323 QVBoxLayout* vboxLayoutTrim = QVBoxLayout(groupBoxTrim);
8324 vboxLayoutTrim->add_widget(frameTrimDstNumJumps);
8325 groupBoxTrim->set_layout(vboxLayoutTrim);
8326 */
8327}

8333static void
8334create_tab_printing(void)
8335{
8336 translated_text("Default Printer");
8337 /*
8338 int checked;
8339 ImGui_RadioButton(translate("Use as default device"), &checked);
8340 ImGui_RadioButton(translate("Use last used device"), &checked);
8341
8342 ImGui_ComboBox(translate("Available Printers"), &checked);
8343 std_vector<PrinterInfo> listAvailPrinters = PrinterInfo_availablePrinters();
8344 for (PrinterInfo info : listAvailPrinters) {
8345 comboBoxDefaultDevice->addItem(load_icon("print"), info.printerName());
8346 }
8347
8348 translated_text("Save Ink");
8349 checkbox_data("Disable Background", &(dialog.printing_disable_bg));
8350 */
8351}

8370 translated_text("Grid Misc");
8371 /*

8375 checkBoxGridShowOnLoad_set_checked(dialog.grid_show_on_load);
8376 connect(checkBoxGridShowOnLoad, stateChanged(int), checkBoxGridShowOnLoadStateChanged(int)));

8379 dialog.grid_show_origin = settings_grid_show_origin;
8380 checkBoxGridShowOrigin_set_checked(dialog.grid_show_origin);
8381 connect(checkBoxGridShowOrigin, stateChanged(int), checkBoxGridShowOriginStateChanged(int)));

8388 //Grid Color

8580 gridLayoutGridGeom->add_widget(checkBoxGridCenterOnOrigin, 2, 0, EMB_ALIGN_LEFT);
8581 gridLayoutGridGeom->add_widget(labelGridCenterX, 3, 0, EMB_ALIGN_LEFT);

8583 gridLayoutGridGeom->add_widget(labelGridCenterY, 4, 0, EMB_ALIGN_LEFT);

8585 gridLayoutGridGeom->add_widget(labelGridSizeX, 5, 0, EMB_ALIGN_LEFT);
8586 gridLayoutGridGeom->add_widget(spinBoxGridSizeX, 5, 1, EMB_ALIGN_RIGHT);
8587 gridLayoutGridGeom->add_widget(labelGridSizeY, 6, 0, EMB_ALIGN_LEFT);
8588 gridLayoutGridGeom->add_widget(spinBoxGridSizeY, 6, 1, EMB_ALIGN_RIGHT);

8607 connect(checkBoxRulerShowOnLoad, stateChanged(int), checkBoxRulerShowOnLoadStateChanged(int)));

8644 QGroupBox* groupBoxRulerGeom = QGroupBox(translate("Ruler Geometry"), widget);

8647 labelRulerPixelSize->setObjectName("labelRulerPixelSize");

8649 spinBoxRulerPixelSize->setObjectName("spinBoxRulerPixelSize");
8650 dialog.ruler_pixel_size = settings_ruler_pixel_size;

8652 spinBoxRulerPixelSize->setRange(20.000, 100.000);
8653 spinBoxRulerPixelSize->setValue(dialog.ruler_pixel_size);

8655

8657 gridLayoutRulerGeom->add_widget(labelRulerPixelSize, 0, 0, EMB_ALIGN_LEFT);

8659 groupBoxRulerGeom->set_layout(gridLayoutRulerGeom);
8660
8661 //Widget Layout
8662 QVBoxLayout *vboxLayoutMain = QVBoxLayout(widget);
8663 vboxLayoutMain->add_widget(groupBoxGridMisc);
8664 vboxLayoutMain->add_widget(groupBoxGridColor);
8665 vboxLayoutMain->add_widget(groupBoxGridGeom);
8666 vboxLayoutMain->add_widget(groupBoxRulerMisc);
8667 vboxLayoutMain->add_widget(groupBoxRulerColor);
8668 vboxLayoutMain->add_widget(groupBoxRulerGeom);
8669 vboxLayoutMain->addStretch(1);
8670 widget->set_layout(vboxLayoutMain);
8671
8672 QScrollArea* scrollArea = QScrollArea(this);
8673 scrollArea->setWidgetResizable(true);
8674 scrollArea->setWidget(widget);
8675 return scrollArea;
8676 */
8677}

8701{
8702 /*

8773

8775 dialog.qsnap_apparent = settings_qsnap_apparent;
8776 checkBoxQSnapApparent_set_checked(dialog.qsnap_apparent);
8777 checkBoxQSnapApparent->setIcon(load_icon("locator-snaptoapparentintersection"));
8778 connect(checkBoxQSnapApparent, stateChanged(int), checkBoxQSnapApparentStateChanged(int)));
8779
8780 QCheckBox* checkBoxQSnapParallel = QCheckBox(translate("Parallel"), groupBoxQSnapLoc);
8781 dialog.qsnap_parallel = settings_qsnap_parallel;
8782 checkBoxQSnapParallel_set_checked(dialog.qsnap_parallel);
8783 checkBoxQSnapParallel->setIcon(load_icon("locator-snaptoparallel"));
8784 connect(checkBoxQSnapParallel, stateChanged(int), checkBoxQSnapParallelStateChanged(int)));
8785
8786 QPushButton* buttonQSnapSelectAll = QPushButton(translate("Select All"), groupBoxQSnapLoc);
8787 connect(buttonQSnapSelectAll, clicked(), buttonQSnapSelectAllClicked()));
8788 connect(buttonQSnapSelectAll(bool)), checkBoxQSnapEndPoint, setChecked(bool)));
8789 connect(buttonQSnapSelectAll(bool)), checkBoxQSnapMidPoint, setChecked(bool)));
8790 connect(buttonQSnapSelectAll(bool)), checkBoxQSnapCenter, setChecked(bool)));
8791 connect(buttonQSnapSelectAll(bool)), checkBoxQSnapNode, setChecked(bool)));
8792 connect(buttonQSnapSelectAll(bool)), checkBoxQSnapQuadrant, setChecked(bool)));
8793 connect(buttonQSnapSelectAll(bool)), checkBoxQSnapIntersection, setChecked(bool)));
8794 connect(buttonQSnapSelectAll(bool)), checkBoxQSnapExtension, setChecked(bool)));
8795 connect(buttonQSnapSelectAll(bool)), checkBoxQSnapInsertion, setChecked(bool)));
8796 connect(buttonQSnapSelectAll(bool)), checkBoxQSnapPerpendicular, setChecked(bool)));
8797 connect(buttonQSnapSelectAll(bool)), checkBoxQSnapTangent, setChecked(bool)));
8798 connect(buttonQSnapSelectAll(bool)), checkBoxQSnapNearest, setChecked(bool)));
8799 connect(buttonQSnapSelectAll(bool)), checkBoxQSnapApparent, setChecked(bool)));
8800 connect(buttonQSnapSelectAll(bool)), checkBoxQSnapParallel, setChecked(bool)));
8801
8802 QPushButton* buttonQSnapClearAll = QPushButton(translate("Clear All"), groupBoxQSnapLoc);
8803 connect(buttonQSnapClearAll, clicked(), buttonQSnapClearAllClicked()));
8804 connect(buttonQSnapClearAll(bool)), checkBoxQSnapEndPoint, setChecked(bool)));
8805 connect(buttonQSnapClearAll(bool)), checkBoxQSnapMidPoint, setChecked(bool)));
8806 connect(buttonQSnapClearAll(bool)), checkBoxQSnapCenter, setChecked(bool)));
8807 connect(buttonQSnapClearAll(bool)), checkBoxQSnapNode, setChecked(bool)));
8808 connect(buttonQSnapClearAll(bool)), checkBoxQSnapQuadrant, setChecked(bool)));
8809 connect(buttonQSnapClearAll(bool)), checkBoxQSnapIntersection, setChecked(bool)));
8810 connect(buttonQSnapClearAll(bool)), checkBoxQSnapExtension, setChecked(bool)));
8811 connect(buttonQSnapClearAll(bool)), checkBoxQSnapInsertion, setChecked(bool)));
8812 connect(buttonQSnapClearAll(bool)), checkBoxQSnapPerpendicular, setChecked(bool)));
8813 connect(buttonQSnapClearAll(bool)), checkBoxQSnapTangent, setChecked(bool)));
8814 connect(buttonQSnapClearAll(bool)), checkBoxQSnapNearest, setChecked(bool)));
8815 connect(buttonQSnapClearAll(bool)), checkBoxQSnapApparent, setChecked(bool)));
8816 connect(buttonQSnapClearAll(bool)), checkBoxQSnapParallel, setChecked(bool)));
8817
8818 QGridLayout* gridLayoutQSnap = QGridLayout(groupBoxQSnapLoc);
8819 gridLayoutQSnap->add_widget(checkBoxQSnapEndPoint, 0, 0, EMB_ALIGN_LEFT);
8820 gridLayoutQSnap->add_widget(checkBoxQSnapMidPoint, 1, 0, EMB_ALIGN_LEFT);
8821 gridLayoutQSnap->add_widget(checkBoxQSnapCenter, 2, 0, EMB_ALIGN_LEFT);
8822 gridLayoutQSnap->add_widget(checkBoxQSnapNode, 3, 0, EMB_ALIGN_LEFT);
8823 gridLayoutQSnap->add_widget(checkBoxQSnapQuadrant, 4, 0, EMB_ALIGN_LEFT);
8824 gridLayoutQSnap->add_widget(checkBoxQSnapIntersection, 5, 0, EMB_ALIGN_LEFT);
8825 gridLayoutQSnap->add_widget(checkBoxQSnapExtension, 6, 0, EMB_ALIGN_LEFT);
8826 gridLayoutQSnap->add_widget(checkBoxQSnapInsertion, 0, 1, EMB_ALIGN_LEFT);
8827 gridLayoutQSnap->add_widget(checkBoxQSnapPerpendicular, 1, 1, EMB_ALIGN_LEFT);
8828 gridLayoutQSnap->add_widget(checkBoxQSnapTangent, 2, 1, EMB_ALIGN_LEFT);
8829 gridLayoutQSnap->add_widget(checkBoxQSnapNearest, 3, 1, EMB_ALIGN_LEFT);
8830 gridLayoutQSnap->add_widget(checkBoxQSnapApparent, 4, 1, EMB_ALIGN_LEFT);
8831 gridLayoutQSnap->add_widget(checkBoxQSnapParallel, 5, 1, EMB_ALIGN_LEFT);
8832 gridLayoutQSnap->add_widget(buttonQSnapSelectAll, 0, 2, EMB_ALIGN_LEFT);
8833 gridLayoutQSnap->add_widget(buttonQSnapClearAll, 1, 2, EMB_ALIGN_LEFT);
8834 gridLayoutQSnap->setColumnStretch(2,1);
8835 groupBoxQSnapLoc->set_layout(gridLayoutQSnap);
8836
8837 //QSnap Visual Config
8838 QGroupBox* groupBoxQSnapVisual = QGroupBox(translate("Visual Configuration"), widget);
8839
8840 QLabel* labelQSnapLocColor = QLabel(translate("Locator Color"), groupBoxQSnapVisual);
8841 int* comboBoxQSnapLocColor = int(groupBoxQSnapVisual);
8842 addColorsToComboBox(comboBoxQSnapLocColor);
8843 dialog.qsnap_locator_color = settings_qsnap_locator_color;
8844 comboBoxQSnapLocColor->setCurrentIndex(comboBoxQSnapLocColor->findData(dialog.qsnap_locator_color));
8845 connect(comboBoxQSnapLocColor, currentIndexChanged(int), comboBoxQSnapLocatorColorCurrentIndexChanged(int)));
8846
8847 QLabel* labelQSnapLocSize = QLabel(translate("Locator Size"), groupBoxQSnapVisual);
8848 QSlider* sliderQSnapLocSize = QSlider(Qt_Horizontal, groupBoxQSnapVisual);
8849 sliderQSnapLocSize->setRange(1,20);
8850 dialog.qsnap_locator_size = settings_qsnap_locator_size;
8851 sliderQSnapLocSize->setValue(dialog.qsnap_locator_size);
8852 connect(sliderQSnapLocSize, valueChanged(int), sliderQSnapLocatorSizeValueChanged(int)));
8853
8854 QVBoxLayout* vboxLayoutQSnapVisual = QVBoxLayout(groupBoxQSnapVisual);
8855 vboxLayoutQSnapVisual->add_widget(labelQSnapLocColor);
8856 vboxLayoutQSnapVisual->add_widget(comboBoxQSnapLocColor);
8857 vboxLayoutQSnapVisual->add_widget(labelQSnapLocSize);
8858 vboxLayoutQSnapVisual->add_widget(sliderQSnapLocSize);
8859 groupBoxQSnapVisual->set_layout(vboxLayoutQSnapVisual);
8860
8861 //QSnap Sensitivity Config
8862 QGroupBox* groupBoxQSnapSensitivity = QGroupBox(translate("Sensitivity"), widget);
8863
8864 QLabel* labelQSnapApertureSize = QLabel(translate("Aperture Size"), groupBoxQSnapSensitivity);
8865 QSlider* sliderQSnapApertureSize = QSlider(Qt_Horizontal, groupBoxQSnapSensitivity);
8866 sliderQSnapApertureSize->setRange(1,20);
8867 dialog.qsnap_aperture_size = settings_qsnap_aperture_size;
8868 sliderQSnapApertureSize->setValue(dialog.qsnap_aperture_size);
8869 connect(sliderQSnapApertureSize, valueChanged(int), sliderQSnapApertureSizeValueChanged(int)));
8870
8871 QVBoxLayout* vboxLayoutQSnapSensitivity = QVBoxLayout(groupBoxQSnapSensitivity);
8872 vboxLayoutQSnapSensitivity->add_widget(labelQSnapApertureSize);
8873 vboxLayoutQSnapSensitivity->add_widget(sliderQSnapApertureSize);
8874 groupBoxQSnapSensitivity->set_layout(vboxLayoutQSnapSensitivity);
8875
8876 //Widget Layout
8877 QVBoxLayout *vboxLayoutMain = QVBoxLayout(widget);
8878 vboxLayoutMain->add_widget(groupBoxQSnapLoc);
8879 vboxLayoutMain->add_widget(groupBoxQSnapVisual);
8880 vboxLayoutMain->add_widget(groupBoxQSnapSensitivity);
8881 vboxLayoutMain->addStretch(1);
8882 widget->set_layout(vboxLayoutMain);
8883
8884 QScrollArea* scrollArea = QScrollArea(this);
8885 scrollArea->setWidgetResizable(true);
8886 scrollArea->setWidget(widget);
8887 return scrollArea;
8888 */
8889}

8915static void
8916create_tab_lineweight(void)
8917{
8918 /*
8919 QWidget* widget = QWidget(this);
8920 */
8921
8922 /* Misc */
8923 /*
8924 QGroupBox* groupBoxLwtMisc = QGroupBox(translate("LineWeight Misc"), widget);
8925
8926 QGraphicsScene* s = activeScene();
8927
8928 QCheckBox* checkBoxShowLwt = QCheckBox(translate("Show LineWeight"), groupBoxLwtMisc);
8929 if (s) {
8930 dialog.lwt_show_lwt = s->property(ENABLE_LWT).toBool();
8931 }
8932 else {
8933 dialog.lwt_show_lwt = settings_lwt_show_lwt;
8934 }
8935 preview.lwt_show_lwt = dialog.lwt_show_lwt;
8936 checkBoxShowLwt_set_checked(preview.lwt_show_lwt);
8937 connect(checkBoxShowLwt, stateChanged(int), checkBoxLwtShowLwtStateChanged(int)));
8938
8939 QCheckBox* checkBoxRealRender = QCheckBox(translate("RealRender"), groupBoxLwtMisc);
8940 checkBoxRealRender->setObjectName("checkBoxRealRender");
8941 if (s) {
8942 dialog.lwt_real_render = s->property(ENABLE_REAL).toBool();
8943 }
8944 else {
8945 dialog.lwt_real_render = settings_lwt_real_render;
8946 }
8947 preview.lwt_real_render = dialog.lwt_real_render;
8948 checkBoxRealRender_set_checked(preview.lwt_real_render);
8949 connect(checkBoxRealRender, stateChanged(int), checkBoxLwtRealRenderStateChanged(int)));
8950 checkBoxRealRender->setEnabled(dialog.lwt_show_lwt);
8951
8952 QLabel* labelDefaultLwt = QLabel(translate("Default weight"), groupBoxLwtMisc);
8953 labelDefaultLwt->setEnabled(false); //\todo remove later
8954 int* comboBoxDefaultLwt = int(groupBoxLwtMisc);
8955 dialog.lwt_default_lwt = settings_lwt_default_lwt;
8956 //\todo populate the comboBox and set the initial value
8957 comboBoxDefaultLwt->addItem(std_string().setNum(dialog.lwt_default_lwt, 'F', 2).append(" mm"), dialog.lwt_default_lwt);
8958 comboBoxDefaultLwt->setEnabled(false); //\todo remove later
8959
8960 QVBoxLayout* vboxLayoutLwtMisc = QVBoxLayout(groupBoxLwtMisc);
8961 vboxLayoutLwtMisc->add_widget(checkBoxShowLwt);
8962 vboxLayoutLwtMisc->add_widget(checkBoxRealRender);
8963 vboxLayoutLwtMisc->add_widget(labelDefaultLwt);
8964 vboxLayoutLwtMisc->add_widget(comboBoxDefaultLwt);
8965 groupBoxLwtMisc->set_layout(vboxLayoutLwtMisc);
8966 */
8967
8968 /* Widget Layout */
8969 /*
8970 QVBoxLayout *vboxLayoutMain = QVBoxLayout(widget);
8971 vboxLayoutMain->add_widget(groupBoxLwtMisc);
8972 vboxLayoutMain->addStretch(1);
8973 widget->set_layout(vboxLayoutMain);
8974
8975 QScrollArea* scrollArea = QScrollArea(this);
8976 scrollArea->setWidgetResizable(true);
8977 scrollArea->setWidget(widget);
8978 return scrollArea;
8979 */
8980}
8981
8986static void
8987create_tab_selection(void)
8988{
8989 /*
8990 QWidget* widget = QWidget(this);
8991 */
8992 /* Selection Modes */
8993 /*
8994 QGroupBox* groupBoxSelectionModes = QGroupBox(translate("Modes"), widget);
8995
8996 QCheckBox* checkBoxSelectionModePickFirst = QCheckBox(translate("Allow Preselection (PickFirst)"), groupBoxSelectionModes);
8997 dialog.selection_mode_pickfirst = settings_selection_mode_pickfirst;
8998 checkBoxSelectionModePickFirst_set_checked(dialog.selection_mode_pickfirst);
8999 checkBoxSelectionModePickFirst_set_checked(true); checkBoxSelectionModePickFirst->setEnabled(false); //\todo Remove this line when Post-selection is available
9000 connect(checkBoxSelectionModePickFirst, stateChanged(int), checkBoxSelectionModePickFirstStateChanged(int)));
9001
9002 QCheckBox* checkBoxSelectionModePickAdd = QCheckBox(translate("Add to Selection (PickAdd)"), groupBoxSelectionModes);
9003 dialog.selection_mode_pickadd = settings_selection_mode_pickadd;
9004 checkBoxSelectionModePickAdd_set_checked(dialog.selection_mode_pickadd);
9005 connect(checkBoxSelectionModePickAdd, stateChanged(int), checkBoxSelectionModePickAddStateChanged(int)));
9006
9007 QCheckBox* checkBoxSelectionModePickDrag = QCheckBox(translate("Drag to Select (PickDrag)"), groupBoxSelectionModes);
9008 dialog.selection_mode_pickdrag = settings_selection_mode_pickdrag;
9009 checkBoxSelectionModePickDrag_set_checked(dialog.selection_mode_pickdrag);
9010 checkBoxSelectionModePickDrag_set_checked(false); checkBoxSelectionModePickDrag->setEnabled(false); //\todo Remove this line when this functionality is available
9011 connect(checkBoxSelectionModePickDrag, stateChanged(int), checkBoxSelectionModePickDragStateChanged(int)));
9012
9013 QVBoxLayout* vboxLayoutSelectionModes = QVBoxLayout(groupBoxSelectionModes);
9014 vboxLayoutSelectionModes->add_widget(checkBoxSelectionModePickFirst);
9015 vboxLayoutSelectionModes->add_widget(checkBoxSelectionModePickAdd);
9016 vboxLayoutSelectionModes->add_widget(checkBoxSelectionModePickDrag);
9017 groupBoxSelectionModes->set_layout(vboxLayoutSelectionModes);
9018 */
9019
9020 /* Selection Colors */
9021 /*
9022 QGroupBox* groupBoxSelectionColors = QGroupBox(translate("Colors"), widget);
9023
9024 QLabel* labelCoolGripColor = QLabel(translate("Cool Grip (Unselected)"), groupBoxSelectionColors);
9025 int* comboBoxCoolGripColor = int(groupBoxSelectionColors);
9026 addColorsToComboBox(comboBoxCoolGripColor);
9027 dialog.selection_coolgrip_color = settings_selection_coolgrip_color;
9028 comboBoxCoolGripColor->setCurrentIndex(comboBoxCoolGripColor->findData(dialog.selection_coolgrip_color));
9029 connect(comboBoxCoolGripColor, currentIndexChanged(int), comboBoxSelectionCoolGripColorCurrentIndexChanged(int)));
9030
9031 QLabel* labelHotGripColor = QLabel(translate("Hot Grip (Selected)"), groupBoxSelectionColors);
9032 int* comboBoxHotGripColor = int(groupBoxSelectionColors);
9033 addColorsToComboBox(comboBoxHotGripColor);
9034 dialog.selection_hotgrip_color = settings_selection_hotgrip_color;
9035 comboBoxHotGripColor->setCurrentIndex(comboBoxHotGripColor->findData(dialog.selection_hotgrip_color));
9036 connect(comboBoxHotGripColor, currentIndexChanged(int), comboBoxSelectionHotGripColorCurrentIndexChanged(int)));
9037
9038 QVBoxLayout* vboxLayoutSelectionColors = QVBoxLayout(groupBoxSelectionColors);
9039 vboxLayoutSelectionColors->add_widget(labelCoolGripColor);
9040 vboxLayoutSelectionColors->add_widget(comboBoxCoolGripColor);
9041 vboxLayoutSelectionColors->add_widget(labelHotGripColor);
9042 vboxLayoutSelectionColors->add_widget(comboBoxHotGripColor);
9043 groupBoxSelectionColors->set_layout(vboxLayoutSelectionColors);
9044 */
9045
9046 /* Selection Sizes */
9047 /*
9048 QGroupBox* groupBoxSelectionSizes = QGroupBox(translate("Sizes"), widget);
9049
9050 QLabel* labelSelectionGripSize = QLabel(translate("Grip Size"), groupBoxSelectionSizes);
9051 QSlider* sliderSelectionGripSize = QSlider(Qt_Horizontal, groupBoxSelectionSizes);
9052 sliderSelectionGripSize->setRange(1,20);
9053 dialog.selection_grip_size = settings_selection_grip_size;
9054 sliderSelectionGripSize->setValue(dialog.selection_grip_size);
9055 connect(sliderSelectionGripSize, valueChanged(int), sliderSelectionGripSizeValueChanged(int)));
9056
9057 QLabel* labelSelectionPickBoxSize = QLabel(translate("Pickbox Size"), groupBoxSelectionSizes);
9058 QSlider* sliderSelectionPickBoxSize = QSlider(Qt_Horizontal, groupBoxSelectionSizes);
9059 sliderSelectionPickBoxSize->setRange(1,20);
9060 dialog.selection_pickbox_size = settings_selection_pickbox_size;
9061 sliderSelectionPickBoxSize->setValue(dialog.selection_pickbox_size);
9062 connect(sliderSelectionPickBoxSize, valueChanged(int), sliderSelectionPickBoxSizeValueChanged(int)));
9063
9064 QVBoxLayout* vboxLayoutSelectionSizes = QVBoxLayout(groupBoxSelectionSizes);
9065 vboxLayoutSelectionSizes->add_widget(labelSelectionGripSize);
9066 vboxLayoutSelectionSizes->add_widget(sliderSelectionGripSize);
9067 vboxLayoutSelectionSizes->add_widget(labelSelectionPickBoxSize);
9068 vboxLayoutSelectionSizes->add_widget(sliderSelectionPickBoxSize);
9069 groupBoxSelectionSizes->set_layout(vboxLayoutSelectionSizes);
9070 */
9071
9072 /* Widget Layout */
9073 /*
9074 QVBoxLayout *vboxLayoutMain = QVBoxLayout(widget);
9075 vboxLayoutMain->add_widget(groupBoxSelectionModes);
9076 vboxLayoutMain->add_widget(groupBoxSelectionColors);
9077 vboxLayoutMain->add_widget(groupBoxSelectionSizes);
9078 vboxLayoutMain->addStretch(1);
9079 widget->set_layout(vboxLayoutMain);
9080
9081 QScrollArea* scrollArea = QScrollArea(this);
9082 scrollArea->setWidgetResizable(true);
9083 scrollArea->setWidget(widget);
9084 return scrollArea;
9085 */
9086}
9087
9093static void
9094settings_dialog_addColorsToComboBox(int* comboBox)
9095{
9096 /*
9097 comboBox->addItem(load_icon("colorred"), translate("Red"), qRgb(255, 0, 0));
9098 comboBox->addItem(load_icon("coloryellow"), translate("Yellow"), qRgb(255,255, 0));
9099 comboBox->addItem(load_icon("colorgreen"), translate("Green"), qRgb( 0,255, 0));
9100 comboBox->addItem(load_icon("colorcyan"), translate("Cyan"), qRgb( 0,255,255));
9101 comboBox->addItem(load_icon("colorblue"), translate("Blue"), qRgb( 0, 0,255));
9102 comboBox->addItem(load_icon("colormagenta"), translate("Magenta"), qRgb(255, 0,255));
9103 comboBox->addItem(load_icon("colorwhite"), translate("White"), qRgb(255,255,255));
9104 */
9105}

9110static void
9111settings_dialog_comboBoxLanguageCurrentIndexChanged(const char * lang)
9112{
9113 /*
9114 dialog.general_language = lang.toLower();
9115 */
9116}
9117
9121static void
9122settings_dialog_comboBoxIconThemeCurrentIndexChanged(const char *theme)
9123{
9124 /*
9125 dialog.general_icon_theme.string_value = theme.toLocal8Bit();
9126 */
9127}
9128
9132static void
9133settings_dialog_comboBoxIconSizeCurrentIndexChanged(int index)
9134{
9135 /*
9136 int* comboBox = <int*>(sender());
9137 if (comboBox) {
9138 bool ok = 0;
9139 dialog.general_icon_size = comboBox->itemData(index).toUInt(&ok);
9140 if (!ok) {
9141 dialog.general_icon_size = 16;
9142 }
9143 }
9144 else {
9145 dialog.general_icon_size = 16;
9146 }
9147 */
9148}
9149
9153static void
9154settings_dialog_checkBoxGeneralMdiBGUseLogoStateChanged(int checked)
9155{
9156 /*
9157 preview.general_mdi_bg_use_logo = checked;

9834static void
9835settings_dialog_checkBoxGridLoadFromFileStateChanged(int checked)
9836{
9837 /*

9842 return;
9843 }

9845 if (!parent) {
9846 return;
9847 }
9848 QLabel* labelGridType = parent->findChild<QLabel*>("labelGridType");
9849 if (labelGridType) {
9850 labelGridType->setEnabled(!dialog.grid_load_from_file);
9851 }

9853 if (comboBoxGridType) {
9854 comboBoxGridType->setEnabled(!dialog.grid_load_from_file);
9855 }
9856 QCheckBox* checkBoxGridCenterOnOrigin = parent->findChild<QCheckBox*>("checkBoxGridCenterOnOrigin");
9857 if (checkBoxGridCenterOnOrigin)
9858 checkBoxGridCenterOnOrigin->setEnabled(!dialog.grid_load_from_file);
9859 QLabel* labelGridCenterX = parent->findChild<QLabel*>("labelGridCenterX");
9860 if (labelGridCenterX)
9861 labelGridCenterX->setEnabled(!dialog.grid_load_from_file && !dialog.grid_center_on_origin);
9862 QDoubleSpinBox* spinBoxGridCenterX = parent->findChild<QDoubleSpinBox*>("spinBoxGridCenterX");

9864 spinBoxGridCenterX->setEnabled(!dialog.grid_load_from_file && !dialog.grid_center_on_origin);

9866 if (labelGridCenterY)
9867 labelGridCenterY->setEnabled(!dialog.grid_load_from_file && !dialog.grid_center_on_origin);
9868 QDoubleSpinBox* spinBoxGridCenterY = parent->findChild<QDoubleSpinBox*>("spinBoxGridCenterY");
9869 if (spinBoxGridCenterY)
9870 spinBoxGridCenterY->setEnabled(!dialog.grid_load_from_file && !dialog.grid_center_on_origin);
9871 QLabel* labelGridSizeX = parent->findChild<QLabel*>("labelGridSizeX");
9872 if (labelGridSizeX)
9873 labelGridSizeX->setEnabled(!dialog.grid_load_from_file);
9874 QDoubleSpinBox* spinBoxGridSizeX = parent->findChild<QDoubleSpinBox*>("spinBoxGridSizeX");
9875 if (spinBoxGridSizeX)
9876 spinBoxGridSizeX->setEnabled(!dialog.grid_load_from_file);
9877 QLabel* labelGridSizeY = parent->findChild<QLabel*>("labelGridSizeY");
9878 if (labelGridSizeY)
9879 labelGridSizeY->setEnabled(!dialog.grid_load_from_file);
9880 QDoubleSpinBox* spinBoxGridSizeY = parent->findChild<QDoubleSpinBox*>("spinBoxGridSizeY");

9889 QLabel* labelGridSpacingY = parent->findChild<QLabel*>("labelGridSpacingY");
9890 if (labelGridSpacingY)
9891 labelGridSpacingY->setEnabled(!dialog.grid_load_from_file);
9892 QDoubleSpinBox* spinBoxGridSpacingY = parent->findChild<QDoubleSpinBox*>("spinBoxGridSpacingY");
9893 if (spinBoxGridSpacingY)
9894 spinBoxGridSpacingY->setEnabled(!dialog.grid_load_from_file);

9920
9926static void
9927settings_dialog_comboBoxGridTypeCurrentIndexChanged(const char *type)
9928{
9929 /*
9930 dialog.grid_type = type;
9931
9932 QObject* senderObj = sender();
9933 if (!senderObj) {
9934 return;
9935 }
9936 QObject* parent = senderObj->parent();
9937 if (!parent) {
9938 return;
9939 }
9940 bool visibility = false;
9941 if (type == "Circular") {
9942 visibility = true;
9943 }
9944
9945 QLabel* labelGridSizeX = parent->findChild<QLabel*>("labelGridSizeX");
9946 if (labelGridSizeX) {
9947 labelGridSizeX->setVisible(!visibility);
9948 }
9949 QDoubleSpinBox* spinBoxGridSizeX = parent->findChild<QDoubleSpinBox*>("spinBoxGridSizeX");
9950 if (spinBoxGridSizeX) {
9951 spinBoxGridSizeX->setVisible(!visibility);
9952 }
9953 QLabel* labelGridSizeY = parent->findChild<QLabel*>("labelGridSizeY");
9954 if (labelGridSizeY)
9955 labelGridSizeY->setVisible(!visibility);
9956 QDoubleSpinBox* spinBoxGridSizeY = parent->findChild<QDoubleSpinBox*>("spinBoxGridSizeY");
9957 if (spinBoxGridSizeY)
9958 spinBoxGridSizeY->setVisible(!visibility);
9959 QLabel* labelGridSpacingX = parent->findChild<QLabel*>("labelGridSpacingX");
9960 if (labelGridSpacingX)
9961 labelGridSpacingX->setVisible(!visibility);
9962 QDoubleSpinBox* spinBoxGridSpacingX = parent->findChild<QDoubleSpinBox*>("spinBoxGridSpacingX");
9963 if (spinBoxGridSpacingX) spinBoxGridSpacingX->setVisible(!visibility);
9964 QLabel* labelGridSpacingY = parent->findChild<QLabel*>("labelGridSpacingY");
9965 if (labelGridSpacingY) labelGridSpacingY->setVisible(!visibility);
9966 QDoubleSpinBox* spinBoxGridSpacingY = parent->findChild<QDoubleSpinBox*>("spinBoxGridSpacingY");
9967 if (spinBoxGridSpacingY) spinBoxGridSpacingY->setVisible(!visibility);
9968 QLabel* labelGridSizeRadius = parent->findChild<QLabel*>("labelGridSizeRadius");
9969 if (labelGridSizeRadius) labelGridSizeRadius->setVisible(visibility);
9970 QDoubleSpinBox* spinBoxGridSizeRadius = parent->findChild<QDoubleSpinBox*>("spinBoxGridSizeRadius");
9971 if (spinBoxGridSizeRadius) spinBoxGridSizeRadius->setVisible(visibility);
9972 QLabel* labelGridSpacingRadius = parent->findChild<QLabel*>("labelGridSpacingRadius");
9973 if (labelGridSpacingRadius) labelGridSpacingRadius->setVisible(visibility);
9974 QDoubleSpinBox* spinBoxGridSpacingRadius = parent->findChild<QDoubleSpinBox*>("spinBoxGridSpacingRadius");
9975 if (spinBoxGridSpacingRadius) spinBoxGridSpacingRadius->setVisible(visibility);
9976 QLabel* labelGridSpacingAngle = parent->findChild<QLabel*>("labelGridSpacingAngle");
9977 if (labelGridSpacingAngle) labelGridSpacingAngle->setVisible(visibility);
9978 QDoubleSpinBox* spinBoxGridSpacingAngle = parent->findChild<QDoubleSpinBox*>("spinBoxGridSpacingAngle");
9979 if (spinBoxGridSpacingAngle) spinBoxGridSpacingAngle->setVisible(visibility);
9980 */
9981}
9982

9989settings_dialog_checkBoxGridCenterOnOriginStateChanged(int checked)

9991 /*

9998 QLabel* labelGridCenterX = parent->findChild<QLabel*>("labelGridCenterX");
9999 if (labelGridCenterX) labelGridCenterX->setEnabled(!dialog.grid_center_on_origin);
10000 QDoubleSpinBox* spinBoxGridCenterX = parent->findChild<QDoubleSpinBox*>("spinBoxGridCenterX");
10001 if (spinBoxGridCenterX) spinBoxGridCenterX->setEnabled(!dialog.grid_center_on_origin);
10002 QLabel* labelGridCenterY = parent->findChild<QLabel*>("labelGridCenterY");

10004 QDoubleSpinBox* spinBoxGridCenterY = parent->findChild<QDoubleSpinBox*>("spinBoxGridCenterY");

10042
10043 if (colorDialog->result() == QDialog_Accepted) {
10044 accept_ruler_color = colorDialog->selectedColor().rgb();
10045 QPixmap pix(16,16);
10046 pix.fill(EmbColor(accept_ruler_color));

10049 }

10052 }
10053 }
10054 */

10210
10214static void
10215settings_dialog_acceptChanges(void)
10216{
10217 /*
10218 dialog.general_mdi_bg_use_logo = preview.general_mdi_bg_use_logo;
10219 dialog.general_mdi_bg_use_texture = preview.general_mdi_bg_use_texture;
10220 dialog.general_mdi_bg_use_color = preview.general_mdi_bg_use_color;
10221 dialog.general_mdi_bg_logo = accept_general_mdi_bg_logo;
10222 dialog.general_mdi_bg_texture = accept_general_mdi_bg_texture;
10223 dialog.general_mdi_bg_color = accept_general_mdi_bg_color;
10224 dialog.display_show_scrollbars = preview.display_show_scrollbars;
10225 dialog.display_crosshair_color = accept_display_crosshair_color;
10226 dialog.display_bg_color = accept_display_bg_color;
10227 dialog.display_selectbox_left_color = accept_display_selectbox_left_color;
10228 dialog.display_selectbox_left_fill = accept_display_selectbox_left_fill;
10229 dialog.display_selectbox_right_color = accept_display_selectbox_right_color;
10230 dialog.display_selectbox_right_fill = accept_display_selectbox_right_fill;
10231 dialog.display_selectbox_alpha = preview.display_selectbox_alpha;
10232 dialog.prompt_text_color = accept_prompt_text_color;
10233 dialog.prompt_bg_color = accept_prompt_bg_color;
10234 dialog.prompt_font_family = preview.prompt_font_family;
10235 dialog.prompt_font_style = preview.prompt_font_style;
10236 dialog.prompt_font_size = preview.prompt_font_size;
10237 if (dialog.grid_color_match_crosshair) {
10238 dialog.grid_color = accept_display_crosshair_color;
10239 }
10240 else {
10241 dialog.grid_color = accept_grid_color;
10242 }
10243 dialog.ruler_color = accept_ruler_color;
10244 dialog.lwt_show_lwt = preview.lwt_show_lwt;
10245 dialog.lwt_real_render = preview.lwt_real_render;
10246
10247 settings = dialog;
10248
10249 //Make sure the user sees the changes applied immediately
10250 active_view->useBackgroundLogo(dialog.general_mdi_bg_use_logo);
10251 active_view->useBackgroundTexture(dialog.general_mdi_bg_use_texture);
10252 active_view->useBackgroundColor(dialog.general_mdi_bg_use_color);
10253 active_view->setBackgroundLogo(dialog.general_mdi_bg_logo);
10254 active_view->setBackgroundTexture(dialog.general_mdi_bg_texture);
10255 active_view->setBackgroundColor(dialog.general_mdi_bg_color);
10256 iconResize(dialog.general_icon_size);
10257 updateAllViewscrollbars(dialog.display_show_scrollbars);
10258 updateAllViewCrossHairColors(dialog.display_crosshair_color);
10259 updateAllViewBackgroundColors(dialog.display_bg_color);
10260 updateAllViewSelectBoxColors(dialog.display_selectbox_left_color,
10261 dialog.display_selectbox_left_fill,
10262 dialog.display_selectbox_right_color,
10263 dialog.display_selectbox_right_fill,
10264 dialog.display_selectbox_alpha);
10265 prompt->setPromptTextColor(EmbColor(dialog.prompt_text_color));
10266 prompt->setPromptBackgroundColor(EmbColor(dialog.prompt_bg_color));
10267 prompt->setPromptFontFamily(dialog.prompt_font_family);
10268 prompt->setPromptFontStyle(dialog.prompt_font_style);
10269 prompt->setPromptFontSize(dialog.prompt_font_size);
10270 updateAllViewGridColors(dialog.grid_color);
10271 updateAllViewRulerColors(dialog.ruler_color);
10272 if (dialog.lwt_show_lwt) {
10273 statusbarLwtButton->enableLwt();
10274 }
10275 else {
10276 statusbarLwtButton->disableLwt();
10277 }
10278 if (dialog.lwt_real_render) {
10279 statusbarLwtButton->enableReal();
10280 }
10281 else {
10282 statusbarLwtButton->disableReal();
10283 }
10284 updatePickAddMode(dialog.selection_mode_pickadd);
10285
10286 writeSettings();
10287 accept();
10288 */
10289}
10290
10296static void
10297settings_dialog_rejectChanges(void)
10298{
10337}
10338
10344static void
10345stub_implement(const char *msg)
10346{
10347 log_debug(msg);
10348}
10349
10370static void
10371actuator(char command_line[200])
10372{
10373 char argv[11][200];
10374 int argc = 0;
10375 c_split(command_line, &argc, argv);
10376 const char *cmd = argv[0];
10377
10378 if (n_views > 0) {
10379 add_to_undo_history(&(active_view->undo_history), command_line);
10380 }
10381
10382 /* Command/argument seperation is done in order to reduce the number of
10383 * checks on every click before an action can run.
10384 *
10385 * File actions can be grouped under starts_with "file" etc.
10386 */
10387 log_debug(command_line);
10388
10389 /* Try to keep these if conditions alphabetical within each
10390 * indentation level.
10391 *
10392 * For actions with less than 5 lines of code, don't call a seperate
10393 * "*_action" function.
10394 */
10395 if (streq(cmd, "about")) {
10396 settings.show_about_dialog = true;
10397 return;
10398 }
10399 if (streq(cmd, "alert")) {
10400 /* settings.show_alert = true; */
10401 return;
10402 }
10403 if (streq(cmd, "arc")) {
10404 arc_action();
10405 return;
10406 }
10407 if (streq(cmd, "circle")) {
10408 circle_action();
10409 return;
10410 }
10411 if (streq(cmd, "changelog")) {
10412 /* settings.show_changelog = true; */
10413 return;
10414 }
10415 if (streq(cmd, "close")) {
10416 close_action();
10417 return;
10418 }
10419 if (streq(cmd, "copy")) {
10420 copy_action();
10421 return;
10422 }
10423 if (streq(cmd, "cut")) {
10424 cut_action();
10425 return;
10426 }
10427 if (streq(cmd, "day")) {
10428 /*
10429 if (active_view != NULL) {
10430 active_view->setBackgroundColor(qRgb(255,255,255));
10431 active_view->setCrossHairColor(qRgb(0,0,0));
10432 active_view->setGridColor(qRgb(0,0,0));
10433 }
10434 */
10435 return;
10436 }
10437 if (streq(cmd, "debug")) {
10438 if (strlen(cmd) > 6) {
10439 log_debug(command_line + 6);
10440 }
10441 return;
10442 }
10443 if (streq(cmd, "designdetails")) {
10444 settings.show_details_dialog = true;
10445 return;
10446 }
10447 if (streq(cmd, "donothing")) {
10448 log_debug("This action intentionally does nothing.");
10449 return;
10450 }
10451 if (streq(cmd, "editor")) {
10452 settings.show_editor = true;
10453 return;
10454 }
10455 if (streq(cmd, "exit") || streq(cmd, "quit")) {
10456 exit_action();
10457 return;
10458 }
10459 if (streq(cmd, "check-for-updates")) {
10460 printf("Visit https://libembroidery.org for information about new releases.\n");
10461 printf("Your version is: %s.\n", settings.version);
10462 return;
10463 }
10464 if (streq(cmd, "save")) {
10465 if (active_view != NULL) {
10466 embPattern_writeAuto(active_view->pattern, active_view->filename);
10467 }
10468 return;
10469 }
10470 if (streq(cmd, "platform")) {
10471 char s[200];
10472 platform_string(s);
10473 printf("%s\n", s);
10474 return;
10475 }
10476 if (streq(cmd, "settingsdialog")) {
10477 settings.show_settings_editor = true;
10478 return;
10479 }
10480 if (streq(cmd, "simulate")) {
10481 if (active_view != NULL) {
10482 active_view->simulate = true;
10483 active_view->simulation_start = clock();
10484 }
10485 return;
10486 }
10487
10488 if (streq(cmd, "ellipse")) {
10489 ellipse_action();
10490 return;
10491 }
10492 if (streq(cmd, "error")) {
10493 error_action(argv[1]);
10494 return;
10495 }
10496 if (streq(cmd, "help")) {
10497 error_action(argv[1]);
10498 return;
10499 }
10500 if (streq(cmd, "icon")) {
10501 icon_action(atoi(argv[1]));
10502 return;
10503 }
10504 if (streq(cmd, "new")) {
10505 new_file_action();
10506 return;
10507 }
10508 if (streq(cmd, "night")) {
10512 /*
10513 if (active_view) {
10514 active_view->setBackgroundColor(qRgb(0,0,0));
10515 active_view->setCrossHairColor(qRgb(255,255,255));
10516 active_view->setGridColor(qRgb(255,255,255));
10517 }
10518 */
10519 return;
10520 }
10521 if (streq(cmd, "open")) {
10522 open_file_action(argc-1, argv+1);
10523 return;
10524 }
10525 if (streq(cmd, "pan")) {
10526 pan_action(argv[1]);
10527 return;
10528 }
10529 if (streq(cmd, "paste")) {
10530 paste_action();
10531 return;
10532 }
10533 if (streq(cmd, "print")) {
10534 print_action();
10535 return;
10536 }
10537 if (streq(cmd, "rectangle")) {
10538 rectangle_action();
10539 return;
10540 }
10541 if (streq(cmd, "redo")) {
10542 redo_action();
10543 return;
10544 }
10545 if (streq(cmd, "undo")) {
10546 undo_action();
10547 return;
10548 }
10549 if (streq(cmd, "vulcanize")) {
10550 vulcanize_action();
10551 return;
10552 }
10553 if (streq(cmd, "window")) {
10554 if (argc < 2) {
10555 /* \todo missing argument error */
10556 }
10557 else {
10558 window_action(argv[1]);
10559 }
10560 return;
10561 }
10562 if (streq(cmd, "zoom")) {
10563 if (argc < 2) {
10564 /* \todo missing argument error */
10565 }
10566 else {
10567 zoom_action(argv[1]);
10568 }
10569 return;
10570 }
10571
10572 /*
10573 if (streq(cmd, "blinkPrompt")) {
10574 error_action(argc-1, argv+1);
10575 return;
10576 }
10577 if (streq(cmd, "set_prompt_prefix")) {
10578 error_action(argc-1, argv+1);
10579 return;
10580 }
10581 if (streq(cmd, "append_prompt_history")) {
10582 error_action(argc-1, argv+1);
10583 return;
10584 }
10585 if (streq(cmd, "enablePromptRapidFire")) {
10586 error_action(argc-1, argv+1);
10587 return;
10588 }
10589 if (streq(cmd, "disablePromptRapidFire")) {
10590 error_action(argc-1, argv+1);
10591 return;
10592 }
10593 if (streq(cmd, "enableMoveRapidFire")) {
10594 error_action(argc-1, argv+1);
10595 return;
10596 }
10597 if (streq(cmd, "disableMoveRapidFire")) {
10598 error_action(argc-1, argv+1);
10599 return;
10600 }
10601 if (streq(cmd, "init_command")) {
10602 error_action(argc-1, argv+1);
10603 return;
10604 }
10605 if (streq(cmd, "end_command")) {
10606 error_action(argc-1, argv+1);
10607 return;
10608 }
10609 if (streq(cmd, "tip-of-the-day")) {
10610 error_action(argc-1, argv+1);
10611 return;
10612 }
10613 if (streq(cmd, "message-box")) {
10614 error_action(argc-1, argv+1);
10615 return;
10616 }
10617 if (streq(cmd, "print-area")) {
10618 error_action(argc-1, argv+1);
10619 return;
10620 }
10621 if (streq(cmd, "setBackgroundColor")) {
10622 error_action(argc-1, argv+1);
10623 return;
10624 }
10625 if (streq(cmd, "setCrossHairColor")) {
10626 error_action(argc-1, argv+1);
10627 return;
10628 }
10629 if (streq(cmd, "setGridColor")) {
10630 error_action(argc-1, argv+1);
10631 return;
10632 }
10633 if (streq(cmd, "textFont")) {
10634 error_action(argc-1, argv+1);
10635 return;
10636 }
10637 if (streq(cmd, "textSize")) {
10638 error_action(argc-1, argv+1);
10639 return;
10640 }
10641 if (streq(cmd, "textAngle")) {
10642 error_action(argc-1, argv+1);
10643 return;
10644 }
10645 if (streq(cmd, "textBold")) {
10646 error_action(argc-1, argv+1);
10647 return;
10648 }
10649 if (streq(cmd, "textItalic")) {
10650 error_action(argc-1, argv+1);
10651 return;
10652 }
10653 if (streq(cmd, "textUnderline")) {
10654 error_action(argc-1, argv+1);
10655 return;
10656 }
10657 if (streq(cmd, "textStrikeOut")) {
10658 error_action(argc-1, argv+1);
10659 return;
10660 }
10661 if (streq(cmd, "textOverline")) {
10662 error_action(argc-1, argv+1);
10663 return;
10664 }
10665 if (streq(cmd, "setTextFont")) {
10666 error_action(argc-1, argv+1);
10667 return;
10668 }
10669 if (streq(cmd, "setTextSize")) {
10670 error_action(argc-1, argv+1);
10671 return;
10672 }
10673 if (streq(cmd, "setTextAngle")) {
10674 error_action(argc-1, argv+1);
10675 return;
10676 }
10677 if (streq(cmd, "setTextBold")) {
10678 error_action(argc-1, argv+1);
10679 return;
10680 }
10681 if (streq(cmd, "setTextItalic")) {
10682 error_action(argc-1, argv+1);
10683 return;
10684 }
10685 if (streq(cmd, "setTextUnderline")) {
10686 error_action(argc-1, argv+1);
10687 return;
10688 }
10689 if (streq(cmd, "setTextStrikeOut")) {
10690 error_action(argc-1, argv+1);
10691 return;
10692 }
10693 if (streq(cmd, "setTextOverline")) {
10694 error_action(argc-1, argv+1);
10695 return;
10696 }
10697 if (streq(cmd, "previewOn")) {
10698 error_action(argc-1, argv+1);
10699 return;
10700 }
10701 if (streq(cmd, "previewOff")) {
10702 error_action(argc-1, argv+1);
10703 return;
10704 }
10705 if (streq(cmd, "allowRubber")) {
10706 error_action(argc-1, argv+1);
10707 return;
10708 }
10709 if (streq(cmd, "setRubberMode")) {
10710 error_action(argc-1, argv+1);
10711 return;
10712 }
10713 if (streq(cmd, "setRubberPoint")) {
10714 error_action(argc-1, argv+1);
10715 return;
10716 }
10717 if (streq(cmd, "setRubberText")) {
10718 error_action(argc-1, argv+1);
10719 return;
10720 }
10721 if (streq(cmd, "add_rubber")) {
10722 error_action(argc-1, argv+1);
10723 return;
10724 }
10725 if (streq(cmd, "clearRubber")) {
10726 error_action(argc-1, argv+1);
10727 return;
10728 }
10729 if (streq(cmd, "spareRubber")) {
10730 error_action(argc-1, argv+1);
10731 return;
10732 }
10733 if (streq(cmd, "addTextMulti")) {
10734 error_action(argc-1, argv+1);
10735 return;
10736 }
10737 if (streq(cmd, "addTextSingle")) {
10738 error_action(argc-1, argv+1);
10739 return;
10740 }
10741 if (streq(cmd, "addInfiniteLine")) {
10742 error_action(argc-1, argv+1);
10743 return;
10744 }
10745 if (streq(cmd, "addRay")) {
10746 error_action(argc-1, argv+1);
10747 return;
10748 }
10749 if (streq(cmd, "addLine")) {
10750 error_action(argc-1, argv+1);
10751 return;
10752 }
10753 if (streq(cmd, "addTriangle")) {
10754 error_action(argc-1, argv+1);
10755 return;
10756 }
10757 if (streq(cmd, "addRectangle")) {
10758 error_action(argc-1, argv+1);
10759 return;
10760 }

11113 return;

11117 return;
11118 }

11142 return;

11145 active_view->grid_mode = false;
11146 return;
11147 }
11148 if (streq(argv[1], "real")) {
11149 active_view->real_render = false;
11150 return;
11151 }
11152 if (streq(argv[1], "ruler")) {

11154 return;

11158 return;

11162 return;

11166 return;

11170 return;

11173 active_view->lwt_mode = false;
11174 return;
11175 }

11177 active_view->metric = false;
11178 return;
11179 }
11180 if (streq(argv[1], "text-bold")) {
11181 active_view->text_style_bold = false;
11182 return;
11183 }
11184 if (streq(argv[1], "text-italic")) {
11185 active_view->text_style_italic = false;
11186 return;
11187 }
11188 if (streq(argv[1], "text-underline")) {
11189 active_view->text_style_underline = false;
11190 return;
11191 }
11192 if (streq(argv[1], "text-overline")) {
11193 active_view->text_style_overline = false;
11194 return;
11195 }
11196 if (streq(argv[1], "text-strikeout")) {
11197 active_view->text_style_strikeout = false;
11198 return;
11199 }
11200 return;
11201 }
11202 if (streq(cmd, "toggle")) {
11203 if (argc < 2) {
11204 return;
11205 }
11206 if (n_views == 0) {
11207 return;
11208 }
11209 if (streq(argv[1], "snap")) {
11210 active_view->snap_mode = !active_view->snap_mode;
11211 return;
11212 }
11213 if (streq(argv[1], "grid")) {
11214 active_view->grid_mode = !active_view->grid_mode;
11215 return;
11216 }
11217 if (streq(argv[1], "real")) {
11218 active_view->real_render = !active_view->real_render;
11219 return;
11220 }
11221 if (streq(argv[1], "ruler")) {
11222 active_view->ruler_mode = !active_view->ruler_mode;
11229 return;
11230 }
11231 if (streq(argv[1], "ortho")) {
11232 active_view->ortho_mode = !active_view->ortho_mode;
11233 return;
11234 }
11235 if (streq(argv[1], "qsnap")) {
11236 active_view->qsnap_mode = !active_view->qsnap_mode;
11237 return;
11238 }
11239 if (streq(argv[1], "qtrack")) {
11240 /* FIXME */
11241 active_view->qsnap_mode = !active_view->qsnap_mode;
11242 return;
11243 }
11244 if (streq(argv[1], "polar")) {
11245 active_view->polar_mode = !active_view->polar_mode;
11246 return;
11247 }
11248 if (streq(argv[1], "track")) {
11249 active_view->qtrack_mode = !active_view->qtrack_mode;
11250 return;
11251 }
11252 if (streq(argv[1], "lwt")) {
11253 active_view->lwt_mode = !active_view->lwt_mode;
11254 return;
11255 }
11256 if (streq(argv[1], "metric")) {
11257 active_view->metric = !active_view->metric;
11258 return;
11259 }
11260 if (streq(argv[1], "text-bold")) {
11261 active_view->text_style_bold = !active_view->text_style_bold;
11262 return;
11263 }
11264 if (streq(argv[1], "text-italic")) {
11265 active_view->text_style_italic = !active_view->text_style_italic;
11266 return;
11267 }
11268 if (streq(argv[1], "text-underline")) {
11269 active_view->text_style_underline = !active_view->text_style_underline;
11270 return;
11271 }
11272 if (streq(argv[1], "text-overline")) {
11273 active_view->text_style_overline = !active_view->text_style_overline;
11274 return;
11275 }
11276 if (streq(argv[1], "text-strikeout")) {
11277 active_view->text_style_strikeout = !active_view->text_style_strikeout;
11278 return;
11279 }
11280 return;
11281 }
11282
11283 char msg[200];
11284 sprintf(msg, "ERROR: action %s not in function_table.", cmd);
11285 log_debug(msg);
11286}
11287
11291static void
11292arc_action(void)
11293{
11294 EmbArc arc;
11295
11296 /* Should be created based on the current view if arguments aren't supplied. */
11297 arc.start.x = 0.0;
11298 arc.start.y = 0.0;
11299 arc.mid.x = 10.0;
11300 arc.mid.y = 20.0;
11301 arc.end.x = 30.0;
11302 arc.end.y = 40.0;
11303
11304 printf("%f\n", arc.start.x);
11305 /*
11306 arc.color = getCurrentColor();
11307
11308 if (view && active_scene) {
11309 embPattern_addArc(patterns[settings.pattern_index], arc);
11310 char * name;
11311 name = "pattern" + atoi(pattern_index);
11312 name += ".arc" + atoi(patterns[settings.pattern_index]->arcs->count);
11313 rubber_points_mode[name] = OBJ_RUBBER_OFF;
11314 if (OBJ_RUBBER_OFF) {
11315 active_view->addToRubberRoom(arcObj);
11316 }
11317 }
11318
11319 embPattern_addArcAbs(views[settings.pattern_index].pattern, arc);
11320 */
11321}
11322
11328static void
11329circle_action(void)
11330{
11331 EmbCircle circle;
11332
11333 /* Defaults */
11334 circle.center.x = 10.0;
11335 circle.center.y = 10.0;
11336 circle.radius = 20.0;
11337 /* getCurrentColor */
11338
11339 /*
11340 if (argc > 1) {
11341 circle.center.x = atof(argv[0]);
11342 circle.center.y = -atof(argv[1]);
11343 if (isnan(circle.center.x)) {
11344 return;
11345 }
11346 if (isnan(circle.center.y)) {
11347 return;
11348 }
11349 }
11350 if (argc > 2) {
11351 circle.radius = atof(argv[2]);
11352 if (isnan(circle.radius)) {
11353 return;
11354 }
11355 }
11356 */
11357
11358 /* bool fill = results[3];
11359 obj->setObjectRubberMode(rubberMode);
11360 if (rubber_mode) {
11361 active_view->addToRubberRoom(obj);
11362 active_view->addItem(obj);
11363 }
11364 else {
11365 UndoableAddCommand* cmd = UndoableAddCommand(obj->data(OBJ_NAME).toString(), obj, view, 0);
11366 stack->push(cmd);
11367 }
11368 */
11369 embPattern_addCircleAbs(views[settings.pattern_index].pattern, circle);
11370}

11408static void
11409ellipse_action(void)
11410{
11411 EmbEllipse ellipse;
11412 /*
11413 double rot = atof(results[4]);
11414 bool fill = results[5];
11415
11416 OBJ_RUBBER_OFF
11417 ellipse.center.x = result[0].double_data;
11418 ellipse.center.y = result[1].double_data;
11419 ellipse.radius.x = result[2].double_data;
11420 ellipse.radius.y = result[3].double_data;
11421 embPattern_addEllipseAbs(views[settings.pattern_index].pattern, ellipse);
11422 */
11423}

11435 append_prompt_history(char *());
11436 end_command();
11437 */
11438}
11439
11443static void
11444exit_action(void)
11445{
11446 log_debug("Closing Embroidermodder 2.0.");
11447
11448 settings.running = false;
11449 /*
11450 if (settings.prompt_save_history) {
11451 prompt->saveHistory("prompt.log", settings_prompt_save_history_as_html);
11452 // \todo get filename from settings
11453 }
11454 closeAllWindows();
11455 */
11456}
11457
11463static void
11464export_action(const char *filename)
11465{
11466 if (n_views > 0) {
11467 embPattern_writeAuto(views[settings.pattern_index].pattern, filename);
11468 }
11469}
11470
11476static void
11477icon_action(int new_size)
11478{
11479 if (new_size >= 16 && new_size <= 128) {
11480 settings.icon_size = new_size;
11481 }
11482
11483 /*
11484 int iconSize;
11485 this->setIconSize(QSize(iconSize, iconSize));
11486 layerSelector->setIconSize(QSize(iconSize*4, iconSize));
11487 colorSelector->setIconSize(QSize(iconSize, iconSize));
11488 linetypeSelector->setIconSize(QSize(iconSize*4, iconSize));
11489 lineweightSelector->setIconSize(QSize(iconSize*4, iconSize));
11490 //set the minimum combobox width so the text is always readable
11491 layerSelector->setMinimumWidth(iconSize*4);
11492 colorSelector->setMinimumWidth(iconSize*2);
11493 linetypeSelector->setMinimumWidth(iconSize*4);
11494 lineweightSelector->setMinimumWidth(iconSize*4);
11495
11496 //\todo low-priority: open app with iconSize set to 128. resize the icons to a smaller size.
11497
11498 settings_general_icon_size = iconSize;
11499 */
11500}
11501
11505static void
11506new_file_action(void)
11507{
11508 views[n_views] = init_view();
11509 views[n_views].pattern = embPattern_create();
11510 settings.pattern_index = n_views;
11511 active_view = &(views[n_views]);
11512 n_views++;
11513 /*
11514 updateMenuToolbarStatusbar();
11515 windowMenuAboutToShow();
11516
11517 if (active_view != NULL) {
11518 active_view->recalculateLimits();
11519 actuator("zoom extents");
11520 }
11521 */
11522}
11523
11532static void
11533open_file_action(int argc, char argv[10][200])
11534{
11535 if (argc == 0) {
11536 settings.show_open_file_dialog = true;
11537 }
11538 else {
11539 for (int i=1; i<argc; i++) {
11540 if (n_views < 50) {
11541 views[n_views] = init_view();
11542 strcpy(views[n_views].filename, argv[i]);
11543 embPattern_readAuto(views[n_views].pattern, views[n_views].filename);
11544 settings.pattern_index = n_views;
11545 active_view = &(views[n_views]);
11546 n_views++;
11547 }
11548 else {
11549 }
11550 }
11551 }
11552 /*
11553 log_debug("openFile()");
11554
11555 char *List files;
11556 bool preview = settings_opensave_open_thumbnail;
11557 openFilesPath = settings_opensave_recent_directory;
11558
11559 // Check to see if this from the recent files list
11560 if (recent) {
11561 files.append(recentFile);
11562 openFilesSelected(files);
11563 }
11564 else {
11565 if (!preview) {
11566 \todo set getOpenFileNames' selectedFilter parameter from settings_opensave_open_format");
11567 files = QFileDialog_getOpenFileNames(translate("Open"), openFilesPath, formatFilterOpen);
11568 openFilesSelected(files);
11569 }
11570 else {
11571 PreviewDialog* openDialog = PreviewDialog(translate("Open w/Preview"), openFilesPath, formatFilterOpen);
11572 \todo set openDialog->selectNameFilter(const char * filter) from settings_opensave_open_format");
11573 connect(openDialog, filesSelected(const char *List&), openFilesSelected(const char *List&)));
11574 openDialog->exec();
11575 }
11576 }
11577
11578 openFileSelected
11579
11580 bool doOnce = true;
11581
11582 if (filesToOpen.count()) {
11583 for (int i = 0; i < filesToOpen.count(); i++) {
11584 if (!validFileFormat(filesToOpen[i])) {
11585 continue;
11586 }
11587
11588 SubView* existing = findView(filesToOpen[i]);
11589 if (existing) {
11590 active_view->setActiveSubWindow(existing);
11591 continue;
11592 }
11593
11594 //The docIndex doesn't need increased as it is only used for unnamed files
11595 numOfDocs++;
11596 View* mdiWin = View(docIndex, mainWin, mdiArea, SubWindow);
11597 connect(mdiWin, sendCloseMdiWin(View*), onCloseMdiWin(View*)));
11598 connect(mdiArea, subWindowActivated(SubView*), onWindowActivated(SubView*)));
11599
11600 //Make sure the toolbars/etc... are shown before doing their zoomExtents
11601 if (doOnce) { updateMenuToolbarStatusbar(); doOnce = false; }
11602
11603 if (mdiWin->loadFile(filesToOpen.at(i))) {
11604 statusbar_showMessage(translate("File(s) loaded"), 2000);
11605 mdiWin->show();
11606 mdiWin->showMaximized();
11607 //Prevent duplicate entries in the recent files list
11608 if (!settings_opensave_recent_list_of_files.contains(filesToOpen.at(i), CaseInsensitive))
11609 {
11610 settings_opensave_recent_list_of_files.prepend(filesToOpen.at(i));
11611 }
11612 //Move the recent file to the top of the list
11613 else
11614 {
11615 settings_opensave_recent_list_of_files.removeAll(filesToOpen.at(i));
11616 settings_opensave_recent_list_of_files.prepend(filesToOpen.at(i));
11617 }
11618 settings_opensave_recent_directory = QFileInfo(filesToOpen.at(i)).absolutePath();
11619
11620 if (active_view) {
11621 active_view->recalculateLimits();
11622 actuator("zoom extents");
11623 }
11624 }
11625 else {
11626 mdiWin->close();
11627 }
11628 }
11629 }
11630
11631 windowMenuAboutToShow();
11632
11633 log_debug("View loadFile()");
11634
11635 unsigned int tmpColor = getCurrentColor();
11636
11637 QFile file(fileName);
11638 if (!file.open(QFile_ReadOnly | QFile_Text)) {
11639 warning_messagebox(translate("Error reading file"),
11640 translate("Cannot read file %1:\n%2.")
11641 .arg(fileName)
11642 .arg(file.errorString()));
11643 return false;
11644 }
11645
11646 char * ext = fileExtension(fileName);
11647 log_debug("ext: %s", ext));
11648
11649 //Read
11650 EmbPattern* p = embPattern_create();
11651 if (!p) {
11652 printf("Could not allocate memory for embroidery pattern\n");
11653 exit(1);
11654 }
11655 int readSuccessful = 0;
11656 char * readError;
11657 int reader = emb_identify_format(fileName));
11658 if (reader < 0) {
11659 readSuccessful = 0;
11660 readError = "Unsupported read file type: " + fileName;
11661 log_debug("Unsupported read file type: " + fileName.toStdString());
11662 }
11663 else {
11664 readSuccessful = embPattern_read(p, fileName), reader);
11665 if (!readSuccessful) {
11666 readError = "Reading file was unsuccessful: " + fileName;
11667 log_debug("Reading file was unsuccessful: " + fileName.toStdString());
11668 }
11669 }
11670 if (!readSuccessful) {
11671 messagebox(MSG_WARNING, translate("Error reading pattern"), translate(readError)));
11672 messagebox(MSG_WARNING, translate("Error reading pattern"), translate("Cannot read pattern"));
11673 }
11674 else {
11675 \todo test embPattern_moveStitchListToPolylines more.
11676 embPattern_moveStitchListToPolylines(p);
11677 int stitchCount = p->stitchList->count;
11678 EmbPath path;
11679
11680
11681 setCurrentFile(fileName);
11682 statusbar_showMessage("File loaded.");
11683 char * stitches;
11684 stitches.setNum(stitchCount);
11685
11686 if (settings_grid_load_from_file) {
11687 \todo Josh, provide me a hoop size and/or grid spacing from the pattern.
11688 }
11689 }
11690 embPattern_free(p);
11691
11692 //Clear the undo stack so it is not possible to undo past this point.
11693 gview->undo_stack->clear();
11694
11695 setCurrentColor(tmpColor);
11696
11697 fileWasLoaded = true;
11698 setUndoCleanIcon(fileWasLoaded);
11699 return fileWasLoaded;
11700 */
11701}
11702
11706static void
11707redo_action(void)
11708{
11709 /*
11710 char * prefix = prompt->getPrefix();
11711 if (dockUndoEdit->canRedo()) {
11712 prompt->setPrefix("Redo " + dockUndoEdit->redoText());
11713 prompt->appendHistory(char *());
11714 dockUndoEdit->redo();
11715 prompt->setPrefix(prefix);
11716 }
11717 else {
11718 prompt->alert("Nothing to redo");
11719 prompt->setPrefix(prefix);
11720 }
11721 */
11722}
11723
11731static void
11732pan_action(const char *mode)
11733{
11734 if (streq(mode, "realtime")) {
11735 /* active_view->panningRealTimeActive = true; */
11736 return;
11737 }
11738 if (streq(mode, "point")) {
11739 /* active_view->panningPointActive = true; */
11740 return;
11741 }
11742 if (streq(mode, "left")) {
11743 active_view->origin.x += active_view->scale;
11744 /*
11745 horizontalscrollbar()->setValue(horizontalscrollbar()->value() + panDistance);
11746 updateMouseCoords(viewMousePoint);
11747 */
11748 return;
11749 }
11750 if (streq(mode, "right")) {
11751 active_view->origin.x -= active_view->scale;
11752 /*
11753 horizontalscrollbar()->setValue(horizontalscrollbar()->value() - panDistance);
11754 updateMouseCoords(viewMousePoint);
11755 */
11756 return;
11757 }
11758 if (streq(mode, "up")) {
11759 active_view->origin.y += active_view->scale;
11760 /*
11761 verticalscrollbar()->setValue(verticalscrollbar()->value() + panDistance);
11762 updateMouseCoords(viewMousePoint);
11763 */
11764 return;
11765 }
11766 if (streq(mode, "down")) {
11767 active_view->origin.y -= active_view->scale;
11768 /*
11769 verticalscrollbar()->setValue(verticalscrollbar()->value() - panDistance);
11770 updateMouseCoords(viewMousePoint);
11771 */
11772 return;
11773 }
11774}
11775
11779static void
11780paste_action(void)
11781{
11782
11783}
11784
11788static void
11789print_action(void)
11790{
11791 if (active_view == NULL) {
11792 return;
11793 }
11794
11795 log_debug("print()");
11796 /*
11797 QPrintDialog dialog(&printer, this);
11798 if (dialog.exec() == QDialog_Accepted) {
11799 QPainter painter(&printer);
11800 if (settings_printing_disable_bg) {
11801 //Save current bg
11802 QBrush brush = gview->backgroundBrush();
11803 //Save ink by not printing the bg at all
11804 gview->setBackgroundBrush(NoBrush);
11805 //Print, fitting the viewport contents into a full page
11806 gview->render(&painter);
11807 //Restore the bg
11808 gview->setBackgroundBrush(brush);
11809 }
11810 else {
11811 //Print, fitting the viewport contents into a full page
11812 gview->render(&painter);
11813 }
11814 }
11815 */
11816}
11817
11823static void
11824rectangle_action(void)
11825{
11826 /*
11827 EmbRect rect;
11828 rect.top = results[0].double_data;
11829 rect.bottom = results[1].double_data;
11830 rect.left = results[2].double_data;
11831 rect.right = results[3].double_data;
11832 printf("%f", rect.top);
11833 double rot = results[4].double_data;
11834 bool fill = results[5].toBool();
11835
11836 addRectangle(x, y, w, h, rot, fill, OBJ_RUBBER_OFF);
11837
11838 if (active_view == NULL) {
11839 return;
11840 }
11841
11842 RectObject* obj = RectObject(x, -y, w, -h, getCurrentColor());
11843 obj->setRotation(-rot);
11844 obj->setObjectRubberMode(rubberMode);
11845 if (rubberMode) {
11846 active_view->addToRubberRoom(obj);
11847 active_view->addItem(obj);
11848 }
11849 else {
11850 UndoableAddCommand* cmd = UndoableAddCommand(obj->data(OBJ_NAME).toString(), obj, view, 0);
11851 stack->push(cmd);
11852 }
11853 */
11854}

11866 /*

11868 file = QFileDialog_getSaveFileName(translate("Save As"), openFilesPath, formatFilterSave);
11869 */
11870 }
11871}

11957static void
11958window_action(const char *arg)
11959{
11960 if (streq(arg, "cascade")) {
11961 /* window_cascade_action(argc-1, argv+1); */
11962 return;
11963 }
11964 if (streq(arg, "tile")) {
11965 /* window_tile_action(argc-1, argv+1); */
11966 return;
11967 }
11968 if (streq(arg, "cascade")) {
11969 /* error_action(argc-1, argv+1); */
11970 return;
11971 }
11972 if (streq(arg, "tile")) {
11973 /* error_action(argc-1, argv+1); */
11974 return;
11975 }
11976 if (streq(arg, "close")) {
11977 /* error_action(argc-1, argv+1); */
11978 return;
11979 }
11980 if (streq(arg, "closeall")) {
11981 /* error_action(argc-1, argv+1); */
11982 return;
11983 }
11984 if (streq(arg, "next")) {
11985 /* error_action(argc-1, argv+1); */
11986 return;
11987 }
11988 if (streq(arg, "previous")) {
11989 /* error_action(argc-1, argv+1); */
11990 return;
11991 }
11992}
11993
11999static void
12000zoom_action(const char *arg)
12001{
12002 if (active_view == NULL) {
12003 return;
12004 }
12005
12006 if (streq(arg, "in")) {
12007 active_view->scale *= 2.0;
12008 /*
12009 if (!allowZoomIn()) {
12010 return;
12011 }
12012 EmbVector cntr = map_to_scene(EmbVector(width()/2,height()/2));
12013 scale(settings_display_zoomscale_in, settings_display_zoomscale_in);
12014
12015 centerOn(cntr);
12016 */
12017 return;
12018 }
12019 if (streq(arg, "out")) {
12020 active_view->scale /= 2.0;
12021
12022 /*
12023 if (!allowZoomOut()) {
12024 return;
12025 }
12026 EmbVector cntr = map_to_scene(EmbVector(width()/2,height()/2));
12027 scale(settings_display_zoomscale_out, settings_display_zoomscale_out);
12028
12029 centerOn(cntr);
12030 */
12031 return;
12032 }
12033 if (streq(arg, "all")) {
12034 log_debug("zoom all");
12035 /*
12036 stub_implement("Implement zoomAll.");
12037 */
12038 return;
12039 }
12040 if (streq(arg, "window")) {
12041 log_debug("zoom window");
12042 /*
12043 active_view->zoomWindowActive = true;
12044 active_view->selectingActive = false;
12045 */
12046 clear_selection();
12047 return;
12048 }
12049 if (streq(arg, "center")) {
12050 log_debug("zoom center");
12054 return;
12055 }
12056 if (streq(arg, "dynamic")) {
12057 log_debug("zoom dynamic");
12061 return;
12062 }
12063 if (streq(arg, "extents")) {
12064 log_debug("zoom extents");
12065 /*
12066 EmbRect extents = active_view->itemsBoundingRect();
12067 if (extents.isNull()) {
12068 extents.setWidth(settings.grid_size_x);
12069 extents.setHeight(settings.grid_size_y);
12070 extents.moveCenter(EmbVector(0,0));
12071 }
12072 fitInView(extents, KeepAspectRatio);
12073
12074 active_view->undo_stack;
12075 UndoableNavCommand* cmd = UndoableNavCommand("ZoomExtents", view, 0);
12076 stack->push(cmd);
12077 */
12078 return;
12079 }
12080 if (streq(arg, "previous")) {
12081 log_debug("zoom previous");
12085 return;
12086 }
12087 if (streq(arg, "realtime")) {
12088 log_debug("zoomRealtime()");
12092 return;
12093 }
12094 if (streq(arg, "scale")) {
12095 log_debug("zoomScale()");
12099 return;
12100 }
12101 if (streq(arg, "selected")) {
12102 log_debug("zoomSelected()");
12103 /*
12104 QUndoStack* stack = active_view->undo_stack;
12105 UndoableNavCommand* cmd = UndoableNavCommand("ZoomSelected", active_view, 0);
12106 stack->push(cmd);
12107 */
12108 return;
12109 }
12110}

12116 * DisableMoveRapidFire();

12131 log_debug("messageBox(): first argument must be \"critical\", \"information\", \"question\" or \"warning\".");
12132 }
12133
12134 MessageBox(type, title, text);
12135 */
12136}

12214static void
12215preview_on_action(void)
12216{
12217 /*
12218 char * cloneStr = results[0).toString().toUpper();
12219 char * modeStr = results[1).toString().toUpper();
12220 EmbReal x = results[2];
12221 EmbReal y = results[3];
12222 EmbReal data = results[4];
12223
12224 int clone = PREVIEW_CLONE_NULL;
12225 int mode = PREVIEW_MODE_NULL;
12226 if (cloneStr == "SELECTED") { clone = PREVIEW_CLONE_SELECTED; }
12227 else if (cloneStr == "RUBBER") { clone = PREVIEW_CLONE_RUBBER; }
12228 else { log_debug("previewOn(): first argument must be \"SELECTED\" or \"RUBBER\"."); }
12229
12230 if (modeStr == "MOVE") { mode = preview.MODE_MOVE; }
12231 else if (modeStr == "ROTATE") { mode = preview.MODE_ROTATE; }
12232 else if (modeStr == "SCALE") { mode = preview.MODE_SCALE; }
12233 else { log_debug("previewOn(): second argument must be \"MOVE\", \"ROTATE\" or \"SCALE\"."); }
12234
12235 PreviewOn(clone, mode, x, y, data);
12236 */
12237}
12238
12245static void
12246set_rubber_mode_action(char *label, int mode)
12247{
12248 if (active_view == NULL) {
12249 return;
12250 }
12251 switch (mode) {
12252 case CIRCLE_MODE_1P_RAD:
12253 active_view->rubber_mode = OBJ_RUBBER_CIRCLE_1P_RAD;
12254 break;
12255 /*
12256 case CIRCLE_1P_DIA:
12257 active_view->rubber_mode = OBJ_RUBBER_CIRCLE_1P_DIA;
12258 break;
12259 case CIRCLE_2P:
12260 active_view->rubber_mode = OBJ_RUBBER_CIRCLE_2P;
12261 break;
12262 case CIRCLE_3P:
12263 active_view->rubber_mode = OBJ_RUBBER_CIRCLE_3P;
12264 break;
12265 case CIRCLE_TTR:
12266 active_view->rubber_mode = OBJ_RUBBER_CIRCLE_TTR;
12267 break;
12268 case CIRCLE_TTT:
12269 active_view->rubber_mode = OBJ_RUBBER_CIRCLE_TTT;
12270 break;
12271 case DIM_LEADER_LINE:
12272 active_view->rubber_mode = OBJ_RUBBER_DIMLEADER_LINE;
12273 break;
12274 case ELLIPSE_LINE:
12275 active_view->rubber_mode = OBJ_RUBBER_ELLIPSE_LINE;
12276 break;
12277 case ELLIPSE_MAJORDIAMETER_MINORRADIUS:
12278 active_view->rubber_mode = OBJ_RUBBER_ELLIPSE_MAJORDIAMETER_MINORRADIUS;
12279 break;
12280 case ELLIPSE_MAJORRADIUS_MINORRADIUS:
12281 active_view->rubber_mode = OBJ_RUBBER_ELLIPSE_MAJORRADIUS_MINORRADIUS;
12282 break;
12283 case ELLIPSE_ROTATION:
12284 active_view->rubber_mode = OBJ_RUBBER_ELLIPSE_ROTATION;
12285 break;
12286 case LINE:
12287 active_view->rubber_mode = OBJ_RUBBER_LINE;
12288 break;
12289 case POLYGON:
12290 active_view->rubber_mode = OBJ_RUBBER_POLYGON;
12291 break;
12292 case POLYGON_INSCRIBE:
12293 active_view->rubber_mode = OBJ_RUBBER_POLYGON_INSCRIBE;
12294 break;
12295 case POLYGON_CIRCUMSCRIBE:
12296 active_view->rubber_mode = OBJ_RUBBER_POLYGON_CIRCUMSCRIBE;
12297 break;
12298 case POLYLINE:
12299 active_view->rubber_mode = OBJ_RUBBER_POLYLINE;
12300 break;
12301 case RECTANGLE:
12302 active_view->rubber_mode = OBJ_RUBBER_RECTANGLE;
12303 break;
12304 case TEXTSINGLE:
12305 active_view->rubber_mode = OBJ_RUBBER_TEXTSINGLE;
12306 break;
12307 */
12308 default:
12309 log_debug("Unknown rubber_mode value.");
12310 active_view->rubber_mode = OBJ_RUBBER_OFF;
12311 break;
12312 }
12313}

12481spare_rubber_action(void)

12487 spareRubber(SPARE_RUBBER_PATH);

12490 spareRubber(SPARE_RUBBER_POLYGON);
12491 }

12494 }
12495 else {

12497 long int id = objID.toLongLong(&ok);
12498 if (!ok) return log_debug("spareRubber(): error converting object ID into an int64");

12500 }
12501 */
