12561
12565static void
12566line_action(void)
12567{
12568 /*
12569 EmbReal x1 = results[0];
12570 EmbReal y1 = results[1];
12571 EmbReal x2 = results[2];
12572 EmbReal y2 = results[3];
12573 EmbReal rot = results[4];
12574
12575 embPattern_addLine(x1, y1, x2, y2, rot, OBJ_RUBBER_OFF);
12576 */
12577}
12578
12582static void
12583rounded_rectangle_action(void)
12584{
12585 /*
12586 EmbReal x = atof(results[0]);
12587 EmbReal y = atof(results[1]);
12588 EmbReal w = results[2].toNumber();
12589 EmbReal h = results[3].toNumber();
12590 EmbReal rad = results[4].toNumber();
12591 EmbReal rot = results[5].toNumber();
12592 bool fill = results[6].toBool();
12593
12594 addRoundedRectangle(x, y, w, h, rad, rot, fill);
12595 */
12596}
12597
12605static void
12606add_slot_action(void)
12607{
12608 int rubberMode = OBJ_RUBBER_OFF;
12609 /*
12610 EmbReal centerX = results[0];
12611 EmbReal centerY = results[1];
12612 EmbReal diameter = results[2];
12613 EmbReal length = results[3];
12614 EmbReal rot = results[4];
12615 bool fill = results[5];
12616
12617 SlotObject* slotObj = SlotObject(centerX, -centerY, diameter, length, getCurrentColor());
12618 slotObj->setRotation(-rot);
12619 slotObj->setObjectRubberMode(rubberMode);
12620 if (rubberMode) active_view->addToRubberRoom(slotObj);
12621 scene->addItem(slotObj);
12622 scene->update();
12623 */
12624}
12625
12629static void
12630add_point_action(void)
12631{
12632 /*
12633 EmbReal x = atof(results[0]);
12634 EmbReal y = atof(results[1]);
12635
12636 addPoint(x, y);
12637 */
12638}
12639
12645static void
12646polygon_action(void)
12647{
12648 /*
12649 QVariantList varList = results[0).toVariant().toList();
12650 int varSize = varList.size();
12651 */
12652 int varSize = 10;
12653 if (varSize < 2) {
12654 log_debug("addPolygon(): array must contain at least two elements");
12655 return;
12656 }
12657 if (varSize % 2) {
12658 log_debug("addPolygon(): array cannot contain an odd number of elements");
12659 return;
12660 }
12661
12662 bool lineTo = false;
12663 bool xCoord = true;
12664 EmbVector position = {0.0, 0.0};
12665 EmbVector start = {0.0, 0.0};
12666 EmbPath *path = NULL;
12667 int rubberMode = OBJ_RUBBER_OFF;
12668 /*
12669 for (QVariant var : varList) {
12670 if (var.canConvert(QVariant_Double)) {
12671 if (xCoord) {
12672 xCoord = false;
12673 x = var.toReal();
12674 }
12675 else {
12676 xCoord = true;
12677 y = -var.toReal();
12678
12679 if (lineTo) { path.lineTo(x,y); }
12680 else { path.moveTo(x,y); lineTo = true; startX = x; startY = y; }
12681 }
12682 }
12683 else {
12684 log_debug("addPolygon(): array contains one or more invalid elements");
12685 return;
12686 }
12687 }
12688 */
12689 /* Close the polygon */
12690 /*
12691 path.closeSubpath();
12692
12693 path.translate(-startX, -startY);
12694
12695 embPattern_addPolygon(startX, startY, path, OBJ_RUBBER_OFF);
12696
12697 ---------------------------------------------------
12698
12699 QGraphicsScene* active_view = active_view->scene();
12700 QUndoStack* stack = active_view->undo_stack;
12701 EmbPolygon* obj = EmbPolygon(startX, startY, p, getCurrentColor());
12702 obj->setObjectRubberMode(rubberMode);
12703 if (rubberMode) {
12704 active_view->addToRubberRoom(obj);
12705 active_view->addItem(obj);
12706 }
12707 else {
12708 UndoableAddCommand* cmd = UndoableAddCommand(obj->data(OBJ_NAME).toString(), obj, view, 0);
12709 stack->push(cmd);
12710 }
12711 */
12712}
12713
12725static void
12726polyline_action(EmbVector start, EmbPath *p, int rubberMode)
12727{
12728 /*
12729 QGraphicsScene* active_view = active_view->scene();
12730 QUndoStack* stack = active_view->undo_stack;
12731 if (view && active_view && stack) {
12732 PolylineObject* obj = PolylineObject(startX, startY, p, getCurrentColor());
12733 obj->setObjectRubberMode(rubberMode);
12734 if (rubberMode) {
12735 active_view->addToRubberRoom(obj);
12736 active_view->addItem(obj);
12737 }
12738 else {
12739 UndoableAddCommand* cmd = UndoableAddCommand(obj->data(OBJ_NAME).toString(), obj, view, 0);
12740 stack->push(cmd);
12741 }
12742 }
12743 if (argc < 1)
12744 log_debug("addPolyline() requires one argument");
12745 if (!results[0).isArray())
12746 return log_debug("addPolyline(): first argument is not an array");
12747
12748 QVariantList varList = results[0).toVariant().toList();
12749 int varSize = varList.size();
12750 if (varSize < 2) return log_debug("addPolyline(): array must contain at least two elements");
12751 if (varSize % 2) return log_debug("addPolyline(): array cannot contain an odd number of elements");
12752 */
12753
12754 bool lineTo = false;
12755 bool xCoord = true;
12756 EmbVector position = {0.0f, 0.0f};
12757 EmbPath *path = NULL;
12758 /*
12759 for (QVariant var, varList) {
12760 if (var.canConvert(QVariant_Double)) {
12761 if (xCoord) {
12762 xCoord = false;
12763 x = var.toReal();
12764 }
12765 else {
12766 xCoord = true;
12767 y = -var.toReal();
12768
12769 if (lineTo) { path.lineTo(x,y); }
12770 else { path.moveTo(x,y); lineTo = true; startX = x; startY = y; }
12771 }
12772 }
12773 else
12774 return log_debug("addPolyline(): array contains one or more invalid elements");
12775 }
12776
12777 path.translate(-startX, -startY);
12778
12779 addPolyline(startX, startY, path, OBJ_RUBBER_OFF);
12780 */
12781}
12782
12790static void
12791set_cursor_shape_action(int shape)
12792{
12793 /* Get view here */
12794
12795 switch (shape) {
12796 case 0:
12797 break;
12798 default:
12799 break;
12800 }
12801
12802 /*
12803 char * shape = str.toLower();
12804 if (shape == "arrow")
12805 active_view->setCursor(QCursor(ArrowCursor));
12806 else if (shape == "uparrow")
12807 active_view->setCursor(QCursor(UpArrowCursor));
12808 else if (shape == "cross")
12809 active_view->setCursor(QCursor(CrossCursor));
12810 else if (shape == "wait")
12811 active_view->setCursor(QCursor(WaitCursor));
12812 else if (shape == "ibeam")
12813 active_view->setCursor(QCursor(IBeamCursor));
12814 else if (shape == "resizevert")
12815 active_view->setCursor(QCursor(SizeVerCursor));
12816 else if (shape == "resizehoriz")
12817 active_view->setCursor(QCursor(SizeHorCursor));
12818 else if (shape == "resizediagleft")
12819 active_view->setCursor(QCursor(SizeBDiagCursor));
12820 else if (shape == "resizediagright")
12821 active_view->setCursor(QCursor(SizeFDiagCursor));
12822 else if (shape == "move")
12823 active_view->setCursor(QCursor(SizeAllCursor));
12824 else if (shape == "blank")
12825 active_view->setCursor(QCursor(BlankCursor));
12826 else if (shape == "splitvert")
12827 active_view->setCursor(QCursor(SplitVCursor));
12828 else if (shape == "splithoriz")
12829 active_view->setCursor(QCursor(SplitHCursor));
12830 else if (shape == "handpointing")
12831 active_view->setCursor(QCursor(PointingHandCursor));
12832 else if (shape == "forbidden")
12833 active_view->setCursor(QCursor(ForbiddenCursor));
12834 else if (shape == "handopen")
12835 active_view->setCursor(QCursor(OpenHandCursor));
12836 else if (shape == "handclosed")
12837 active_view->setCursor(QCursor(ClosedHandCursor));
12838 else if (shape == "whatsthis")
12839 active_view->setCursor(QCursor(WhatsThisCursor));
12840 else if (shape == "busy")
12841 active_view->setCursor(QCursor(BusyCursor));
12842 else if (shape == "dragmove")
12843 active_view->setCursor(QCursor(DragMoveCursor));
12844 else if (shape == "dragcopy")
12845 active_view->setCursor(QCursor(DragCopyCursor));
12846 else if (shape == "draglink")
12847 active_view->setCursor(QCursor(DragLinkCursor));
12848 */
12849}
12850
12856static void
12857calculate_angle_action(void)
12858{
12859 /*
12860 EmbReal x1 = results[0];
12861 EmbReal y1 = results[1];
12862 EmbReal x2 = results[2];
12863 EmbReal y2 = results[3];
12864
12865 output = embVector_angle(x1, y1, x2, y2);
12866 */
12867}
12868
12874static void
12875calculate_distance_action(void)
12876{
12877 /*
12878 EmbLine line;
12879 line.start.x = results[0];
12880 line.start.y = results[1];
12881 line.end.x = results[2];
12882 line.end.y = results[3];
12883
12884 return embVector_length(embLine_vector(line));
12885 */
12886}
12887
12895EmbReal
12896embVector_perpendicularDistance(EmbVector p, EmbLine line)
12897{
12898 EmbVector direction = embVector_subtract(line.end, line.start);
12899 EmbReal length = embVector_length(direction);
12900 EmbVector p_start = embVector_subtract(line.start, p);
12901 EmbReal v = embVector_cross(direction, p_start);
12902 return v / length;
12903}

13603static void
13604messagebox(int type, char title[200], char text[200])
13605{
13606 switch (type) {
13607 default:
13608 case MSG_CRITICAL:
13609 /* critical_messagebox(translate(title), translate(text)); */
13610 break;
13611 case MSG_INFORMATION:
13612 /* information_messagebox(translate(title), translate(text)); */
13613 break;
13614 case MSG_QUESTION:
13615 /* messagebox_question(translate(title), translate(text)); */
13616 break;
13617 case MSG_WARNING:
13618 /* messagebox_warning(translate(title), translate(text)); */
13619 break;
13620 }
13621}
13622
13633static void
13634PrintArea(EmbReal x, EmbReal y, EmbReal w, EmbReal h)
13635{
13636 EmbRect rect;
13637 rect.top = y;
13638 rect.left = x;
13639 rect.bottom = y+h;
13640 rect.right = x+w;
13641 char msg[200];
13642 sprintf(msg, "PrintArea(%.2f, %.2f, %.2f, %.2f)", x, y, w, h);
13643 log_debug(msg);
13644 /* print(); */
13645}

13655setBackgroundColor_(int r, int g, int b)
13656{

13659 color.g = g;
13660 color.b = b;
13661 settings.display_bg_color = embColor_to_int(color, 255);
13662 /* updateAllViewBackgroundColors(color); */
13663}

13700
13704static void
13705vulcanize_action(void)

13786 active_view->addToRubberRoom(obj);
13787 active_view->addItem(obj);
13788 }
13789 else {

13791 stack->push(cmd);
13792 }

13805static void
13806add_infinite_line(EmbReal x1, EmbReal y1, EmbReal x2, EmbReal y2, EmbReal rot)
13807{
13808 EmbVector v1, v2;
13809 v1.x = x1;
13810 v1.y = y1;
13811 v2.x = x2;
13812 v2.y = y2;
13813}
13814
13824static void
13825add_ray(EmbReal x1, EmbReal y1, EmbReal x2, EmbReal y2, EmbReal rot)
13826{
13827 EmbVector v1, v2;
13828 v1.x = x1;
13829 v1.y = y1;
13830 v2.x = x2;
13831 v2.y = y2;
13832}

13862
13874static void
13875add_ellipse(EmbReal centerX, EmbReal centerY, EmbReal width, EmbReal height, EmbReal rot, bool fill, int rubberMode)
13876{
13877 EmbEllipse ellipse;
13878 ellipse.center.x = centerX;
13879 ellipse.center.y = centerY;
13880 ellipse.radius.x = width;
13881 ellipse.radius.y = height;
13882 /* FIXME: To silence the unused variable warning. */
13883 printf("%d %f", active_view->metric, ellipse.center.x);
13884 printf("%f %d %d\n", rot, fill, rubberMode);
13885 /*
13886 QGraphicsScene* active_view = active_view->scene();
13887 QUndoStack* stack = active_view->undo_stack;
13888
13889 EmbEllipse* obj = EmbEllipse(centerX, -centerY, width, height, getCurrentColor());
13890 obj->setRotation(-rot);
13891 obj->setObjectRubberMode(rubberMode);
13892 //\todo ellipse fill
13893 if (rubberMode) {
13894 active_view->addToRubberRoom(obj);
13895 active_view->addItem(obj);
13896 }
13897 else {
13898 UndoableAddCommand* cmd = UndoableAddCommand(obj->data(OBJ_NAME).toString(), obj, view, 0);
13899 stack->push(cmd);
13900 }
13901 */
13902}

13925
13939static void
13940add_regular_polygon(EmbReal centerX, EmbReal centerY, int sides, int mode, EmbReal rad, EmbReal rot, bool fill)
13941{
13942 char msg[200];
13943 printf("%d", active_view->metric);
13944 sprintf(msg, "use add_regular_polygon variables: %f %f %d %d %f %f %d", centerX, centerY, sides, mode, rad, rot, fill);
13945 log_debug(msg);
13946}

13957path_action(EmbReal startX, EmbReal startY, EmbPath *p, int rubberMode)
13958{
13959 EmbVector start;
13960 start.x = startX;
13961 start.y = startY;
13962 printf("%f %d %d", start.x, p->pointList->count, rubberMode);
13963}

13993
13999static void
14000dim_leader_action(void)
14001{
14002 /*
14003 int rubberMode
14004 EmbReal x1 = results[0];
14005 EmbReal y1 = results[1];
14006 EmbReal x2 = results[2];
14007 EmbReal y2 = results[3];
14008 EmbReal rot = results[4];
14009
14010 embPattern_addDimLeader(x1, y1, x2, y2, rot, OBJ_RUBBER_OFF);
14011
14012 QGraphicsScene* active_view = active_view->scene();
14013 QUndoStack* stack = active_view->undo_stack;
14014 if (active_view != NULL) {
14015 EmbDimLeader* obj = EmbDimLeader(x1, -y1, x2, -y2, getCurrentColor());
14016 obj->setRotation(-rot);
14017 obj->setObjectRubberMode(rubberMode);
14018 if (rubberMode) {
14019 active_view->addToRubberRoom(obj);
14020 active_view->addItem(obj);
14021 }
14022 else {
14023 UndoableAddCommand* cmd = UndoableAddCommand(obj->data(OBJ_NAME).toString(), obj, view, 0);
14024 stack->push(cmd);
14025 }
14026 }
14027 */
14028}
14029
14041EmbReal
14042calculate_angle(EmbReal x1, EmbReal y1, EmbReal x2, EmbReal y2)
14043{
14044 EmbLine line;
14045 line.start.x = x1;
14046 line.start.y = y1;
14047 line.end.x = x2;
14048 line.end.y = y2;
14049 printf("%f", line.start.x);
14050 /*
14051 return embLine_angle(line);
14052 */
14053 return 0.0;
14054}
14055
14063EmbReal
14064perpendicular_distance(EmbVector p, EmbLine line)
14065{
14066 EmbVector iPoint;
14067 EmbVector norm;
14068 EmbVector delta = embVector_subtract(p, line.start);
14069 /*
14070 norm = embLine_normal(line);
14071 norm = embVector_add(norm, delta);
14072 norm.intersects(line, &iPoint);
14073 return embVector_distance(p, iPoint);
14074 */
14075 return 0.0;
14076}
14077
14090static void
14091createAllActions(void)
14092{
14093 log_debug("Creating All Actions...");
14094 /*
14095 for (int i=0; action_list[i].action>=0; i++) {
14096 char * icon = action_list[i].command;
14097 char * toolTip = translate(action_list[i].menu_label);
14098 char * statusTip = translate(action_list[i].description);
14099 QAction *ACTION = QAction(load_icon(icon), toolTip, this);
14100 ACTION->setStatusTip(statusTip);
14101 ACTION->setObjectName(icon);
14102 ACTION->setWhatsThis(statusTip);
14103
14104 if (icon == "textbold") {
14105 ACTION->setCheckable(true);
14106 connect(ACTION, toggled(bool), setTextBold(bool)));
14107 }
14108 else if (icon == "textitalic") {
14109 ACTION->setCheckable(true);
14110 connect(ACTION, toggled(bool), setTextItalic(bool)));
14111 }
14112 else if (icon == "textunderline") {
14113 ACTION->setCheckable(true);
14114 connect(ACTION, toggled(bool), setTextUnderline(bool)));
14115 }
14116 else if (icon == "textstrikeout") {
14117 ACTION->setCheckable(true);
14118 connect(ACTION, toggled(bool), setTextStrikeOut(bool)));
14119 }
14120 else if (icon == "textoverline") {
14121 ACTION->setCheckable(true);
14122 connect(ACTION, toggled(bool), setTextOverline(bool)));
14123 }
14124 else {
14125 connect(ACTION, &QAction_triggered, [=](){
14126 actuator(ACTION->objectName().toStdString());
14127 });
14128 }
14129
14130 if (icon == "new") {
14131 ACTION->setShortcut(QKeySequence_New);
14132 }
14133 else if (icon == "open") {
14134 ACTION->setShortcut(QKeySequence_Open);
14135 }
14136 else if (icon == "save") {
14137 ACTION->setShortcut(QKeySequence_Save);
14138 }
14139 else if (icon == "saveas") {
14140 ACTION->setShortcut(QKeySequence_SaveAs);
14141 }
14142 else if (icon == "print") {
14143 ACTION->setShortcut(QKeySequence_Print);
14144 }
14145 else if (icon == "designdetails") {
14146 ACTION->setShortcut(QKeySequence("Ctrl+D"));
14147 }
14148 else if (icon == "exit") {
14149 ACTION->setShortcut(QKeySequence("Ctrl+Q"));
14150 }
14151 else if (icon == "cut") {
14152 ACTION->setShortcut(QKeySequence_Cut);
14153 }
14154 else if (icon == "copy") {
14155 ACTION->setShortcut(QKeySequence_Copy);
14156 }
14157 else if (icon == "paste") {
14158 ACTION->setShortcut(QKeySequence_Paste);
14159 }
14160 else if (icon == "windowclose") {
14161 ACTION->setShortcut(QKeySequence_Close);
14162 }
14163 else if (icon == "windownext") {
14164 ACTION->setShortcut(QKeySequence_NextChild);
14165 }
14166 else if (icon == "windowprevious") {
14167 ACTION->setShortcut(QKeySequence_PreviousChild);
14168 }
14169 actionHash.insert(action_list[i].action, ACTION);
14170 }
14171
14172 actionHash.value(ACTION_windowclose)->setEnabled(numOfDocs > 0);
14173 actionHash.value(ACTION_designdetails)->setEnabled(numOfDocs > 0);
14174 */
14175}

14354
14355/*
14356MainWindow *
14357MainWindow_init(void)
14358{
14359 readSettings();
14360
14361 char * appDir = qApp->applicationDirPath();
14362 // Verify that files/directories needed are actually present.
14363 check_load_file("/designs");
14364 check_load_file("/docs");
14365 check_load_file("/icons");
14366 check_load_file("/images");
14367 check_load_file("/samples");
14368 check_load_file("/translations");
14369
14370 log_debug("language: " + settings_general_language.toStdString());
14371 if (settings_general_language == "system") {
14372 settings_general_language = QLocale_system().languageToString(QLocale_system().language()).toLocal8Bit().toLower();
14373 }
14374
14375 //Selectors
14376 layerSelector = int(this);
14377 colorSelector = int(this);
14378 linetypeSelector = int(this);
14379 lineweightSelector = int(this);
14380 textFontSelector = QFontComboBox(this);
14381 textSizeSelector = int(this);
14382
14383 numOfDocs = 0;
14384 docIndex = 0;
14385
14386 shiftKeyPressedState = false;
14387
14388 setWindowIcon(load_icon("app"));
14389 setMinimumSize(800, 480); //Require Minimum WVGA
14390
14391 loadFormats();
14392
14393 //create the mdiArea
14394 QFrame* vbox = QFrame(this);
14395 QVBoxLayout* layout = QVBoxLayout(vbox);
14396 // layout->setMargin(0);
14397 vbox->setFrameStyle(QFrame_StyledPanel | QFrame_Sunken);
14398 mdiArea = MdiArea(vbox);
14399 active_view->useBackgroundLogo(settings_general_mdi_bg_use_logo);
14400 active_view->useBackgroundTexture(settings_general_mdi_bg_use_texture);
14401 active_view->useBackgroundColor(settings_general_mdi_bg_use_color);
14402 active_view->setBackgroundLogo(settings_general_mdi_bg_logo);
14403 active_view->setBackgroundTexture(settings_general_mdi_bg_texture);
14404 active_view->setBackgroundColor(EmbColor(settings_general_mdi_bg_color));
14405 active_view->set_viewMode(QTabbedView);
14406 active_view->setHorizontalscrollbarPolicy(scrollbarAsNeeded);
14407 active_view->setVerticalscrollbarPolicy(scrollbarAsNeeded);
14408 active_view->setActivationOrder(QActivationHistoryOrder);
14409 layout->add_widget(mdiArea);
14410 setCentralWidget(vbox);
14411
14412 //create the Command Prompt
14413 prompt = CmdPrompt(this);
14414 prompt->setFocus(OtherFocusReason);
14415 this->setFocusProxy(prompt);
14416 active_view->setFocusProxy(prompt);
14417
14418 prompt->setPromptTextColor(EmbColor(settings_prompt_text_color));
14419 prompt->setPromptBackgroundColor(EmbColor(settings_prompt_bg_color));
14420
14421 connect(prompt, startCommand(const char *), logPromptInput(const char *)));
14422
14423 connect(prompt, startCommand(const char *), runCommandMain(const char *)));
14424 connect(prompt, runCommand(const char *, const char *), runCommandPrompt(const char *, const char *)));
14425
14426 connect(prompt, deletePressed(), deletePressed()));
14427 //\todo connect(prompt, tabPressed(), someUnknownSlot()));
14428 connect(prompt, escapePressed(), escapePressed()));
14429 connect(prompt, upPressed(), promptInputPrevious()));
14430 connect(prompt, downPressed(), promptInputNext()));
14431 connect(prompt, F1Pressed(), help()));
14432 //\todo connect(prompt, F2Pressed(), floatHistory()));
14433 //\todo connect(prompt, F3Pressed(), toggleQSNAP()));
14434 connect(prompt, F4Pressed(), toggleLwt())); //\todo typically this is toggleTablet(), make F-Keys customizable thru settings
14435 //\todo connect(prompt, F5Pressed(), toggleISO()));
14436 //\todo connect(prompt, F6Pressed(), toggleCoords()));
14437 connect(prompt, F7Pressed(), toggleGrid()));
14438 //\todo connect(prompt, F8Pressed(), toggleORTHO()));
14439 //\todo connect(prompt, F9Pressed(), toggleSNAP()));
14440 //\todo connect(prompt, F10Pressed(), togglePOLAR()));
14441 //\todo connect(prompt, F11Pressed(), toggleQTRACK()));
14442 connect(prompt, F12Pressed(), toggleRuler()));
14443 connect(prompt, cutPressed(), cut()));
14444 connect(prompt, copyPressed(), copy()));
14445 connect(prompt, pastePressed(), paste()));
14446 connect(prompt, selectAllPressed(), selectAll()));
14447 connect(prompt, undoPressed(), undo()));
14448 connect(prompt, redoPressed(), redo()));
14449
14450 connect(prompt, shiftPressed(), setShiftPressed()));
14451 connect(prompt, shiftReleased(), setShiftReleased()));
14452
14453 connect(prompt, showSettings(), settingsPrompt()));
14454
14455 connect(prompt, historyAppended(const char *), promptHistoryAppended(const char *)));
14456
14457 //create the Object Property Editor
14458 char * s = appDir + "/icons/" + settings_general_icon_theme;
14459 dockPropEdit = PropertyEditor(s, settings_selection_mode_pickadd, prompt, this);
14460 addDockWidget(LeftDockWidgetArea, dockPropEdit);
14461 connect(dockPropEdit, pickAddModeToggled(), pickAddModeToggled()));
14462
14463 //create the Command History Undo Editor
14464 dockUndoEdit = UndoEditor(s, prompt, this);
14465 addDockWidget(LeftDockWidgetArea, dockUndoEdit);
14466
14467 //setDockOptions(QAnimatedDocks | QAllowTabbedDocks | QVerticalTabs); //\todo Load these from settings
14468 //tabifyDockWidget(dockPropEdit, dockUndoEdit); //\todo load this from settings
14469
14470 statusbar = StatusBar(this);
14471 this->setStatusBar(statusbar);
14472
14473 createAllActions();
14474 createAllMenus();
14475 createAllToolbars();
14476
14477 iconResize(settings_general_icon_size);
14478 updateMenuToolbarStatusbar();
14479
14480 //Show date in statusbar after it has been updated
14481 QDate date = QDate_currentDate();
14482 char * datestr = date.toString("MMMM d, yyyy");
14483 statusbar_showMessage(datestr);
14484
14485 showNormal();
14486
14487 //Load tips from external file
14488 std_vector<char *> tips;
14489
14490 QFile tipFile(appDir + "/docs/tips.txt");
14491 if (tipFile.open(QFile_ReadOnly)) {
14492 QTextStream stream(&tipFile);
14493 char * tipLine;
14494 do {
14495 tipLine = stream.readLine();
14496 if (!tipLine.isEmpty())
14497 listTipOfTheDay << tipLine;
14498 }
14499 while(!tipLine.isNull());
14500 }
14501 if (settings_general_tip_of_the_day) {
14502 tipOfTheDay();
14503 }
14504}
14505*/
14506

14526static void

14536 //If less than the max amount of entries add to menu
14537 if (i < settings_opensave_recent_max_files) {
14538 recentFileInfo = QFileInfo(settings_opensave_recent_list_of_files.at(i));
14539 if (recentFileInfo.exists() && validFileFormat(recentFileInfo.fileName())) {
14540 recentValue.setNum(i+1);
14541 QAction* rAction;
14542 if (recentValue.toInt() >= 1 && recentValue.toInt() <= 9) rAction = QAction("&" + recentValue + " " + recentFileInfo.fileName(), this);
14543 else if (recentValue.toInt() == 10) rAction = QAction("1&0 " + recentFileInfo.fileName(), this);
14544 else rAction = QAction( recentValue + " " + recentFileInfo.fileName(), this);
14545 rAction->setCheckable(false);
14546 rAction->setData(settings_opensave_recent_list_of_files.at(i));
14547 recentMenu->addAction(rAction);
14548 connect(rAction, triggered(), openrecentfile()));
14549 }
14550 }
14551 }
14552 //Ensure the list only has max amount of entries
14553 while(settings_opensave_recent_list_of_files.size() > settings_opensave_recent_max_files) {
14554 settings_opensave_recent_list_of_files.removeLast();
14555 }
14556 */
14557}

14631 View* mdiWin = <View*>(subWindow);
14632 if (mdiWin) {
14633 if (mdiWin->curFile == canonicalFilePath) {
14634 return subWindow;
14635 }
14636 }
14637 }
14638 */
14639 return 0;
14640}

14700static void
14701update_menu_toolbar_statusbar(void)
14702{
14703 log_debug("updateMenuToolbarStatusbar()");
14704
14705 /*
14706 actionHash.value(ACTION_print)->setEnabled(numOfDocs > 0);
14707 actionHash.value(ACTION_windowclose)->setEnabled(numOfDocs > 0);
14708 actionHash.value(ACTION_designdetails)->setEnabled(numOfDocs > 0);
14709
14710 if (numOfDocs) {
14711 //Toolbars
14712 toolbarView->show();
14713 toolbarZoom->show();
14714 toolbarPan->show();
14715 toolbarIcon->show();
14716 toolbarHelp->show();
14717 toolbarLayer->show();
14718 toolbarText->show();
14719 toolbarProperties->show();
14720 toolbarPrompt->show();
14721
14722 for (QToolBar* tb, toolbarHash) {
14723 tb->show();
14724 }
14725
14726 //DockWidgets
14727 dockPropEdit->show();
14728 dockUndoEdit->show();
14729
14730 //Menus
14731 menuBar()->clear();
14732 menuBar()->addMenu(fileMenu);
14733 menuBar()->addMenu(editMenu);
14734 menuBar()->addMenu(viewMenu);
14735
14736 for (QMenu* menu, menuHash) {
14737 menuBar()->addMenu(menu);
14738 }
14739
14740 menuBar()->addMenu(settingsMenu);
14741 menuBar()->addMenu(windowMenu);
14742 menuBar()->addMenu(helpMenu);
14743
14744 windowMenu->setEnabled(true);
14745
14746 //Statusbar
14747 statusbar_clearMessage();
14748 statusbarMouseCoord->show();
14749 statusbarSnapButton->show();
14750 statusbarGridButton->show();
14751 statusbarRulerButton->show();
14752 statusbarOrthoButton->show();
14753 statusbarPolarButton->show();
14754 statusbarQSnapButton->show();
14755 statusbarQTrackButton->show();
14756 statusbarLwtButton->show();
14757 }
14758 else {
14759 //Toolbars
14760 toolbarView->hide();
14761 toolbarZoom->hide();
14762 toolbarPan->hide();
14763 toolbarIcon->hide();
14764 toolbarHelp->hide();
14765 toolbarLayer->hide();
14766 toolbarText->hide();
14767 toolbarProperties->hide();
14768 toolbarPrompt->hide();
14769 for (QToolBar* tb : toolbarHash) {
14770 tb->hide();
14771 }
14772
14773 //DockWidgets
14774 dockPropEdit->hide();
14775 dockUndoEdit->hide();
14776
14777 //Menus
14778 menuBar()->clear();
14779 menuBar()->addMenu(fileMenu);
14780 menuBar()->addMenu(editMenu);
14781 menuBar()->addMenu(settingsMenu);
14782 menuBar()->addMenu(windowMenu);
14783 menuBar()->addMenu(helpMenu);
14784
14785 windowMenu->setEnabled(false);
14786
14787 //Statusbar
14788 statusbar_clearMessage();
14789 statusbarMouseCoord->hide();
14790 statusbarSnapButton->hide();
14791 statusbarGridButton->hide();
14792 statusbarRulerButton->hide();
14793 statusbarOrthoButton->hide();
14794 statusbarPolarButton->hide();
14795 statusbarQSnapButton->hide();
14796 statusbarQTrackButton->hide();
14797 statusbarLwtButton->hide();
14798 }
14799 */
14800}
14801
14805static void
14806load_formats(void)
14807{
14808 /*
14809 char stable, unstable;
14810 char * supportedReaders = "All Supported Files (";
14811 char * individualReaders = "All Files (*);;";
14812 char * supportedWriters = "All Supported Files (";
14813 char * individualWriters = "All Files (*);;";
14814 char * supportedStr;
14815 char * individualStr;
14816
14817 //\todo Stable Only (Settings Option)
14818 //stable = 'S'; unstable = 'S';
14819
14820 //Stable + Unstable
14821 stable = 'S'; unstable = 'U';
14822
14823 const char* extension = 0;
14824 const char* description = 0;
14825 char readerState;
14826 char writerState;
14827
14828 EmbFormatList* curFormat = 0;
14829 for (int i=0; i < numberOfFormats; i++) {
14830 extension = formatTable[i].extension;
14831 description = formatTable[i].description;
14832 readerState = formatTable[i].reader_state;
14833 writerState = formatTable[i].writer_state;
14834
14835 char * upperExt = char *(extension).toUpper();
14836 supportedStr = "*" + upperExt + " ";
14837 individualStr = upperExt.replace(".", "") + " - " + description + " (*" + extension + ");;";
14838 if (readerState == stable || readerState == unstable) {
14839 //Exclude color file formats from open dialogs
14840 if (upperExt != "COL" && upperExt != "EDR" && upperExt != "INF" && upperExt != "RGB") {
14841 supportedReaders.append(supportedStr);
14842 individualReaders.append(individualStr);
14843 }
14844 }
14845 if (writerState == stable || writerState == unstable) {
14846 supportedWriters.append(supportedStr);
14847 individualWriters.append(individualStr);
14848 }
14849 }
14850
14851 supportedReaders.append(");;");
14852 supportedWriters.append(");;");
14853
14854 formatFilterOpen = supportedReaders + individualReaders;
14855 formatFilterSave = supportedWriters + individualWriters;
14856
14857 //\todo Fixup custom filter
14858 char * custom = getSettingsCustomFilter();
14859 if (custom.contains("supported", CaseInsensitive))
14860 custom = ""; //This will hide it
14861 else if (!custom.contains("*", CaseInsensitive))
14862 custom = ""; //This will hide it
14863 else
14864 custom = "Custom Filter(" + custom + ");;";
14865
14866 return translate(custom + supported + all));
14867 */
14868}

14879 if (action->objectName() == "toolbarclose") {

14881 if (tb) {
14882 log_debug("%s closed.", tb->objectName()));
14883 tb->hide();

14894static void
14895floating_changed_toolbar_action(bool isFloating)

14897 /*

14899 if (tb) {
14900 if (isFloating) {
14901 //\todo Determine best suited close button on various platforms.
14902 QStyle_SP_DockWidgetCloseButton
14903 QStyle_SP_TitleBarCloseButton
14904 QStyle_SP_DialogCloseButton
14905 QAction *ACTION = QAction(tb->style()->standardIcon(QStyle_SP_DialogCloseButton), "Close", this);
14906 ACTION->setStatusTip("Close the " + tb->windowTitle() + " Toolbar");
14907 ACTION->setObjectName("toolbarclose");
14908 tb->addAction(ACTION);
14909 connect(tb, actionTriggered(QAction*), closeToolBar(QAction*)));
14910 }
14911 else {
14912 std_vector<QAction*> actList = tb->actions();
14913 for (int i = 0; i < actList.size(); ++i) {
14914 QAction* ACTION = actList.value(i);
14915 if (ACTION->objectName() == "toolbarclose") {
14916 tb->removeAction(ACTION);
14917 disconnect(tb, actionTriggered(QAction*), closeToolBar(QAction*)));
14918 delete ACTION;
14919 }
14920 }
14921 }
14922 }
14923 */
14924}

14983static void
14984rotate(EmbVector point, EmbReal rot)
14985{
14986 printf("rotate, %f %f %lf\n", point.x, point.y, rot);
14987 /*
14988 EmbReal alpha = radians(rot);
14989 EmbVector p = embVector_subtract(object->scenePos(), point);
14990 EmbVector rot = embVector_rotate(p, alpha);
14991 rot = embVector(rot, point);
14992
14993 object->setPos(rot);
14994 object->setRotation(object->rotation() + alpha);
14995 */
14996}
14997
15007static void
15008scale_action(
15009 EmbVector position,
15010 EmbReal scaleFactor,
15011 char *text,
15012 EmbGeometry* obj,
15013 View* v)
15014{
15015 /*
15016 gview = v;
15017 object = obj;
15018 setText(text);
15019
15020 // Prevent division by zero and other wacky behavior
15021 if (scaleFactor <= 0.0) {
15022 delta.x = 0.0;
15023 delta.y = 0.0;
15024 factor = 1.0;
15025 critical_message(0, translate("ScaleFactor Error"),
15026 translate("Hi there. If you are not a developer, report this as a bug. "
15027 "If you are a developer, your code needs examined, and possibly your head too."));
15028 }
15029 else {
15030 //Calculate the offset
15031 EmbLine scaleLine(position, object->position);
15032 scaleLine.setLength(scaleLine.length()*scaleFactor);
15033
15034 delta = embVector_subtract(scaleLine.end, object->position.x);
15035 factor = scaleFactor;
15036 }
15037 */
15038}

15043static void
15044scale_undo(void)
15045{
15046 /*
15047 object->setScale(object->scale()*(1/factor));
15048 object->moveBy(-dx, -dy);
15049 */
15050}
15051
15055static void
15056scale_redo(void)
15057{
15058 /*
15059 object->setScale(object->scale()*factor);
15060 object->moveBy(dx, dy);
15061 */
15062}

15099 toCenter = cmd->toCenter;

15101
15102 return true;
15103}

15118 gview->setTransform(fromTransform);
15119 gview->centerAt(fromCenter);

15121}
15122
15126static void
15127redo_navigation(void)
15128{
15129 /*
15130 if (!done) {
15131 if (navType == "ZoomInToPoint") {
15132 gview->zoomToPoint(
15133 gview->scene()->property("VIEW_MOUSE_POINT").toPoint(),
15134 +1);
15135 }
15136 else if (navType == "ZoomOutToPoint") {
15137 gview->zoomToPoint(
15138 gview->scene()->property("VIEW_MOUSE_POINT").toPoint(),
15139 -1);
15140 }
15141 else if (navType == "ZoomExtents") {
15142 actuator("zoom extents");
15143 }
15144 else if (navType == "ZoomSelected") {
15145 actuator("zoom selected");
15146 }
15147 else if (navType == "PanStart") {
15148 // Do Nothing. We are just recording the spot where the pan started.
15149 }
15150 else if (navType == "PanStop") {
15151 // Do Nothing. We are just recording the spot where the pan stopped.
15152 }
15153 else if (navType == "pan left") {
15154 actuator("pan left");
15155 }
15156 else if (navType == "pan right") {
15157 actuator("pan right");
15158 }
15159 else if (navType == "pan up") {
15160 actuator("pan up");
15161 }
15162 else if (navType == "pan down") {
15163 actuator("pan down");
15164 }
15165 toTransform = gview->transform();
15166 toCenter = gview->center();
15167 }
15168 else {
15169 gview->setTransform(toTransform);
15170 gview->centerAt(toCenter);
15171 }
15172 */
15173}
15174
15180static void
15181embCircle_click(UiObject *global, EmbVector position)
15182{
15183 if (n_views == 0) {
15184 return;
15185 }
15186
15187 switch (global->mode) {
15188 case CIRCLE_MODE_1P_RAD: {
15189 /*
15190 if (isnan(global.x1)) {
15191 global.point1 = position;
15192 global.center = position;
15193 add_rubber("CIRCLE");
15194 setRubberMode("CIRCLE_1P_RAD");
15195 setRubberPoint("CIRCLE_CENTER", global.cx, global.cy);
15196 append_prompt_history();
15197 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify radius of circle or [Diameter]: "));
15198 }
15199 else {
15200 global.x2 = position.x;
15201 global.y2 = position.y;
15202 setRubberPoint("CIRCLE_RADIUS", global.x2, global.y2);
15203 vulcanize();
15204 append_prompt_history();
15205 end_command();
15206 }
15207 */
15208 break;
15209 }
15210 case CIRCLE_MODE_1P_DIA: {
15211 /*
15212 if (isnan(global.x1)) {
15213 error("CIRCLE", translate("This should never happen."));
15214 }
15215 else {
15216 global.x2 = position.x;
15217 global.y2 = position.y;
15218 setRubberPoint("CIRCLE_DIAMETER", global.x2, global.y2);
15219 vulcanize();
15220 append_prompt_history();
15221 end_command();
15222 }
15223 */
15224 break;
15225 }
15226 case CIRCLE_MODE_2P: {
15227 /*
15228 if (isnan(global.x1)) {
15229 global.x1 = position.x;
15230 global.y1 = position.y;
15231 add_rubber("CIRCLE");
15232 setRubberMode("CIRCLE_2P");
15233 setRubberPoint("CIRCLE_TAN1", global.x1, global.y1);
15234 append_prompt_history();
15235 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify second end point of circle's diameter: "));
15236 }
15237 else if (isnan(global.x2)) {
15238 global.x2 = position.x;
15239 global.y2 = position.y;
15240 setRubberPoint("CIRCLE_TAN2", global.x2, global.y2);
15241 vulcanize();
15242 append_prompt_history();
15243 end_command();
15244 }
15245 else {
15246 error("CIRCLE", translate("This should never happen."));
15247 }
15248 */
15249 break;
15250 }
15251 case CIRCLE_MODE_3P: {
15252 /*
15253 if (isnan(global.x1)) {
15254 global.x1 = position.x;
15255 global.y1 = position.y;
15256 append_prompt_history();
15257 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify second point on circle: "));
15258 }
15259 else if (isnan(global.x2)) {
15260 global.x2 = position.x;
15261 global.y2 = position.y;
15262 add_rubber("CIRCLE");
15263 setRubberMode("CIRCLE_3P");
15264 setRubberPoint("CIRCLE_TAN1", global.x1, global.y1);
15265 setRubberPoint("CIRCLE_TAN2", global.x2, global.y2);
15266 append_prompt_history();
15267 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify third point on circle: "));
15268 }
15269 else if (isnan(global.x3)) {
15270 global.x3 = position.x;
15271 global.y3 = position.y;
15272 setRubberPoint("CIRCLE_TAN3", global.x3, global.y3);
15273 vulcanize();
15274 append_prompt_history();
15275 end_command();
15276 }
15277 else {
15278 error("CIRCLE", translate("This should never happen."));
15279 }
15280 */
15281 break;
15282 }
15283 case CIRCLE_MODE_TTR: {
15284 /*
15285 if (isnan(global.x1)) {
15286 global.x1 = position.x;
15287 global.y1 = position.y;
15288 append_prompt_history();
15289 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify point on object for second tangent of circle: "));
15290 }
15291 else if (isnan(global.x2)) {
15292 global.x2 = position.x;
15293 global.y2 = position.y;
15294 append_prompt_history();
15295 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify radius of circle: "));
15296 }
15297 else if (isnan(global.x3)) {
15298 global.x3 = position.x;
15299 global.y3 = position.y;
15300 append_prompt_history();
15301 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify second point: "));
15302 }
15303 else {
15304 todo("CIRCLE", "click() for TTR");
15305 }
15306 */
15307 break;
15308 }
15309 default:
15310 break;
15311 }
15312}
15313
15319static void
15320embCircle_prompt(UiObject *global, const char *str)
15321{
15322 if (n_views == 0) {
15323 return;
15324 }
15325
15326 printf("%s", str);
15327
15328 if (global->mode == CIRCLE_MODE_1P_RAD) {
15329 /*
15330 if (isnan(global.x1)) {
15331 if (streq(str, "2P") {
15332 //\todo Probably should add additional translate calls here.
15333 global->mode = "CIRCLE_MODE_2P";
15334 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify first end point of circle's diameter: "));
15335 }
15336 else if (streq(str, "3P") {
15337 global->mode = "CIRCLE_MODE_3P";
15338 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify first point of circle: "));
15339 }
15340 else if (streq(str, "T" || streq(str, "TTR") {
15341 global->mode = "CIRCLE_MODE_TTR";
15342 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify point on object for first tangent of circle: "));
15343 }
15344 else {
15345 std_vector<char *> strList = str.split(",");
15346 if (isnan(strList[0]) || isnan(strList[1])) {
15347 alert(translate("Point or option keyword required."));
15348 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify center point for circle or [3P/2P/Ttr (tan tan radius)]: "));
15349 }
15350 else {
15351 global.x1 = Number(strList[0]);
15352 global.y1 = Number(strList[1]);
15353 global.cx = global.x1;
15354 global.cy = global.y1;
15355 add_rubber("CIRCLE");
15356 setRubberMode("CIRCLE_1P_RAD");
15357 setRubberPoint("CIRCLE_CENTER", global.cx, global.cy);
15358 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify radius of circle or [Diameter]: "));
15359 }
15360 }
15361 }
15362 else {
15363 if (streq(str, "D" || streq(str, "DIAMETER") {
15364 //\todo Probably should add additional translate calls here.
15365 global->mode = "CIRCLE_MODE_1P_DIA";
15366 setRubberMode("CIRCLE_1P_DIA");
15367 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify diameter of circle: "));
15368 }
15369 else {
15370 float num = Number(str);
15371 if (isnan(num)) {
15372 alert(translate("Requires numeric radius, point on circumference, or \"D\"."));
15373 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify radius of circle or [Diameter]: "));
15374 }
15375 else {
15376 global.rad = num;
15377 global.x2 = global.x1 + global.rad;
15378 global.y2 = global.y1;
15379 setRubberPoint("CIRCLE_RADIUS", global.x2, global.y2);
15380 vulcanize();
15381 end_command();
15382 }
15383 }
15384 }
15385 }
15386 case MODE_1P_DIA) {
15387 if (isnan(global.x1)) {
15388 error("CIRCLE", translate("This should never happen."));
15389 }
15390 if (isnan(global.x2)) {
15391 float num = Number(str);
15392 if (isnan(num)) {
15393 alert(translate("Requires numeric distance or second point."));
15394 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify diameter of circle: "));
15395 }
15396 else {
15397 global.dia = num;
15398 global.x2 = global.x1 + global.dia;
15399 global.y2 = global.y1;
15400 setRubberPoint("CIRCLE_DIAMETER", global.x2, global.y2);
15401 vulcanize();
15402 end_command();
15403 }
15404 }
15405 else {
15406 error("CIRCLE", translate("This should never happen."));
15407 }
15408 }
15409 case MODE_2P) {
15410 if (isnan(global.x1)) {
15411 std_vector<char *> strList = str.split(",");
15412 if (isnan(strList[0]) || isnan(strList[1])) {
15413 alert(translate("Invalid point."));
15414 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify first end point of circle's diameter: "));
15415 }
15416 else {
15417 global.x1 = Number(strList[0]);
15418 global.y1 = Number(strList[1]);
15419 add_rubber("CIRCLE");
15420 setRubberMode("CIRCLE_2P");
15421 setRubberPoint("CIRCLE_TAN1", global.x1, global.y1);
15422 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify second end point of circle's diameter: "));
15423 }
15424 }
15425 else if (isnan(global.x2)) {
15426 std_vector<char *> strList = str.split(",");
15427 if (isnan(strList[0]) || isnan(strList[1])) {
15428 alert(translate("Invalid point."));
15429 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify second end point of circle's diameter: "));
15430 }
15431 else {
15432 global.x2 = Number(strList[0]);
15433 global.y2 = Number(strList[1]);
15434 setRubberPoint("CIRCLE_TAN2", global.x2, global.y2);
15435 vulcanize();
15436 end_command();
15437 }
15438 }
15439 else {
15440 error("CIRCLE", translate("This should never happen."));
15441 }
15442 }
15443 case MODE_3P) {
15444 if (isnan(global.x1)) {
15445 std_vector<char *> strList = str.split(",");
15446 if (isnan(strList[0]) || isnan(strList[1])) {
15447 alert(translate("Invalid point."));
15448 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify first point of circle: "));
15449 }
15450 else {
15451 global.x1 = Number(strList[0]);
15452 global.y1 = Number(strList[1]);
15453 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify second point of circle: "));
15454 }
15455 }
15456 else if (isnan(global.x2)) {
15457 std_vector<char *> strList = str.split(",");
15458 if (isnan(strList[0]) || isnan(strList[1])) {
15459 alert(translate("Invalid point."));
15460 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify second point of circle: "));
15461 }
15462 else {
15463 global.x2 = Number(strList[0]);
15464 global.y2 = Number(strList[1]);
15465 add_rubber("CIRCLE");
15466 setRubberMode("CIRCLE_3P");
15467 setRubberPoint("CIRCLE_TAN1", global.x1, global.y1);
15468 setRubberPoint("CIRCLE_TAN2", global.x2, global.y2);
15469 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify third point of circle: "));
15470 }
15471 }
15472 else if (isnan(global.x3)) {
15473 std_vector<char *> strList = str.split(",");
15474 if (isnan(strList[0]) || isnan(strList[1])) {
15475 alert(translate("Invalid point."));
15476 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify third point of circle: "));
15477 }
15478 else {
15479 global.x3 = Number(strList[0]);
15480 global.y3 = Number(strList[1]);
15481 setRubberPoint("CIRCLE_TAN3", global.x3, global.y3);
15482 vulcanize();
15483 end_command();
15484 }
15485 }
15486 else {
15487 error("CIRCLE", translate("This should never happen."));
15488 }
15489
15490 }
15491 case MODE_TTR) {
15492 todo("CIRCLE", "prompt() for TTR");
15493 */
15494 }
15495}
15496
15512bool
15513save_save(const char *fileName)
15514{
15515 char debug_msg[200];
15516 sprintf(debug_msg, "save %s", fileName);
15517 log_debug(debug_msg);
15518 printf("%s", fileName);
15519 bool writeSuccessful = false;
15520 int i;
15521
15522 int formatType = emb_identify_format(fileName);
15523 if (formatTable[formatType].type == EMBFORMAT_UNSUPPORTED) {
15524 sprintf(debug_msg, "Unsupported write file type: %s", fileName);
15525 log_debug(debug_msg);
15526 return false;
15527 }
15528
15529 EmbPattern* pattern = embPattern_create();
15530 if (!pattern) {
15531 log_debug("Could not allocate memory for embroidery pattern");
15532 return false;
15533 }
15534
15538 /*
15539 if (formatTable[formatType].type == EMBFORMAT_STITCHONLY) {
15540 embPattern_movePolylinesToStitchList(pattern);
15541 */
15545 /*
15546 }
15547
15548 const char *s = "output";
15549 s += formatTable[formatType].extension;
15550
15551 writeSuccessful = embPattern_write(pattern, s), formatType);
15552 if (!writeSuccessful) {
15553 debug_message("Writing file %s was unsuccessful", fileName));
15554 }
15555 */
15556
15560 embPattern_free(pattern);
15561 return writeSuccessful;
15562}
15563
15578static void
15579save_toPolyline(
15580 EmbPattern* pattern,
15581 EmbVector objPos,
15582 EmbPath objPath,
15583 const char *layer,
15584 EmbColor color,
15585 const char *lineType,
15586 const char *lineWeight)
15587{
15588 int i;
15589 EmbVector start = objPos;
15590 EmbArray *pointList = embArray_create(EMB_POINT);
15591 EmbPoint lastPoint;
15592 /*
15593 EmbPath_Element element;
15594 for (i = 0; i < objPath.count; ++i) {
15595 element = objPath.elementAt(i);
15596 if (pointList->count == 0) {
15597 lastPoint.position.x = element.x + startX;
15598 lastPoint.position.y = -(element.y + startY);
15599 embArray_addPoint(pointList, lastPoint);
15600 }
15601 else {
15602 lastPoint.position.x += element.x + startX;
15603 lastPoint.position.y += -(element.y + startY);
15604 }
15605 }
15606 */
15607
15608 EmbPolyline polyObject;
15609 polyObject.pointList = pointList;
15610 polyObject.color = color;
15614 //embPattern_addPolylineAbs(pattern, polyObject);
15615}
15616
15620UiObject
15621dolphin_main(void)
15622{
15623 UiObject global;
15624 global.numPoints = 512;
15625 global.minPoints = 64;
15626 global.maxPoints = 8192;
15627 global.center.x = 0.0f;
15628 global.center.y = 0.0f;
15629 global.scale.x = 0.04f;
15630 global.scale.y = 0.04f;
15631 global.mode = DOLPHIN_MODE_NUM_POINTS;
15632 strcpy(global.path_desc, "");
15633
15634 clear_selection();
15635 views[settings.pattern_index].ui_mode = DOLPHIN_MODE_NUM_POINTS;
15636 /*
15637 add_rubber("POLYGON");
15638 setRubberMode("POLYGON");
15639 updateDolphin(global);
15640 spareRubber("POLYGON");
15641 */
15642 return global;
15643}
15644
15651static void
15652updateDolphin(EmbArray* path, UiObject global)
15653{
15654 /*
15655 float xx = 0.0f;
15656 float yy = 0.0f;
15657 float two_pi = 2*Math.PI;
15658
15659 for (int i = 0; i <= numPts; i++) {
15660 float t = two_pi/numPts*i;
15661
15662 xx = 4/23*sin(62/33-58*t)+
15663 8/11*sin(10/9-56*t)+
15664 17/24*sin(38/35-55*t)+
15665 30/89*sin(81/23-54*t)+
15666 3/17*sin(53/18-53*t)+
15667 21/38*sin(29/19-52*t)+
15668 11/35*sin(103/40-51*t)+
15669 7/16*sin(79/18-50*t)+
15670 4/15*sin(270/77-49*t)+
15671 19/35*sin(59/27-48*t)+
15672 37/43*sin(71/17-47*t)+
15673 sin(18/43-45*t)+
15674 21/26*sin(37/26-44*t)+
15675 27/19*sin(111/32-42*t)+
15676 8/39*sin(13/25-41*t)+
15677 23/30*sin(27/8-40*t)+
15678 23/21*sin(32/35-37*t)+
15679 18/37*sin(91/31-36*t)+
15680 45/22*sin(29/37-35*t)+
15681 56/45*sin(11/8-33*t)+
15682 4/7*sin(32/19-32*t)+
15683 54/23*sin(74/29-31*t)+
15684 28/19*sin(125/33-30*t)+
15685 19/9*sin(73/27-29*t)+
15686 16/17*sin(737/736-28*t)+
15687 52/33*sin(130/29-27*t)+
15688 41/23*sin(43/30-25*t)+
15689 29/20*sin(67/26-24*t)+
15690 64/25*sin(136/29-23*t)+
15691 162/37*sin(59/34-21*t)+
15692 871/435*sin(199/51-20*t)+
15693 61/42*sin(58/17-19*t)+
15694 159/25*sin(77/31-17*t)+
15695 241/15*sin(94/31-13*t)+
15696 259/18*sin(114/91-12*t)+
15697 356/57*sin(23/25-11*t)+
15698 2283/137*sin(23/25-10*t)+
15699 1267/45*sin(139/42-9*t)+
15700 613/26*sin(41/23-8*t)+
15701 189/16*sin(122/47-6*t)+
15702 385/6*sin(151/41-5*t)+
15703 2551/38*sin(106/35-4*t)+
15704 1997/18*sin(6/5-2*t)+
15705 43357/47*sin(81/26-t)-
15706 4699/35*sin(3*t+25/31)-
15707 1029/34*sin(7*t+20/21)-
15708 250/17*sin(14*t+7/40)-
15709 140/17*sin(15*t+14/25)-
15710 194/29*sin(16*t+29/44)-
15711 277/52*sin(18*t+37/53)-
15712 94/41*sin(22*t+33/31)-
15713 57/28*sin(26*t+44/45)-
15714 128/61*sin(34*t+11/14)-
15715 111/95*sin(38*t+55/37)-
15716 85/71*sin(39*t+4/45)-
15717 25/29*sin(43*t+129/103)-
15718 7/37*sin(46*t+9/20)-
15719 17/32*sin(57*t+11/28)-
15720 5/16*sin(59*t+32/39);
15721
15722 yy = 5/11*sin(163/37-59*t)+
15723 7/22*sin(19/41-58*t)+
15724 30/41*sin(1-57*t)+
15725 37/29*sin(137/57-56*t)+
15726 5/7*sin(17/6-55*t)+
15727 11/39*sin(46/45-52*t)+
15728 25/28*sin(116/83-51*t)+
15729 25/34*sin(11/20-47*t)+
15730 8/27*sin(81/41-46*t)+
15731 44/39*sin(78/37-45*t)+
15732 11/25*sin(107/37-44*t)+
15733 7/20*sin(7/16-41*t)+
15734 30/31*sin(19/5-40*t)+
15735 37/27*sin(148/59-39*t)+
15736 44/39*sin(17/27-38*t)+
15737 13/11*sin(7/11-37*t)+
15738 28/33*sin(119/39-36*t)+
15739 27/13*sin(244/81-35*t)+
15740 13/23*sin(113/27-34*t)+
15741 47/38*sin(127/32-33*t)+
15742 155/59*sin(173/45-29*t)+
15743 105/37*sin(22/43-27*t)+
15744 106/27*sin(23/37-26*t)+
15745 97/41*sin(53/29-25*t)+
15746 83/45*sin(109/31-24*t)+
15747 81/31*sin(96/29-23*t)+
15748 56/37*sin(29/10-22*t)+
15749 44/13*sin(29/19-19*t)+
15750 18/5*sin(34/31-18*t)+
15751 163/51*sin(75/17-17*t)+
15752 152/31*sin(61/18-16*t)+
15753 146/19*sin(47/20-15*t)+
15754 353/35*sin(55/48-14*t)+
15755 355/28*sin(102/25-12*t)+
15756 1259/63*sin(71/18-11*t)+
15757 17/35*sin(125/52-10*t)+
15758 786/23*sin(23/26-6*t)+
15759 2470/41*sin(77/30-5*t)+
15760 2329/47*sin(47/21-4*t)+
15761 2527/33*sin(23/14-3*t)+
15762 9931/33*sin(51/35-2*t)-
15763 11506/19*sin(t+56/67)-
15764 2081/42*sin(7*t+9/28)-
15765 537/14*sin(8*t+3/25)-
15766 278/29*sin(9*t+23/33)-
15767 107/15*sin(13*t+35/26)-
15768 56/19*sin(20*t+5/9)-
15769 5/9*sin(21*t+1/34)-
15770 17/24*sin(28*t+36/23)-
15771 21/11*sin(30*t+27/37)-
15772 138/83*sin(31*t+1/7)-
15773 10/17*sin(32*t+29/48)-
15774 31/63*sin(42*t+27/28)-
15775 4/27*sin(43*t+29/43)-
15776 13/24*sin(48*t+5/21)-
15777 4/7*sin(49*t+29/23)-
15778 26/77*sin(50*t+29/27)-
15779 19/14*sin(53*t+61/48)+
15780 34/25*sin(54*t+37/26);
15781
15782 setRubberPoint("POLYGON_POINT_" + i.toString(), xx*xScale, yy*yScale);
15783 }
15784
15785 setRubberText("POLYGON_NUM_POINTS", numPts.toString());
15786 */
15787}
15788
15792static UiObject
15793heart_init(void)
15794{
15795 UiObject global;
15796 clear_selection();
15797 /*
15798 global.numPoints = 512; //Default //\todo min:64 max:8192
15799 global.scale = {1.0, 1.0};
15800 global.center = {0.0f, 0.0f};
15801 global->mode = HEART_MODE_NUM_POINTS;
15802
15803 //Heart4: 10.0 / 512
15804 //Heart5: 1.0 / 512
15805
15806 add_rubber("POLYGON");
15807 setRubberMode("POLYGON");
15808 updateHeart("HEART5", global.numPoints, global.scale);
15809 spareRubber("POLYGON");
15810 */
15811 return global;
15812}
15813
15820static void
15821update_heart(EmbPath *path, UiObject global)
15822{
15823 /*
15824 EmbVector v;
15825 float two_pi = 2*Math.PI;
15826
15827 for (int i = 0; i <= numPts; i++) {
15828 float t = two_pi/numPts*i;
15829
15830 if (style == "HEART4") {
15831 v.x = cos(t)*((sin(t)*sqrt(fabs(cos(t))))/(sin(t)+7/5) - 2*sin(t) + 2);
15832 v.y = sin(t)*((sin(t)*sqrt(fabs(cos(t))))/(sin(t)+7/5) - 2*sin(t) + 2);
15833 }
15834 else if (style == "HEART5") {
15835 v.x = 16*Math.pow(sin(t), 3);
15836 v.y = 13*cos(t) - 5*cos(2*t) - 2*cos(3*t) - cos(4*t);
15837 }
15838
15839 setRubberPoint("POLYGON_POINT_" + i.toString(), v.x*xScale, v.y*yScale);
15840 }
15841
15842 setRubberText("POLYGON_NUM_POINTS", numPts.toString());
15843 */
15844}
15845
15851static UiObject
15852path_init(void)
15853{
15854 UiObject global;
15855 init_command();
15856 clear_selection();
15857 /*
15858 global.firstRun = true;
15859 global.first = {0.0f, 0.0f};
15860 global.prev = {0.0f, 0.0f};
15861 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify start point: "));
15862 */
15863 return global;
15864}
15865
15873static void
15874path_click(UiObject *global, float x, float y)
15875{
15876 printf("%f %f", x, y);
15877 /*
15878 if (global.firstRun) {
15879 global.firstRun = false;
15880 global.firstX = x;
15881 global.firstY = y;
15882 global.prevX = x;
15883 global.prevY = y;
15884 addPath(x,y);
15885 append_prompt_history();
15886 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify next point or [Arc/Undo]: "));
15887 }
15888 else {
15889 append_prompt_history();
15890 appendLineToPath(x,y);
15891 global.prevX = x;
15892 global.prevY = y;
15893 }
15894 */
15895}
15896
15902static void
15903path_prompt(const char *str)
15904{
15905 /*
15906 if (streq(str, "A" || streq(str, "ARC") {
15907 //\todo Probably should add additional translate calls here.
15908 todo("PATH", "prompt() for ARC");
15909 }
15910 else if (streq(str, "U" || streq(str, "UNDO") {
15911 //\todo Probably should add additional translate calls here.
15912 todo("PATH", "prompt() for UNDO");
15913 }
15914 else {
15915 std_vector<char *> strList = str.split(",");
15916 if (isnan(strList[0]) || isnan(strList[1])) {
15917 alert(translate("Point or option keyword required."));
15918 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify next point or [Arc/Undo]: "));
15919 }
15920 else {
15921 float x = Number(strList[0]);
15922 float y = Number(strList[1]);
15923 if (global.firstRun) {
15924 global.firstRun = false;
15925 global.firstX = x;
15926 global.firstY = y;
15927 global.prevX = x;
15928 global.prevY = y;
15929 addPath(x,y);
15930 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify next point or [Arc/Undo]: "));
15931 }
15932 else {
15933 appendLineToPath(x,y);
15934 global.prevX = x;
15935 global.prevY = y;
15936 }
15937 }
15938 }
15939 */
15940}

15952

15954 /*
15955 set_prompt_prefix("\todo Current point settings: PDMODE=? PDSIZE=?"); //\todo translate needed here when complete
15956 append_prompt_history();
15957 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify first point: "));
15958 */
15959 return global;
15960}

15965static void
15966point_click(UiObject global, EmbVector position)
15967{
15968 if (global.firstRun) {
15969 /*
15970 global.firstRun = false;
15971 append_prompt_history();
15972 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify next point: "));
15973 addPoint(x,y);
15974 */
15975 }
15976 else {
15977 /*
15978 append_prompt_history();
15979 addPoint(x,y);
15980 */
15981 }
15982}
15983
15987static void
15988point_prompt(const char *str)
15989{
15990 /*
15991 if (global.firstRun) {
15992 if (streq(str, "M" || streq(str, "MODE") {
15993 todo("POINT", "prompt() for PDMODE");
15994 }
15995 else if (streq(str, "S" || streq(str, "SIZE") {
15996 todo("POINT", "prompt() for PDSIZE");
15997 }
15998 std_vector<char *> strList = str.split(",");
15999 if (isnan(strList[0]) || isnan(strList[1])) {
16000 alert(translate("Invalid point."));
16001 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify first point: "));
16002 }
16003 else {
16004 global.firstRun = false;
16005 float x = Number(strList[0]);
16006 float y = Number(strList[1]);
16007 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify next point: "));
16008 addPoint(x,y);
16009 }
16010 }
16011 else {
16012 std_vector<char *> strList = str.split(",");
16013 if (isnan(strList[0]) || isnan(strList[1])) {
16014 alert(translate("Invalid point."));
16015 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify next point: "));
16016 }
16017 else {
16018 float x = Number(strList[0]);
16019 float y = Number(strList[1]);
16020 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify next point: "));
16021 addPoint(x,y);
16022 }
16023 }
16024 */
16025}
16026
16054static void
16055polygon_main(void)
16056{
16057 init_command();
16058 clear_selection();
16059 /*
16060 global.centerX = 0.0f;
16061 global.centerY = 0.0f;
16062 global.sideX1 = 0.0f;
16063 global.sideY1 = 0.0f;
16064 global.sideX2 = 0.0f;
16065 global.sideY2 = 0.0f;
16066 global.pointIX = 0.0f;
16067 global.pointIY = 0.0f;
16068 global.pointCX = 0.0f;
16069 global.pointCY = 0.0f;
16070 global->mode = MODE_NUM_SIDES;
16071 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Enter number of sides") + " {" + global.numSides.toString() + "}: ");
16072 */
16073}
16074
16078static void
16079polygon_click(float x, float y)
16080{
16081 /*
16082 if (global->mode == MODE_NUM_SIDES)
16083 {
16084 //Do nothing, the prompt controls this.
16085 }
16086 case MODE_CENTER_PT)
16087 {
16088 global.centerX = x;
16089 global.centerY = y;
16090 global->mode = MODE_POLYTYPE;
16091 append_prompt_history();
16092 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify polygon type [Inscribed in circle/Circumscribed around circle]") + " {" + global.polyType + "}: ");
16093 }
16094 case MODE_POLYTYPE) {
16095 //Do nothing, the prompt controls this.
16096 }
16097 case MODE_INSCRIBE) {
16098 global.pointIX = x;
16099 global.pointIY = y;
16100 setRubberPoint("POLYGON_INSCRIBE_POINT", global.pointIX, global.pointIY);
16101 vulcanize();
16102 append_prompt_history();
16103 end_command();
16104 }
16105 case MODE_CIRCUMSCRIBE) {
16106 global.pointCX = x;
16107 global.pointCY = y;
16108 setRubberPoint("POLYGON_CIRCUMSCRIBE_POINT", global.pointCX, global.pointCY);
16109 vulcanize();
16110 append_prompt_history();
16111 end_command();
16112 }
16113 case MODE_DISTANCE) {
16114 //Do nothing, the prompt controls this.
16115 }
16116 case MODE_SIDE_LEN) {
16117 todo("POLYGON", "Sidelength mode");
16118 }
16119 */
16120}
16121
16125static void
16126polygon_prompt(const char *str)
16127{
16128 /*
16129 if (global->mode == MODE_NUM_SIDES) {
16130 if (streq(str, "" && global.numSides >= 3 && global.numSides <= 1024) {
16131 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify center point or [Sidelength]: "));
16132 global->mode = MODE_CENTER_PT;
16133 }
16134 else {
16135 float tmp = Number(str);
16136 if (isnan(tmp) || !isInt(tmp) || tmp < 3 || tmp > 1024) {
16137 alert(translate("Requires an integer between 3 and 1024."));
16138 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Enter number of sides") + " {" + global.numSides.toString() + "}: ");
16139 }
16140 else {
16141 global.numSides = tmp;
16142 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify center point or [Sidelength]: "));
16143 global->mode = MODE_CENTER_PT;
16144 }
16145 }
16146 }
16147 case MODE_CENTER_PT) {
16148 if (streq(str, "S" || streq(str, "SIDELENGTH") {
16149 global->mode = MODE_SIDE_LEN;
16150 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify start point: "));
16151 }
16152 else {
16153 std_vector<char *> strList = str.split(",");
16154 if (isnan(strList[0]) || isnan(strList[1])) {
16155 alert(translate("Point or option keyword required."));
16156 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify center point or [Sidelength]: "));
16157 }
16158 else {
16159 global.centerX = Number(strList[0]);
16160 global.centerY = Number(strList[1]);
16161 global->mode = MODE_POLYTYPE;
16162 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify polygon type [Inscribed in circle/Circumscribed around circle]") + " {" + global.polyType + "}: ");
16163 }
16164 }
16165 }
16166 case MODE_POLYTYPE) {
16167 if (streq(str, "INSCRIBED") {
16168 global->mode = MODE_INSCRIBE;
16169 global.polyType = "Inscribed";
16170 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify polygon corner point or [Distance]: "));
16171 add_rubber("POLYGON");
16172 setRubberMode("POLYGON_INSCRIBE");
16173 setRubberPoint("POLYGON_CENTER", global.centerX, global.centerY);
16174 setRubberPoint("POLYGON_NUM_SIDES", global.numSides, 0);
16175 }
16176 else if (streq(str, "CIRCUMSCRIBED") {
16177 global->mode = MODE_CIRCUMSCRIBE;
16178 global.polyType = "Circumscribed";
16179 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify polygon side point or [Distance]: "));
16180 add_rubber("POLYGON");
16181 setRubberMode("POLYGON_CIRCUMSCRIBE");
16182 setRubberPoint("POLYGON_CENTER", global.centerX, global.centerY);
16183 setRubberPoint("POLYGON_NUM_SIDES", global.numSides, 0);
16184 }
16185 else if (streq(str, "") {
16186 if (global.polyType == "Inscribed") {
16187 global->mode = MODE_INSCRIBE;
16188 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify polygon corner point or [Distance]: "));
16189 add_rubber("POLYGON");
16190 setRubberMode("POLYGON_INSCRIBE");
16191 setRubberPoint("POLYGON_CENTER", global.centerX, global.centerY);
16192 setRubberPoint("POLYGON_NUM_SIDES", global.numSides, 0);
16193 }
16194 else if (global.polyType == "Circumscribed") {
16195 global->mode = MODE_CIRCUMSCRIBE;
16196 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify polygon side point or [Distance]: "));
16197 add_rubber("POLYGON");
16198 setRubberMode("POLYGON_CIRCUMSCRIBE");
16199 setRubberPoint("POLYGON_CENTER", global.centerX, global.centerY);
16200 setRubberPoint("POLYGON_NUM_SIDES", global.numSides, 0);
16201 }
16202 else {
16203 error("POLYGON", translate("Polygon type is not Inscribed or Circumscribed."));
16204 }
16205 }
16206 else {
16207 alert(translate("Invalid option keyword."));
16208 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify polygon type [Inscribed in circle/Circumscribed around circle]") + " {" + global.polyType + "}: ");
16209 }
16210 }
16211 case MODE_INSCRIBE) {
16212 if (streq(str, "D" || streq(str, "DISTANCE") {
16213 global->mode = MODE_DISTANCE;
16214 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify distance: "));
16215 }
16216 else {
16217 std_vector<char *> strList = str.split(",");
16218 if (isnan(strList[0]) || isnan(strList[1])) {
16219 alert(translate("Point or option keyword required."));
16220 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify polygon corner point or [Distance]: "));
16221 }
16222 else {
16223 global.pointIX = Number(strList[0]);
16224 global.pointIY = Number(strList[1]);
16225 setRubberPoint("POLYGON_INSCRIBE_POINT", global.pointIX, global.pointIY);
16226 vulcanize();
16227 end_command();
16228 }
16229 }
16230 }
16231 case MODE_CIRCUMSCRIBE) {
16232 if (streq(str, "D" || streq(str, "DISTANCE") {
16233 global->mode = MODE_DISTANCE;
16234 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify distance: "));
16235 }
16236 else {
16237 std_vector<char *> strList = str.split(",");
16238 if (isnan(strList[0]) || isnan(strList[1])) {
16239 alert(translate("Point or option keyword required."));
16240 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify polygon side point or [Distance]: "));
16241 }
16242 else {
16243 global.pointCX = Number(strList[0]);
16244 global.pointCY = Number(strList[1]);
16245 setRubberPoint("POLYGON_CIRCUMSCRIBE_POINT", global.pointCX, global.pointCY);
16246 vulcanize();
16247 end_command();
16248 }
16249 }
16250 }
16251 case MODE_DISTANCE) {
16252 if (isnan(str)) {
16253 alert(translate("Requires valid numeric distance."));
16254 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify distance: "));
16255 }
16256 else {
16257 if (global.polyType == "Inscribed") {
16258 global.pointIX = global.centerX;
16259 global.pointIY = global.centerY + Number(str);
16260 setRubberPoint("POLYGON_INSCRIBE_POINT", global.pointIX, global.pointIY);
16261 vulcanize();
16262 end_command();
16263 }
16264 else if (global.polyType == "Circumscribed") {
16265 global.pointCX = global.centerX;
16266 global.pointCY = global.centerY + Number(str);
16267 setRubberPoint("POLYGON_CIRCUMSCRIBE_POINT", global.pointCX, global.pointCY);
16268 vulcanize();
16269 end_command();
16270 }
16271 else {
16272 error("POLYGON", translate("Polygon type is not Inscribed or Circumscribed."));
16273 }
16274 }
16275 }
16276 case MODE_SIDE_LEN) {
16277 todo("POLYGON", "Sidelength mode");
16278 }
16279 */
16280}
16281
16293static void
16294embPolyline_main(void)
16295{
16296 init_command();
16297 clear_selection();
16298 /*
16299 global.firstRun = true;
16300 global.firstX = 0.0f;
16301 global.firstY = 0.0f;
16302 global.prevX = 0.0f;
16303 global.prevY = 0.0f;
16304 global.num = 0;
16305 */
16306 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify first point: "));
16307}
16308
16312static void
16313embPolyline_click(UiObject *global, float x, float y)
16314{
16315 if (global->firstRun) {
16316 global->firstRun = false;
16317 global->controlPoints[0].x = x;
16318 global->controlPoints[0].y = y;
16319 global->controlPoints[1].x = x;
16320 global->controlPoints[1].y = y;
16321 /*
16322 add_rubber("POLYLINE");
16323 setRubberMode("POLYLINE");
16324 setRubberPoint("POLYLINE_POINT_0",
16325 global->controlPoints[0].x,
16326 global->controlPoints[0].y);
16327 append_prompt_history();
16328 */
16329 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify next point or [Undo]: "));
16330 }
16331 else {
16332 global->numPoints++;
16333 /*
16334 setRubberPoint("POLYLINE_POINT_" + global.num.toString(), x, y);
16335 setRubberText("POLYLINE_NUM_POINTS", global.num.toString());
16336 spareRubber("POLYLINE");
16337 append_prompt_history();
16338 */
16339 global->controlPoints[1].x = x;
16340 global->controlPoints[1].y = y;
16341 }
16342}
16343
16347static void
16348embPolyline_prompt(UiObject global, const char *str)
16349{
16350 if (global.firstRun) {
16351 /*
16352 std_vector<char *> strList = str.split(",");
16353 if (isnan(strList[0]) || isnan(strList[1])) {
16354 alert(translate("Invalid point."));
16355 */
16356 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify first point: "));
16357 /*
16358 }
16359 else {
16360 */
16361 global.firstRun = false;
16362 /*
16363 global.firstX = Number(strList[0]);
16364 global.firstY = Number(strList[1]);
16365 global.prevX = global.firstX;
16366 global.prevY = global.firstY;
16367 add_rubber("POLYLINE");
16368 setRubberMode("POLYLINE");
16369 setRubberPoint("POLYLINE_POINT_0", global.firstX, global.firstY);
16370 */
16371 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify next point or [Undo]: "));
16372 /*
16373 }
16374 */
16375 }
16376 else {
16377 /*
16378 if (streq(str, "U" || streq(str, "UNDO") {
16379 todo("POLYLINE", "prompt() for UNDO");
16380 }
16381 else {
16382 std_vector<char *> strList = str.split(",");
16383 if (isnan(strList[0]) || isnan(strList[1])) {
16384 alert(translate("Point or option keyword required."));
16385 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify next point or [Undo]: "));
16386 }
16387 else {
16388 float x = Number(strList[0]);
16389 float y = Number(strList[1]);
16390 global.num++;
16391 setRubberPoint("POLYLINE_POINT_" + global.num.toString(), x, y);
16392 setRubberText("POLYLINE_NUM_POINTS", global.num.toString());
16393 spareRubber("POLYLINE");
16394 global.prevX = x;
16395 global.prevY = y;
16396 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify next point or [Undo]: "));
16397 }
16398 }
16399 */
16400 }
16401}
16402
16406UiObject
16407locate_point_main(void)
16408{
16409 UiObject global;
16410 init_command();
16411 clear_selection();
16412 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify point: "));
16413 return global;
16414}

16420locate_point_click(UiObject *global, EmbVector v)
16421{
16422 /*
16423 append_prompt_history();
16424 set_prompt_prefix("X = " + x.toString() + ", Y = " + y.toString());
16425 append_prompt_history();
16426 */
16427 end_command();
16428}
16429
16433static void
16434located_point_prompt(UiObject *global, const char *str)
16435{
16436 /*
16437 std_vector<char *> strList = str.split(",");
16438 if (isnan(strList[0]) || isnan(strList[1])) {
16439 alert(translate("Invalid point."));
16440 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify point: "));
16441 }
16442 else {
16443 append_prompt_history();
16444 set_prompt_prefix("X = " + strList[0].toString() + ", Y = " + strList[1].toString());
16445 append_prompt_history();
16446 end_command();
16447 }
16448 */
16449}
16450
16456UiObject
16457move_main(void)
16458{
16459 UiObject global;
16460 init_command();
16461 global.firstRun = true;
16462 /* base */
16463 global.controlPoints[0].x = 0.0f;
16464 global.controlPoints[0].y = 0.0f;
16465 /* dest */
16466 global.controlPoints[1].x = 0.0f;
16467 global.controlPoints[1].y = 0.0f;
16468 /* delta */
16469 global.controlPoints[2].x = 0.0f;
16470 global.controlPoints[2].y = 0.0f;
16471 /*
16472 if ( active_view->n_selected() <= 0) {
16473 alert(translate("Preselect objects before invoking the move command."));
16474 end_command();
16475 messageBox("information", translate("Move Preselect"), translate("Preselect objects before invoking the move command."));
16476 }
16477 else {
16478 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify base point: "));
16479 }
16480 */
16481 return global;
16482}
16483
16487static void
16488move_click(UiObject *global, EmbVector v)
16489{
16490 if (global->firstRun) {
16491 global->firstRun = false;
16492 /*
16493 global->baseX = x;
16494 global->baseY = y;
16495 add_rubber("LINE");
16496 setRubberMode("LINE");
16497 setRubberPoint("LINE_START", global.baseX, global.baseY);
16498 previewOn("SELECTED", "MOVE", global.baseX, global.baseY, 0);
16499 append_prompt_history();
16500 */
16501 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify destination point: "));
16502 }
16503 else {
16504 /*
16505 global->destX = x;
16506 global->destY = y;
16507 global->deltaX = global.destX - global.baseX;
16508 global->deltaY = global.destY - global.baseY;
16509 moveSelected(global.deltaX, global.deltaY);
16510 previewOff();
16511 */
16512 end_command();
16513 }
16514}
16515
16519static void
16520move_prompt(UiObject *global, const char *str)
16521{
16522 if (global->firstRun) {
16523 /*
16524 std_vector<char *> strList = str.split(",");
16525 if (isnan(strList[0]) || isnan(strList[1])) {
16526 alert(translate("Invalid point."));
16527 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify base point: "));
16528 }
16529 else {
16530 global.firstRun = false;
16531 global.baseX = Number(strList[0]);
16532 global.baseY = Number(strList[1]);
16533 add_rubber("LINE");
16534 setRubberMode("LINE");
16535 setRubberPoint("LINE_START", global.baseX, global.baseY);
16536 previewOn("SELECTED", "MOVE", global.baseX, global.baseY, 0);
16537 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify destination point: "));
16538 }
16539 */
16540 }
16541 else {
16542 /*
16543 std_vector<char *> strList = str.split(",");
16544 if (isnan(strList[0]) || isnan(strList[1])) {
16545 alert(translate("Invalid point."));
16546 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify destination point: "));
16547 }
16548 else {
16549 global.destX = Number(strList[0]);
16550 global.destY = Number(strList[1]);
16551 global.deltaX = global.destX - global.baseX;
16552 global.deltaY = global.destY - global.baseY;
16553 moveSelected(global.deltaX, global.deltaY);
16554 previewOff();
16555 end_command();
16556 }
16557 */
16558 }
16559}

16567UiObject
16568quickleader_main(void)
16569{
16570 UiObject global;
16571 init_command();
16572 clear_selection();
16573 /*
16574 global.x1 = 0.0f;
16575 global.y1 = 0.0f;
16576 global.x2 = 0.0f;
16577 global.y2 = 0.0f;
16578 */
16579 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify first point: "));
16580 return global;
16581}

16595 setRubberPoint("DIMLEADER_LINE_START", global.x1, global.y1);

16658UiObject
16659rectangle_main(void)
