16666 global.x1 = 0.0f;
16667 global.y1 = 0.0f;
16668 global.x2 = 0.0f;
16669 global.y2 = 0.0f;
16670 */
16671 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify first corner point or [Chamfer/Fillet]: "));
16672 return global;
16673}
16674
16678static void
16679rectangle_click(UiObject *global, EmbVector position)
16680{
16681 /*
16682 if (global.newRect) {
16683 global.newRect = false;
16684 global.x1 = x;
16685 global.y1 = y;
16686 add_rubber("RECTANGLE");
16687 setRubberMode("RECTANGLE");
16688 setRubberPoint("RECTANGLE_START", x, y);
16689 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify other corner point or [Dimensions]: "));
16690 }
16691 else {
16692 global.newRect = true;
16693 global.x2 = x;
16694 global.y2 = y;
16695 setRubberPoint("RECTANGLE_END", x, y);
16696 vulcanize();
16697 end_command();
16698 }
16699 */
16700}
16701
16705static void
16706rectangle_prompt(UiObject *global, const char *str)
16707{
16708 /*
16709 if (streq(str, "C" || streq(str, "CHAMFER") {
16710 todo("RECTANGLE", "prompt() for CHAMFER");
16711 }
16712 else if (streq(str, "D" || streq(str, "DIMENSIONS") {
16713 todo("RECTANGLE", "prompt() for DIMENSIONS");
16714 }
16715 else if (streq(str, "F" || streq(str, "FILLET") {
16716 todo("RECTANGLE", "prompt() for FILLET");
16717 }
16718 else {
16719 std_vector<char *> strList = str.split(",");
16720 if (isnan(strList[0]) || isnan(strList[1])) {
16721 alert(translate("Invalid point."));
16722 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify first point: "));
16723 }
16724 else {
16725 float x = Number(strList[0]);
16726 float y = Number(strList[1]);
16727 if (global.newRect) {
16728 global.newRect = false;
16729 global.x1 = x;
16730 global.y1 = y;
16731 add_rubber("RECTANGLE");
16732 setRubberMode("RECTANGLE");
16733 setRubberPoint("RECTANGLE_START", x, y);
16734 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify other corner point or [Dimensions]: "));
16735 }
16736 else {
16737 global.newRect = true;
16738 global.x2 = x;
16739 global.y2 = y;
16740 setRubberPoint("RECTANGLE_END", x, y);
16741 vulcanize();
16742 end_command();
16743 }
16744 }
16745 }
16746 */
16747}
16748
16752#define RGB_MODE_BACKGROUND 0
16753#define RGB_MODE_CROSSHAIR 1
16754#define RGB_MODE_GRID 2
16755
16762UiObject
16763rgb_main(void)
16764{
16765 UiObject global;
16766 init_command();
16767 clear_selection();
16768 /*
16769 global->mode = MODE_BACKGROUND;
16770 */
16771 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Enter RED,GREEN,BLUE values for background or [Crosshair/Grid]: "));
16772 return global;
16773}
16774
16778static void
16779rgb_prompt(const char *str)
16780{
16781 /*
16782 if (global->mode == MODE_BACKGROUND) {
16783 if (streq(str, "C" || streq(str, "CROSSHAIR") {
16784 //\todo Probably should add additional translate calls here.
16785 global->mode = MODE_CROSSHAIR;
16786 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify crosshair color: "));
16787 }
16788 else if (streq(str, "G" || streq(str, "GRID") {
16789 //\todo Probably should add additional translate calls here.
16790 global->mode = MODE_GRID;
16791 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify grid color: "));
16792 }
16793 else {
16794 std_vector<char *> strList = str.split(",");
16795 float r = Number(strList[0]);
16796 float g = Number(strList[1]);
16797 float b = Number(strList[2]);
16798 if (!validRGB(r,g,b)) {
16799 alert(translate("Invalid color. R,G,B values must be in the range of 0-255."));
16800 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify background color: "));
16801 }
16802 else {
16803 setBackgroundColor(r,g,b);
16804 end_command();
16805 }
16806 }
16807 }
16808 case MODE_CROSSHAIR) {
16809 std_vector<char *> strList = str.split(",");
16810 float r = Number(strList[0]);
16811 float g = Number(strList[1]);
16812 float b = Number(strList[2]);
16813 if (!validRGB(r,g,b)) {
16814 alert(translate("Invalid color. R,G,B values must be in the range of 0-255."));
16815 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify crosshair color: "));
16816 }
16817 else {
16818 setCrossHairColor(r,g,b);
16819 end_command();
16820 }
16821 }
16822 case MODE_GRID) {
16823 std_vector<char *> strList = str.split(",");
16824 float r = Number(strList[0]);
16825 float g = Number(strList[1]);
16826 float b = Number(strList[2]);
16827 if (!validRGB(r,g,b)) {
16828 alert(translate("Invalid color. R,G,B values must be in the range of 0-255."));
16829 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify grid color: "));
16830 }
16831 else {
16832 setGridColor(r,g,b);
16833 end_command();
16834 }
16835 }
16836 */
16837}
16838
16844UiObject
16845rotate_main(void)
16846{
16847 UiObject global;
16848 init_command();
16849 global.firstRun = true;
16850 /*
16851 global->mode = MODE_NORMAL;
16852 global.base.x = 0.0f;
16853 global.base.y = 0.0f;
16854 global.dest.x = 0.0f;
16855 global.dest.y = 0.0f;
16856 global.angle = 0.0f;
16857
16858 global.baseR.x = 0.0f;
16859 global.baseR.y = 0.0f;
16860 global.destR.x = 0.0f;
16861 global.destR.y = 0.0f;
16862 global.angleRef = 0.0f;
16863 global.angleNew = 0.0f;
16864 */
16865
16866 if (active_view->n_selected <= 0) {
16867 /*
16868 alert(translate("Preselect objects before invoking the rotate command."));
16869 end_command();
16870 messageBox("information", translate("Rotate Preselect"), translate("Preselect objects before invoking the rotate command."));
16871 */
16872 }
16873 else {
16874 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify base point: "));
16875 }
16876 return global;
16877}
16878
16882static void
16883rotate_click(UiObject *global, EmbVector pos)
16884{
16885 switch (global->mode) {
16886 case ROTATE_MODE_NORMAL: {
16887 /*
16888 if (global.firstRun) {
16889 global.firstRun = false;
16890 global.baseX = x;
16891 global.baseY = y;
16892 add_rubber("LINE");
16893 setRubberMode("LINE");
16894 setRubberPoint("LINE_START", global.baseX, global.baseY);
16895 previewOn("SELECTED", "ROTATE", global.baseX, global.baseY, 0);
16896 append_prompt_history();
16897 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify rotation angle or [Reference]: "));
16898 }
16899 else {
16900 global.destX = x;
16901 global.destY = y;
16902 global.angle = calculateAngle(global.baseX, global.baseY, global.destX, global.destY);
16903 append_prompt_history();
16904 rotateSelected(global.baseX, global.baseY, global.angle);
16905 previewOff();
16906 end_command();
16907 }
16908 */
16909 break;
16910 }
16911 case ROTATE_MODE_REFERENCE: {
16912 /*
16913 if (isnan(global.baseR.x)) {
16914 global.baseR.x = x;
16915 global.baseR.y = y;
16916 append_prompt_history();
16917 add_rubber("LINE");
16918 setRubberMode("LINE");
16919 setRubberPoint("LINE_START", global.baseR.x, global.baseR.y);
16920 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify second point: "));
16921 }
16922 else if (isnan(global.destR.x)) {
16923 global.destR.x = x;
16924 global.destR.y = y;
16925 global.angleRef = calculateAngle(global.baseR.x, global.baseR.y, global.destR.x, global.destR.y);
16926 setRubberPoint("LINE_START", global.baseX, global.baseY);
16927 previewOn("SELECTED", "ROTATE", global.baseX, global.baseY, global.angleRef);
16928 append_prompt_history();
16929 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify the new angle: "));
16930 }
16931 else if (isnan(global.angleNew)) {
16932 global.angleNew = calculateAngle(global.baseX, global.baseY, x, y);
16933 rotateSelected(global.baseX, global.baseY, global.angleNew - global.angleRef);
16934 previewOff();
16935 end_command();
16936 }
16937 */
16938 break;
16939 }
16940 default:
16941 break;
16942 }
16943}
16944
16948static void
16949rotate_prompt(UiObject *global, const char *str)
16950{
16951 switch (global->mode) {
16952 case ROTATE_MODE_NORMAL: {
16953 if (global->firstRun) {
16954 /*
16955 std_vector<char *> strList = str.split(",");
16956 if (isnan(strList[0]) || isnan(strList[1])) {
16957 alert(translate("Invalid point."));
16958 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify base point: "));
16959 }
16960 else {
16961 global.firstRun = false;
16962 global.baseX = Number(strList[0]);
16963 global.baseY = Number(strList[1]);
16964 add_rubber("LINE");
16965 setRubberMode("LINE");
16966 setRubberPoint("LINE_START", global.baseX, global.baseY);
16967 previewOn("SELECTED", "ROTATE", global.baseX, global.baseY, 0);
16968 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify rotation angle or [Reference]: "));
16969 }
16970 */
16971 }
16972 else {
16973 /*
16974 if (streq(str, "R" || streq(str, "REFERENCE") {
16975 global->mode = MODE_REFERENCE;
16976 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify the reference angle") + " {0.00}: ");
16977 clearRubber();
16978 previewOff();
16979 }
16980 else {
16981 if (isnan(str)) {
16982 alert(translate("Requires valid numeric angle, second point, or option keyword."));
16983 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify rotation angle or [Reference]: "));
16984 }
16985 else {
16986 global.angle = Number(str);
16987 rotateSelected(global.baseX, global.baseY, global.angle);
16988 previewOff();
16989 end_command();
16990 }
16991 }
16992 */
16993 }
16994 break;
16995 }
16996 case ROTATE_MODE_REFERENCE: {
16997 /*
16998 if (isnan(global.baseR.x)) {
16999 if (isnan(str)) {
17000 std_vector<char *> strList = str.split(",");
17001 if (isnan(strList[0]) || isnan(strList[1])) {
17002 alert(translate("Requires valid numeric angle or two points."));
17003 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify the reference angle") + " {0.00}: ");
17004 }
17005 else {
17006 global.baseR.x = Number(strList[0]);
17007 global.baseR.y = Number(strList[1]);
17008 add_rubber("LINE");
17009 setRubberMode("LINE");
17010 setRubberPoint("LINE_START", global.baseR.x, global.baseR.y);
17011 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify second point: "));
17012 }
17013 }
17014 else {
17015 //The base and dest values are only set here to advance the command.
17016 global.baseR.x = 0.0;
17017 global.baseR.y = 0.0;
17018 global.destR.x = 0.0;
17019 global.destR.y = 0.0;
17020 //The reference angle is what we will use later.
17021 global.angleRef = Number(str);
17022 add_rubber("LINE");
17023 setRubberMode("LINE");
17024 setRubberPoint("LINE_START", global.baseX, global.baseY);
17025 previewOn("SELECTED", "ROTATE", global.baseX, global.baseY, global.angleRef);
17026 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify the new angle: "));
17027 }
17028 }
17029 else if (isnan(global.destR.x)) {
17030 if (isnan(str)) {
17031 std_vector<char *> strList = str.split(",");
17032 if (isnan(strList[0]) || isnan(strList[1])) {
17033 alert(translate("Requires valid numeric angle or two points."));
17034 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify second point: "));
17035 }
17036 else {
17037 global.destR.x = Number(strList[0]);
17038 global.destR.y = Number(strList[1]);
17039 global.angleRef = calculateAngle(global.baseR.x, global.baseR.y, global.destR.x, global.destR.y);
17040 previewOn("SELECTED", "ROTATE", global.baseX, global.baseY, global.angleRef);
17041 setRubberPoint("LINE_START", global.baseX, global.baseY);
17042 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify the new angle: "));
17043 }
17044 }
17045 else {
17046 //The base and dest values are only set here to advance the command.
17047 global.baseR.x = 0.0;
17048 global.baseR.y = 0.0;
17049 global.destR.x = 0.0;
17050 global.destR.y = 0.0;
17051 //The reference angle is what we will use later.
17052 global.angleRef = Number(str);
17053 previewOn("SELECTED", "ROTATE", global.baseX, global.baseY, global.angleRef);
17054 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify the new angle: "));
17055 }
17056 }
17057 else if (isnan(global.angleNew)) {
17058 if (isnan(str)) {
17059 std_vector<char *> strList = str.split(",");
17060 if (isnan(strList[0]) || isnan(strList[1])) {
17061 alert(translate("Requires valid numeric angle or second point."));
17062 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify the new angle: "));
17063 }
17064 else {
17065 float x = Number(strList[0]);
17066 float y = Number(strList[1]);
17067 global.angleNew = calculateAngle(global.baseX, global.baseY, x, y);
17068 rotateSelected(global.baseX, global.baseY, global.angleNew - global.angleRef);
17069 previewOff();
17070 end_command();
17071 }
17072 }
17073 else {
17074 global.angleNew = Number(str);
17075 rotateSelected(global.baseX, global.baseY, global.angleNew - global.angleRef);
17076 previewOff();
17077 end_command();
17078 }
17079 }
17080 }
17081 */
17082 break;
17083 }
17084 default:
17085 break;
17086 }
17087}
17088
17089
17097static UiObject
17098sandbox_main(void)
17099{
17100 UiObject global;
17101 init_command();
17102 /*
17103 //Report number of pre-selected objects
17104 set_prompt_prefix("Number of Objects Selected: " + active_view->n_selected().toString());
17105 append_prompt_history();
17106
17107 mirrorSelected(0,0,0,1);
17108
17109 //selectAll();
17110 //rotateSelected(0,0,90);
17111
17112 //Polyline & Polygon Testing
17113
17114 EmbVector offset = {0.0f, 0.0f};
17115
17116 float polylineArray = [];
17117 polylineArray.push(1.0 + offsetX);
17118 polylineArray.push(1.0 + offsetY);
17119 polylineArray.push(1.0 + offsetX);
17120 polylineArray.push(2.0 + offsetY);
17121 polylineArray.push(2.0 + offsetX);
17122 polylineArray.push(2.0 + offsetY);
17123 polylineArray.push(2.0 + offsetX);
17124 polylineArray.push(3.0 + offsetY);
17125 polylineArray.push(3.0 + offsetX);
17126 polylineArray.push(3.0 + offsetY);
17127 polylineArray.push(3.0 + offsetX);
17128 polylineArray.push(2.0 + offsetY);
17129 polylineArray.push(4.0 + offsetX);
17130 polylineArray.push(2.0 + offsetY);
17131 polylineArray.push(4.0 + offsetX);
17132 polylineArray.push(1.0 + offsetY);
17133 addPolyline(polylineArray);
17134
17135 offsetX = 5.0;
17136 offsetY = 0.0;
17137
17138 float polygonArray = [];
17139 polygonArray.push(1.0 + offsetX);
17140 polygonArray.push(1.0 + offsetY);
17141 polygonArray.push(1.0 + offsetX);
17142 polygonArray.push(2.0 + offsetY);
17143 polygonArray.push(2.0 + offsetX);
17144 polygonArray.push(2.0 + offsetY);
17145 polygonArray.push(2.0 + offsetX);
17146 polygonArray.push(3.0 + offsetY);
17147 polygonArray.push(3.0 + offsetX);
17148 polygonArray.push(3.0 + offsetY);
17149 polygonArray.push(3.0 + offsetX);
17150 polygonArray.push(2.0 + offsetY);
17151 polygonArray.push(4.0 + offsetX);
17152 polygonArray.push(2.0 + offsetY);
17153 polygonArray.push(4.0 + offsetX);
17154 polygonArray.push(1.0 + offsetY);
17155 addPolygon(polygonArray);
17156
17157 */
17158 end_command();
17159 return global;
17160}

17166sandbox_click(UiObject *global, EmbVector pos)
17167{
17168

17175sandbox_prompt(UiObject *global, const char *str)
17176{
17177

17179
17183static UiObject
17184scale_main(void)
17185{
17186 UiObject global;
17187 init_command();
17188 /*
17189 global->mode = MODE_NORMAL;
17190 global.firstRun = true;
17191 global.base.x = 0.0f;
17192 global.base.y = 0.0f;
17193 global.dest.x = 0.0f;
17194 global.dest.y = 0.0f;
17195 global.factor = 0.0f;
17196
17197 global.baseR.x = 0.0f;
17198 global.baseR.y = 0.0f;
17199 global.destR.x = 0.0f;
17200 global.destR.y = 0.0f;
17201 global.factorRef = 0.0f;
17202 global.factorNew = 0.0f;
17203
17204 if ( active_view->n_selected() <= 0) {
17205 //\todo Prompt to select objects if nothing is preselected
17206 alert(translate("Preselect objects before invoking the scale command."));
17207 end_command();
17208 messageBox("information", translate("Scale Preselect"), translate("Preselect objects before invoking the scale command."));
17209 }
17210 else */ {
17211 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify base point: "));
17212 }
17213 return global;
17214}
17215
17219static void
17220scale_click(UiObject *global, EmbVector pos)
17221{
17222 switch (global->mode) {
17223 case SCALE_MODE_NORMAL: {
17224 /*
17225 if (global.firstRun) {
17226 global.firstRun = false;
17227 global.baseX = x;
17228 global.baseY = y;
17229 add_rubber("LINE");
17230 setRubberMode("LINE");
17231 setRubberPoint("LINE_START", global.baseX, global.baseY);
17232 previewOn("SELECTED", "SCALE", global.baseX, global.baseY, 1);
17233 append_prompt_history();
17234 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify scale factor or [Reference]: "));
17235 }
17236 else {
17237 global.destX = x;
17238 global.destY = y;
17239 global.factor = calculateDistance(global.baseX, global.baseY, global.destX, global.destY);
17240 append_prompt_history();
17241 scaleSelected(global.baseX, global.baseY, global.factor);
17242 previewOff();
17243 end_command();
17244 }
17245 */
17246 break;
17247 }
17248 case SCALE_MODE_REFERENCE: {
17249 /*
17250 if (isnan(global.baseR.x)) {
17251 global.baseR.x = x;
17252 global.baseR.y = y;
17253 append_prompt_history();
17254 add_rubber("LINE");
17255 setRubberMode("LINE");
17256 setRubberPoint("LINE_START", global.baseR.x, global.baseR.y);
17257 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify second point: "));
17258 }
17259 else if (isnan(global.destR.x)) {
17260 global.destR.x = x;
17261 global.destR.y = y;
17262 global.factorRef = calculateDistance(global.baseR.x, global.baseR.y, global.destR.x, global.destR.y);
17263 if (global.factorRef <= 0.0) {
17264 global.destR.x = 0.0f;
17265 global.destR.y = 0.0f;
17266 global.factorRef = 0.0f;
17267 alert(translate("Value must be positive and nonzero."));
17268 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify second point: "));
17269 }
17270 else {
17271 append_prompt_history();
17272 setRubberPoint("LINE_START", global.baseX, global.baseY);
17273 previewOn("SELECTED", "SCALE", global.baseX, global.baseY, global.factorRef);
17274 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify new length: "));
17275 }
17276 }
17277 else if (isnan(global.factorNew)) {
17278 global.factorNew = calculateDistance(global.baseX, global.baseY, x, y);
17279 if (global.factorNew <= 0.0) {
17280 global.factorNew = 0.0f;
17281 alert(translate("Value must be positive and nonzero."));
17282 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify new length: "));
17283 }
17284 else {
17285 append_prompt_history();
17286 scaleSelected(global.baseX, global.baseY, global.factorNew/global.factorRef);
17287 previewOff();
17288 end_command();
17289 }
17290 }
17291 */
17292 break;
17293 }
17294 default:
17295 break;
17296 }
17297}
17298
17302static void
17303scale_prompt(UiObject *global, const char *str)
17304{
17305 switch (global->mode) {
17306 case SCALE_MODE_NORMAL: {
17307 if (global->firstRun) {
17308 /*
17309 std_vector<char *> strList = str.split(",");
17310 if (isnan(strList[0]) || isnan(strList[1])) {
17311 alert(translate("Invalid point."));
17312 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify base point: "));
17313 }
17314 else {
17315 global.firstRun = false;
17316 global.baseX = Number(strList[0]);
17317 global.baseY = Number(strList[1]);
17318 add_rubber("LINE");
17319 setRubberMode("LINE");
17320 setRubberPoint("LINE_START", global.baseX, global.baseY);
17321 previewOn("SELECTED", "SCALE", global.baseX, global.baseY, 1);
17322 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify scale factor or [Reference]: "));
17323 }
17324 */
17325 }
17326 else {
17327 /*
17328 if (streq(str, "R" || streq(str, "REFERENCE") {
17329 global->mode = MODE_REFERENCE;
17330 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify reference length") + " {1}: ");
17331 clearRubber();
17332 previewOff();
17333 }
17334 else {
17335 if (isnan(str)) {
17336 alert(translate("Requires valid numeric distance, second point, or option keyword."));
17337 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify scale factor or [Reference]: "));
17338 }
17339 else {
17340 global.factor = Number(str);
17341 scaleSelected(global.baseX, global.baseY, global.factor);
17342 previewOff();
17343 end_command();
17344 }
17345 }
17346 */
17347 }
17348 break;
17349 }
17350 case SCALE_MODE_REFERENCE: {
17351 /*
17352 if (isnan(global.baseR.x)) {
17353 if (isnan(str)) {
17354 std_vector<char *> strList = str.split(",");
17355 if (isnan(strList[0]) || isnan(strList[1])) {
17356 alert(translate("Requires valid numeric distance or two points."));
17357 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify reference length") + " {1}: ");
17358 }
17359 else {
17360 global.baseR.x = Number(strList[0]);
17361 global.baseR.y = Number(strList[1]);
17362 add_rubber("LINE");
17363 setRubberMode("LINE");
17364 setRubberPoint("LINE_START", global.baseR.x, global.baseR.y);
17365 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify second point: "));
17366 }
17367 }
17368 else {
17369 //The base and dest values are only set here to advance the command.
17370 global.baseR.x = 0.0;
17371 global.baseR.y = 0.0;
17372 global.destR.x = 0.0;
17373 global.destR.y = 0.0;
17374 //The reference length is what we will use later.
17375 global.factorRef = Number(str);
17376 if (global.factorRef <= 0.0) {
17377 global.baseR.x = 0.0f;
17378 global.baseR.y = 0.0f;
17379 global.destR.x = 0.0f;
17380 global.destR.y = 0.0f;
17381 global.factorRef = 0.0f;
17382 alert(translate("Value must be positive and nonzero."));
17383 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify reference length") + " {1}: ");
17384 }
17385 else {
17386 add_rubber("LINE");
17387 setRubberMode("LINE");
17388 setRubberPoint("LINE_START", global.baseX, global.baseY);
17389 previewOn("SELECTED", "SCALE", global.baseX, global.baseY, global.factorRef);
17390 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify new length: "));
17391 }
17392 }
17393 }
17394 else if (isnan(global.destR.x)) {
17395 if (isnan(str)) {
17396 std_vector<char *> strList = str.split(",");
17397 if (isnan(strList[0]) || isnan(strList[1])) {
17398 alert(translate("Requires valid numeric distance or two points."));
17399 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify second point: "));
17400 }
17401 else {
17402 global.destR.x = Number(strList[0]);
17403 global.destR.y = Number(strList[1]);
17404 global.factorRef = calculateDistance(global.baseR.x, global.baseR.y, global.destR.x, global.destR.y);
17405 if (global.factorRef <= 0.0) {
17406 global.destR.x = 0.0f;
17407 global.destR.y = 0.0f;
17408 global.factorRef = 0.0f;
17409 alert(translate("Value must be positive and nonzero."));
17410 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify second point: "));
17411 }
17412 else {
17413 setRubberPoint("LINE_START", global.baseX, global.baseY);
17414 previewOn("SELECTED", "SCALE", global.baseX, global.baseY, global.factorRef);
17415 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify new length: "));
17416 }
17417 }
17418 }
17419 else {
17420 //The base and dest values are only set here to advance the command.
17421 global.baseR.x = 0.0;
17422 global.baseR.y = 0.0;
17423 global.destR.x = 0.0;
17424 global.destR.y = 0.0;
17425 //The reference length is what we will use later.
17426 global.factorRef = Number(str);
17427 if (global.factorRef <= 0.0) {
17428 global.destR.x = 0.0f;
17429 global.destR.y = 0.0f;
17430 global.factorRef = 0.0f;
17431 alert(translate("Value must be positive and nonzero."));
17432 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify second point: "));
17433 }
17434 else {
17435 setRubberPoint("LINE_START", global.baseX, global.baseY);
17436 previewOn("SELECTED", "SCALE", global.baseX, global.baseY, global.factorRef);
17437 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify new length: "));
17438 }
17439 }
17440 }
17441 else if (isnan(global.factorNew)) {
17442 if (isnan(str)) {
17443 std_vector<char *> strList = str.split(",");
17444 if (isnan(strList[0]) || isnan(strList[1])) {
17445 alert(translate("Requires valid numeric distance or second point."));
17446 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify new length: "));
17447 }
17448 else {
17449 float x = Number(strList[0]);
17450 float y = Number(strList[1]);
17451 global.factorNew = calculateDistance(global.baseX, global.baseY, x, y);
17452 if (global.factorNew <= 0.0)
17453 {
17454 global.factorNew = 0.0f;
17455 alert(translate("Value must be positive and nonzero."));
17456 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify new length: "));
17457 }
17458 else {
17459 scaleSelected(global.baseX, global.baseY, global.factorNew/global.factorRef);
17460 previewOff();
17461 end_command();
17462 }
17463 }
17464 }
17465 else {
17466 global.factorNew = Number(str);
17467 if (global.factorNew <= 0.0) {
17468 global.factorNew = 0.0f;
17469 alert(translate("Value must be positive and nonzero."));
17470 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify new length: "));
17471 }
17472 else {
17473 scaleSelected(global.baseX, global.baseY, global.factorNew/global.factorRef);
17474 previewOff();
17475 end_command();
17476 }
17477 }
17478 }
17479 */
17480 break;
17481 }
17482 default:
17483 break;
17484 }
17485}
17486
17490static UiObject
17491single_line_text_main(void)
17492{
17493 UiObject global;
17494 init_command();
17495 clear_selection();
17496 /*
17497 global.text = "";
17498 global.position = {0.0f, 0.0f};
17499 global.textJustify = "Left";
17500 global.textFont = textFont();
17501 global.textHeight = 0.0f;
17502 global.textRotation = 0.0f;
17503 global->mode = SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_MODE_SETGEOM;
17504 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Current font: ") + "{" + global.textFont + "} " + translate("Text height: ") + "{" + textSize() + "}");
17505 append_prompt_history();
17506 */
17507 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify start point of text or [Justify/Setfont]: "));
17508 return global;
17509}
17510
17514static void
17515single_line_text_click(UiObject *global, EmbVector pos)
17516{
17517 /*
17518 if (global->mode == MODE_SETGEOM) {
17519 if (isnan(global.textX)) {
17520 global.textX = x;
17521 global.textY = y;
17522 add_rubber("LINE");
17523 setRubberMode("LINE");
17524 setRubberPoint("LINE_START", global.textX, global.textY);
17525 append_prompt_history();
17526 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify text height") + " {" + textSize() + "}: ");
17527 }
17528 else if (isnan(global.textHeight)) {
17529 global.textHeight = calculateDistance(global.textX, global.textY, x, y);
17530 setTextSize(global.textHeight);
17531 append_prompt_history();
17532 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify text angle") + " {" + textAngle() + "}: ");
17533 }
17534 else if (isnan(global.textRotation)) {
17535 global.textRotation = calculateAngle(global.textX, global.textY, x, y);
17536 setTextAngle(global.textRotation);
17537 append_prompt_history();
17538 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Enter text: "));
17539 global->mode = MODE_RAPID;
17540 enablePromptRapidFire();
17541 clearRubber();
17542 add_rubber("TEXTSINGLE");
17543 setRubberMode("TEXTSINGLE");
17544 setRubberPoint("TEXT_POINT", global.textX, global.textY);
17545 setRubberPoint("TEXT_HEIGHT_ROTATION", global.textHeight, global.textRotation);
17546 setRubberText("TEXT_FONT", global.textFont);
17547 setRubberText("TEXT_JUSTIFY", global.textJustify);
17548 setRubberText("TEXT_RAPID", global.text);
17549 }
17550 else {
17551 //Do nothing, as we are in rapidFire mode now.
17552 }
17553 }
17554 */
17555}
17556
17560static void
17561single_line_text_prompt(UiObject *global, const char *str)
17562{
17563 switch (global->mode) {
17564 case SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_MODE_JUSTIFY:
17565 global->mode = SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_MODE_SETGEOM;
17566 if (streq(str, "C") || streq(str, "CENTER")) {
17567 global->textJustify = JUSTIFY_TOPCENTER;
17568 /*
17569 setRubberText("TEXT_JUSTIFY", global.textJustify);
17570 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify center point of text or [Justify/Setfont]: "));
17571 */
17572 break;
17573 }
17574 if (streq(str, "R") || streq(str, "RIGHT")) {
17575 global->textJustify = JUSTIFY_RIGHT;
17576 /*
17577 setRubberText("TEXT_JUSTIFY", global.textJustify);
17578 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify right-end point of text or [Justify/Setfont]: "));
17579 */
17580 break;
17581 }
17582 /*
17583 if (streq(str, "A") || streq(str, "ALIGN")) {
17584 global.textJustify = "Aligned";
17585 setRubberText("TEXT_JUSTIFY", global.textJustify);
17586 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify start point of text or [Justify/Setfont]: "));
17587 break;
17588 }
17589 if (streq(str, "M" || streq(str, "MIDDLE") {
17590 global.textJustify = "Middle";
17591 setRubberText("TEXT_JUSTIFY", global.textJustify);
17592 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify middle point of text or [Justify/Setfont]: "));
17593 }
17594 else if (streq(str, "F" || streq(str, "FIT") {
17595 global.textJustify = "Fit";
17596 setRubberText("TEXT_JUSTIFY", global.textJustify);
17597 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify start point of text or [Justify/Setfont]: "));
17598 }
17599 else if (streq(str, "TL" || streq(str, "TOPLEFT") {
17600 global.textJustify = "Top Left";
17601 setRubberText("TEXT_JUSTIFY", global.textJustify);
17602 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify top-left point of text or [Justify/Setfont]: "));
17603 }
17604 else if (streq(str, "TC" || streq(str, "TOPCENTER") {
17605 global.textJustify = "Top Center";
17606 setRubberText("TEXT_JUSTIFY", global.textJustify);
17607 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify top-center point of text or [Justify/Setfont]: "));
17608 }
17609 else if (streq(str, "TR" || streq(str, "TOPRIGHT") {
17610 global.textJustify = "Top Right";
17611 setRubberText("TEXT_JUSTIFY", global.textJustify);
17612 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify top-right point of text or [Justify/Setfont]: "));
17613 }
17614 else if (streq(str, "ML" || streq(str, "MIDDLELEFT") {
17615 global.textJustify = "Middle Left";
17616 setRubberText("TEXT_JUSTIFY", global.textJustify);
17617 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify middle-left point of text or [Justify/Setfont]: "));
17618 }
17619 else if (streq(str, "MC" || streq(str, "MIDDLECENTER") {
17620 global.textJustify = "Middle Center";
17621 setRubberText("TEXT_JUSTIFY", global.textJustify);
17622 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify middle-center point of text or [Justify/Setfont]: "));
17623 }
17624 else if (streq(str, "MR" || streq(str, "MIDDLERIGHT") {
17625 global.textJustify = "Middle Right";
17626 setRubberText("TEXT_JUSTIFY", global.textJustify);
17627 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify middle-right point of text or [Justify/Setfont]: "));
17628 }
17629 else if (streq(str, "BL" || streq(str, "BOTTOMLEFT") {
17630 global.textJustify = "Bottom Left";
17631 setRubberText("TEXT_JUSTIFY", global.textJustify);
17632 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify bottom-left point of text or [Justify/Setfont]: "));
17633 }
17634 else if (streq(str, "BC" || streq(str, "BOTTOMCENTER") {
17635 global.textJustify = "Bottom Center";
17636 setRubberText("TEXT_JUSTIFY", global.textJustify);
17637 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify bottom-center point of text or [Justify/Setfont]: "));
17638 }
17639 else if (streq(str, "BR" || streq(str, "BOTTOMRIGHT") {
17640 global.textJustify = "Bottom Right";
17641 setRubberText("TEXT_JUSTIFY", global.textJustify);
17642 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify bottom-right point of text or [Justify/Setfont]: "));
17643 }
17644 else {
17645 alert(translate("Invalid option keyword."));
17646 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Text Justification Options [Center/Right/Align/Middle/Fit/TL/TC/TR/ML/MC/MR/BL/BC/BR]: "));
17647 }
17648 }
17649 */
17650 break;
17651
17652 case SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_MODE_SETFONT:
17653 global->mode = SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_MODE_SETGEOM;
17654 /*
17655 strcpy(global.textFont, str);
17656 setRubberText("TEXT_FONT", global.textFont);
17657 setTextFont(global.textFont);
17658 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify start point of text or [Justify/Setfont]: "));
17659 */
17660 break;
17661
17662 case SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_MODE_SETGEOM:
17663 /*
17664 if (isnan(global.textX)) {
17665 if (streq(str, "J" || streq(str, "JUSTIFY") {
17666 global->mode = MODE_JUSTIFY;
17667 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Text Justification Options [Center/Right/Align/Middle/Fit/TL/TC/TR/ML/MC/MR/BL/BC/BR]: "));
17668 }
17669 else if (streq(str, "S" || streq(str, "SETFONT") {
17670 global->mode = MODE_SETFONT;
17671 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify font name: "));
17672 }
17673 else {
17674 std_vector<char *> strList = str.split(",");
17675 if (isnan(strList[0]) || isnan(strList[1])) {
17676 alert(translate("Point or option keyword required."));
17677 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify start point of text or [Justify/Setfont]: "));
17678 }
17679 else {
17680 global.textX = Number(strList[0]);
17681 global.textY = Number(strList[1]);
17682 add_rubber("LINE");
17683 setRubberMode("LINE");
17684 setRubberPoint("LINE_START", global.textX, global.textY);
17685 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify text height") + " {" + textSize() + "}: ");
17686 }
17687 }
17688 }
17689 else if (isnan(global.textHeight)) {
17690 if (streq(str, "") {
17691 global.textHeight = textSize();
17692 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify text angle") + " {" + textAngle() + "}: ");
17693 }
17694 else if (isnan(str)) {
17695 alert(translate("Requires valid numeric distance or second point."));
17696 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify text height") + " {" + textSize() + "}: ");
17697 }
17698 else {
17699 global.textHeight = Number(str);
17700 setTextSize(global.textHeight);
17701 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify text angle") + " {" + textAngle() + "}: ");
17702 }
17703 }
17704 else if (isnan(global.textRotation)) {
17705 if (streq(str, "") {
17706 global.textRotation = textAngle();
17707 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Enter text: "));
17708 global->mode = MODE_RAPID;
17709 enablePromptRapidFire();
17710 clearRubber();
17711 add_rubber("TEXTSINGLE");
17712 setRubberMode("TEXTSINGLE");
17713 setRubberPoint("TEXT_POINT", global.textX, global.textY);
17714 setRubberPoint("TEXT_HEIGHT_ROTATION", global.textHeight, global.textRotation);
17715 setRubberText("TEXT_FONT", global.textFont);
17716 setRubberText("TEXT_JUSTIFY", global.textJustify);
17717 setRubberText("TEXT_RAPID", global.text);
17718 }
17719 else if (isnan(str)) {
17720 alert(translate("Requires valid numeric angle or second point."));
17721 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify text angle") + " {" + textAngle() + "}: ");
17722 }
17723 else {
17724 global.textRotation = Number(str);
17725 setTextAngle(global.textRotation);
17726 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Enter text: "));
17727 global->mode = MODE_RAPID;
17728 enablePromptRapidFire();
17729 clearRubber();
17730 add_rubber("TEXTSINGLE");
17731 setRubberMode("TEXTSINGLE");
17732 setRubberPoint("TEXT_POINT", global.textX, global.textY);
17733 setRubberPoint("TEXT_HEIGHT_ROTATION", global.textHeight, global.textRotation);
17734 setRubberText("TEXT_FONT", global.textFont);
17735 setRubberText("TEXT_JUSTIFY", global.textJustify);
17736 setRubberText("TEXT_RAPID", global.text);
17737 }
17738 }
17739 else {
17740 //Do nothing, as we are in rapidFire mode now.
17741 }
17742 */
17743 break;
17744
17745 case SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_MODE_RAPID:
17761 break;
17762
17763 default:
17764 break;
17765 }
17766}
17767
17771UiObject
17772snowflake_main(void)
17773{
17774 UiObject global = generic_design_init();
17775 global.numPoints = 2048;
17776 global.minPoints = 64;
17777 global.maxPoints = 8192;
17778 global.scale.x = 0.04f;
17779 global.scale.y = 0.04f;
17780 global.mode = SNOWFLAKE_MODE_NUM_POINTS;
17781
17782 /*
17783 add_rubber("POLYGON");
17784 setRubberMode("POLYGON");
17785 updateSnowflake(path, global);
17786 spareRubber("POLYGON");
17787 */
17788 end_command();
17789 return global;
17790}
17791
17795UiObject
17796snowflake_click(UiObject global, EmbVector position)
17797{
17798
17799 return global;
17800}
17801
17808UiObject
17809snowflake_move(UiObject global, EmbVector delta)
17810{
17811 global.center = embVector_add(global.center, delta);
17812 return global;
17813}
17814
17818static void
17819updateSnowflake(EmbPath *path, UiObject global)
17820{
17821 int i;
17822 float t;
17823 EmbVector v;
17824 v.x = 0.0;
17825 v.y = 0.0;
17826 /*
17827
17828 float two_pi = 2*Math.PI;
17829
17830 for (i = 0; i <= numPts; i++)
17831 {
17832 t = two_pi/numPts*i;
17833
17834//Snowflake Curve with t [0,2pi]
17835
17836xx = 4/7*sin(20/11-318*t)+
178373/13*sin(19/11-317*t)+
178383/5*sin(21/16-316*t)+
178391/6*sin(17/5-315*t)+
178402/9*sin(20/19-314*t)+
178415/9*sin(35/9-313*t)+
178427/12*sin(9/8-310*t)+
178435/16*sin(33/8-309*t)+
178445/11*sin(31/11-308*t)+
178454/7*sin(3/8-307*t)+
178464/11*sin(9/8-306*t)+
178477/8*sin(21/11-305*t)+
178482/3*sin(55/13-304*t)+
178495/9*sin(17/7-303*t)+
178503/10*sin(3/13-302*t)+
178514/11*sin(60/17-301*t)+
178526/11*sin(48/11-300*t)+
178539/19*sin(1/6-299*t)+
178544/5*sin(19/11-298*t)+
178557/13*sin(25/8-297*t)+
178567/11*sin(19/7-296*t)+
178571/2*sin(1-295*t)+
178584/9*sin(24/11-294*t)+
178591/3*sin(7/2-291*t)+
178606/17*sin(15/13-290*t)+
1786111/17*sin(32/7-288*t)+
178623/8*sin(33/8-287*t)+
178634/7*sin(15/7-286*t)+
178644/5*sin(48/11-284*t)+
178656/7*sin(10/7-283*t)+
178666/7*sin(20/11-282*t)+
178673/8*sin(11/7-281*t)+
178685/7*sin(23/6-280*t)+
178691/21*sin(19/12-279*t)+
178704/9*sin(1/5-278*t)+
178715/8*sin(5/9-276*t)+
178729/10*sin(2/3-274*t)+
178735/8*sin(5/11-273*t)+
178741/6*sin(9/2-272*t)+
1787512/25*sin(29/12-271*t)+
178767/13*sin(59/15-270*t)+
178775/7*sin(23/9-269*t)+
178783/4*sin(9/2-268*t)+
178795/11*sin(37/9-267*t)+
1788010/11*sin(11/7-266*t)+
178811/3*sin(3/7-264*t)+
178827/9*sin(33/17-262*t)+
178835/8*sin(9/8-261*t)+
178845/8*sin(38/13-260*t)+
1788511/21*sin(36/13-259*t)+
178863/11*sin(1/29-258*t)+
178878/15*sin(31/8-257*t)+
178882/5*sin(3/13-256*t)+
178891/2*sin(47/10-255*t)+
178901/10*sin(33/10-254*t)+
178912/5*sin(1/2-253*t)+
178924/7*sin(33/7-252*t)+
178936/17*sin(3/8-250*t)+
178945/7*sin(25/9-249*t)+
178957/9*sin(35/8-248*t)+
178962/7*sin(81/20-247*t)+
178975/8*sin(25/6-244*t)+
178985/16*sin(11/21-243*t)+
1789911/13*sin(167/42-242*t)+
1790011/15*sin(18/5-241*t)+
1790113/14*sin(37/11-240*t)+
179021/4*sin(20/9-239*t)+
179039/14*sin(52/15-238*t)+
179049/14*sin(17/14-237*t)+
179056/13*sin(69/17-236*t)+
179065/8*sin(74/21-235*t)+
179077/15*sin(76/25-234*t)+
1790810/11*sin(15/8-232*t)+
179095/11*sin(5/9-230*t)+
179101/8*sin(8/3-229*t)+
179115/9*sin(2/7-227*t)+
179124/13*sin(32/9-226*t)+
179132/3*sin(45/11-225*t)+
179141/30*sin(53/15-223*t)+
179157/11*sin(4/11-222*t)+
1791610/19*sin(31/13-221*t)+
17917sin(13/7-219*t)+
179189/14*sin(33/7-216*t)+
179192/3*sin(19/9-215*t)+
179203/5*sin(27/11-214*t)+
179219/11*sin(43/10-210*t)+
179225/7*sin(13/8-209*t)+
179235/9*sin(21/5-208*t)+
179242/7*sin(14/9-206*t)+
179259/8*sin(23/7-205*t)+
1792618/13*sin(11/9-203*t)+
179277/4*sin(47/12-201*t)+
1792810/7*sin(8/9-200*t)+
179297/10*sin(6/11-199*t)+
179305/3*sin(7/6-198*t)+

1793215/8*sin(9/8-195*t)+

179348/3*sin(39/10-191*t)+
1793523/10*sin(2/7-188*t)+
179363/4*sin(3/5-187*t)+
179377/12*sin(50/11-185*t)+
1793857/29*sin(4-184*t)+

1794218/7*sin(5/14-180*t)+
1794317/9*sin(35/12-179*t)+

1794918/11*sin(19/8-172*t)+

1804320/13*sin(1-46*t)+
180447/6*sin(32/7-43*t)+
1804512/7*sin(13/25-42*t)+
1804611/17*sin(9/10-40*t)+
1804711/9*sin(2-39*t)+

18058129/13*sin(38/15-25*t)+
1805913/6*sin(1/8-24*t)+
1806077/13*sin(11/8-23*t)+
1806119/6*sin(15/7-22*t)+
1806218/7*sin(29/10-21*t)+
180639*sin(13/5-18*t)+
18064342/7*sin(11/6-17*t)+
180653/5*sin(49/11-15*t)+
1806638/3*sin(19/7-14*t)+
18067994/9*sin(25/8-13*t)+
1806822/9*sin(49/12-10*t)+
1806997/9*sin(1/14-8*t)+
18070559/7*sin(47/14-7*t)+
1807119/13*sin(5/6-6*t)+
180723*sin(57/17-4*t)+
1807328/5*sin(1-3*t)+
1807410/3*sin(22/7-2*t)+
180751507/3*sin(29/8-t)-
180761407/13*sin(5*t+8/11)-
1807715/2*sin(9*t+2/5)-
180781193/9*sin(11*t+28/27)-
18079209/15*sin(12*t+2/5)-

18475 }
18476
18477 setRubberText("POLYGON_NUM_POINTS", numPts.toString());
18478 */
18479}
18480
18484UiObject
18485generic_design_init(void)
18486{
18487 UiObject design;
18488 init_command();
18489 clear_selection();
18490 design.center.x = 0.0f;
18491 design.center.y = 0.0f;
18492 for (int i=0; i<10; i++) {
18493 design.controlPoints[i].x = 0.0f;
18494 design.controlPoints[i].y = 0.0f;
18495 }
18496 return design;
18497}
18498
18504UiObject
18505star_main(void)
18506{
18507 char msg[200];
18508 UiObject global = generic_design_init();
18509 global.numPoints = 5;
18510 global.mode = STAR_MODE_NUM_POINTS;
18511 sprintf(msg, "%s {%d}: ", translate("Enter number of star points"), global.numPoints);
18512 set_prompt_prefix(msg);
18513 return global;
18514}
18515
18519UiObject
18520star_click(UiObject global, EmbVector pos)
18521{
18522 switch (global.mode) {
18523 case STAR_MODE_NUM_POINTS:
18524 /* Do nothing, the prompt controls this. */
18525 break;
18526 case STAR_MODE_CENTER_PT: {
18527 /*
18528 global.cx = x;
18529 global.cy = y;
18530 global->mode = MODE_RAD_OUTER;
18531 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify outer radius of star: "));
18532 add_rubber("POLYGON");
18533 setRubberMode("POLYGON");
18534 updateStar(global.cx, global.cy);
18535 enableMoveRapidFire();
18536 */
18537 break;
18538 }
18539 case STAR_MODE_RAD_OUTER: {
18540 /*
18541 global.x1 = x;
18542 global.y1 = y;
18543 global->mode = MODE_RAD_INNER;
18544 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify inner radius of star: "));
18545 updateStar(global.x1, global.y1);
18546 */
18547 break;
18548 }
18549 case STAR_MODE_RAD_INNER: {
18550 /*
18551 global.x2 = x;
18552 global.y2 = y;
18553 disableMoveRapidFire();
18554 updateStar(global.x2, global.y2);
18555 spareRubber("POLYGON");
18556 end_command();
18557 */
18558 break;
18559 }
18560 default:
18561 break;
18562 }
18563}
18564
18568UiObject
18569star_move(UiObject global, EmbVector delta)
18570{
18571 switch (global.mode) {
18572 case STAR_MODE_NUM_POINTS:
18573 //Do nothing, the prompt controls this.
18574 break;
18575 case STAR_MODE_CENTER_PT:
18576 //Do nothing, prompt and click controls this.
18577 break;
18578 case STAR_MODE_RAD_OUTER:
18579 // updateStar(delta);
18580 break;
18581 case STAR_MODE_RAD_INNER:
18582 // updateStar(delta);
18583 break;
18584 default:
18585 break;
18586 }
18587 return global;
18588}
18589
18593static void
18594star_prompt(UiObject design, const char *str)
18595{
18596 switch (design.mode) {
18597 case STAR_MODE_NUM_POINTS:
18598 /*
18599 if (streq(str, "" && global.numPoints >= 3 && global.numPoints <= 1024) {
18600 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify center point: "));
18601 global->mode = MODE_CENTER_PT;
18602 }
18603 else {
18604 float tmp = Number(str);
18605 if (isnan(tmp) || !isInt(tmp) || tmp < 3 || tmp > 1024) {
18606 alert(translate("Requires an integer between 3 and 1024."));
18607 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Enter number of star points") + " {" + global.numPoints.toString() + "}: ");
18608 }
18609 else {
18610 global.numPoints = tmp;
18611 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify center point: "));
18612 global->mode = MODE_CENTER_PT;
18613 }
18614 }
18615 */
18616 break;
18617 case STAR_MODE_CENTER_PT:
18618 /*
18619 std_vector<char *> strList = str.split(",");
18620 if (isnan(strList[0]) || isnan(strList[1])) {
18621 alert(translate("Invalid point."));
18622 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify center point: "));
18623 }
18624 else {
18625 global.center.x = Number(strList[0]);
18626 global.center.y = Number(strList[1]);
18627 global->mode = MODE_RAD_OUTER;
18628 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify outer radius of star: "));
18629 add_rubber("POLYGON");
18630 setRubberMode("POLYGON");
18631 updateStar(qsnapX(), qsnapY());
18632 enableMoveRapidFire();
18633 }
18634 */
18635 break;
18636 case STAR_MODE_RAD_INNER:
18637 /*
18638 std_vector<char *> strList = str.split(",");
18639 if (isnan(strList[0]) || isnan(strList[1])) {
18640 alert(translate("Invalid point."));
18641 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify inner radius of star: "));
18642 }
18643 else {
18644 global.x2 = Number(strList[0]);
18645 global.y2 = Number(strList[1]);
18646 disableMoveRapidFire();
18647 updateStar(global.x2, global.y2);
18648 spareRubber("POLYGON");
18649 end_command();
18650 }
18651 */
18652 break;
18653 case STAR_MODE_RAD_OUTER:
18654 /*
18655 std_vector<char *> strList = str.split(",");
18656 if (isnan(strList[0]) || isnan(strList[1])) {
18657 alert(translate("Invalid point."));
18658 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify outer radius of star: "));
18659 }
18660 else {
18661 global.point1.x = Number(strList[0]);
18662 global.point1.y = Number(strList[1]);
18663 global->mode = MODE_RAD_INNER;
18664 set_prompt_prefix(translate("Specify inner radius of star: "));
18665 updateStar(qsnapX(), qsnapY());
18666 }
18667 */
18668 break;
18669 default:
18670 break;
18671 }
18672}
18673
18677static void
18678updateStar(EmbPath *path, UiObject global)
18679{
18680 float distOuter = 0.0;
18681 float distInner = 0.0;
18682 float angOuter = 0.0;
18683
18684 if (n_views == 0) {
18685 return;
18686 }
18687
18688 switch (global.mode) {
18689 case STAR_MODE_RAD_OUTER: {
18690 EmbVector delta;
18691 delta = embVector_subtract(global.center, global.controlPoints[1]);
18692 angOuter = embVector_angle(delta);
18693 distOuter = embVector_distance(global.center, global.controlPoints[1]);
18694 distInner = distOuter/2.0;
18695 break;
18696 }
18697 case STAR_MODE_RAD_INNER: {
18698 EmbVector delta;
18699 delta = embVector_subtract(global.center, global.controlPoints[0]);
18700 angOuter = embVector_angle(delta);
18701 distOuter = embVector_distance(global.center, global.controlPoints[0]);
18702 distInner = embVector_distance(global.center, global.controlPoints[1]);
18703 break;
18704 }
18705 default:
18706 break;
18707 }
18708
18709 //Calculate the Star Points
18710 float angInc = 360.0/(global.numPoints*2);
18711
18712 for (int i = 0; i < (int)global.numPoints*2; i++) {
18713 EmbVector point;
18714 EmbReal angle = (angOuter+(angInc*i)) * embConstantPi / 180.0;
18715 if (i%2 == 1) {
18716 point.x = distOuter*cos(angle);
18717 point.y = distOuter*sin(angle);
18718 }
18719 else {
18720 point.x = distInner*cos(angle);
18721 point.y = distInner*sin(angle);
18722 }
18723 printf("%f %f", point.x, point.y);
18724 /*
18725 setRubberPoint("POLYGON_POINT_" + i.toString(), global.cx + xx, global.cy + yy);
18726 */
18727 }
18728 /*
18729 setRubberText("POLYGON_NUM_POINTS", (global.numPoints*2 - 1).toString());
18730 */
18731}
